T07hvsatssu:17: samyak śāstrecchayā gacchet gabhīrajñāninaṃ sa ca //
T07hvsatssu:23: cirakālañca dharmasya sthitaye na tu kīrtaye //
T07hvsatssu:29: (pṛ) nanu bhavatā satyasiddhiśāstraṃ vakṣyata iti jñātmasmābhiḥ /
T07hvsatssu:34: (u) bhagavān prakṛtyā manuṣyabhūtaḥ sarvākārajñānena sarvadharmāṇāṃ svalakṣaṇavibhāgān prajānāti /
T07hvsatssu:38: taṃ dharmaṃ ye pratipadyante te saṅgha ityucyante /
T07hvsatssu:50: ājanma yo maitrīmabhyasyati tasyākuśalacittamudeti na vā /

T07hvsatssu:59: yathā ghṛtatailabahulaḥ pradīpaḥ vartikāmahimnā mahān prakāśate /
T07hvsatssu:64: tathāgatasya samādhiḥ puruṣaṃ sthānaṃ dharmopadeśaṃ vā ityādipratyayagaṇān nopakṣate /
T07hvsatssu:67: yathā kaścit ātmānaṃ saṃrakṣan sadā smarati na vismarati /
T07hvsatssu:69: tadyathā kaścit svāvasaṃthaṃ prāpya vadati kṣemaprāptaḥ akhinna iti /
T07hvsatssu:75: ṛddhividhinā ekasminneva kṣaṇe daśadikṣu apramāṇadhātuṣu parikrāmati /
T07hvsatssu:80: asukhe ca sukhasaṃjñotpadyate sukhāsukhe ca upekṣāsaṃjñotpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:94: dhyānāvaraṇaṃ kleśotpāda iti dvividhāvidyā tathāgatasya sarvathā prahīṇā /
T07hvsatssu:98: anye sattvā steṣu kauśalaṃ na saṃpādayāṃbabhūvuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:109: prajñāprakarṣāt prakṛṣṭeryāpathaśca bhavati ityādibhiḥ pratyayaiḥ prajñāskandhasampannaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:116: yathā kaścit vṛkṣaṃ chettuṃ haste dhṛtakuṭhāraḥ pāryantikaṃ jānānaḥ prajānāti śākhāḥ praśākhāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:117: tathā bhagavānapi saṃyojanaprahāṇajñānasya pratikṣaṇaṃ kṣīyamāṇaṃ sarvamavayavaśaḥ prajānāti /
T07hvsatssu:121: kiñca bhagavān kālaṃ jñātvā dharmamupadiśati yathā timburukabrāhmaṇādinām /
T07hvsatssu:124: yathā bhagavānānandamāmantrya chandakasya yogyaṃ bhāvābhāvavyāvartakaṃ sūtramupadiśati /
T07hvsatssu:126: kiñcopāyakuśalaḥ sattvamalaṃ hāpayati yathā nandasya kāmaprajihīrṣāyai [dharma]mupadiśati /
T07hvsatssu:127: sattvānāñca śraddhendriyādiparipākaṃ jñātvā paścāt dharmamupadiśati yathā rāhulasya /
T07hvsatssu:128: kecit sattvāḥ karmavipākāvṛtāḥ na vimuktiṃ labhante /
T07hvsatssu:130: kecit sattvāḥ kālapakṣye kṣīṇāsravā bhavanti yathā jāyāpatisūtra upadiṣṭam /
T07hvsatssu:131: kecit sattvāḥ puruṣaviśeṣamapekṣya kṣīṇāsravāḥ bhavanti yathā śāriputra aśvajitamapekṣya /
T07hvsatssu:132: kecit sattvā deśamapekṣya kṣīṇāsravāḥ yathā rājā pukkasātiḥ /
T07hvsatssu:135: kecit sattvā bhagavataḥ tāttvikakāyamapekṣya nirmitakāya ñcāpekṣya kṣīṇāsravā bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:137: kiñca bhagavān vividhān saddharmānupadiya sarvān vimuktyāvaraṇadharmān paribhedayati ato vimuktijñānadarśanasampanna ityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:141: bhagavān satvānāṃ pūrvanivāsaṃ kuśalamūla ñca jñātvā kramaśo dharmamupadiśati /
T07hvsatssu:142: bhagavān vimuktiṃ pratyakṣīkṛtya parasyopaśati na parataḥśratvā /
T07hvsatssu:145: tathā jinaśāsanamapi pratipakṣakalāpamukhena sarvān kleśān vyāvartayati /
T07hvsatssu:146: yathā navasaṃjñādīn mahatyo 'lpā vā saṃyojanā na punaḥ kṣapayanti /
T07hvsatssu:149: kadācit sukumāravacanaiḥ kadācit kaṭuvacanaiḥ kadācit punaḥ sukumārakaṭuvacanaiśca /
T07hvsatssu:157: asmāt īdṛśaṃ phalaṃ bhavati na tādṛśam /
T07hvsatssu:158: ayamācāraḥ akuśalo 'vayaṃ duḥkhavipākaḥ na sukhavipāka iti jñānam /
T07hvsatssu:163: yathā yavādyava eva jāyate na brīhyādaya iti /
T07hvsatssu:164: (u) sthānāsthānabalena karmādīnāṃ jñānāt idaṃ balamatigahanaṃ paramaṃ devamanuṣyāṇāṃ na prāptuṃ śakyam /
T07hvsatssu:165: jātadharmasya hetusamanantarādhipatipratyayān pratyāyayatītyata idaṃ balaṃ praṇītam /
T07hvsatssu:166: (2) yat atitānāgatapratyutpannāni karmāṇi sarvadharmasamādānāni ca prajānāti /
T07hvsatssu:167: teṣāṃ sthānaṃ prajānāti vastu prajānāti hetuṃ prajānāti vipākañca prajānāti /
T07hvsatssu:172: ato bhagavataḥ teṣāṃ kathanaṃ balaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:175: kecit kuśalakarmavanto dṛṣṭe duḥkhavedanāḥ yathā śīlaṃ dhṛtvā kleśānanubhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:176: kecitpāpakarmāṇaḥ dṛṣṭe sukhavedanāḥ yathā śīlaṃ bhitvā svairaṃ caranti /
T07hvsatssu:177: ataḥ kecit saṃśerate anāgatādhvāpi pratyutpannasama iti /
T07hvsatssu:179: catvāri dharmasamādānāni pratyutpannaṃ duḥkhaṃ āyatyāṃ sukhavipākam,
T07hvsatssu:189: yathoktaṃ sūtre pūrvañca pramuditacittaḥ dānakāle ca viśuddhacitto dattvā ca yanna vipratisarati /
T07hvsatssu:191: bhagavāneva prajānāti taratamaṃ karma yadi niyatamaniyataṃ vā dṛṣṭavipākam upapadyavipākaṃ tadūrdhvavipākaṃ vā ityādi /
T07hvsatssu:194: (3) bhagavān sarvadhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattīnāṃ saṃkleśaṃ prajānāti sthitiṃ prajānāti upacayaṃ prajānāti vyavadānañca prajānāti /
T07hvsatssu:195: tatra dhyānaṃ nāma catvāri dhyānāni catvāra ārūpyasamādhayaśca /
T07hvsatssu:200: samāpattayaścaturdhā vibhaktāḥ saṃkleśataḥ sthitita upacayato vyavadānataśceti /
T07hvsatssu:216: atha śraddhāpratipat dharmapratipat iti dvividho mārgaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:222: prājñajanā viśiṣṭendriyā adhimuktita upakṛtā średdhendriyapradhānāśca bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:229: tathāgato yathādhimukti pratipattiṃ prajānāti yadutāyaṃ sattvaḥ pañcakāmanāsvadhimuktaḥ bhāvanāmārge bādhimukta ityevaṃ viditvā yathārhaṃ dharmamupadiśati
T07hvsatssu:232: sattvānāṃ yat dīrghakālamabhyasya abhirocate sa dhātuḥ sidhyati /
T07hvsatssu:235: kecit sattvāḥ svabhāvataḥ pravṛttarāgāḥ kecit dṛṣṭaṃ pratītya pravṛttarāgāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:238: imāṃ pratipadaṃ pratipanno naraka utpadyate yāvatsvarge iti ca prajānāti /
T07hvsatssu:248: narakapratitasyāpi pravibhāgo 'sti anena karmaṇā sañjīvanarake patiṣyati,
T07hvsatssu:250: atastathāgataḥ saptamabale sthitaḥ sukṣmaṃ karma prajānāti /
T07hvsatssu:254: tathāgataḥ sattvānāṃ pūrvamācaritāṃ pratipadaṃ jñātvā dharmamupadiśati /
T07hvsatssu:256: tathāgato 'tītaṃ sarvamupapattisthānaṃ rūpadhātau vā ārupyadhātau vā ityanusmarati /
T07hvsatssu:260: (9) tathāgato divyena cakṣuṣā paśyati anāgatādhvani tribhavasantānān trividhāni karmāṇi caturdharmasamādānāni ca jñātvā vyākaroti /
T07hvsatssu:279: eṣu caturṣu yadi kaścidāgatya yathā dharmaṃ codayet /
T07hvsatssu:285: tathāgato vyākaroti āntarāyikamāntarāyikamārgadharmān yadutākuśalaṃ sāsravaṃ kuśalañca /
T07hvsatssu:300: keṣāñcitpuruṣāṇāṃ jñāne satyapi vyākaraṇakauśalābhāvāt parapuruṣāṇāṃ vijayo vaiśāradyam /
T07hvsatssu:310: ya ājanma paritrastaḥ sa paścāt kiñcit jñānaṃ labdhvā viśārado bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:311: kiṃ punarbhagavān sudūrakālāt mahodāracittaḥ sarvākārābhisambodhiñca labdhvā bibheṣyati /
T07hvsatssu:313: tatra na kaścidasti yaṃ tathāgato na vijitavān /
T07hvsatssu:315: yo vādī vacanakuśalaḥ arthakuśalaśca sa viśāradaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:321: sarvasūtrāṇi sarvaśāstrāṇi ca pratividhya praśnavisarjanaṃ paridīpayatīti viśāradaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:322: kecitpunaḥ kule gotre rūpe śīlabāhuśrutyajñānādiṣu vā vikalā ityataḥ sāvadyaṃ śāstramadhigacchanti /
T07hvsatssu:327: yathāvocat asurabrāhmaṇo bhagavantam- yathābhūtadharmavādī durjayo duṣprakampaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:330: yaḥ punaścaturbhirvāda dharmaiḥ samanvitaḥ so 'pi durjayaḥ duṣprakampaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:335: devamanuṣyā api taṃ na jetuṃ śaknuvanti ityato viśāradaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:336: yaśca kalyāṇamitramanupasevya vādaṃ karoti sa sukampaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:337: tathāgatastu dīpaṅkarādiṣu apramāṇabuddheṣu pūrvamevābhyastavādadharmā ityato na prakampyaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:347: śāstraṃ puna dvividhaṃ tattvaśāstraṃ śaṭhaśāstram iti /
T07hvsatssu:353: tīrthikānāṃ śāstrāṇi sahetvābhāsāni na sahetukāni iti na vijayasamarthāni bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:354: bhagavataḥ sūtrāṇi pariśuddhapravacanārthagatikāni tattvalakṣaṇāvilomakāni na tīrthikīyasamānāni /
T07hvsatssu:358: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantyāha mā bhikṣavo mama vacanādhimuktikā bhavata /
T07hvsatssu:362: prātarvo dharmaṃ bhāṣamāṇe mayi sāyaṃ mārga labhedhvam /
T07hvsatssu:373: bhagavān sattvānāmuttamo mahān iti alpajñānāṃ śāstraṃ jānāti /
T07hvsatssu:375: tīrthikānāṃ śāstraṃ yāṃ kāñcit dṛṣṭimupādāya pravṛttam /
T07hvsatssu:383: tathāgatastu sarvākārajñaḥ sarvadharmajñaḥ sarvaparaśāstrāṇāṃ dārako na paraśāstrairdāryo bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:394: sa śrāvakaḥ śāstā kṣayajñānasampanna ityataḥ sarvāṇi vaiśāradyāni sāmānyata uktāni /
T07hvsatssu:395: (pṛ) sattvāḥ kasmāt saṃśerate tathāgato 'sarvajñaḥ puruṣa iti /
T07hvsatssu:397: tadyathā bhagavān pratyāha- kuto yūyamāgacchatha ityādi /
T07hvsatssu:398: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yaḥ kaścit nagaraṃ praviśya tannāma nāgarikān pṛcchati /
T07hvsatssu:400: śrotāsya sūtrasya saṃśete tathāgato 'sarvajñaḥ puruṣa iti /
T07hvsatssu:402: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhagavānāha svāgataṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ anena (SSS_14)
T07hvsatssu:406: yathoktam- tvaṃ khalu devadatta śavabhūtaḥ kheṭāśano 'si /
T07hvsatssu:409: yathātmānamadhikṛtyāha ahaṃ pariṣadi siṃhakalpo daśabalaiścaturbhirvaiśāradyaiśca samanvitaḥ mahāpariṣadi siṃhanādaṃ nadāmi iti /
T07hvsatssu:412: āha ca devadattam- nāhaṃ dadāmi saṅghaṃ śāriputramaugdalyāyanādibhyo 'pi kiṃ punardāsyāmi tubhyam /
T07hvsatssu:414: alpajñā imāni vacanāni śrutvā vadanti tathāgatasyasravā akṣīṇā iti /
T07hvsatssu:422: ato 'lpajñāḥ saṃśerate āryamārgaḥ saṃyojanānāṃ na kṣayakṛta iti /
T07hvsatssu:427: yathā laukikā jānanto 'pi praṣṭāro na duṣyanti /
T07hvsatssu:429: laukikā anāsaṅgacittā api āsaṅgikalpaṃ vadanti īdṛśamiti /
T07hvsatssu:431: kāmā nāntarāyikadharmā iti sati vacane tatra tathāgata upadiśati kāmā vastuta āntarāyikadharmā iti /
T07hvsatssu:432: yasya kāmāścittagatāḥ sa na mārgaṃ bhāvayati /
T07hvsatssu:433: ato 'vaśyaṃ kāmān pūrvaṃ parityajya paścānmārgaṃ spṛśati /
T07hvsatssu:435: mārgaḥprāpyata iti brūvato 'vaśyaṃ paribhinne 'pyāpattidharme mārgo na prāpyate /
T07hvsatssu:437: tasya gurupratyayatvāt bhagavān punaḥkhayamāśrāvayet nāstyāpattidharmo vināśayitum iti /
T07hvsatssu:447: atha sūtra uktaṃ- tathāgatādīnāṃ daśa guṇāḥ yaduta tathāgataḥ arhan samyak sambuddho
T07hvsatssu:448: vidyācaraṇasampannaḥ sugato lokavit anuttarapuruṣadaumyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ
T07hvsatssu:450: tathāgata iti yathābhūtamārgayānena saṃsādhitasamyaksambodhitvāt tathāgata ityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:451: yadyadupadiśati sarvaṃ tattvameva bhavati na mṛṣā /
T07hvsatssu:457: atrāntarāle yat bhāṣate tat satyameva bhavati nānyathā /
T07hvsatssu:459: sarvākārasarvajñajñānena pūrvāparaṃ parīkṣya paścādupadiśatītyata upadiṣṭaṃ satyameva bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:460: kiñca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ smṛtirdṛḍhā bhavati na muṣitā /
T07hvsatssu:461: kecidanumāya yadupadiśaṃti tat kadācit sūtrānuyāyi bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:463: tairupadiṣṭhaṃ lābhāya vā bhavati hānāya vā /
T07hvsatssu:464: yathoktaṃ sūtre- anumāturvacanaṃ lābhāya kadācit bhavati hānāya vā kadācit /
T07hvsatssu:471: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhagavān sattvānāṃ cittaprāmodyamadhimukti ñca prajñāya mārgamupadiśati iti /
T07hvsatssu:474: yathoktaṃ kiṃśukaśirṣaka sūtre yo dharma upadeśārhaḥ tamupadiśati saṃkṣepato vistarato vā skandhāyatanādimukhena iti /
T07hvsatssu:476: atha punardharmāvavādo dvividhaḥ saṃvṛtitaḥ paramārthata iti /
T07hvsatssu:477: tathāgata idaṃ satyadvayaṃ niśrityopadiśatītyata upadiṣṭaṃ sarvaṃ tattvaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:478: bhagavān nopadiśati yat saṃvṛtisatyaṃ tat paramārthasatyamiti /
T07hvsatssu:479: na ca yat paramārthasatyaṃ tat saṃvṛtisatyamiti /
T07hvsatssu:481: atha tathāgatena yadi vā saṃvriyate yadi vā vivriyate tadubhayamapyaviruddham /
T07hvsatssu:482: yat saṃvaraṇāya bhavati na tat vibriyate /
T07hvsatssu:483: yat vivaraṇāya bhavati na tat saṃvriyate /
T07hvsatssu:488: santi ca caturvidhā avavādāḥ darśanaśravaṇamananidhyaptidharmā iti /
T07hvsatssu:489: bhagavāneṣu caturṣu dharmeṣu yadyadupadiśati tat sarvaṃ cittavyavadānāya bhavati nāsaṅgāya /
T07hvsatssu:491: eṣu pañcasu bhagavān sambuddhaḥ san vyaktaramabhijñāyopadiśati /
T07hvsatssu:499: anityatādinā dharmān samyak bhāvayataḥ kleśāḥ kṣīyante /
T07hvsatssu:502: pūrvāntāparāntayośca nāsti santatiriti samyak pratisambudhyata iti samyak sambuddha iti nāma /
T07hvsatssu:504: anye 'pi puruṣā anādisaṃsāre dānādīn dharmānācaranti na samyagācarantīti na sugata ityucyante /
T07hvsatssu:505: bhagavān punardānādicaryāḥ samyaṅmārgeṇa caritavāniti sugata ityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:514: kecit vicikitsante kathaṃ manuṣyeṇa devā avavadituṃ śakyanta iti /
T07hvsatssu:515: ata āha- ahaṃ devamanuṣyāṇāṃ śāstā iti /
T07hvsatssu:516: buddha iti atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtasakṣayākṣayāṇāṃ sthūlasūkṣmādīnāṃ vā sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇām /
T07hvsatssu:517: bodhimūle niṣadya avidyāmiddhamavidhya sarvajñānojvalitāṃ mahābodhiṃ labdhavāniti buddhaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:518: evaṃ navabhirguṇaiḥ sampanna triṣu adhvasu daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu ca pūjya iti bhagavān /
T07hvsatssu:519: bhagavān daśanāmasampannaḥ svātmasampadā parasampadā ca ātmānamupakaroti parāṃścopakarotītyato 'bhivandyaḥ //
T07hvsatssu:524: na hi santi tathāgatasya kāyikavācikamānasikaduścaritāni yāni[tathāgato rakṣitu]micchet mā paro drakṣyāt mā ca jñāsīt iti /
T07hvsatssu:525: anyeṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ santi kadācidavyākṛtābhāsāni kāyikavācikamānasikaduścaritāni vidvadgarhaṇīyāni /
T07hvsatssu:533: tathāgataḥ kāyena subhāvitavān śīlasamādhiprajñā stattulyān dharmāśca /
T07hvsatssu:534: ataḥ sarvāṇyakuśalāni akuśalābhāsāni ca karmāṇi sarvathā parikṣīṇāni /
T07hvsatssu:537: tathāgataḥ sadā śīlamācarati adhimuktito na durgatipatanabhayādinā /
T07hvsatssu:538: tathāgatasya ca sarvāṇi kāyikavācikamānasikakarmāṇi paropakārāya bhavanti iti nākuśalāni /
T07hvsatssu:542: dharma upadiśyamāne yadi śrotā ekāgracitto bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:549: sarvadharmāṇāmatyantaśūnyatāṃ jñātavāniti na daurmanasyaṃ na vā saumanasyam /
T07hvsatssu:550: susañcitamahākaruṇācittatvāt tathāgataḥ kuśale akuśale ca vinā saumanasyadaurmanasyādi mahākaruṇāmevotpādayati /
T07hvsatssu:551: tathāgataḥ sattvānāṃ pṛthak pṛthak svabhāvamatigahanaṃ parijñātavānityato yadi kaścit kuśalacittaḥ śṛṇoti nānena sumanasko bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:552: yadi akuśacittaḥ śṛṇoti nānena durmanasko bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:564: mahākaruṇayā saṃsādhito 'nuttaro mārgo na punaranyaiḥ kāraṇaiḥ /
T07hvsatssu:565: atha punastathāgatasya nāsti kāpīcchā- mama paramā santuṣṭiriti /
T07hvsatssu:568: mahākāruṇikatvāt bhavaduḥkhahṛdvacanena mahopāye na sattvānāmuddharaṇāya vyavasāyaduḥkhānyupādatte /
T07hvsatssu:569: tathāgato mahākaruṇayā sattvānāmuddharaṇāya loke 'smin taptāyaḥpiṇḍavat kṣaṇamapyasahyaṃ pañcaskandhātmakaṃ kāyamupādāya viharati /
T07hvsatssu:570: bhagavān buddhaḥ subhāvitopākṣācittaḥ tadupekṣācittamupekṣya sadā mahākaruṇācittamācarati /
T07hvsatssu:574: ātmano mahāhitaṃ prāpayati parāṃśca mahāhitaṃ prāpayati /
T07hvsatssu:576: tathāgataḥ sattvānāṃ cittaparijñāne paramakuśalaḥ yathoktaṃ sūtre- ahaṃ sattvaparamārthasya suvijñaḥ kṛpāvān hitakārī ityādi /
T07hvsatssu:581: yathoktamekottarāgame tathāgatavarge- svayamāha- ahaṃ puruṣasārathiḥ puruṣāvataṃsaḥ puruṣahastī śramaṇānāṃ paramo brāhmaṇānāmapyuttamaḥ āryāṇāmadhipo
T07hvsatssu:593: yathā vyavadāna sūtre śāriputrastathāgatasyābhimukhaṃ tathāgataguṇān stauti /
T07hvsatssu:603: (u) tathāgataḥ svayaṃ pravacanaṃ praśaṃsati- mayā bhāṣito dharma ādau madhye 'vasāne
T07hvsatssu:604: ca kalyāṇaṃ svarthaṃ suvyañjanaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātamanulomakaṃ brahmacaryamiti /
T07hvsatssu:606: jinaśāsanamakālikaṃ kalyāṇañca bālye yauvane vārdhakye ca kalyāṇam /
T07hvsatssu:614: ādau madhye 'vasāne ca sarvadā viduṣāṃ kamanīyam,
T07hvsatssu:616: nānyasūtravat rādau mahat madhye sūkṣmamavasāne sūkṣmataram /
T07hvsatssu:631: [tadyathā] yo duṣṭaḥ śabdaḥ yo vā duṣṭasvaraḥ śabdaḥ sa yajamānaṃ hinasti iti /
T07hvsatssu:641: santi kānicana anyāni sūtrāṇi ca deva[putra]bhāṣitāni /
T07hvsatssu:645: yathoktaṃ vinaye- dharmo nāma yat buddhabhāṣitaṃ,
T07hvsatssu:646: śrāvakabhāṣitaṃ nirmitabhāṣitaṃ devabhāṣitaṃ vā saṃkṣipya yāni loke subhāṣitāni tāni sarvāṇi buddhabhāṣitāni /
T07hvsatssu:663: tathāgatāt śrutastu samyagarthe nikṣiptaṃ yathārthaṃ vacanaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:669: ayaṃ paryavadātadharma ucyate [yo] na sūtramātrānuyāyī bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:670: santi ca jinaśāsanasya tisro dharmamudrāḥ- sarvamanātmā,
T07hvsatssu:671: sarve saṃskṛtadharmāḥ kṣaṇikā anityāḥ- śāntaṃ nirodho nirvāṇam iti /
T07hvsatssu:672: imā stisro dharmamudrāḥ sarvairapi vādibhirna śakyāḥ khaṇḍayitum /
T07hvsatssu:680: atha tathāgataḥ svayaṃ svadharmaṃ stauti- mama dharmo nirodho nirvāṇagāmī samyak sambodhijanaka aupanāyika iti /
T07hvsatssu:688: buddhāgama ucyate sarve saṃskṛtāḥ sādīnavā nāniśaṃsāsthānam iti /
T07hvsatssu:689: na tu yathā brāhmaṇāḥ brahmalokādīn praśaṃsanti /
T07hvsatssu:692: tathāgatasya san dharmo nirvāṇāya bhavati ityataḥ samyaksambodhijanakaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:700: buddha dharmaḥ ṣaḍvidhaḥ- svākhyāto [bhagavatā] sāndṛṣṭikaḥ akālikaḥ aupanāyika ehipaśyakaḥ pratyātmaṃ vedayitavyo vijñaiḥ /
T07hvsatssu:707: buddhadharmo dṛṣṭa eva loke vipākaṃ prāpayati /
T07hvsatssu:713: ataḥ sāndṛṣṭikaṃ pūjāsatkāraṃ prāpayan aurdhvavipākaṃ nirvāṇaśca prāpayati /
T07hvsatssu:717: buddhadharmo na kañcana divasaṃ māsaṃ vatsaraṃ nakṣatraṃ vāpekṣya mārgo bhāvyate /
T07hvsatssu:718: asmin divase māse vatsare va mārgo na bhāvyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:719: na brāhmaṇadharmavat vasante brāhmaṇo 'gnīnādadhīta grīṣme rājanya ityādi /
T07hvsatssu:728: baddhadharmaḥ svakāyena sākṣātkartavyo bhaviṣyati na parānuvartanena /
T07hvsatssu:729: yathāvocadbhagavān- mā bhikṣavaḥ kevalaṃ mama pravacanādhimuktikā bhavata /
T07hvsatssu:730: svayameva parīkṣadhvam ayaṃ dharma ācāritavyaḥ ayamanācaritavya iti /
T07hvsatssu:731: na yathā tīrthikā vadanti svaśiṣyān- praśnaprativacanaṃ mā kurudhvam /
T07hvsatssu:738: upavāsādau paramamugdhāḥ śraddadhante vijñaiḥ sukhaṃ na vedyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:742: yathā kaścit rogānmuktaḥ adhyātmaṃ pravivekaṃ vedayate /
T07hvsatssu:744: kecit sadoṣaṃ dharmaṃ vadanti yathā khakkaṭalakṣaṇā pṛthivī iti /
T07hvsatssu:745: kiṃ khakkaṭalakṣaṇam ityasya spṛṣṭvā vedayitavyam iti prativacanaṃ na vindate /
T07hvsatssu:746: yathā jātyandho nīlapītalohitāvadātān na vyavahartuṃ śaknoti /
T07hvsatssu:748: na sa buddhadharmasya paramārthaṃ vyavahartuṃ śankoti /
T07hvsatssu:750: atha buddhadharma adhyātmamadhigantavyaḥ na dhanādivat svayamadhigamya parasmai pradātavyaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:751: yathā pārāyaṇa sūtre bhagavānāha- nāhaṃ [bhikṣava] ucchetsyāmi vaḥ kāṃkṣām /
T07hvsatssu:756: pṛthagjanā avidyāparvatapraticchannā na śraddhadhanta imaṃ dharmam /
T07hvsatssu:764: laukikā hi bahavo dṛṣṭaphalaṃ paśryanto na jānanti tatkāraṇam /
T07hvsatssu:768: uttānacetanā laukikā buddhadharme na gabhīrasaṃjñāṃ kurvanti /
T07hvsatssu:770: tṛṇamapi hetupratyayaiḥ sañcitaṃ parīkṣayituḥ tallakṣaṇaṃ gabhīraṃ vivartate /
T07hvsatssu:771: yathā bhagavatā bhāṣitaḥ pratītyasamutpādadharmo gahanaṃ vastu /
T07hvsatssu:776: (u) kecidvā dino vadanti- nedaṃ vacanaṃ yuktam /
T07hvsatssu:777: ānando mahān śrāvako dharmalakṣaṇapratisaṃvedī kathaṃ vadiṣyati pratītyasamutpādadharma uttānaka iti /
T07hvsatssu:780: na hi sa karmakleśān suvivicya paśyati /
T07hvsatssu:781: āditaḥ śikṣitasya vastunaḥ paryantaṃ labdhavato [vā] uttānakasaṃjñotpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:789: tathāgate nānāhetupratyayadṛṣṭāntairarthaṃ prakāśayati sati subodhā bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:790: bālā api jānanti yathā sudā ya śrāmaṇerādayaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:791: buddhadharmaḥ sāravān sarvapravacaneṣu tattvārthaḥ pradhāno bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:792: na yathā bhāratarāmāyaṇādīni tattvārthaṃ vinā kevalākhyānarūpāṇi /
T07hvsatssu:793: yathā vā rāghabrāhmaṇa āha- bhagavān bhikṣūn arthadharme paramārthadharme yogaṃ śikṣāpayati yadutāsravakṣaye / iti /
T07hvsatssu:795: na brāhmaṇā iva brāhmaṇadharmaṃ vadanta ātmana eva bodhimanuprāpnuvanti;
T07hvsatssu:818: yathā alaṅkaraṇāya puṣpāṇi vikīryante mālā vā dhriyate /
T07hvsatssu:822: pūrvaṃ kaṇṭhoktasya dharmasya paścādgāthayopadiṣṭasyārthaḥ spaṣṭapratītaḥ śraddhādārḍhyakṛdbhavati /
T07hvsatssu:825: kecidāhu- śāstuḥ śāsanaṃ na kāvyapratirūpayā gāthayā racayitavyamiti /
T07hvsatssu:830: yathāha sūtram- sarve lokāḥ supraṇītavacananirūktikā mama pravrajitāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:835: yat sūtramaprativacanamavibhaṅgaṃ yathā catuḥpratisaṃ vidādisūtram tat sūtramityucyate sapraśnaprativacanaṃ sūtrantuyathocyate- catvāraḥ pudgalāḥ
T07hvsatssu:842: yathā kaścit daridro vividhānyakuśalakarmāṇi kṛtvā durgatau patati /
T07hvsatssu:848: kintu saṅgīti kārā gabhīrasūtrārthān saṅgṛhyābhidharme prākṣipan /
T07hvsatssu:849: yathā bāhyābhyantarasaṃyojanikaḥ puruṣaḥ sadā rātrāvarthaṃ vibhajate /
T07hvsatssu:850: ityanena hetunā ayamarthaḥ saṃyojanaskandhe niveśitavya iti /
T07hvsatssu:857: dvividhāṃ gāthāṃ vihāyānyat gāthārahitaṃ sūtram udānamityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:861: tāni sūtranidānāni kadācit sūtra eva vartante anyatra vā vartante /
T07hvsatssu:864: yathoktaṃ sūtre- viduṣāṃ bhāṣaṇaṃ sakramaṃ sārthaṃ savibhaṅgamavikṣepakam /
T07hvsatssu:872: tathāgato 'nāgataṃ vastu kathayannapi atītaṃ pratyutpannamupādāyaiva kathayatītyataḥ pṛthaṅ nocyate /
T07hvsatssu:874: kecinna śraddadhante yanmahāmunaya upaśamābhiratā na vikṣepavighāte suprītikā laukikasaṃbhinnapralāpānnirviṇṇāḥ
T07hvsatssu:876: yathoktaṃ sūtre- mārgasya pratilābhī puruṣo dvau māsāvatītya ekamakṣaramuccārayati /
T07hvsatssu:879: yathoktaṃ- tathāgato vaipulyataḥ saṃkṣepataśca dvidhā dharmamupadiśati /
T07hvsatssu:888: upadeśaḥ- mahākātyāyanādayo mahājñānino bhagavadbhāṣitaṃ suvistṛtaṃ vyabhajanta /
T07hvsatssu:899: āhvanīyaṃ, prahvanīyaṃ dakṣiṇeyamañjalikaraṇīyamanuttaraṃ puṇyakṣetraṃ dāyakānāṃ hitakaram iti /
T07hvsatssu:901: tathāgata śrāvakasaṅghaḥ aneḍakaṃ śīlaṃ dhārayan yāvadalpāparādhe 'pi paramatrāsaśaṅkī bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:903: narakādibhyo 'pyabhītāḥ śīlaṃ saprayatnaṃ dhārayantaḥ kevalaṃ saddharmābhiratā bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:921: yā sarvakleśānāṃ kṣayaṃ prāpayati na kevalaṃ vighnayati /
T07hvsatssu:924: kṣīṇakleśānāṃ jñānaṃ bhavati yaduta kṣīṇā me jātiriti /
T07hvsatssu:935: kṣetraṃ pañcavidhadhānyānyatiśayena saṃvardhayati na vināśaṃ gamayati /
T07hvsatssu:936: tathā saṅghakṣetramapi aṣṭāṅgasamanvitamityato dāyakānāṃ guṇān vardhayati /
T07hvsatssu:941: (u) caturvidhāḥ pratipattayañcaturvidhāḥ pratipannakāḥ śīlasamādhiprajñādiguṇāśca pariśuddhā ityataḥ saṅgha ityākhyāyate /
T07hvsatssu:944: srotaāpattipratipattau trayaḥ pudgalāḥ śraddhānusāripratipannako dharmānusāripratipannako 'nimittānusāripratipannaka iti /
T07hvsatssu:946: yo 'labdhānātmaśūnyatājñāno bhagavacchāsane śraddadhāno bhagavadvacanamanusṛtya pratipanno bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:948: yathoktaṃ sūtre ahamasmin vastuni śraddhayā pratipannaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:950: labdhe tu tattvajñāne na śraddhāmātramanusṛtya pratipadyate /
T07hvsatssu:951: yathoktaṃ sūtre- nāsti kārako nāsti śraddhālurityādi prajānan uttamapudgalo bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:954: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yo dharme kṣāntisukhaṃ prajñayā bhāvayati sa śraddhāpratipannakaḥ [yaḥ] pṛthagjanabhūmimatikrāntaḥ srotaāpattiphalañca nālabhata
T07hvsatssu:958: ayaṃ śrutacintāmayaprajñāyāṃ sthito dharmaṇāṃ kṣāntikāmasukhacittaṃ samyak bhāvayan anātmaśūnyatājñānamalabhamāno 'pi laukikaṃ dharmakṣāntyābhāsacittamutpādayati
T07hvsatssu:963: sa krameṇa uṣmādidharmeṣu sthitau bhāvanāmayīṃ prajñāṃ labhamāno 'pi maulanāmnaiva śraddhānusārītyucyate /
T07hvsatssu:965: asmāt sūtrāt vaktavyamavaśyaṃ srotaāpattiphalaṃ lapsyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:966: na vaktavyaṃ jīvitānte na lapsyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:969: yathogreṇa saṅghe nimantrite devatā upasaṃgamyārocayanti- amuko 'rhan amuko 'rhatpratipannako yāvadamukaḥ śrotaāpannaḥ amukaḥ srotaāpattipratipannaka iti /
T07hvsatssu:974: ayaṃ labdhānātmajñāna ūṣmamūrdhakṣāntyagradharmeṣusthito dharmamanusṛtya pratipadyate yadanātmaśūnyādi /
T07hvsatssu:976: imau dvau pratipannakau satyadarśanamārgamavatārya nirodhasatyaṃ paśyata ityato 'nimittapratipannaka ityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:978: laukikamārge saṃyojanaprahāṇāt phalatrayapratipanna iti na prathāṃ labhante /
T07hvsatssu:982: sayojānanāṃ parikṣayāt srotaāpanno bhavati avinipātadharmā niyataḥ sambodhiparāyaṇaḥ
T07hvsatssu:984: (pṛ) yaḥ srotaāpannaḥ sa satyadarśanaprahīṇakleśo 'tyantaparikṣīṇāpramāṇaduḥkhaḥ pṛthivīsama iti aupamyasūtramāha /
T07hvsatssu:986: (u) idamuttaratra vakṣyate yaduta satyadṛṣṭikṣayādanye kṣīṇā iti /
T07hvsatssu:996: yathā ca navanītādi saptadinaparamaṃ sevamānasya dhruvā glānirapi jarjaritā bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:998: yathā ca saptaphaṇasarpadaṣṭaḥ pudgalakāyaścaturbhūtabalāt saptapadāni gacchati nāṣṭamaṃ viṣabalādgacchati /
T07hvsatssu:1008: ya ekaṃ dvau vā prahāya trīn caturaḥ pañca vā yāti /
T07hvsatssu:1015: sa dve vā trīṇi vā kulāni sandhāvati saṃsarati /
T07hvsatssu:1018: sakṛdāgāmī imaṃ lokaṃ sakṛdāgatya duḥkhasyāntaṃ karoti /
T07hvsatssu:1021: ayaṃ sakṛdāgāmī ihaiva vā janmani duḥkhasyāntaṃ karoti /
T07hvsatssu:1025: sa ihaiva vā janmani duḥkhasyāntaṃ karoti /
T07hvsatssu:1047: kaścidutpannaḥ san anāsravamārgeṣu prakṛtyā sthito 'bhisaṃskāramaprayujya parinirvāti /
T07hvsatssu:1056: yo dvayostriṣu vāyataneṣu utpadya [parinirvāti] sa madhyamendriyaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:1066: yaḥ pūrvabhave srotaāpattiphalasakṛdāgāmiphalaprāptaḥ paścātpravṛttakāyena anāgāmiphalaṃ prāpnoti /
T07hvsatssu:1068: dṛṣṭadharmaparinirvāyī ti paramatīkṣṇendriyo dṛṣṭa eva kāye nirvāṇaṃ prāpnoti /
T07hvsatssu:1069: atha pudgalo dvividhaḥ śraddhāvimukto dṛṣṭiprāpta iti /
T07hvsatssu:1088: anurakṣaṇalakṣaṇa iti kiñcidviśiṣṭendriyatvāt yaḥ samādhimanurakṣati sa na parihīyate /
T07hvsatssu:1091: mṛtalakṣaṇaḥ tato 'pi kiñcidviśiṣṭendriyo bhaveṣu paramaṃ nirviṇṇaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:1095: sthitalakṣaṇa iti yaḥ samādhiṃ labdhvā na parākramate na ca parihīyate sa sthitalakṣaṇaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:1110: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhagavānāha- yo bhikṣavo macchrāvakaḥ śayane paryaṅke vā ahamahamikayā pratilabdhāt [āsrava]kṣayānna parihīyate /
T07hvsatssu:1113: pūrvoktā aṣṭādaśa śaikṣā navāśaikṣāśca [militvā] saptaviṃśati [pudgalāḥ] laukikaṃ sarvapuṇyakṣetram /
T07hvsatssu:1124: śūnyalakṣaṇatvāt sarve rāgadveṣādayaḥ kleśā anutpannā nākuśalaṃ karmotpādayanti /
T07hvsatssu:1126: tairlabdhvā dhyānasamādhayaḥ sarve pariśuddhāḥ mahālpaiḥ kleśairviśaṃyuktatvāt /
T07hvsatssu:1129: aṣṭakṣetraguṇasamanvitvāt saptavidha samādhipariṣkāraiḥ surakṣitatvāt saptāsrava sannirodhitvāt āsravairaduṣṭam /
T07hvsatssu:1132: uktaṃ ca sūtre prasthānacitamātra eva kuśaladharmamācaritumabhilaṣati /
T07hvsatssu:1136: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre yasmāddāyakād gṛhapateḥ śīlavato bhikṣuḥ satkāramādāya apramāṇasamādhimupasampadya viharati /
T07hvsatssu:1137: sa dāyakto gṛhapatirapramāṇaṃ puṇyaṃ labhata iti /
T07hvsatssu:1142: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- trayāṇāṃ sannipātānmahataḥ puṇyasya pratilābhaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:1147: saṅghadānasya pratigrahītā pariśuddha ityatastaddānamapi avaśyaṃ pariśuddham /
T07hvsatssu:1153: (5) pariśuddhacitto bahuśo ['lpaśo vā] dadāti tathā deyaṃ caturvidham /
T07hvsatssu:1154: saṅghasya dānamavaśyaṃ dve trīṇi vā prasādhayet /
T07hvsatssu:1161: yadyekasmin puruṣe utpannā śraddhā cittaṃ kadācit pariśodhayet kadācidvā prakampeta /
T07hvsatssu:1164: kasmiṃścidutpannaḥ snehaḥ cittaṃ na gurukuryāt na pracīyeta /
T07hvsatssu:1165: saṅghe tūtpannā bhaktiḥ cittaṃ gurukuryāt apramāṇālambanatvāt cittaṃ pracīyeta /
T07hvsatssu:1173: idaṃ ratnatrayaṃ sarvasya lokasya prathamaṃ maṅgalam /
T07hvsatssu:1174: yathoktaṃ maṅgalagāthāyām- buddho dharmaśca saṅgaśca etanmaṅgalamuttamam iti /
T07hvsatssu:1175: atha kānicitsūtrāṇi maṅgalādīni śaikṣāṇāmāyuryaśaḥprasaravardhanāni iti sūtrakartāro 'bhiprayanti /
T07hvsatssu:1191: bhagavato mahākaruṇācittena sarvalokānāṃ hitakaratvāt taddharmo 'pāryantikabādha ityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:1193: bhagavadupadiṣṭaṃ śāstrantu cāturvargīyāṇāṃ sattvānāmātiryagjantūnāñca santārakaṃ bhavati iti nāsti pāryantikabādhā /
T07hvsatssu:1203: bhagavadabhisandhimajānatāmupadiṣṭaṃ vṛtheti tat ātmanaḥ kleśāyaiva bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:1204: yathoktaṃ sūtre- dvau puruṣau bhagavantaṃ nindataḥ eko 'śraddhādveṣābhyāṃ nindati,
T07hvsatssu:1207: vidvānapi buddhābhisandhimanavabudhya buddhabhāṣitaṃ na vicārayituṃ śaknoti /
T07hvsatssu:1211: sarve bhikṣavo nānāvidhāḥ parapravādino nālabhanta tathāgatāśayam /
T07hvsatssu:1213: yathā ca kaścit mahāntaṃ vṛkṣaṃ chitvā atikramyaiva mūlamatikramyaiva skandhaṃ śākhāpalāśāni paryeṣayanti /
T07hvsatssu:1217: kiñca bhagavān śariputramapṛcchat ke śaikṣāḥ ke ca sāṅkhyā iti /
T07hvsatssu:1221: iti ānanda stathāgatamāmantyāha- abhisambodhisamadhigamāt pratilabdhe mārge hitaṃ bhavatītyatadapi yujyate /
T07hvsatssu:1223: dvābhyāṃ pratyayābhyāṃ samyak dṛṣṭirbhavati parato ghoṣāt yoniśaśca (SSS_39)
T07hvsatssu:1226: yathā cāha bhagavān- yadi mayā kasyacit dharma upadiṣṭaḥ so 'pratilabdhamadabhisandhitvāt kalahāyate / iti / iti /
T07hvsatssu:1230: ato jñātavyameva vādinaḥ tathāgatamapratipadyamānā yathārutamanuvartamānāḥ kalahāyanta iti /
T07hvsatssu:1232: tadā bhagavān bhikṣūnabravīt- bhāvayathemamartha nānandopamitākāram iti /
T07hvsatssu:1233: sarve vādina āhuḥ- arhan agradakṣiṇīya iti /
T07hvsatssu:1236: [evam] annapāne sthūlavastunyeva na jānanti [yathāvat] kaḥ punarvādastathāgatenabhisandhāya bhāṣite sūkṣmadharme /
T07hvsatssu:1243: jānantyapi ca vaktuśca vivakṣā yasya vastunaḥ // iti /
T07hvsatssu:1244: tatrāsti dvidhā mārga āryamārgo laukikamārga iti /
T07hvsatssu:1247: atha parapravāda sūtre 'pi bhagavān saṃśrāvayati sma /
T07hvsatssu:1249: (SSS_40) udāyibhikṣudharmadinnādibhibhikṣuṇībhiḥ kṛtaṃ bhagavacchāsanaṃ bhagavān śrutvā [tadeva punaḥ] śrāvayati sma /
T07hvsatssu:1252: evamanyaḥ “tathāgatamūlāḥ sarvadharmā” ityādi praśnaḥ sarvaḥ pratyuktaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:1255: śāstre viracitte hi arthaḥ sugamaḥ syāt /
T07hvsatssu:1258: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhagavānavocadbhikṣūn- yathāpraṇītaṃ śāstraṃ samyagdhārayata /
T07hvsatssu:1260: ataḥ sūtrādarthamādāya śāstraṃ nikāyānta rātmanā pṛthak sthāpyate /
T07hvsatssu:1262: kiñca bhagavān nānāsattvānāṃ santaraṇīyānāṃ kṛte lokādīni śāstramukhānyuktavān /
T07hvsatssu:1264: svātyādayo bhikṣava āhuḥ- tadevedaṃ vijñānaṃ sandhāvati saṃsarati /
T07hvsatssu:1274: ātmā hi ātmano nāthaḥ ko nu nāthaḥ paro bhavet /
T07hvsatssu:1279: āha ca- dīrgharātraṃ bhāvitacitto mṛta ūrdhvajanmabhāk bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:1286: yathoktaṃ sūtre eṣu pañcasu skandheṣu nāstyātmā vā ātmīyaṃ vā /
T07hvsatssu:1291: yathā bhagavān āha- skandhānāṃ santatyāsti saṃsāra iti /
T07hvsatssu:1297: [yathā vā] mṛgā ramāteti snuṣāṃ māteti vadanti /
T07hvsatssu:1299: yathoktaṃ sūtre- jihvā rasaṃ vijānāti iti /
T07hvsatssu:1300: jihvāvijñānaṃ rasaṃ vijānāti na tu jihvā /
T07hvsatssu:1301: yathā śaktipratihataṃ puruṣaṃ prati vadanti puruṣo 'yaṃ duḥkhaṃ vijānātīti /
T07hvsatssu:1304: yathā vā daridraḥ puruṣaḥ prabhuriti vyapadiśyate /
T07hvsatssu:1306: kiñca bhagavān tīrthikānākārayati brāhmaṇāniti śramaṇāniti ca /
T07hvsatssu:1307: kṣatriyabrāhmaṇādaya iva buddho 'pi vyavahārataḥ pūjyo bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:1313: yathoktaṃ sūtre- pratītyasamutpannaṃ vijñānaṃ cakṣurādīnāmindriyāṇāṃ mūlaṃ mahāsamudravat /
T07hvsatssu:1314: yathāha sūtram- skandhāyatanadhātūnāṃ pratyayāḥ sāmagrīmātram na kārakaḥ nāpi vedakaḥ iti /
T07hvsatssu:1316: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yat laukikā vadanti sukhamiti [tat] āryā duḥkhaṃ vadanti /
T07hvsatssu:1317: yat āryā duḥkhaṃ vadanti [tat]laukikāḥ sukhaṃ vadanti /
T07hvsatssu:1322: yatra rūpamityākhyāyate tatra yadatītaṃ yadanāgataṃ vartamānam sarvaṃ tat rūpamityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:1327: na tu sarvaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśasya hetūkriyate /
T07hvsatssu:1328: tṛṣṇasti cet avaśyaṃ sā vedanāmupādāyaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:1329: na tu sarvā vedanā tṛṣṇāyā hetūkriyate /
T07hvsatssu:1330: kadācit samagraheturucyate yathā sparśapratyayā vedanā iti /
T07hvsatssu:1331: kadācidasamagra heturucyate yathā vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā iti /
T07hvsatssu:1337: iti ca caturbhirdhyānaiḥ prasrabdhimānapi na sukhaṃ vedayate /
T07hvsatssu:1340: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yaścai- tyavandanāya pādāvutkṣipati sa āyuṣo 'nte deveṣūtpadyate iti /
T07hvsatssu:1342: sūtrāntaramāha- anantaryasya kartā na deveṣūtpadyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:1344: uktañca sūtre- kāmānāmanubhavitā nāpāpakaṃ karoti iti /
T07hvsatssu:1346: srotaāpannaḥ puruṣaḥ kāmānupabhuñjāno 'pi na durgatipatanīyaṃ karma karoti iti /
T07hvsatssu:1348: api coktaṃ sūtre- cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpañca cakṣurvijñānamutpadyate iti /
T07hvsatssu:1350: yadi tadaiva sarvāṇi rūpāṇi pratītya cakṣurvijñānamutpadyata (SSS_43) iti vadet /
T07hvsatssu:1352: atha coktaṃ sūtre- śrotraṃ pratītya śabdañca śrotravijñānamutpadyate na cakṣurvijñānam /
T07hvsatssu:1357: viniścitam- yathocyate- buddhaḥ sarvajñaḥ puruṣa iti /
T07hvsatssu:1360: kiñcāha- sarve saṃskṛtadharmā anityā duḥkhāḥ śūnyā anātmānaḥ [teṣāṃ]nirodho nirvāṇam ityādi mukhaṃ viniścitam /
T07hvsatssu:1377: yathocyate- adbhuta mūlikā surabhipuṣpañca na vātarogapratikūlam iti /
T07hvsatssu:1381: kiñca vadanti tisro vedanā- duḥkhā vedanā sukhā vedanā aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā iti /
T07hvsatssu:1386: āha ca- duḥkhamidaṃ trividhaṃ navaṃ purāṇaṃ madhyamiti /
T07hvsatssu:1398: yathā ekavastukathane anyadapi vastu samalakṣaṇamuktaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:1402: yathā bhagavānā ha- ya udayavyayalakṣaṇadṛṣṭidvayaṃ na prajānāti sa sarvaḥ sarāgī bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:1408: yathocyate- annadānaṃ prayacchati pañca guṇān- āyuḥ varṇaṃ balaṃ sukhaṃ pratibhānam iti /
T07hvsatssu:1413: api tu kārṣāpaṇamupādāya labdhamadyate ityataḥ kārṣāpaṇamadyata ityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:1423: yathā vadanti- upacitadharmāṇaṃ puruṣaṃ ayaṃ puruṣaḥ sukha iti /
T07hvsatssu:1425: yathā vadanti- mūḍhaiḥ saha saṃvāso duḥkhamiti /
T07hvsatssu:1432: yathāha saptāsravasūtram- tatra dvau vastuta āsravau,
T07hvsatssu:1442: yathoktaṃ sūsre- dvau puruṣau staḥ jño 'jñaśca /
T07hvsatssu:1450: yathā vadanti- kaścinmuṇḍitakeśaśmaśruko dharmapaṭaṃ paridadhānaḥ parigṛhītabuddheryāpatho 'pi bhagavacchāsanād dūrībhūtaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:1452: yastu śraddhendriyādisamanvāgataḥ sa gṛhastho 'pi aprākṛta ityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:1453: yathoktaṃ sūtre- caturvidhāḥ puruṣāḥ kaścit saṅghasyeryāpathe 'vatīrṇaḥ na saṅghagaṇitaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:1464: śraddhendriyalipsunā bhagavacchāsanaṃ śrutvā uddiṣṭaṃ prātimokṣamādāya yathāvaccaritavyam /
T07hvsatssu:1466: kiñcānena śāstreṇa dvividhaṃ hitaṃ bhavati ātmahitaṃ parahitamiti /
T07hvsatssu:1473: ya ātmanā śīlādīn sampādayati na parān śīlādiṣu sthāpayati /
T07hvsatssu:1476: yat kaścidātmahitāya pratipanno 'pi pareṣāñca dānādimahāphalaṃ sampādayati /
T07hvsatssu:1481: sa ātmanā dharmacaryāmanuvartamāno 'pi parārthamupadeśāt ātmano 'pi hitamanuprāpnoti /
T07hvsatssu:1482: yathoktaṃ sūtre- parasyadharmamupadiśan pañcavidhaṃ hitaṃ labhate iti /
T07hvsatssu:1484: tatra pravacanamātrasyottamaṃ hitaṃ bhavati yadyathoktamācarata āsravāḥ kṣīyante iti /
T07hvsatssu:1488: atha sa puruṣa idānīṃ jyotiṣi sthitaḥ paścādapi jyotiḥ parāyaṇo bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:1489: laukikāḥ sarve bhūyasā tamastamaḥ parāyaṇāḥ jyotiṣo jyotiḥ parāyaṇā vā /
T07hvsatssu:1490: yaḥ kaścid buddhaśāsanamācarati sa tamaso jyotiḥ parāyaṇaḥ jyotiṣo jyotiḥ parāyaṇo vā bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:1492: dānādīnācaran na [tādṛśaṃ] hitaṃ vindate yādṛśaṃ buddhadharmaṃ śṛṇvan [vindate] /
T07hvsatssu:1493: yaścālpa[mapi] buddhapravacanaṃ śṛṇoti sa prativedhajñānalābhī san sarvakleśān bhaṅktvā apramāṇahitaṃ prasavati /
T07hvsatssu:1494: yaktoktaṃ sūtre- catvāraḥ pudgalāḥ- tamastamaḥparāyaṇaḥ tamojyotiḥparāyaṇaḥ jyotirjyotiḥ parāyaṇaḥ jyotistamaḥparāyaṇaḥ iti /
T07hvsatssu:1495: kiñca caturvidhāḥ parāyaṇāḥ anussrotogāmī pratisrotogāmī sthitātmā,
T07hvsatssu:1497: yaścittaikāgryeṇa bhagavaddharmaṃ śṛṇoti sa eva pañca nīvaraṇāni prahāya saptabodhyaṅgāni bhāvayati /
T07hvsatssu:1500: punaścaturvidhāḥ puruṣāḥ- sadābhavanimagnaḥ kañcit kālaṃ bhavānnirgatya punarnimagnaḥ,
T07hvsatssu:1504: kaścit laukikaśraddhādīnutpādya na dṛḍhayati panaḥ parihīyate /
T07hvsatssu:1506: yaḥ śraddhādīnutpādya śubhāśubhaṃ vivecayati sa nirgamaparīkṣakaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:1508: yo bhagavaddharmasya samyagarthaṃ vetti sa naiva sadā nimagno bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:1510: sa ca guṇābhāvayitetyucyate yaḥ kāyena śīlaṃ manasā prajñāṃ ca bhāvayati sa kiñcid duṣkarma kurvannapi durgatau patati /
T07hvsatssu:1511: yastu bhāvayati kāyena śīlaṃ manasā prajñāṃ sa bahu duṣkarma kurvannapi na durgatau patati /
T07hvsatssu:1513: kāyaṃ bhāvayan krameṇa śīlasamādhiprajñāskandhānutpādya karmāṇi prajahāti /
T07hvsatssu:1515: - uktañca sūtre caturvidhāḥ puruṣāḥ- kecit agambhīratīkṣṇānuyāḥ,
T07hvsatssu:1520: samanantaro yo mṛdumadhyānuśayaḥ sa sadāgatya cittaniviṣṭo bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:1522: caturtho yo mṛdumadhyānuśayaḥ sa kaśmiṃñcitkāla āgacchati /
T07hvsatssu:1523: sa yadi bhagavataḥ śāsane samyacchāsraṃ śṛṇoti /
T07hvsatssu:1528: nāsti puṇyapāpaṃ [nāsti] karmaphalamiti mithyādṛṣṭau yaḥ patati saparāneva vyābādhate /
T07hvsatssu:1529: yaddānamācarati sa ātmānamapi vyābādhate parānapi vyābādhate /
T07hvsatssu:1537: yathoktaṃ sūtre kathāsamprayogeṇa [pudgalo] veditavyo yadi vā kathyo yadi vākathya iti /
T07hvsatssu:1538: yo viduṣāṃ dharmaṃ pṛṣṭhaḥ sthānāsthāne na santiṣṭhati /
T07hvsatssu:1546: yathā nāthaputrādayaḥ svayaṃ vadanti asmākaṃ śāstā āptaḥ tadvacanamevānuvartāmaha iti /
T07hvsatssu:1560: ātmano vā mānasikī tuṣṭhiḥ āryapravacanadharmaḥ iti /
T07hvsatssu:1561: tatra yo bhagavaddharma samyak jñātvā pravakti sa kathyo bhavati / nānye /
T07hvsatssu:1564: vibhajya vyākaraṇīyaṃ praśnaṃ na vibhajya vyākaroti /
T07hvsatssu:1565: pratipṛcchāvyākaraṇīyaṃ praśnaṃ na patipṛcchya vyākaroti sthapanīyaṃ praśnaṃ na sthapayitvā vyākaroti /
T07hvsatssu:1569: [tena] yathā buddho bhagavān [tathā] loke nāsti tatsama itīdṛśamanumānaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:1576: sthapanīyaḥ praśna iti yo dharmo 'bhūtarūpaḥ kintu prajñaptisan /
T07hvsatssu:1578: kiṃ śāśvataḥ utāśāśvata ityādi yadi kaścit pṛcchati /
T07hvsatssu:1582: kiñca santi caturvidhāḥ puruṣāḥ- sāvadyaḥ badyabahulaḥ alpāvadyaḥ anavadya iti /
T07hvsatssu:1583: sāvadya iti yasya kevalamakuśalaṃ naiko 'pi kuśaladharmo 'sti /
T07hvsatssu:1590: bhagavacchāsanasya samyagarthavedī dvaividhyaṃ bhajate alpavadyo 'navadya iti /
T07hvsatssu:1597: yathoktaṃ sūtre- catvāri saṅgrahavastūni- dānaṃ priyavacanamarthacaryā samānārthatā iti /
T07hvsatssu:1611: tadā te sattvā na prakampyā bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:1615: yathoktaṃ sūtre- dharmapratiśaraṇena bhavitavyam na pudgalapratiśaraṇeneti /
T07hvsatssu:1616: yadyapi kaścidevaṃ vadet mayā bhagavataḥ sammukhāt śrutaṃ bhadantaśca sammukhādvā pūrvānte śrutamiti /
T07hvsatssu:1618: yadvacanantu sūtre 'vatīrṇaṃ dharmalakṣaṇāviruddhaṃ vinayānuloimitañca tatpunarādeyaṃ syāt iti /
T07hvsatssu:1626: anityā duḥkhā anātmāna iti yo bhāvayati /
T07hvsatssu:1628: anityatādijñānameva dharmalakṣaṇam dharmo 'yaṃ śaraṇīkartavyo na pudgalāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:1629: dharmapratiśaraṇaṃ vadatā sarve dharmāḥ saṅgṛhītā bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:1630: ataḥ punarucyate nitārthasūtrapratiśaraṇena bhavitavyaṃ na neyārthasūtrapratiśaraṇeneti /
T07hvsatssu:1632: yaducyate arthapratiśaraṇena bhavitavyaṃ na vyañjanapratiśareṇa iti /
T07hvsatssu:1633: yo 'yaṃ vyañjanārthaḥ sūtre 'vatīrṇo dharmalakṣaṇāvirodhī vinayānulomakaśca tatpratiśaraṇena bhavitavyam /
T07hvsatssu:1645: uktañca sūtre- catvāri devamanuṣyāṇāṃ cakrāṇi śubhavardhakāni /
T07hvsatssu:1646: pratirūpadeśavāsaḥ satparuṣopāśrayaḥ ātmanaḥ samyakpraṇidhānaṃ pūrve ca kṛtapuṇyatā /
T07hvsatssu:1650: pūrve ca kṛtapuṇyatā nāma yat bādhiryamūkatādyabhāvaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:1651: ātmanaḥ samyak praṇidhānaṃ nāma samyak darśanamidam /
T07hvsatssu:1653: asya śāstrasyādhyetā cāsminnevāyuṣi satyaprativedhākhyaṃ mahāsārārthaṃ labhate /
T07hvsatssu:1654: yathoktaṃ sūtre- catvāraḥ sāradharmāḥ vacanasāraḥ samādhisāro darśanasāro vimuktisāra iti /
T07hvsatssu:1657: sarve anātmānaḥ śāntaṃ nirodho nirvāṇamiti yadvacanam /
T07hvsatssu:1660: imaṃ samādhimupādāya saṃskṛtadharmā anityā duḥkhāḥ ityādi bhāvanā samyagdarśanaprāpiṇī bhāvanāmayaprajñāparipūraṇamityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:1669: śrutasaddharmā san yoniśo manaskāramutpādya anityādinā dharmān samyagbhāvayati /
T07hvsatssu:1670: anayā bhāvanayā dharmānudharmaṃ pratipadyate yadutānāsravaṃ darśanam /
T07hvsatssu:1677: śūnyatādarśanena kleśānāṃ viyogaṃ labhata iti tyāgādhiṣṭhānam /
T07hvsatssu:1679: kiñca bhagavacchāsanasya samyacchāstraṃ śrutavataścatvāri nirvāṇagāmini kuśalamūlāni aṅkurībhavanti yaduta ūṣmadharmo mūrdhadharmaḥ kṣāntidharmo laukikāgradharma iti /
T07hvsatssu:1680: anityādyākāreṇa pañcaskandhān bhāvayato 'varaṃ mṛdu nirvāṇagāmi kuśalamūlaṃ cittasyoṣmakaramutpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:1693: yastathāgatasya dharmaṃ śṛṇoti sa hānabhāgīyaṃ visaṃyujya trīṇi kuśalamūlāni pratilabhate //
T07hvsatssu:1696: atha yastāthāgatadharmaṃ śṛṇoti sa catussatyāni savibhaṅgāni samprajānāti duḥkhasatyaṃ,
T07hvsatssu:1703: santi ca catasro vijñānasthitayo rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā iti /
T07hvsatssu:1706: santi ca catasro jātayaḥ- aṇḍajo jarāyujaḥ saṃsvedeja aupapāduka iti /
T07hvsatssu:1710: catvāra āhārāḥ- kavaḍīkāra āhāraḥ audārikaḥ sūkṣmo vā /
T07hvsatssu:1714: manaḥsañcetanāhāro yat kadācit puruṣāḥ sañcetanāpraṇidhānena jīvati /
T07hvsatssu:1715: vijñānāhāraḥ antarābhavikanārakārūpyā nirodhasamāpattipraviṣṭhāḥ satvā adṛṣṭavijñānā api vijñānapratilambhe vartanta ityato vijñānāhārā ityucyante
T07hvsatssu:1725: ṣaṭ sparśāyatanāni cakṣurādīni ṣaḍindriyāṇi vijñānasaṅgatāni sparśāyatanamityākhyāyante /
T07hvsatssu:1727: āsu sthitiṣu viparyayabalāt vijñānaṃ sābhirāmaṃ tiṣṭhati /
T07hvsatssu:1728: aṣṭau lokadharmāḥ- lābho 'lābho yaśo 'yaśo nindā praśaṃsā sukhaṃ duḥkhamiti /
T07hvsatssu:1733: sarve ca dharmāḥ pañcadhā vikalpyante- pañca skandhāḥ dvādaśāyatanāni aṣṭādaśa dhātavo dvādaśa nidānāni dvāviṃśatirindriyāṇi iti /
T07hvsatssu:1736: yat cittaṃ strī puruṣaḥ śatrubandhurityādisaṃjñāṃ janayati /
T07hvsatssu:1738: śatrurbandhurmadhyastha iti yat puruṣaṃ vikalpayati tat tisro vedanā janayati /
T07hvsatssu:1740: āsu tisṛṣu vedanāsu yat trividhāḥ kleśā utpadyante /
T07hvsatssu:1742: eṣāṃ pravṛttyā kāyopādānānyupādatta iti pañcopādānaskandhā ityucyante /
T07hvsatssu:1743: caturbhiḥ pratyayai vijñānamutpadyate yaduta hetupratyayaḥ samanantarapratyaya ālambanapratyayo (SSS_54)

T07hvsatssu:2480: yasmātsattvā atītānanāgatān dharmān sātmano manyante tasmāt bhagavānevamavocat /
T07hvsatssu:2483: tacca karma phalasya hetuṃ kṛtvā niruddham /
T07hvsatssu:2486: tathāgataśāsane asti vā nāsti vā iti sarvamupāya ityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:2493: cittasyotpādo nātmani niśrayata iti ca viśadam /
T07hvsatssu:2496: tathāgataḥ prajānāti- karmaniruddhamapi phalasya hetuṃ karotīti /
T07hvsatssu:2501: tasya ca karmaṇo nirodhe 'pi vipāko na praṇaśyati /
T07hvsatssu:2512: prākṛto jano mohādabhūtasmṛtyā pūrvagṛhītaṃ niyatalakṣaṇaṃ paścānniruddhamapi utpadyamāna[mivā]nusmarati /
T07hvsatssu:2517: bhavānāha- na kīrtayet- ahaṃ dhyānasamādhiṃ labdhavāniti /
T07hvsatssu:2520: bhavān bravīti- adhicittamadhivedanañca bhāvanā na bhavet iti /
T07hvsatssu:2533: uktañca bhavatā- sūdīrghamalpakālaṃ vā śīlābhyāsaśca na syāditi /
T07hvsatssu:2546: bhagavānāha- sarvaṃ sarvamiti brāhmaṇa yāvadeva dvādaśāyatanāni /
T07hvsatssu:2548: pṛthivyādīni dravyāṇi saṃkhyādayo guṇāḥ utkṣepaṇāvakṣepaṇādikaṃ karma /
T07hvsatssu:2553: ākāśe [ca] padaṃ nāsti śramaṇo nāsti bāhyataḥ /
T07hvsatssu:2562: bhagavataḥ śāsana upāyatayā sarvamastīti vā sarvaṃ nāstīti vocyate /
T07hvsatssu:2575: āśvalāyanasūtre hi bhagavānāha- yadā pitarau sannipatitau bhavataḥ /
T07hvsatssu:2578: vatsasūtrañcāha- yasmin samaye sattva imaṃ kāyaṃ nikṣipati punaścittotpādanakāyamanupādāno bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:2582: uktañcasūtre- vyavakīrṇaṃ karmābhisaṃskṛtya vyavakīrṇaṃ kāyamupādāya vyavakīrṇe loka utpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:2584: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- catvāro bhavāḥ pūrvakālabhavo maraṇabhavo 'ntarābhava upapattibhava iti /
T07hvsatssu:2587: āha ca- yamarājo 'ntarābhave pāpinaḥ santarjya vyatyastaṃ pātayanti /
T07hvsatssu:2589: tathāgato 'ntarābhavamupādāya sattvānāṃ pūrvanivāsaṃ prajānāti ayaṃ sattvo 'smin upapattisthāna utpadyate sa sattvastasminnupapattisthāna iti
T07hvsatssu:2590: uktañca sūtre- divyena cakṣuṣā paśyati sattvān cyavamānānupapadyamānāṃśceti /
T07hvsatssu:2593: laukikā api astyantarābhava iti śraddhadhānā vadantimriyamāṇasya sūkṣmāṇi catvāri mahābhūtāni asmādbhavāt [bhavāntaraṃ] krāmanti iti /
T07hvsatssu:2597: imaṃ kāyaṃ visṛjya parakāyamanupādānasyāntarā vyucchedaḥ syāt /
T07hvsatssu:2602: yadyapyuktaṃ bhavatā- āśvalāyanasūtra uktam astyantarābhava iti /
T07hvsatssu:2605: yadyāryā na jānanti- ayaṃ kaḥ kuta āgata iti /
T07hvsatssu:2612: anena brāhmaṇena kalpitam- anyaḥ kāyo 'nyo jīva iti /
T07hvsatssu:2613: ata evaṃ prativakti- santyantarābhave pañcaskandhā iti /
T07hvsatssu:2615: sa kāmarūpadhātvorantarā kāyamupādāya tatra parinirvṛta iti antarāparinirvāyī /
T07hvsatssu:2617: yathoktaṃ sūtre- kaścinmriyamāṇaḥ kutra gacchati kutrotpadyate kutra tiṣṭhati itīdamekārthakam /
T07hvsatssu:2618: bhavānāha- vyavakīrṇaṃ kāyamupādāya vyavakīrṇe loka utpadyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:2619: kāyamupādāyeti vacanaṃ loka utpadyata iti cedamekārthakam /
T07hvsatssu:2620: catvāro bhavāḥ sapta bhavā iti ca bhavaduktaṃ sūtramayuktam /
T07hvsatssu:2634: bhavānāha- mriyamāṇasya sūkṣmāṇi catvāri mahābhūtāni bhavāntaraṃ krāmantīti /
T07hvsatssu:2640: pūrvanivāsajñāna uktaṃ jānāti ayaṃ puruṣo 'smiṃlloke mṛtastasmiṃlloka utpadyata iti na tūktam antarābhave tiṣṭhatīti /
T07hvsatssu:2650: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yadimaṃ kāyaṃ nikṣipan kāyāntaramupādatte tadahaṃ vadāmi upapattiriti /
T07hvsatssu:2676: nahi pratyakṣaṃ dṛśyate cittaṃ santatyotpadyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:2690: yathoktaṃ sūtre lokasya samudayaṃ paśyato nāstitādṛṣṭirna bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:2694: tasya virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dharmacakṣurbhavati / āha ca-
T07hvsatssu:2695: anupūrveṇa medhāvī stokaṃ stokaṃ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe /
T07hvsatssu:2697: āsravakṣayasūtramāha jānataḥ paśyataḥ āsravāṇāṃ kṣayo bhavati iti /
T07hvsatssu:2698: pratipattupratidinaṃ kṣīyamāṇaṃ svayamajānato 'pi sadā bhāvitatvāt āsravāṇāṃ kṣayo bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:2699: (SSS_79) bhagavānāha satyeṣu udapadyata cakṣuḥ jñānaṃ vidyā prajñā iti /
T07hvsatssu:2702: sūtre ca bhagavān kaṇṭhata āha anupūrveṇa satyābhisamaya iti /
T07hvsatssu:2705: kleśānāñca catussatyeṣu caturdhā mithyācārā bhavanti yaduta nāsti dukhaṃ,
T07hvsatssu:2710: yogī ca cittaṃ samādhāya idaṃ duḥkhaṃ ayaṃ duḥkhanirodha iyaṃ duḥkhanigāminī patipat iti vikalpayet /
T07hvsatssu:2711: yadyekasmin citte syāt kathamevamanupūrveṇa samādhivikalpo bhavet /
T07hvsatssu:2716: bhavānāha lokasya samudayaṃ paśyato nastitādṛṣṭirna bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:2719: tathā cet ṣoḍaśabhiḥ cittakṣaṇaiḥ dvādaśabhirākāraiśca mārgo labhyata iti na syāt /
T07hvsatssu:2720: bhavatoktaṃ yatsamudayalakṣaṇaṃ sarvaṃ tannirodhalakṣaṇamiti prajānato dharmacakṣurbhavatīti /
T07hvsatssu:2721: tathā cet cittadvayena mārgalābhaḥ syāt- adyaṃ samudayacittaṃ dvitīyaṃ nirodhacittaṃ iti /
T07hvsatssu:2723: bhavānāha anupūrveṇa medhāvī stokaṃ stokaṃ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe /
T07hvsatssu:2725: bhavatoktaṃ āsravakṣayasūtramāha rūpādīn jānataḥ paśyataḥ āsravānāṃ kṣayo bhavatīti /
T07hvsatssu:2728: bhagavān svayaṃ bravīti caturṣu satyeṣu jñānaṃ cakṣurvidyā prajñodapadyateti na bravīti anupūrveṇa ṣoḍaśacittakṣaṇāni bhavantīti /
T07hvsatssu:2729: (SSS_80) bhavatoktaṃ bhagavān kaṇṭhenāha- anupūrveṇa satyabhisamayaḥ śreṇyārohaṇavat iti /
T07hvsatssu:2736: evaṃ ca ṣoḍaśabhireva cittakṣaṇairmārgalābha iti na syāt /
T07hvsatssu:2740: [yogino] na [nānā]satyāni bhavanti kintu ekameva satyaṃ bhavati yaduta duḥkhanirodhadarśanamādyābhisambodhi nāmakam /
T07hvsatssu:2741: dṛśyadharmādīnāṃ pratītyasamutpannatvāt yogī ūṣmagatādidharmānupūrveṇa caramanirodhasatyarūpaṃ satyaṃ paśyati /
T07hvsatssu:2747: (pṛ) kena kāraṇena parihīyate kena kāraṇena na parihīyate /
T07hvsatssu:2749: yathoktaṃ sūtre- pañca hetavaḥ pañca pratyayāḥ samayavimuktasyārhataḥ parihāṇāya saṃvartante /
T07hvsatssu:2757: āha ca sūtram dvividho 'rhan parihāṇalakṣaṇo 'parihāṇalakṣaṇa iti /
T07hvsatssu:2758: api coktaṃ sūtre yadyamuko bhikṣuḥ vimuktimukhāt parihīyate tadidaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate iti /
T07hvsatssu:2760: kumbhopamaṃ kāyamidaṃ viditvā nagaropamaṃ cittamidaṃ sthāpayet /
T07hvsatssu:2761: yudhyeta māraṃ prajñāyudhena jitañca rakṣedaniveśanaḥ syāt // iti /
T07hvsatssu:2769: dapadyata ityādibhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ jñātavyaṃ parihīyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:2772: kecidvadanti āryamārgānna parihīyate dhyānasamādheḥ paraṃ parihīyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:2773: (pṛ) tathā cet arhan dvividho na syāt /
T07hvsatssu:2778: yathā gaudhiko bhikṣuḥ ṣaḍvāraṃ [cetovimukteḥ] parihīṇaḥ asinā ātmānaṃ jaghāna /
T07hvsatssu:2781: tathāgatāśāsane hi vimuktiḥ pradhānā na samādhiḥ /
T07hvsatssu:2783: tasmāt samādheḥ cyutasyānāsravaṃ cyavate na tu anāsravātparihīyate /
T07hvsatssu:2786: kṣīṇaṃ purāṇaṃ na navo 'sti sambhavo viraktacittā āyatike bhave ca /
T07hvsatssu:2787: te kṣīṇabījā aviruḍhacchandā nirvānti dhīrā yathāyaṃ pradīpaḥ // iti /
T07hvsatssu:2789: śailo yathā caikaghano vātena na samīryate /
T07hvsatssu:2790: evaṃ nindāpraśaṃsāsu na samiñjanti paṇḍitāḥ / iti /
T07hvsatssu:2795: kiñcāha- āryasya kṣīyamāṇaḥ samudayo na punarbhavati /
T07hvsatssu:2801: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- ye śaikṣā nirvāṇamārgaṃ paryeṣante /
T07hvsatssu:2803: yeṣāmāsravāḥ kṣīṇāḥ na teṣāṃ punarāsravā bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:2805: kiñcāha- vidvāna kuśalabhāvanaḥ kuśalavāk kuśalakāyakarmāntaḥ karaṇīyānna cyavata iti / api cāha-
T07hvsatssu:2817: āha ca- dharmān mithyābhāvayato bhikṣostraya āsravāḥ prādurbhavanti iti /
T07hvsatssu:2818: arhan punarna mithyābhāvayatīti na ta āsravāḥ prādurbhavanti iti /
T07hvsatssu:2819: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- ya āryaprajñayā prajānāti na sa parihīyate /
T07hvsatssu:2821: kīñcārhan tisro vedanāḥ samyak prajānāti [tāsā]mutpādalakṣaṇaṃ nirodhalakṣaṇamāsvādalakṣaṇaṃ mārgalakṣaṇaṃ nissaraṇalakṣaṇañcetyato notpādayati saṃyojanam /
T07hvsatssu:2822: kiñcāha- yo bhikṣuḥ śīlasamādhiprajñākhyai stribhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sa na parihīyate /
T07hvsatssu:2826: yathoktaṃ sūtre- satyavihārī āryo naiva parihīyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:2830: kiñcārhan akopyāṃ [ceto]vimuktiṃ sākṣātkṛtatvān ityato na parihīyate /
T07hvsatssu:2831: arhan tathāgataśāsane sāramarthaṃ pratilabdhavān yadutākopyā cetovimuktiḥ /
T07hvsatssu:2832: kasyacit karacchedavat tatsmaraṇe 'smaraṇe ca sadā karacchedo 'styeva /
T07hvsatssu:2835: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- śraddhādināmindriyāṇāṃ tīkṣṇatvāt arhan bhavati iti /
T07hvsatssu:2838: tadyathā dahano 'dagdhaṃ dahati dagdhvā ca napunastatra pratyāvartate /
T07hvsatssu:2839: evaṃ bhikṣuḥ ekā daśabhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgata ityato na kadāpi parihīyate /
T07hvsatssu:2840: (pṛ) dvividho 'rhan iti bhavatodāhṛtasūtramāha- asti aparihāṇa[lakṣaṇa] iti /
T07hvsatssu:2845: jinaścet punarutpannaḥ syāt ucyate na tu so jinaḥ
T07hvsatssu:2846: jino bhūtvā na jāyet tātvikaḥ sa jino mataḥ // iti /
T07hvsatssu:2847: yo 'rhan punaḥ kleśānutpādayati na sa jino bhavet /
T07hvsatssu:2848: arhataḥ kṣīṇajātitvāt na punaḥ kāyo vedyate /
T07hvsatssu:2849: bhavataḥ sūtraṃ yadyapyāha- arhan parihāṇadharmā punaḥ parihīyeta iti /
T07hvsatssu:2863: kleśā hi sadā cittena saha saṃprayogajāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:2870: yaḥ kleśaḥ sahajo bhavati na sa āgantuka ityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:2875: cittamidaṃ tatkāla eva niruddhaṃ na malanimittavat bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:2876: cittaṃ tatkāla eva vinaṣṭaṃ kena malena lipyate /
T07hvsatssu:2885: kintu tathāgataḥ cittaṃ nityaṃ sthāyīti vadatāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛta āha āgantukamalakliṣṭaṃ sat cittamapariśuddhamiti /
T07hvsatssu:2886: kiñca kusīdasattvā ye śṛṇvanti cittaṃ prakṛtito 'pariśuddhamiti /
T07hvsatssu:2888: na te cittavyavadānamārabheran ityataḥ tathāgata āha prakṛtipariśuddhamiti //
T07hvsatssu:2899: bhavatāṃ śāsane yadyapyucyate cittaviprayukto 'nuśayaḥ cittasamprayuktasaṃyojanaparyavasthānasya hetuṃ karotīti /
T07hvsatssu:2902: uktaṃ hi sūtre- avidyāyoniśomanaskāramithyāsaṅkalpādibhyo rāgādīni saṃyojanani prādurbhavanti iti /
T07hvsatssu:2904: yadyapi bhavatāṃ śāsana uktaṃ- cirābhyastasaṃyojanaparyavasthāpako 'nuśayo nāma iti /
T07hvsatssu:2910: yujyata iti cet sarve 'pi dharmāḥ pratyutpanna hetorupadyeran nātītahetoḥ /
T07hvsatssu:2911: tathā ca na karmajo vipākaḥ syāt /
T07hvsatssu:2913: anuśayānāmeṣāṃ kṣaṇikatvāt kathaṃ punaste janakahetavaḥ syuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:2921: śāstramāha- kāśyapīyā vadanti ananubhūtavipākaṃ karma atīte 'dhvani asti /
T07hvsatssu:2932: yathā payo nirodhe daghno hetukṛtyaṃ karoti /
T07hvsatssu:2944: śāstramāha- mahīśāsakā vadanti tathāgata saṅghavartī iti /
T07hvsatssu:2946: yadi mataṃ tathāgataḥ catasṛṣu pariṣatsu antargataḥ yaduta sattvapariṣat prāṇipariṣat manuṣyapariṣat āryapariṣat iti /
T07hvsatssu:2948: yadi mataṃ tathāgataḥ śrāvakapariṣadi antargata iti /
T07hvsatssu:2952: (pṛ) saṅghārāmāgragasya tathāgatasya dāyakaḥ puruṣaḥ saṅghadāyaka ityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:2956: (pṛ) bhagavān gautamīmavocat- imaṃ cīvaraṃ saṅghe dehi /
T07hvsatssu:2957: tadā ahamapi pūjito bhaviṣyāmi saṅgho 'pi ca /
T07hvsatssu:2960: yathoktaṃ sūtre yo rogaprekṣī sa māṃ paśyati /
T07hvsatssu:2967: ato jñāyate na bhagavān saṅgāntargata iti /
T07hvsatssu:2968: kiñca bhagavān na saṅghakarmapraviṣṭaḥ nāpi anyasaṅghavastusamaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:2972: śāstramāha- vātsīputrīyā vadanti asti pudgala iti /
T07hvsatssu:2977: yathā bahuṣu sūtreṣu tathāgato bhikṣūnāha- nāmamātrataḥ prajñaptimātrata upayogamātrataḥ pudgala ityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:2979: nāmamātrata ityādinā jñāyate na paramārtha iti /
T07hvsatssu:2981: yo na paśyati duḥkhañca sa ātmānantu paśyati /
T07hvsatssu:2982: duḥkhadarśī yathābhūtaṃ sa ātmānaṃ na paśyati // iti /
T07hvsatssu:2986: api ca sūtre bhagavānavocat- yatrāsmīti tatreñjitam iti /
T07hvsatssu:2987: yadvastu sat na tatreñjitaṃ bhavati yathā cakṣuḥ,
T07hvsatssu:2989: tatra tatra sūtre ca ātmavādaḥ pratiṣiddhaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:2991: kiṃ nu satveti pratyeṣi māradṛṣṭigataṃ nu te /
T07hvsatssu:2999: nāstyātmā na cātmīyaṃ na sattvo nāpi mānavaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:3017: bimbisārapratyudgamanasūtre bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantryāha- vibhāvayata yūyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ prākṛtānāṃ prajñaptimanurudhya vadāmi astyātmeti /
T07hvsatssu:3020: kiñcāha- pañcaskandhānupādāyāsti nānāvidhaṃ nāma yaduta ātmā sattvo mānavo deva iti /
T07hvsatssu:3024: sthavirapūrṇakaḥ kaścit tīrthikaḥ āha- yadi puruṣo mithyādṛṣṭayā asantamastīti vadati /
T07hvsatssu:3027: yamakasūtre śāriputro yamakamavocat- kiṃ yamaka samanupaśyasi rūpaskandho 'rhan iti /
T07hvsatssu:3029: kiṃ samanupaśyasi vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānamarhan iti /
T07hvsatssu:3035: yadevaṃ parimṛgya [dṛṣṭa eva dharme satyataḥ sthirataḥ] nopalabhyate /
T07hvsatssu:3036: tatkalyaṃ nu te vyākaraṇaṃ arhan [kāyasya bhedāducchidyate vinaśyati] na bhavati paraṃ maraṇāditi /
T07hvsatssu:3037: abhūtkhalu me [āyuṣman] śāriputra pūrvaṃ pāpakaṃ dṛṣṭigatam,
T07hvsatssu:3038: idaṃ punarāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya dharmadeśanāṃ śrutvā tacca pāpakaṃ dṛṣṭigataṃ prahīṇam /
T07hvsatssu:3045: uktañcaśreṇikasūtre- trayāṇāṃ śāstṝṇāṃ yo nopalabhate pratyutpannamātmānamūrdhvabhāvinaṃ vātmānaṃ tamahaṃ śāstāraṃ buddhaṃ vadāmi iti /
T07hvsatssu:3048: yadi mataṃ satyātmani ātmeti saṃjñā na viparyāsa iti /
T07hvsatssu:3069: astyekāntata ātmeti yo vadati sa ṣaṇṇāṃ mithyādṛṣṭīnīmanyatamasyāmanupatati /
T07hvsatssu:3075: paramārthatastu astyātmeti brūvato hi doṣo bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:3079: api cātmadṛṣṭimūloddharaṇāyāha bhagavān yathā mogharāja [māṇava]pṛcchāyāṃ bhagavān mogharājaṃ pratyāha-
T07hvsatssu:3082: evaṃ lokamavekṣantaṃ] mṛtyurājo na paśyati // iti
T07hvsatssu:3088: kasmāt caturṣu vyākaraṇeṣu caturtha sthapanīyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ yaduta bhavati puruṣaḥ paraṃ maraṇāt na bhavati [puruṣaḥ paraṃ maraṇāt] bhavati ca na bhavati ca [puruṣaḥ paraṃ maraṇāt],
T07hvsatssu:3089: naiva bhavati na na bhavati [puruṣaḥ paraṃ maraṇāt] /
T07hvsatssu:3096: tatra bhagavānevamāha- tasmin samaye ahameva mahāsudarśano rājā evaṃkāya ityādi /
T07hvsatssu:3097: pūrvakebhya utpannā idānīntanāḥ pañcaskandhāḥ na tu purāṇā eva /
T07hvsatssu:3100: iha nandati pretya nandati kṛtapuṇyo ubhayanna nandati / iti /
T07hvsatssu:3106: ekatyaḥ pudgala utpadyate loke bahūnāṃ vipattyanutāpāya /
T07hvsatssu:3107: ekatyaḥ pudgala utpadyate loke bahūnāṃ lābhāya /
T07hvsatssu:3108: yat kuśalākuśalakarmaṇāṃ samudācaraṇaṃ sarvaṃ tat sattvopagam /
T07hvsatssu:3109: tatra tatra ca sūtre bhagavān svayamāha- ahaṃ vadāmi sattvā ūrdhvakāyaṃ vedayante iti /
T07hvsatssu:3124: yathā bālakānāṃ nāmamātreṇa vastudānaṃ savipākaṃ syāt /
T07hvsatssu:3127: nāmamātrato 'sadapi astīti vādina āryā mṛṣāvādinaḥ syuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:3133: yadi vyavahārato 'sadapi astīti vadatāṃ punaḥ sūtragatāni pāramārthikāni dvādaśanidānāni trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni anātmānaḥ sarvadharmā ityādi vacanaṃ na syāt /
T07hvsatssu:3134: asti paraloka iti vādinamanusṛtya vadanti astīti /
T07hvsatssu:3136: vadanti ca loke ayutāni vastūni īśvarādutpannani /
T07hvsatssu:3140: ato bhavatodāhṛtaṃ sūtraṃ sarvaṃ sāmānyato dūṣitameva /
T07hvsatssu:3142: atrocyate / yadbhavatā pūrvamuktaṃ sthapanīyavyākaraṇāt astyātmeti jñāyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:3146: ato nāsti paramārthata ātmā avaktavya iti /
T07hvsatssu:3149: yathāha bhavatāmāgamaḥ cakṣuṣā dṛśyamānaṃ rūpamupādāyetyato vināśyātmā /
T07hvsatssu:3151: tadā na vaktavyaṃ na rūpaṃ nārūpamiti /
T07hvsatssu:3155: sūtre hyuktam- pañcendriyāṇi nānyopyasya viṣayān pratyanubhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:3161: yat cakṣurvijñānavijñeyaṃ na tat rūpamiti bravīṣi /
T07hvsatssu:3163: sūtre bhagavān svayaṃ bhikṣūnāmantryāha- asatyapyātmani saṃskārāṇāṃ (SSS_93)
T07hvsatssu:3165: paśyāmi ca divyena cakṣuṣā sattvānutpadyamānān mriyamāṇāṃśca /
T07hvsatssu:3168: bhavatāṃ śāsane hyucyate ātmā na jāyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:3171: anyānyapi pāpakarmāṇi na santi ityato bhavatāṃ śāsanameva mithyādarśanam /
T07hvsatssu:3174: ta eva pañcaskandhāḥ santatyā buddho bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:3176: bhavatāṃ śāsane ātmana ekatvāt viśeṣo na syāt /
T07hvsatssu:3178: sūtre bhagavān idaṃ vastu pratiṣidhyāha- nāhaṃ vadāmi kaścidimān pañcaskandhān parityajya tān skandhānupādatta iti /
T07hvsatssu:3179: kintu tatpañcaskandhānāṃ santatyā bhedābhāvādāha- ubhayatna nandatīti /
T07hvsatssu:3186: na hi sambhavati tasya saṃkleśasamayaṃ [sattva] upādatta iti /
T07hvsatssu:3187: kintu prajñaptyā hetupratyayānāṃ saṃkliṣṭatvāt āha- sattvāḥ saṃkliśyanta iti /
T07hvsatssu:3190: bhavatāṃ śāsane cocyate na pañcaskandhā evātmeti /
T07hvsatssu:3192: vayantu vadāmaḥ pañcaskandhānāṃ kalāpaḥ prajñaptyā ātmeti /
T07hvsatssu:3193: imamātmānamupādāya asti janma asti nirodhaḥ puṇyapāpamityādi /
T07hvsatssu:3197: abhūtasaṃjñayā bhavānevaṃ kalpayati na tathā bhagavadāśayaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:3198: vividhā ātmavādāḥ sarve duṣṭāḥ yathā bhavān bravīti- pañcaskandhān vihāya anyo 'styātmeti tīrthikā manyanta iti /
T07hvsatssu:3204: atha skandhasya santi trayo bhedāḥ- śīlasamādhiprajñāḥ,
T07hvsatssu:3217: loke ca nāsti ko 'pi dharma eka ityavaktavyaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:3219: (pṛ) yathā agnirindhanañca na vaktuṃ śakyata evaṃ vā nānā veti /
T07hvsatssu:3238: evamātmāpi pañcaskandhaiḥ saha triṣu adhvasu vartamānaṃ syāt /
T07hvsatssu:3241: yadyapi bhavānāha- agnirindhanena naiko na nānā iti /
T07hvsatssu:3250: bhavāṃstu abhūtasaṃjñayā imamātmānaṃ vikalpya keṣāṃ hitaṃ prāpayati /
T07hvsatssu:3252: ṣaḍvijñānavijñeya iti bhavatokta ātmā na ṣaḍviṣayarūpo bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:3255: caturṣu satyeṣu asaṅgraprahītaśca na satyeṣu bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:3257: bhavatāṃ śāsana ucyate jñeyadharmā yaduta pañcadharmakośāḥ- atītā anāgatāḥ pratyutpannā asaṃskṛtā avaktavyā iti /
T07hvsatssu:3260: sa caturbhyo dharmebhyo 'nya itīcchanti khalu bhavantaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:3264: ato bhavatā pūrvamuktam- tīrthikāḥ pañcaskandhān vihāya pṛthagātmāstīti manyante /
T07hvsatssu:3267: yadbhavānāha- ātmā prajñaptimātramitīdaṃ gāḍhataraṃ cintanīyam iti /
T07hvsatssu:3270: jinaśāsane hyucyate lokasatyavastu na pragāḍhaṃ cintanīyam iti /
T07hvsatssu:3275: yadavocadbhavān lokoktāni sarvāṇi anusartavyāni yadvadanti īśvarādutpannāni na yutāni vastūni ityādi /
T07hvsatssu:3282: savijñānānāṃ skandhānāṃ santatyā samudācāre sati asti karma asti vipākaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:3284: tasmāt pañcaskandhānāṃ kalāpaḥ prajñaptyā ātmā ityākhyāyate /
T07hvsatssu:3292: (u) satyaṃ nāma catvāri [ārya]satyāni yaduta duḥkhaṃ duḥkhasamudayo duḥkhanirodho duḥkhanirodhagāminī patipat /
T07hvsatssu:3298: tathāgataḥ svayamimaṃ dharmaṃ sādhayannapi sattvānāṃ tāraṇāya tatra tatra viprakīrṇaṃ deśitavān /
T07hvsatssu:3309: rūpaskandho yaduta catvāri mahābhūtāni catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya dharmāśca /
T07hvsatssu:3329: (pṛ) uktaṃ khalu sūtre- yatkiñcana rūpaṃ sarvaṃ tat catvāri mahābhūtāni catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya [rūpam] iti /
T07hvsatssu:3331: (u) yatkiñcit tatsarvamiti vadan rūpalakṣaṇaṃ nirdhārayati nānyadastīti /
T07hvsatssu:3333: tatpratyākhyānāyāha catvāri [eva] mahābhūtāni catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya [rūpam] iti /
T07hvsatssu:3341: (pṛ) kasmāt pṛthivyādaya eva rūpaṃ na śabdaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:3356: yathā gandharasādayaḥ saukṣmyāt ekamākāraṃ yugapadāśrayante na mithaḥ pratighnanti /
T07hvsatssu:3357: ataḥ śabdādayaḥ sāvaraṇāḥ sapratighā ityato rūpamityucyante /
T07hvsatssu:3359: yat chidyate bhidyate vihiṃsyata ityādi tat sarvaṃ rūpāśritam /
T07hvsatssu:3371: tīrthikāḥ kecidvadanti rūpādireva mahābhūtaṃ bhavatīti yathā sāṃkhyādīnām /
T07hvsatssu:3372: kecidvadanti rūpādi vihāyāsti mahābhūtam iti yathā vaiśeṣikādīnām /
T07hvsatssu:3373: ata idaṃ sūtramavadhārayati rūpādyupādāya pṛthivyādi mahābhūtaṃ sidhyatīti /
T07hvsatssu:3375: kiñcāha sūtram- khakkhaṭaḥ kharagataḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ iti /
T07hvsatssu:3379: te hi vadanti pṛthivīṃ paśyāmi pṛthivīṃ jighremi (dharmi)
T07hvsatssu:3381: sūtre coktaṃ yathā sparśavatī pṛthivī draṣṭavyā /
T07hvsatssu:3382: pṛthivyādisarvāyata nagato 'yaṃ puruṣaḥ paśyati rūpaṃ na kaṭhinyādi /
T07hvsatssu:3393: kiñcāha- ahamimāṃ mahāpṛthivīṃ dagdhvā vidhūmaṃ bhasmasātkariṣyāmīti /
T07hvsatssu:3394: atra prajñaptisatīṃ pṛthivīṃ dahati na kāṭhinyamātraṃ dahati /
T07hvsatssu:3397: kūpopame coktam- āpo dṛśyante ca spṛśyante ceti /
T07hvsatssu:3403: kiñcāha bhagavān- aṣṭaguṇā āpaḥsusaṃsthitaṃ śītalaṃ mṛdu madhuraṃ śuci adurgandhaṃ pātuḥ prahlādanaṃ paridāhanivāraṇamiti /
T07hvsatssu:3404: tatra yat susaṃsthitaṃ śītalaṃ sukumāraṃ tat sarvaṃ sparśāntargatam /
T07hvsatssu:3411: upādāya dharmāḥ sarve prajñaptisantaḥ na dravyasantaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:3414: evaṃ skandheṣu satsveva bhavati sattveti saṃvṛtiḥ // iti /
T07hvsatssu:3419: (SSS_101) tattu sāśrayayaṃ sādhiṣṭhānakamiti na tathāgataśāsanaṃ bhavet /
T07hvsatssu:3422: khakkhaṭādayaścatvāro dharmāḥ kimarthā bhavantiiti kevalaṃ mahābhūtārthā bhavati iti prāpyate /
T07hvsatssu:3424: ato jñāyate catvāri mahābhūtāni prajñaptimātrāṇi iti /
T07hvsatssu:3433: khakkhaṭalakṣaṇaḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ snehalakṣaṇo 'bdhātuḥ ūṣmalakṣaṇastejodhātuḥ īraṇalakṣaṇo vāyudhāturiti /
T07hvsatssu:3435: rūpādi bhautikaṃ rūpaṃ caturbhyo mahābhūtebhyaḥ samutpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:3437: khakkhaṭādinā ca catvāri mahābhūtāni nirucyante yat khakkhaṭaṃ kharagataṃ sā pṛthivīti /
T07hvsatssu:3441: ato jñāyate khakkhaṭaṃ vastudharmaḥ kharagataṃ prajñaptidharma iti /
T07hvsatssu:3450: sūtre cāha bhagavān- yaccakṣuṣi [māṃsa]piṇḍe khakkhaṭaṃ kharagataṃ iyaṃ pṛthivī /
T07hvsatssu:3454: asmin māṃsapiṇḍe bhagavānāha santi catvāri mahābhūtāni iti /
T07hvsatssu:3459: yadi kaścit brūyāt catvāri mahābhūtāni prajñaptisantīti /
T07hvsatssu:3461: yadi kharagataṃ pṛthivīti āpaḥ kharagatā iti tā api pṛthivī syuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:3462: mṛtpiṇḍaḥ snehagata iti so 'pi āpaḥ syāt /
T07hvsatssu:3466: ato na vaktuṃ śakyate kharagataṃ pṛthivī,
T07hvsatssu:3470: yathoktaṃ sūtre yatkiñcidrūpaṃ sarvaṃ tat caturmahābhūtakṛtamiti /
T07hvsatssu:3472: catvāri mahābhūtāni prajñaptisantīti vaktustāni vinirbhaktāni syuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:3475: tathā ca sati cakṣurmāsapiṇḍe catvāri mahābhūtāni na syuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:3477: sūtrasyāvirodhaṃ kāmayānasya bhavataḥ catvāri mahābhūtāni dravyāṇi bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:3481: sarve hi tīrthikā vadanti catvāri mahābhūtāni rūpādibhirekāni yadi vānakānīti /
T07hvsatssu:3484: kiñca vayaṃ vadāmaḥ pratyakṣadṛṣṭāni khakkhaṭādīni caturmahābhūtāni na tu vaiśeṣikāṇāmiva tānyapratyakṣadṛṣṭānyapi /
T07hvsatssu:3488: āha ca cittaṃ mahatāṃ dharmāṇāmāśraya iti /
T07hvsatssu:3489: asminnartha uktam khakkhaṭameva svaragataṃ na punardhamāntaramiti /
T07hvsatssu:3491: laukikāḥ sarve śraddadhante yāvadaṣṭaguṇā āpa iti yadbhavato vacanaṃ tat vyavahārānuvartanamātrato vadanti na dravyamahābhūtā [nuvartana]taḥ
T07hvsatssu:3492: kiñcoktaṃ bhavatā- upādāyadharmāḥ sarve prajñaptyātmakā iti /
T07hvsatssu:3495: uktaṃ hi sūtre- yadi vā ṣaṭ sparśāyatanāni yadi vā ṣaṭ sparśāyatanānyupādāya dharmā iti /
T07hvsatssu:3497: bhagavān pratyāha- cakṣu[rbhikṣo] catvāri mahāmūtānyupādāya rūpaprasāda iti /
T07hvsatssu:3501: dharme dharmo vartata iti mātraṃ vadāmaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:3502: yadbhavānāha- khakkhaṭādayaḥ kimarthā bhavantīti kevalaṃ mahābhūtārthā iti bhavanti iti prāpyate iti /
T07hvsatssu:3503: khakkhaṭādayaḥ sārthakā yaduta khakkhaṭa lakṣaṇaṃ sandhatta iti /
T07hvsatssu:3513: yadyapyuktaṃ bhavatā abhidharma uktaṃ- khakkhaṭalakṣaṇaḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:3517: (SSS_104) bhagavān hi svayamāha- khakkhaṭaḥ kharagataśca pṛthivī iti /
T07hvsatssu:3520: rūpādikaṃ caturbhyo mahābhūtebhyaḥ samutpadyata iti bhavaduktaṃ na yujyate /
T07hvsatssu:3527: yathā cānando bhikṣuṇīśikṣaṇāya bhaginīmāha- ayaṃ kāyaḥ āhārasambhūtaḥ tṛṣṇāsambhūto mānasambhūto maithunasambhūta iti /
T07hvsatssu:3528: ato jñāyate rūpādi rna caturmahābhūtasambhūt iti /
T07hvsatssu:3530: tathāpi catvāri mahābhūtāni ca aṃśena hetavaḥ syuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:3533: tathā cakṣurādīnāṃ karmasambhūtatve 'pi catvāri mahābhūtāni aṃśato hetavo bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:3535: yathā kalpāvasāne kalpādau ca mahatī vṛṣṭiḥ /
T07hvsatssu:3541: yathā ca rūpasantānaḥ vyucchidya punaḥ pratisandhīyate /
T07hvsatssu:3547: utkaṭakarmabalastu na bāhyapratyayamapekṣate tathā dharmā api syuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:3554: kenārthena khakkhaṭādito rūpādirutpadyate na rūpāditaḥ khakkhaṭādiḥ /
T07hvsatssu:3560: na vaktuṃ śakyaṃ vāmadakṣiṇe hetū iti /
T07hvsatssu:3565: pradīpo hi rūpaṃ prakāśa iti dharmadvayasamavāyātmakaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:3566: rūpameva prakāśa iti na pradīpaḥ pṛthagbhavati /
T07hvsatssu:3576: yathā sapratidhe vijñānasya cakṣūrūpaṃ hetupratyayo bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:3580: pūrvaniruddhaṃ cittaṃ hetuḥ iti kathaṃ yugapajjāyamānaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:3581: yo dharmo yaṃ hetumanuvartyotpadyate sa tasya hetuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:3582: yaccittaṃ yadindriyāṇyupādāya bhavati sa tadupādāya dharmaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:3593: (u) na vayaṃ vadāmaḥ asarūpahetorna jāyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:3594: kintu sarūpahetau ca sati jāyata iti vadāmaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:3596: rūpādayo jāyante na caturmahābhūtebhya eva jāyanta iti /
T07hvsatssu:3597: ato nābadhāraṇaṃ bhavati rūpādayaścaturmahābhūtebhya eva jāyanta iti /
T07hvsatssu:3598: khakkhaṭādinā catvāri mahābhūtāni nirūpyanta iti yadavocadbhavān /
T07hvsatssu:3602: saukumāryādestu aniyataḥ kadācit khakkhaṭabahule saṅghāte vartate /
T07hvsatssu:3611: yathoktaṃ sūtre- khakkhaṭā[di]gatānīti caturṇāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ vibhāgā nirdiśyanta iti /
T07hvsatssu:3612: ato jñāyate khakkhaṭagatadharmaḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ na tu khakkhaṭamātralakṣaṇa iti /
T07hvsatssu:3617: saṃjñākriyāyai yat kiñcan khakkhaṭaṃ kharagataṃ sarvaṃ tat pṛthividhātuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:3627: prajñaptitaḥ prasiddhe hetau prajñaptitaḥ saṃjñā bhavati yathā vadanti- paśyāmyahaṃ vṛkṣasya chettāraṃ puruṣamiti /
T07hvsatssu:3635: kiñca tathāgate tejovatī samādhimupasampanne tatkāyā dvividhāni jvālārūpāṇi niścaranti /
T07hvsatssu:3640: yathoktaṃ sūtre- santi kāye 'smin nakhalomakeśādaya iti /
T07hvsatssu:3643: uktañcabīja sūtre yataḥ pṛthivīdhātuḥ syāt nābdhātuḥ na bījāni vṛddhiṃ [virūḍhiṃ vipulatā] māpadyanta iti /
T07hvsatssu:3644: tatra kiṃ pṛthivīdhātuḥ yaduta prajñaptitaḥ kṣetram,
T07hvsatssu:3647: ekasya dharmasya dravyatvaṃ prajñaptitvamiti dviprakāro 'pi nopalabhyate /
T07hvsatssu:3650: mahābhūtāni tu dravyataśca prajñaptitaśca santīdaṃ mithyāśāstram /
T07hvsatssu:3651: ṣaḍdhātu sūtre ca bhagavānāha- keśalomanakhādīni pṛthivīdhāturiti /
T07hvsatssu:3652: hastipadopamasūtre coktam- keśā lomā nakhā ityādīni ayamucyate pṛthivīdhāturiti /
T07hvsatssu:3655: yadavādīḥ bhagavānāha- yaccakṣurmāsapiṇḍe khakkhaṭaṃ kharagataṃ iyaṃ pṛthivī ityādi /
T07hvsatssu:3656: vacanenānena bhagavān pradarśayati pañcendriyāṇi catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya bhavanti iti /
T07hvsatssu:3659: kecidvadanti indriyāṇi nānāsvabhāvajāni yaduta pṛthivīmahābhūtāt sambhūtaṃ ghrāṇamityādi /
T07hvsatssu:3660: tatpratyākhyānāya bhagavānāha- cakṣurādīndriyāṇi caturmahābhūtasamavāyātmakāni śūnyānyavastūni iti /
T07hvsatssu:3663: asmin māṃsapiṇḍe santi catvāro bhāgāḥ khakkhaṭaṃ kharagatamityādi vacanena bhagavān pradarśayati sarvapadārthāḥ caturmahābhūtasambhūtā iti /
T07hvsatssu:3668: pṛthivyādīnāṃ khakkhaṭagatadharmādayo viśiṣṭāḥ vāyostu na tathā /
T07hvsatssu:3670: yadavādīḥ catvāri mahābhūtāni prajñaptisantīti vaktuḥ tanmahābhūtalakṣaṇāni vinirbhaktāni syuriti /
T07hvsatssu:3674: yo dharmo lakṣaṇādanya na sa āśrayaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:3678: (u) āśraya iti saṃjñāyate nānyadvastu lakṣaṇasyāśraya iti /
T07hvsatssu:3684: yathā ātape kevalaṃ rūpayuktaḥ sparśa upalabhyate nānye dharmaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:3685: candrikāyāṃ kevalaṃ rūpayuktaḥ śītasparśa upalabhyate nānye dharmāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:3706: ataścatvāri mahābhūtāni na vinirbhāgalābhina iti jñāyate /
T07hvsatssu:3709: (u) tathā cet vāyau kadācidgandho 'stīti gandho vāyugataḥ syāt /
T07hvsatssu:3721: evaṃ kiṃ saṃjñānusmaraṇavikalpena yaduta catvāri mahābhūtāni sahajātāni apṛthagbhāgavartīnīti //
T07hvsatssu:3724: pūrvaṃ yadavādīḥ- na vayaṃ brūmaḥ catvāri mahābhūtāni rūpādibhirekāni yadi vānekāni ityato 'navadyam iti /
T07hvsatssu:3727: tīrthikāḥ sarve siṣādhayiṣantītyata ścaturṇāṃ mahābhūtānāmekatvanānātve udāharanti /
T07hvsatssu:3728: ato bhagavān prajñaptau catarṇāṃ mahābhūtānāmudāhṛtatvāt teṣāmarthamupadiśati /
T07hvsatssu:3730: laukikāḥ svabhāvataḥ pṛthivyādimahābhūtāni jānanto 'pi na vidanti [teṣāṃ] vastubhāvam /
T07hvsatssu:3735: asti dvidhā āśrayārtha ityuktvā mahābhūtāni dravyāṇīti yadavocaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:3738: [aṣṭaguṇā āpa iti] vyavahārānuvartanato vadanti na tu dravyamahābhūtā[nuvartana]ta iti yadvacanaṃ tadayuktam /
T07hvsatssu:3740: yadi vā pravacane yadi vā loke na hetupratyayairvinā rūpādiṣu caturmahābhūta saṃjñāṃ kurvanti /
T07hvsatssu:3742: rūpādiṣu hi puruṣa iti saṃjñā na hetupratyayairvinā bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:3743: yo vināpi sudṛḍhahetupratyayaiḥ saṃjñāṃ karoti so 'śvaṃ dṛṣṭvā puruṣa ityāhvayet /
T07hvsatssu:3746: laukikāḥ sadā [pṛthag] vadanti pṛthivīti śabda iti /
T07hvsatssu:3753: yathārūpamidaṃ prajñapterhetuṃ sādhayati tatra puruṣa iti saṃjñā /
T07hvsatssu:3756: evaṃ rūpādiṣu dharmeṣu catvāri mahābhūtānīti saṃjñāṃ vadanti /
T07hvsatssu:3757: yadavocaḥ- yadi vā ṣaṭ sparśāyatanāni yadi vā ṣaṭ sparśāyatanānyupādāya siddhā [dharmā] iti /
T07hvsatssu:3759: yathā bhavatāṃ śāsane bhautikaṃ rūpaṃ na kasyacijjanakam /
T07hvsatssu:3760: tathā mama śāsane 'pi prajñaptau na [tat]kasyacit janyam /
T07hvsatssu:3763: yadavādīḥ- catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya bhautiko rūpaprasādaḥ cakṣuriti /
T07hvsatssu:3768: yadyupyuktaṃ bhavatā dharme dharmo vartate nirāśrayo niradhiṣṭhātā ceti /
T07hvsatssu:3769: [tatra yo dharmaḥ] sa evāśrayaḥ adhiṣṭhātā ca /
T07hvsatssu:3780: (pṛ) yadāha bhavān- khakkhaṭabahulo rūpādi [samavāyaḥ] pṛthivīmahābhūtamityataḥ pṛthivyādayaḥ prajñaptisanta iti /
T07hvsatssu:3785: (1) yo mṛtpiṇḍaḥ khakkhaṭaḥ sa eva [kadācit] mṛduḥ /
T07hvsatssu:3792: yena khakkhaṭaḥ kāyaḥ mṛduḥ kāya iti buddhirbhavet /
T07hvsatssu:3802: anenaiva kāraṇena mṛdvādayaḥ sparśā api na santi //
T07hvsatssu:3806: yadyapyāha bhavān- yo mṛtpiṇḍaḥ khakkhaṭaḥ sa eva [kadācit] mṛduriti (1) /
T07hvsatssu:3810: bahūnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kalāpaḥ prajñaptyā mṛtpiṇḍa ityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:3813: mama saṃśliṣṭasaṃṅghātāṇuṣu idaṃ khakkhaṭalakṣaṇaṃ labhyata iti asti khakkhaṭatā /
T07hvsatssu:3820: upalabhyante kilāsmābhiḥ ekasminneva dharme bahavaḥ sparśāḥ khakkhaṭo 'pi mṛdurapīti /
T07hvsatssu:3821: yadapyuktam- khakkhaṭatā mṛdutā cānyonyamapekṣata iti nāsti niyateti (4)
T07hvsatssu:3834: yathāgniṃ dṛṣṭvā ūṣma jñāyate iti noṣma dṛśyaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:3835: yathā puruṣaḥ kambalaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃśete kimidaṃ kaṭhinaṃ kiṃ vā mṛdu iti /
T07hvsatssu:3861: yo dharmaḥ khakkhaṭaḥ kharagataḥ sa pṛthivīdhātuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:3864: āpaḥ snigdhā atiśaityāt karakā bhāvanti iti kathaṃ mahābhūtāni na svalakṣaṇaṃ jahati /
T07hvsatssu:3865: yathāha sūtram- caturṇāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kadācit vikāryaṃ catvāraḥ śrāddhā nānyathopalabhyante /
T07hvsatssu:3872: (pṛ) abhidharma uktam- apāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ sneha iti /
T07hvsatssu:3879: ato drava eva [lakṣaṇam] na tu snehaḥ syandanaṃ vā /
T07hvsatssu:3898: (u) karmeti kevalaṃ lokasatyato vadāmaḥ na tu paramārthataḥ laghudharmamupādāya deśāntare jananadharmaḥ karmeti saṃjñāṃ labhate /
T07hvsatssu:3903: yathā daśapalaṃ vastu viṃśatipalavastvapekṣya laghu pañcapalavastvapekṣa tu guru /
T07hvsatssu:3919: gurutvavarjitā anye rūpādayo dharmā atulyatvāt laghavaḥ syuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:3922: (u) na vayamaṅgīkurmo rūpādīn vihāya dharmāntaraṃ guru bhavatīti /
T07hvsatssu:3925: yathā khakkhaṭamakhakkhaṭaṃ balamabalaṃ navaṃ purāṇamupacitamanucitaṃ kṣīṇamakṣīṇaṃ sthūlaṃ sūkṣmam ityādayaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:3928: ayaṃ rūpādisaṅghāto yadi pārthiva āpyo vā /
T07hvsatssu:3938: gurulaghutvavikalpo 'vaśyaṃ kāyendriyeṇeṣyata ityato na gururlaghuḥ rūpādisaṅghātaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:3939: (u) te ca khakkhaṭādayaḥ kadācit cakṣuṣā kadācit śrotrādīnā vikalpyante /
T07hvsatssu:3940: te ca khakkhaṭādayaḥ padārthā na rūpādīn vihāya santi /
T07hvsatssu:3947: (pṛ) na tasmin samaye jñāyata idaṃ gurulakṣaṇamiti /
T07hvsatssu:3948: (u) yathā parihitavastraḥ puruṣo 'spṛṣṭo 'pi jñāyate [ayaṃ] balavān abalavān iti /
T07hvsatssu:3959: kecitsparśāḥ sadākāyagatāḥ na śītoṣṇādivat bāhyamapekṣyāgāminaḥ yaduta praśrabdhisukhaṃ
T07hvsatssu:3960: styānaprakarṣaḥ astyānaprakarṣaḥ rogo viśeṣovā kāyataikṣṇyaṃ kāyamāndyam ālasyagurutā
T07hvsatssu:3969: yathā ca praśrabdhisukhādayo rūpādisaṅghātātmakakāyenāpi vijñāya vikalpyante /
T07hvsatssu:3971: yadi gururlaghuḥ sparśamātram [ityabhyupagamyate] ko doṣaḥ kimanayā rūpādisaṅghātavikalpakriyayā /
T07hvsatssu:3990: kiṃntu yo laghuḥ san samudīraṇasya hetuṃ karoti /
T07hvsatssu:3993: tatra laghutvaṃ vāyorlakṣaṇaṃ samudīraṇatvaṃ vāyoḥ karma /
T07hvsatssu:4006: kadācit kevalaṃ rūpasparśau staḥ yathā suvarṇajatādiṣu /
T07hvsatssu:4008: kadācit trayo rūparasasparśāḥ santi tejasi kadācit rūparasagandhasparśāḥ santi /
T07hvsatssu:4013: (u) śītoṣṇakaṭhinasukumārādayaḥ sparśāḥ yanmahābhūtasantatāvavinirbhāgavartinaḥ tasya mahābhūtasya sparśā iti jñātavyam /
T07hvsatssu:4017: yathā vātarogiṇo mukhe tiktaraso 'stīti na sa bhiṣagvavati vāyau raso 'stīti /
T07hvsatssu:4019: (pṛ) kecidvadanti vāyuḥ śīto na tu laghuriti /
T07hvsatssu:4022: yathā himaṃ śītaṃ sat na vāyurbhavati /
T07hvsatssu:4031: sattve 'pi saukṣmyānnopalabhyata iti vaktuścitta eva saṃjñānusmaraṇavikalpaḥ syāt yaduta vāyau rūparasau sta iti /
T07hvsatssu:4034: tasmāt yatphala upalabhyate nāvaśyaṃ taddhetau pūrvamasti /
T07hvsatssu:4041: cakṣurvikalpayan bhagavānevaṃ vacanamāha yaccakṣuṣi māṃsapiṇḍe khakkhaṭaṃ kharagataṃ sa pṛthivīdhāturiti /
T07hvsatssu:4045: bhagavān cakṣuḥ śūnyamiti janānāṃ jijñāpayiṣayaivedṛśaṃ vacanamāha /
T07hvsatssu:4046: tathā no cet cakṣuṣi khakkhaṭādikamanyadasti khakkhaṭādau vā anyadāsti cakṣuḥ [iti]khakkhaṭādīnāṃ vikalpe 'pi nāsti kaścanopakāraḥ /
T07hvsatssu:4050: tadā cakṣurādīni na puruṣapratyayā iti sidhyati /
T07hvsatssu:4056: bhagavān pratyāha- catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya rūpi anidarśanaṃ sapratighaṃ cakṣuḥ iti /
T07hvsatssu:4060: laukikāḥ sarve prajānanti rūpadarśanaṃ cakṣuryāvat sparśanaṃ kāya iti /
T07hvsatssu:4065: pañcendriyāṇi caturmahābhūtamayānīti parididṛkṣayā bhagavān pratyāha- cakṣurbhikṣo [ādhyātmikamāyatana] catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya rūpamanidarśanaṃ sapratighamiti /
T07hvsatssu:4066: yo dharmo dravyasan na sa upādāyāsti /
T07hvsatssu:4073: tathā nocet asya bhikṣoścakṣurādiṣu indriyeṣu śaṅkā naivocchidyeta /
T07hvsatssu:4075: bhagavān prāha- cakṣurādīnindriyāṇi catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya bhavantītyato 'yaṃ bhikṣurjānāti adravyasan cakṣurdharma iti /
T07hvsatssu:4077: bhagavān cakṣuṣaḥ śūnyatvapradarśanāya tatra catvāri mahābhūtāni vikalpayati /
T07hvsatssu:4078: yathā prajñayā aprapañcayitā vadati- ayaṃ kāyaḥ ṣaṭsu dhātuṣu vibhaktaḥ yat khakkhaṭaṃ kharagataṃ sa pṛthivīdhāturityādi pratyavekṣeteti /
T07hvsatssu:4082: hastipadopamasūtre catvāri mahābhūtāni vikalpitāni na punaścakṣuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:4085: vātsaputrīyādaya abhidharmikā api īdṛśaṃ vacanaṃ kurvanti /
T07hvsatssu:4100: yāni catvāri mahābhūtāni karmajāni cakṣurādisaṅgṛhītāni [tāni] ādhyātmikamāyātanam indriyam iti ca kathyante /
T07hvsatssu:4108: (u) na yujyata [idam] yathā prasādamupādāya āpaḥ sphaṭikam /
T07hvsatssu:4109: āpa eva prasannā āpa iti prasāda āpa eva /
T07hvsatssu:4115: na ca prajñaptiḥ tatsādhanahetoranyeti vaktuṃ śakyate /
T07hvsatssu:4141: pratyakṣaṃ paśyāmaḥ khalu anindriyāṇāṃ vijñānaṃ notpadyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:4146: dharmatā ca tathā- ya indriyavirahitāḥ teṣāṃ vijñānaṃ notpadyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:4147: na bāhyāni catvāri mahābhūtāni anindriyāṇi janayanti iti dharmatā tadapekṣeta /
T07hvsatssu:4149: yathā dhānyakāraṇakarmapratilambhāt dhānyaṃ bījāṅkurakāṇḍanālapatrāṇyapekṣyāpi kramaśo jāyate /
T07hvsatssu:4152: yathā cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣurindriyakaṃ samanantaraniruddhacittamupādāya ca bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:4158: cittadharmaśca tathā syāt- yat samanantaraniruddhacittendriyakaṃ bhavati nānyatkiñcidapekṣata iti /
T07hvsatssu:4177: yathoktaṃ sūtre- manaḥ pratītya dharmāṃśca manovijñānamutpadyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:4194: yathokta sūtre- paṭaṃ datvā rūpaṃ labhate /
T07hvsatssu:4205: vadanti ca mriyamāṇasya cakṣuḥ sūryaṃ pratigacchatīti /
T07hvsatssu:4220: yathā vadanti- annaṃ datvā pañcavastu- vipākān labhata iti /
T07hvsatssu:4229: yathā kṣālitacakṣuṣkasya puruṣasya cakṣuḥ sphuṭameva pratyeti /
T07hvsatssu:4242: yathā cakṣurākāśādipratyayaṃ labdhvā rūpamaprāpyāpi sudūraṃ paśyati /
T07hvsatssu:4244: ato na kāryaḥ saṃjñānusmaraṇavikalpoi yaduta tejobahulaṃ [cakṣu]riti /
T07hvsatssu:4249: yathā ulūkādayaḥ pakṣiṇo viḍālasṛgālādayastīryañca bāhyāmālokamanapekṣyāpi draṣṭuṃ śaknuvanti /
T07hvsatssu:4253: yadbhavānavādīḥ- cakṣuḥ saprabhatvāt sudūraṃ rūpaṃ patihantīti /
T07hvsatssu:4264: upari devānāṃ mriyamāṇānāṃ cakṣuḥ kutra pratigacchati /
T07hvsatssu:4274: tasmādindriyeṣu mahābhūtāni nyūnādhikāni bhavantīti bhavadvacanaṃ dūṣitameva /
T07hvsatssu:4278: abtejovāyuṣu rūparasasparśāḥ santi iti rūparasasparśajñānotpādakā bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:4292: apāṃ śītasparśamātraṃ tejasa uṣṇasparśamātraṃ jivhācakṣurbhyāṃ jñātuṃ śaknuyāt /
T07hvsatssu:4300: (pṛ) indriyāṇi viṣayān kiṃ prāpya vijānanti utāprāpya vijānanti /
T07hvsatssu:4307: bhavato hṛdayam- yatkecidvadanti indriyaṃ vijñānamapekṣya saha vijānāti na tu vijñānaviyuktaṃ vijānātīti /
T07hvsatssu:4312: yadīndriyaṃ vijānāti idamindriyakarma idaṃ vijñānakarma iti vivektavyam /
T07hvsatssu:4317: bhavatāṃ śāsane śrotrādīnīndriyāṇi na tejaḥprakṛtikāni iti na prakāśayeyuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:4321: tadā prakāśakasya punaḥ prakāśaka ityevamanavasthā syāt /
T07hvsatssu:4322: yadi punaḥ prakāśakaṃ vināpi indriyamātraṃ prakāśayati /
T07hvsatssu:4331: yathā sati tejasi ūṣma nāsati iti /
T07hvsatssu:4332: (pṛ) sūtra uktaṃ- cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā na nimittagrāhī syāditi /
T07hvsatssu:4337: uktañca sūtre- vayaṃ māṇavakāḥ susūkṣmamaṣi vastu jānīmaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:4343: indriyeṇa viṣayo gṛhyate vijñānena vikalpyate ityayamevendriyavijñānayorbhedaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:4344: (u) sūtre bhagavān svayamāha- cakṣu[brāhmaṇa]dvāraṃ[yāvadeva] rūpāṇāṃ darśanāya iti /
T07hvsatssu:4348: (pṛ) āha ca- mano dvāraṃ [yāvadeva] dharmāṇāṃ vijñānāye ti /
T07hvsatssu:4361: kiñca laukikā vyavaharanti- cakṣuḥ paśyati śrotraṃ śṛṇoti iti /
T07hvsatssu:4364: āha ca bhagavān- paśyāmi rāgādīn doṣān iti /
T07hvsatssu:4365: candraḥ kṣīṇa iti laukikānāṃ vacanaṃ bhagavānapyanuvadati /
T07hvsatssu:4372: (u) cakṣuṣo vijñānāśrayahetutāmanusṛtya tasmin hetau paśyatīti vadanti /
T07hvsatssu:4373: yathā vadanti sa puruṣaḥ paśyati ayaṃ puruṣaḥ paśyatīti /
T07hvsatssu:4374: yathā ca vadanti janāḥ puṇyapāpādīni kurvanti /
T07hvsatssu:4376: yathā ca vadanti vāmacakṣuṣā paśyati dakṣiṇacakṣuṣā paśyatīti /
T07hvsatssu:4377: vadanti ca sūryācandramasābhyāṃ paśyati sūryācandramasau paśyataḥ /
T07hvsatssu:4395: cakṣurupādāya vijñāne paśyati cakṣuḥ paśyatīti vyavahāraḥ /
T07hvsatssu:4396: yathā mañcastheṣu puruṣeṣu krośatsu mañcāḥ krośantīti vyavahāraḥ /
T07hvsatssu:4397: cakṣuḥpratisaṃyuktaṃ vijñānakarma ityatastatra cakṣuṣi vijñānakarma vyavaharanti /
T07hvsatssu:4398: yathā hastapādapratisaṃyukte puruṣe vartamānaṃ puruṣakarma hastakarmeti vyavaharanti /
T07hvsatssu:4401: yathā vadanti amukaḥ puruṣo 'mukaṃ grāmaṃ dahatīti /
T07hvsatssu:4406: evaṃ cakṣurbhyomutpannaṃ vijñānaṃ rūpaṃ paśyatītyataścakṣuḥ paśyatīti vyavaharanti /
T07hvsatssu:4407: cakṣuḥsannikṛṣṭe vijñāne rūpaṃ paśyati cakṣuḥ paśyatīti vyavahāraḥ /
T07hvsatssu:4409: cakṣuṣā cākṣuṣaṃ vijñānaṃ vivicyata ityataścakṣuṣi cākṣuṣavijñānakarmāropyate /
T07hvsatssu:4412: yathā dhane prahīṇe puruṣaḥ prahīṇa iti vadanti /
T07hvsatssu:4413: pravivṛddhe ca dhane pravivṛddhaḥ puruṣa iti /
T07hvsatssu:4414: cakṣurvijñāne cakṣuṣā saṃyujya paśyati sati cakṣuḥ paśyatīti vadanti /
T07hvsatssu:4415: yathā vṛkṣe puruṣeṇa saṃyujya chidyamāne sati puruṣo vṛkṣaṃ chinnattīti vyavahāraḥ /
T07hvsatssu:4416: yathā vā kṛṣṇavarṇasaṃyukte paṭe kṛṣṇaḥ paṭa iti vyavahāraḥ /
T07hvsatssu:4417: sarve ca dharmā mithaḥ saṃkīrya vyavahriyante /
T07hvsatssu:4419: cakṣūṣā rūpaṃ paśyatīti vaktavye saṃkṣipya vyavaharantaḥ kevalamāhuḥ cakṣuḥ paśyatīti /
T07hvsatssu:4422: bhavānidaṃ prativaktavyaḥ cakṣurādayaḥ pañcadharmā stadanyarūpādīnatiśerata ityata indriyamiti vyavahriyante /
