T07hvsatssu:4426: tathā yadi rūpādīnāṃ viyoge 'pi vijñānaṃ notpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:4435: rūpavijñānamityukte saṃśayaḥ prasajyate kimidaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ kiṃ vā rūpaṃ pratītya manovijñānamiti /
T07hvsatssu:4443: prasanne tu indriye vijñānaṃ viśadaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:4447: eko viṣayo bahūnāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ sādhāraṇa upalabhyate /
T07hvsatssu:4456: yadbhavānavādīḥ- vayaṃ māṇavakāḥ susūkṣmamapi vastu jānīmaḥ tadyathā cakṣurmyāṃ dṛśyate iti /
T07hvsatssu:4458: laukikāścakṣuḥ paśyatīti vadantītyata āhuḥ tadyathā cakṣurbhyāṃ dṛśyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:4462: acetanāpi jihvā tu na darvībhājanopamā // iti /
T07hvsatssu:4463: jihvāśritaṃ mano jihvāvijñānaṃ janayatītyata āha jihvā [sūpa]rasaṃ vettīti /
T07hvsatssu:4464: tathā cakṣurāśritya samutpanne vijñāne cakṣuḥ paśyatīti vadanti /
T07hvsatssu:4465: ata āha- jinaurasāḥ paśyanti tadyathā cakṣurbhyāṃ dṛśyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:4466: yadbhavānavādīḥ- indriyeṇa viṣayo gṛhyate vijñānena vikalpyate iti /
T07hvsatssu:4469: na ca yūyaṃ bravītha indriyasyaivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ viśiṣṭalakṣaṇa iti /
T07hvsatssu:4483: idānīṃ kiṃ viṣayendriyasaṃyogādvijñānamutpadyate kiṃ vā tadviyogāt /
T07hvsatssu:4492: ato jñātavyaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ na prāpya vijānāti / iti /
T07hvsatssu:4493: śrotrādivijñānaṃ dvividham- kiñcitprāpya vijānāti kiñcidaprāpya vijānāti /
T07hvsatssu:4498: dṛṣṭaṃ khalu trayāṇāmeṣāmindriyāṇāṃ viṣayaiḥ saṃyogāt vijñānaṃ labhyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:4512: yathoktaṃ sūtre- trayāṇāṃ sannipātaḥ sparśa iti /
T07hvsatssu:4517: ghrāṇaṃ gandhe jihvā rase kāyaḥ spraṣṭavye cakṣūrūpe śrotraṃ śabde yadyaprāptam /
T07hvsatssu:4523: bahupratyayasāmagryā ca jñānamutpadyate iti cakṣūraśmirviṣayasaṃyogāya gacchati /
T07hvsatssu:4527: viprakṛṣṭadeśavartini puruṣe mandaṃ bhāṣamāṇe na śrūyate /
T07hvsatssu:4537: aprāpya śravaṇe tu sa vibhāgo na syāt /
T07hvsatssu:4538: ato jñāyate śabdaḥ prāpya śrūyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:4543: aprāpya śravaṇe tu na sākalyena śrūyeta /
T07hvsatssu:4544: yathā rūpasyāprāptyā darśānāt na sākalyena darśanam /
T07hvsatssu:4545: ato jñāyate na rūpasamaḥ śabda iti /
T07hvsatssu:4547: yathā rūpasyekadeśaṃ dṛṣṭvā avaśiṣṭamapi ālokamapekṣya paśyati /
T07hvsatssu:4559: śabdaṃ yadi ghananibiḍaṃ jalādyāvṛtamapi śrotraṃ śrotuṃ śaknoti /
T07hvsatssu:4568: ekāṃ diśaṃ draṣṭuṃ śaknoti naikasmin samaye sarvā diśo draṣṭuṃ śaknoti /
T07hvsatssu:4569: yathā pūrvābhimukhaḥ puruṣaḥ pūrvāṃ diśaṃ rūpañca paśyati nānyā diśaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:4576: parispandatīdaṃ cittaṃ svābhīṣṭañca yathā caratyadaḥ // iti /
T07hvsatssu:4580: yathā puruṣo dūrataḥ sthāṇuṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃśete kimayaṃ puruṣa iti /
T07hvsatssu:4589: rūpadarśane 'sti dvibhāgaḥ yaduta pūrvasyāṃ paścimāyāṃ vā diśi rūpamiti /
T07hvsatssu:4611: tasya nayanaraśme rasati draṣṭari sa na syāt /
T07hvsatssu:4615: (pṛ) rūpa dharmā avaśyaṃ bāhyaṃ prakāśamapekṣya dṛśyante /
T07hvsatssu:4642: yathā bhavataścakṣū rūpaṃ prāpyāpi kadācitpaśyati kadācinna paśyati /
T07hvsatssu:4643: tadyathā cakṣuḥ sūryaṃ prāpya sūryamaṇḍalaṃ paśyati na tu sūryakarma /
T07hvsatssu:4653: kasmād dūrasthaṃ sūryamaṇḍalaṃ dṛṣṭvāpi karma na paśyati tat pāṭaliputrādi āsannaṃ janapadanagaram /
T07hvsatssu:4654: yadi bhavān manyate pāṭaliputrādi na ābhāsagatamityato na paśyatīti /
T07hvsatssu:4655: mama cakṣuraprāpyāpi rūpaṃ nābhāsāgatamityato na paśyati /
T07hvsatssu:4659: rūpasyābhibhāvakaviśeṣānna dṛśyate yathā rātrau tejo dṛśyamanyadadṛśyam /
T07hvsatssu:4660: bhūmiviśeṣānna dṛśyate yathā prathamadhyānagatacakṣuṣā dvitīyadhyānagataṃ rūpaṃ na dṛśyate /
T07hvsatssu:4661: tama āvāvaraṇānna dṛśyate yathā tamasi ghaṭaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:4667: aprāptyā na dṛśyate yathā prabhāgatā aṇavoḥ dṛśyāḥ prabhābāhyāstu adṛśyāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:4668: saukṣmyānna dṛśyate yathā puruṣākāraḥ sthāṇurna vivektuṃ śakyaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:4674: yat vātopahataṃ cakṣuḥ tat viparyastaṃ nīlakṛṣṇādirūpaṃ paśyet /
T07hvsatssu:4679: yat parikhedopahataṃ cakṣuḥ tat rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā na budhyate /
T07hvsatssu:4691: (pṛ) pañca viṣayāḥ jñānābhāsagatatvāt jñeyā bhavantīti jñātameva /
T07hvsatssu:4693: (u) ūrdhvabhūmikatvānna jñāyate yathā prathamadhyānacittaṃ dvitīyadhyānatadūrdhvadharmān na vijānāti /
T07hvsatssu:4694: indriyaviśeṣānna jñāyate yathā mandendriyasya cittaṃ tīkṣṇendriyasya cittagatadharmān na vijānāti /
T07hvsatssu:4695: puruṣaviśeṣānna jñāyate yathā śrotraāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāminaścittagatadharmān na vijānāti /
T07hvsatssu:4696: balaprabhedānna jñāyate yathā yanmanovijñānaṃ yasmin dharme balavihīnaṃ na tena manovijñānena sa dharmo jñāyate /
T07hvsatssu:4698: manovijñānavijñeyadharmo na vikṣiptacittakamanovijñānena vijñātuṃ śakyo bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:4699: yathā pratyekabuddhamanovijñānabalavijñeyadharmo na śrāvakamano[vijñāna]balena vijñātuṃ śakyo bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:4705: yathā janāḥ saṃsāre pūrvānubhūtaṃ dharmaṃ smaranti /
T07hvsatssu:4707: āryāstu yadi vānubhūtaṃ yadivānanubhūtaṃ sarvaṃ tadāryajñānabalādvijānanti /
T07hvsatssu:4708: viśiṣṭaviṣayatvāt jñāyate yathā rūpadhātukacittamanubhūya kāmadhātukadharmān vijānānti /
T07hvsatssu:4709: viparyayāvṛtatvānna jñāyate yathā satkāyadṛṣṭikacittaṃ pañcaskandhālambanaṃ nairātmyaṃ paśyati /
T07hvsatssu:4711: balāvṛtatvānna jñāyate yathā mṛdvindriyaḥ puruṣastīkṣṇendriyasya cittamāvṛtatayā na vijānāti /
T07hvsatssu:4714: (u) vikṣepaviparyayabhūtāveśā mānamadacittapramoṣā madyena vā auṣadhavyāmohena vā cittavibhramaḥ,
T07hvsatssu:4722: tasmādyadyaprāpya paśyati kasmānna sarvāṇi rūpāṇi paśyatīti bhavadvacanamayuktam /
T07hvsatssu:4730: pratyutpanneṣu jñānamutpadyata iti yadavādīḥ tatra ṣaṣṭhaṃ vijñānamapi pratyutpannamātraṃ jñāpayet paracittajñānavat /
T07hvsatssu:4732: tat ṣaṣṭhamanaindriyeṇa pratyuktameva yaduta indriyaviṣayavijñānānugamakālaḥ sannipāta iti /
T07hvsatssu:4733: pratītya mano dharmāṃśca manovijñānamutpadyata itīdaṃ vacanañca tadā vyarthaṃ syāt prāptyabhāvāt /
T07hvsatssu:4740: yadavādīḥ viprakṛṣṭadeśavartini puruṣe mandaṃ bhāṣamāṇe na śabdaḥ śrūyate /
T07hvsatssu:4744: yathā bhavānāha viprakṛṣṭadeśavartini puruṣe bhāṣamāṇe śabdāt śabdasantatyā tanurbhūtvā na punarudbhavatītyato na śrūyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:4747: yathā bhavato nayanaraśmirgatvāpi sūryamaṇḍalamātraṃ paśyati na sūryasya karma /
T07hvsatssu:4750: śabda audārikaḥ san śrūyate sūkṣmastu na śrūyate /
T07hvsatssu:4751: yathā bhavato nayanaraśmiḥ sudūraṃ gacchannapi na śatasahasrāyutayojanāni prāpnoti /
T07hvsatssu:4752: prasannasalilādyāvṛtaṃ suṣṭhu paśyannapi bhittyādyāvṛtaṃ tu na paśyati /
T07hvsatssu:4759: tadā tu na kaścitpratikūle vāyau śṛṇotīti syāt /
T07hvsatssu:4761: tadā śabdo 'pi pratikūlavāyau na kiñcidapi na śrotavyaḥ syāt /
T07hvsatssu:4767: yadavocaḥ śabdaḥ sākalyena śrūyata ityataḥ prāptipakṣe na rūpasama iti /
T07hvsatssu:4782: idānīṃ śabde kaḥ punaḥ śabdaḥ yaḥ śabdāntaraṃ janayati /
T07hvsatssu:4794: evaṃ ghaṇṭātaḥ śabda [udgate] sati ghaṇṭā niśśabdā syāt /
T07hvsatssu:4796: ato jñāyate śabdo ghaṇṭāyāṃ vartata iti /
T07hvsatssu:4799: yadi śabdo ghaṇṭāmāśrito ghaṇṭātaścāpi viyujyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:4803: dṛṣṭe vyavahāre ca nāsti kiñcit yathā ghaṇṭāsantatirutpadyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:4804: śabdasya cāsti digbhāgabhedo yaduta prācīśabdaḥ karṇadeśaṃ prāpnoti tadā na syāt ayaṃ vibhāgaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:4812: tathā no cet viddhaśabda iti nocyeta /
T07hvsatssu:4813: yaḥ śabdo viprakṛṣṭaḥ sannikṛṣṭaśca tau yugapat śrūyetām /
T07hvsatssu:4815: na hi paśyāmaḥ kṣaṇikadharmaḥ kasyacijjanaka iti /
T07hvsatssu:4820: ekañca na karma karmotpādakamiti vacanaṃ praṇaṣṭaṃ syāt /
T07hvsatssu:4821: bhavatāṃ śāsane śabdaḥ śabdāntareṇa viruddhaḥ pṛthak,
T07hvsatssu:4833: (u) paśyasi khalu saṃyoga ekaḥ san yaṃ śabdamutpādayati [so] 'pi tathā syāt /
T07hvsatssu:4836: evañca dravyaṃ pañcasvabhāvaṃ trisvabhāvaṃ dvisvabhāvaṃ na syāt /
T07hvsatssu:4843: evaṃ śabdo 'pi karagṛhīte khaḍge śabdaḥ spandena sahoparamati /
T07hvsatssu:4846: yathā kalpayasi ādyakarmaṇaḥ saṃskāra uttarottarakarmotpādaka iti /
T07hvsatssu:4854: pūrvaṃ karmaṇi niruddhe hi tadanantaraṃ dravyamutpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:4866: kiṃ yathā khalu viṣaṃ viṣauṣadhena viruddham /
T07hvsatssu:4868: tathā no cet ghaṇṭā na śabdadvayavatīti [na] syāt /
T07hvsatssu:4874: tathā no cet ekasminneva kṣaṇe ghaṇṭā śabdadvayavatī syāt /
T07hvsatssu:4877: yadi śabdāt śabdāntaramutpadyate tadā na hetumanuvarteta /
T07hvsatssu:4891: tasya rūpamupādāya jala ādarśe rūpamutpannaṃ syāt /
T07hvsatssu:4892: evaṃ jale candra ādarśe pratibimbameva rūpaṃ bhavet /
T07hvsatssu:4893: tathā ca vaiśeṣikasūtraṃ sarvaṃ naṣṭaṃ syāt /
T07hvsatssu:4899: khaḍgavaṃśādīnāmavayaveṣu mithaḥ saṃśliṣṭeṣu vibhajyamāneṣu ca mitho nodanācchabdo bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:4900: na ca vayaṃ vadāmaḥ saṃyogācchabdo bhavatīti /
T07hvsatssu:4905: kevalaṃ caturṣu mahābhūteṣu saṃyukteṣu viyukteṣu vā śabda utpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:4910: (pṛ) yadyāha bhavān- gandho nāsikāṃ prāpto jighryata iti /
T07hvsatssu:4915: yadi manyase yat asmādgandhāt santatyā gandhakāraṇamutpadyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:4920: yadi kusumāvayavā gacchanti kusumāvayavasya rūpamapi draṣṭavyaṃ syāt /
T07hvsatssu:4927: (u) yatra sūkṣmāvayavarūpaṃ [tatra] tadgandho jighrayata iti pratyakṣadṛṣṭam /
T07hvsatssu:4940: yathā ekapalaṃ kuṅkuma[kusumaṃ] sadā sagandhaṃ gatvāpi sadaikapalam /
T07hvsatssu:4942: yathā jalaghaṭa ekabindvapagame tatkṣayo na budhyate /
T07hvsatssu:4957: nāpi vāyuḥ kusumasya gandhaṃ boḍhvā gamayatīti /
T07hvsatssu:4959: tadupādāya gandhavāyuḥ tataḥ samutpanno gandhavāyurnāsikāṃ prāpya jighryate /
T07hvsatssu:4969: sa kusumagandhaḥ kusume niṣpīḍite vā niṣpiṣṭe vā saṃparitāpite vā kṣīyate /
T07hvsatssu:4975: sa ca gandho dīrghakālaṃ tile vartate /
T07hvsatssu:4980: (u) ayaṃ tilagandhaḥ kusumamupādāya samutpanno na tilādviyujyate /
T07hvsatssu:4995: tatra nāsti vinigamakaṃ yadudakāvayavā stejovayavā eva vā vāyumanugacchanti,
T07hvsatssu:4997: yathā bhavatāṃ sūtram- trayaḥ sparśā sparśakāyā vā na pṛthivyudakatejasāmityadṛṣṭaliṅgo vāyuriti jñāyate /
T07hvsatssu:4998: anena vacanena trividhāḥ sparśā vāyau kadācidāgantukā vānāgantukā vā syuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:5002: bhavato mataṃ yat dṛṣṭa udake tejasi śītoṣṇaspaśau staḥ /
T07hvsatssu:5005: evaṃ dṛṣṭapṛthivyāmanuṣṇāśītasparśo 'stīti so 'pi vāyvayavīyo na syāt /
T07hvsatssu:5009: kathaṃ jñātavyaṃ vāyusparśamātra manuṣṇāśītaṃ na tu pṛthivyavayava iti /
T07hvsatssu:5010: vayamapi vadāmo rūparasagandhasparśāḥ pṛthivyāmeva santi nābādiṣu iti /
T07hvsatssu:5011: yat bhavatāṃ matam- yat dṛṣṭeṣu abādiṣu rūpādikamastīti /
T07hvsatssu:5012: tat pṛthivīyogād dṛśyate na tu tat tatrāsti /
T07hvsatssu:5018: tadā sambhavati vaktum idaṃ rūpamabīyaṃ na pārthivamiti /
T07hvsatssu:5031: yatra nāsti tatra gandhamupādāya gandha utpadyate ityasya ko doṣaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:5032: yadavādīḥ pūrvaṃ gandho dūrāt jighryata ityaprāptyā syāditi /
T07hvsatssu:5040: ato jñāyate aprāpya na jighryata iti /
T07hvsatssu:5057: tathāpi tattejo vartate iti sparśātt jñāyate /
T07hvsatssu:5059: bhavatāṃ sūtre nāstyarūpaṃ teja ityayameva doṣaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:5071: yathā vā jvarārtasya puruṣasya tejaḥ kāyaniśritamasti /
T07hvsatssu:5083: kiñca mano gacchatīti kiṃ jñātvā gacchet /
T07hvsatssu:5091: yat cittaṃ manyate śrotraṃ gamiṣyāmīti tacchrotasmaraṇam /
T07hvsatssu:5097: yaḥ pumān pūrvaṃ nagarādīn dṛṣṭavān sa idānīṃ pūrvamanurudhya smarati na jānāti pratyutpannān /
T07hvsatssu:5103: yo dharmo gacchati sontarāle sarvān viṣayān jānīyāt /
T07hvsatssu:5104: yathā kaścitsañcaran madhyemārgaṃ rūpādīn padārthān jānāti /
T07hvsatssu:5106: yathā cittamasadapi jānāti yadutātītamanāgataṃ śagaśṛṅgaṃ kūrmaromāhipādaṃ vāyurūpaṃ lohitalavaṇagandhamityādīni [sarvāṇya]pijānāti /
T07hvsatssu:5133: tā vedanā stistraḥ- duḥkhāḥ vā sukhā vā aduḥkhāsukhā veti /
T07hvsatssu:5143: ālambanaṃ vijñānasaṃyuktaṃ punaḥ sa vijñānamityucyate ato na gacchati /
T07hvsatssu:5150: yathā kaścitsvapne pibati naiba tat tṛṣṇāmapanayati /
T07hvsatssu:5153: cittaṃ dṛṣṭe śrute mate jñāte dharmamātre vartate /
T07hvsatssu:5155: yadi gamanena prāpnoti tadā dharmāntaramapi jānīyāt /
T07hvsatssu:5181: (pṛ) yadyuktaṃ sūtre- catvāri mahābhūtānyupādāya rūpaprasādāḥ pañcendriyāṇīti /
T07hvsatssu:5186: bhagavān kāṃkṣāvataḥ svaśiṣyān pratyāha- karmajāni pañcendriyāṇīti /
T07hvsatssu:5192: ato bhagavānāha- indriyāṇi rūpīṇi rūpādīnupādāya siddhānīti /
T07hvsatssu:5193: kadācidyāni rūpādīnupādāya bhavanti tāni sanidarśanānīti brūyāt /
T07hvsatssu:5201: tīrthikā vadanti- saṃkhyāḥ parimāṇāni pṛthaktvaṃ saṃyogavibhāgau paratvāparatve karma sāmānyaṃ viśeṣāśca [rūpi]dravyasamavāyādarūpiṇo 'pi cākṣuṣāṇīti
T07hvsatssu:5202: ato bhagavānāha- eṣāṃ rūpamātraṃ sanidarśanam nānye dharmā iti /
T07hvsatssu:5216: yo dharmaḥ pratiniyataḥ sa pratiniyataṃ dharmaṃ pratihanti /
T07hvsatssu:5225: dharmo yadi pratiniyataḥ tadā [na] saṃkhyeyāni pañcendriyāṇi /
T07hvsatssu:5233: (pṛ) cakṣuṣo raśmirmahadalpaṃ paśyati sudūraṃ gatvāpi rūpamapratihataṃ paśyati /
T07hvsatssu:5235: raśmirayaṃ dve cakṣuṣyupādāyaikatra militvā ekībhūto rūpaṃ paśyati /
T07hvsatssu:5236: cakṣurekaṃ śrotraṃ nāsikā ca kāyasyāntarvartamānā na vibhaktuṃ śakyate /
T07hvsatssu:5237: ato bhavadvacanam anyatpaśyati anyadvijānāti idaṃ nirastam /
T07hvsatssu:5270: yadavādīḥ sannikarṣo nigūḍha ityato na dṛśyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:5282: karmabalena pariṇamitāni mahābhūtānīndriyāṇi bhūtvā vibhaktāni santi /
T07hvsatssu:5308: atrocyate / yaduktaṃ bhavatā- indriyāṇi bhautikāni niyatānīti /
T07hvsatssu:5321: yathā catussatyābhisamaye dharmān sākṣātkṛtya [ta]ddharmatāṃ samyak bhāvayatīti sarvamidaṃ manovijñānenaiva /
T07hvsatssu:5326: kiṃ prāpya vijānāti kimaprāpyeti sarvaṃ pratyuktam /
T07hvsatssu:5345: hrasvadīrghādilakṣaṇaṃ sarvaṃ rūpaṃ pratītya manovijñāne samutpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:5358: (u) [kasmiṃścit] dharme sthānāntara uddhite yadi parasyopakāro hiṃsā vā bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:5374: na tu vadanti ghaṭe śabda iti /
T07hvsatssu:5379: sattvānāṃ pūrvākṣiptakarmavāsanatvādyadi padārthā nityaṃ saśabdāḥ syuḥ tadā na tātkālikaḥ [śabdaḥ] /
T07hvsatssu:5383: mahābhūtānāṃ sadā mithaḥ sammardāt sarvaṃ saśabdaṃ syāt /
T07hvsatssu:5384: (u) na padārthānāṃ mithaḥ sammardaḥ sarvaḥ śabdahetuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:5398: (pṛ) saṃvṛtitaḥ sadā vadanti śabda ākāśaguṇa iti /
T07hvsatssu:5423: (SSS_151) ākāśe vartamāne 'pi auṣṇyamasti kadācit kadācinnetyākāśo nauṣṇyakāraṇamiti jñeyam /
T07hvsatssu:5429: dṛṣṭe tāvanna paśyāmaḥ śabdaḥ ākāśamupādatta iti /
T07hvsatssu:5453: yathā pūrvaṃ kusume gandhamāghrāya paścādvastre jighrataḥ ayamāgantukaḥ saṃbhavati /
T07hvsatssu:5459: yadi bravīṣi jalādāvasti rūpaṃ svata iti /
T07hvsatssu:5460: (SSS_152) vayamapi vadema kāṃsyādau svata eva gandho 'stīti /
T07hvsatssu:5461: yo dharmo yasya vastuno 'vinirbhāgavartī sa tasyāsti /
T07hvsatssu:5462: ato yo gandho yatrāvinirbhāgavartī sa tasyaiva dravyasya gandhaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:5465: yathā vadanti- asti candramasi tejaḥ tejasaḥ pratiniyatoṣṇatā iti /
T07hvsatssu:5466: vadanti ca gharmagṛhe 'gnyapagame 'pi śiṣyamāṇasya dharmaṇo 'sti sūkṣmaṃ rūpamiti /
T07hvsatssu:5478: candrādayaḥ śītā api taijasā iti bravīṣi /
T07hvsatssu:5491: ataḥ kāryata iti vacanaṃ na hetuḥ kalpate /
T07hvsatssu:5497: tejaso rūpaṃ bhāskaraṃ śuklam kāṃsyādīnāntu abhāsvaram /
T07hvsatssu:5498: kāṃsyāṃdīnāṃ tejasā vailakṣaṇye 'pi tāni taijasadravyāṇīti jñāpyante /
T07hvsatssu:5506: asamyakcintanāt bravītha yūyaṃ- gandhaḥ pṛthivīmātre vidyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:5512: na tu caturṣu mahābhūteṣu tāratamyena bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:5513: yathā vadanti pṛthivyā apāṃ bāhulyena madhura iti /
T07hvsatssu:5516: ato jñātavyam - padārthāt pṛthak [pṛthak] svabhāvo raso jāyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:5526: saṃvṛtyā rasā vibhaktāḥ yathā janā manyante madhuraṃ madhurameva bhavatīti /
T07hvsatssu:5534: sparśo nāma kaṭhinaṃ mṛdu guru laghu prabalaṃ durbalaṃ śītamuṣṇaṃ karkaśaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ
T07hvsatssu:5535: kṛśaṃ śthūlaṃ praśrabdhiḥ klamathamaklamathaṃ rogo viśeṣo vā kāyataikṣṇyaṃ kāyamāndyamālasyaṃ
T07hvsatssu:5537: sammohaḥ stambharna vyathā śūlaṃ vijṛmbhikā jighatsā pipāsā santṛptiḥ sātaṃ visātaṃ maurarvyam ityādayaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:5538: (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ- trayaḥ sparśāḥ śīta uṣṇo 'nuṣṇāśīta iti /
T07hvsatssu:5542: (pṛ) aulūkyā vadanti- pṛthivyā anuṣṇāśītasparśastathā vāyorapi sparśaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:5545: [tādṛśa]niyamo nāstīti pūrvamevoktam- yaduta sarpirādīnāṃ niyatā śītatā kāṃsyādīnāmanuṣṇateti /
T07hvsatssu:5546: kiñcoktaṃ pūrvaṃ triṣu sparśeṣu yadi vāyavīya āgantukaḥ tadā sparśāntarābhāvādvāyuraniyatalakṣaṇaḥ syāt /
T07hvsatssu:5553: (u) kāṃsyādīni sarpirādīni ca kaṭhinadravyāṇi agnisaṃyogādravī bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:5559: agnisaṃyoge sa sparśo yadi na vinaṣṭaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:5569: [tadā] paro 'pi brūyāt payolakṣaṇamanirudhya kevalaṃ dadhilakṣaṇaṃ parāvartata iti /
T07hvsatssu:5571: yadi bravīṣi na paśyāmaḥ payaḥ punaḥ payorūpeṇeti /
T07hvsatssu:5574: anādau saṃsāre kiṃ dravyaṃ nāgninā dagdhaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:5577: ato jñāyate pāko na nityo 'parāvṛtta iti /
T07hvsatssu:5578: evañca śītasparśe vinaṣṭe punaḥ śītasparśa utpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:5583: vaiśeṣikā vadanti- pṛthivīmātre pāko bhavati nāpsu iti /
T07hvsatssu:5584: bhiṣajastu vadanti- yastaptāṃ yavāgūṃ pāti sa vijātīyaṃ phalaṃ labhata iti /
T07hvsatssu:5603: yathā mārgavarge smṛterekasyā eva pañca nāmānyu[cyante] smṛtyupasthānaṃ smṛtīndriyaṃ smṛtibalaṃ smṛtisambodhyaṅgaṃ samyaksmṛtiriti /
T07hvsatssu:5606: sambodhirityādīni nānā pṛthak pṛthaṅ nāmāni bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:5607: eka eva samādhiḥ dhyānaṃ vimuktiḥ nissṛtiḥ samāpattirityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:5611: yathoktaṃ sūtre- tasya kāmāsravāccittaṃ vimucyate avidyāsravaccittaṃ vimucyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:5614: api coktaṃ sūtre- yadā bhagavān sattvānāṃ kallacittaṃ mṛducittaṃ dāntacittaṃ vimuktilābhapravaṇatāñca prajānāti /
T07hvsatssu:5617: api coktaṃ sūtre- cittasaṃkleśātsattvāḥ saṃkliśyanti cittavyavadānātsattvā viśudhyanti /
T07hvsatssu:5619: kiñcāha- yo bhikṣuścatvāri dhyānānyupasampadya viśuddhākopyacitto (SSS_157) bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:5620: sa duḥkhaṃ samudayaṃ nirodhaṃ mārgamāryasatyañca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti iti /
T07hvsatssu:5625: api coktaṃ sūtre rāṣṭrapālamāhūyāvadat idaṃ vastu punaḥ punarājavajjavaṃ mahārāja cittaṃ vadāmi iti /
T07hvsatssu:5626: āha ca ādhyātmiko vijñānakāyo bāhyaṃ nāparūpamiti dvidhā bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:5632: ato jñāyate cittamātramasti na caitasikamasti pṛthagiti //
T07hvsatssu:5642: yadbhavatāṃ mataṃ- cittamanyena cittena samprayujyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:5645: uktaṃ hi sūtre- dūraṅgamamekacaramaśarīraṃ guhāśayam iti /
T07hvsatssu:5648: yathā bhikṣurekākī san satsvapi maśakā[di]prāṇiṣu sajātīyo nāstīti ekākītyucyate /
T07hvsatssu:5649: ato (SSS_158) jñāyate nānyacittena cittaṃ samprayujyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:5652: caitasikāstu ekena dhātunā ekenāyatanena tribhiḥ skandhaiśca saṅgṛhītāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:5662: yathoktaṃ sūtre- cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpañca cakṣurvijñānamutpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:5670: tādṛśavibhāgāt jñāyate cittamanyat caitasikā anya iti /
T07hvsatssu:5676: bhagavān svayamāha- ye cittajāścittaniśritāste caitasikā iti /
T07hvsatssu:5679: paro 'pi vadet- caitasikāḥ santi na cittamiti /
T07hvsatssu:5701: bhavatā yadyapyuktaṃ dharmālambanaṃ cittaṃ cittaviśeṣāścaitasikā mārgavargoktavat iti /
T07hvsatssu:5718: sūtre bhagavān na pariniṣṭhitaṃ vakti idamasyādhivacanamiti /
T07hvsatssu:5719: yathāha sūtram- ekaṃ dharmaṃ prajahītha ahamājānāmi anāgāmimārgaṃ pratilabhadhve yadidaṃ kāmacchandam /
T07hvsatssu:5726: yaduktaṃ bāhyaṃ nāmarūpamiti sa eva caitasika[dharma] ityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:5731: yat bāhyaṃ sa eva viṣaya ityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:5758: evaṃ cittaṃ cittamāśrayata iti na nāmāntaraṃ labhate /
T07hvsatssu:5770: sa hi bravīti- pūrvaṃ vijñānasya kālaḥ paścātsaṃjñādīnām iti /
T07hvsatssu:5776: cittameva dvidhā vadāmi ekaṃ jñānamaparaṃ vijñānamiti /
T07hvsatssu:5778: yadāha bhavān- bhagavān svayamāha ye cittaniśritāste caitasikā iti /
T07hvsatssu:5782: kintu vadāmi cittaviśeṣā eva caitasikā iti /
T07hvsatssu:5790: cittañca caitasikaiḥ saha cittādutpadyata iti caitasikamityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:5791: caitasikamātramastīti yo vadati sa vadet caitasikadharmā arthākhyā iti /
T07hvsatssu:5799: citta utpannaṃ cittameva citte vitarka udabhūdityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:5813: vijñānasya buddhervā [anyeṣāṃ] sarveṣāṃ lakṣaṇādiṣu nāsti viśeṣaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:5816: yathā laukikā vadanti yadbhavān vijānātīmaṃ puruṣamiti tat jñānameva vedanā saṃjñā iti jñeyam /
T07hvsatssu:5824: asmin cittaskandhe saṃkleśo 'vidyā ca sarvathā saṃprayuktā /
T07hvsatssu:5831: ato jñāyate avidyāto 'pi cittameva vimucyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:5834: yadi ca saṃkleśebhyaścittaṃ vimucyate avidyātaḥ prajñā vimucyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:5836: ataścittaṃ vinā na kiñcidvimucyata iti jñātavyam /
T07hvsatssu:5842: laukikā bhūyasā sukhaṃ duḥkhamapi vijānantīti vedanādayo '[pi] vaktavyāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:5847: bhagavān sattvānāṃ kleśatāratamyavaśātsadā viṣādākrāntacittaḥ san vadati ayameko dharma iti /
T07hvsatssu:5859: dharmāṇāṃ sasamprayogatve 'pi sparśa eva vedanādīnāṃ hetuḥ na vedanādayaḥ sparśasya /
T07hvsatssu:5872: ato nāsti samprayogaḥ gambhīre pratītyasamutpāda[sūtre]bhagavānāha- asyotpādādidamutpadyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:5873: yathā ca bījāṅkurakāṇḍanālapatrapuṣpādīni hetuphalābhyāṃ kramikāni dṛṣṭāni /
T07hvsatssu:5875: yadbhavān manyate kāmādayaḥ kleśā rūpasya saha[bhū]hetavaḥ sahajāḥ syuriti /
T07hvsatssu:5892: (u) kasya pratibandhādekaṃ kramikamālambanaṃ na kramaśaḥ ṣaḍvijñānānyutpādayati /
T07hvsatssu:5893: jñātavyaṃ pūrvaṃ hetuḥ paścātkāryamiti kramaśa utpādaheturiti /
T07hvsatssu:5894: sūtre coktam- cakṣuṣā rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā na nimittagrāhī bhavatīti /
T07hvsatssu:5898: yo nimittaṃ gṛhṇāti sa dṛṣṭvā gṛhṇāti na darśanakāle /
T07hvsatssu:5900: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- cakṣuṣā rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvānuprahṛṣṭacetano bhavati iti /
T07hvsatssu:5903: ato jñāyate na sarvaṃ cittaṃ vedanādisamanvitamiti /
T07hvsatssu:5907: tasya (SSS_164) nāsti saṃjñā nāpi daurmanasyaṃ vā /
T07hvsatssu:5909: kecidāhuḥ tasyāpi kāmādayaḥ kleśā na santīti /
T07hvsatssu:5914: kiñca bhavataḥ pañca vijñānāni na vikalpakāni /
T07hvsatssu:5916: cetanāvikalpaḥ pūrvarbhaudārikaḥ san pañcātsūkṣmo bhavatītyato vitarkavicāraustaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:5918: tadyathā vadasi mayi tava jñāpanāya prathamata evābhyūhādhīno vitarka utpadyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:5924: ato 'bhyupeyaṃ pañca vijñānāni asaṃjñāni avitarkāni avicārāṇīti /
T07hvsatssu:5926: na hi pañcavijñāneṣu strī puruṣa iti vikalpo 'sti /
T07hvsatssu:5929: pañcavijñānānāṃ nirvikalpakatvāt tadanantaraṃ manovijñānamutpadyata iti yuṣmābhiruktam /
T07hvsatssu:5943: avidyā prajñā ca viruddhe na yugapatsyātām /
T07hvsatssu:5947: sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti naikasmin citte samudācarati /
T07hvsatssu:5951: ayaṃ puruṣo mama jñāto māmupakṛtavāniti yat smaraṇam,
T07hvsatssu:5952: smṛtvā ca prītijananam tata kathamekasmin citte syāt /
T07hvsatssu:5961: ekasminneva hi citte 'sti jñānamajñānaṃ saṃśayo niścayaḥ śraddhāśraddhā vīryaṃ kausīdyamityevamādyā doṣāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:5962: sarve ca caitasikā ekasmina citte pariniṣṭhitāḥ syuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:5963: kasya pratibandhāt sukhaṃ dukhaṃ rāgo dveṣa ityādayo na bhavantyekasmin citte /
T07hvsatssu:5964: yadyāha bhavān sukhaduḥkhādayo virodhānnaikasmin citte vartanta iti /
T07hvsatssu:5968: “yo bhikṣuścaturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu carati ca smṛtisambodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati /
T07hvsatssu:5977: upekṣāyāṃ prajānāti” iti caitasikāḥ kramikā bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:5983: śīladharaḥ puruṣo na kaukṛtyabhāvāya cittaṃ praṇidadhāti /
T07hvsatssu:5997: yo bhikṣuralpeccho viharati sa santuṣṭo bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:6027: ārakṣāṃ pratītya daṇḍādānaśasrādānakalahavigrahavivādāḥ sarve duḥkhopāyāsādayaḥ sambhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:6035: uktañca sūtre- cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpañca cakṣurvijñānamutpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:6037: cittacaittā ekakālikā iti vadatastrayāṇāṃ sannipāto nāsti /
T07hvsatssu:6038: ekaikaśa utpadyanta iti vadatastu asti trayāṇāṃ sannipātaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:6043: kasmāt yaḥ paśyati sa vedayata ayamātmeti /
T07hvsatssu:6048: puruṣasūtra uktam- cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpañca cakṣurvijñānamutpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:6051: asmin mate vividhaṃ nāmāsti yaduta sattvo devo manuṣyaḥ strī puruṣo mahānalpa iti /
T07hvsatssu:6052: evamādīni nāmāni sarvāṇi skandhān pratītya bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:6053: yadi cittacaitasikāḥ kramikāḥ tadā skandhadvayaṃ pratītya puruṣo bhavet na skandhapañcakam /
T07hvsatssu:6056: bhavānāha- pratyutpanne na santi pañcaskandhāḥ iti /
T07hvsatssu:6058: ucyate tu sarvaskandhān pratītya na skandhadvayamātram /
T07hvsatssu:6060: asti ca sūtre samprayogo yadutendriyajñānasamprayuktā śraddhā iti /
T07hvsatssu:6061: api coktaṃ sūtre- sparśo vedanāsaṃjñāvitarkaiḥ sahaja iti /
T07hvsatssu:6065: (SSS_168) kathaṃ vijñānasthitiṣu vedanādiṣu sthitamidaṃ niśrayate tiṣṭhatīti /
T07hvsatssu:6069: āha ca- sattvānāṃ cittaṃ dīrgharātraṃ rāgadveṣādisaṃkliṣṭamiti /
T07hvsatssu:6073: api coktaṃ sūtre- yasmin samaye cittamuddhataṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:6074: akālastrayāṇāṃ bodhyaṅgānām yaduta dharmapravicayabodhyaṅgasya vīryabodhyaṅgasya prītibodhyaṅgasya /
T07hvsatssu:6077: [yasmin samaye cittamuddhataṃ bhavati] kālastrayāṇāṃ bodhyaṅgānāṃ bhāvanāyai yaduta praśrabdhisambodhyaṅgasya samādhisambodhyaṅgasya upekṣāsambodhyaṅgasya
T07hvsatssu:6080: akāla[stasmin samaye] trayāṇāṃ sambodhyaṅgānāṃ yaduta praśrabdhisambodhyaṅgasya samādhisambodhyaṅgasya upekṣāsambodhyaṅgasya /
T07hvsatssu:6084: ] kāla[stasmin samaye] trayāṇāṃ sambodhyaṅgānāṃ yaduta dharmapravicayasambodhyaṅgasya vīryasaṃmbodhyaṅgasya prītisambodhyaṅgasya /
T07hvsatssu:6088: ābhidharmikā āhuḥ- ekakālaṃ bhāvanānuyogamanuyuktasya bodhi[pakṣikā] dharmā na viyujyanta iti /
T07hvsatssu:6092: yaduktaṃ bhavatā- yaḥ paśyati sa vedayate sa ātmeti /
T07hvsatssu:6095: na vibhajanti vedaneyamidaṃ vijñānaṃ niśrayata iti /
T07hvsatssu:6097: te cittasantatiṃ dṛṣṭvā avibhajanto vyavahāramātrāsaṅgāttathā (SSS_169) vadanti /
T07hvsatssu:6099: yadavocaḥ- sarvān skandhān pratītya puruṣo bhavatīti /
T07hvsatssu:6100: tatra pañcaskandhānāṃ santatiṃ pratītya puruṣa ityataḥ sarveṣāṃ skandhānāṃ vacanam /
T07hvsatssu:6101: yathā loke vadanti- sukhī duḥkhī aduḥkhāsukhīti /
T07hvsatssu:6119: yathā ca vadanti rājā mānthātā smṛtimātreṇa svargamāruroheti /
T07hvsatssu:6121: pṛthagjanānāṃ vijñānasyālambanakriyāyāṃ catvāro dharmāḥ kramikā bhavanti- vijñānānantarajā saṃjñā,
T07hvsatssu:6133: vitarkavicārau ca na saṃprayuktāviti pūrvameva pratyuktam /
T07hvsatssu:6135: tatsūtra uktā vijñānasya pratyaya[rūpā] sthitiḥ na niśrayarūpā /
T07hvsatssu:6137: tasminneva hi sūtra uktam- vijñānaṃ rūpaṃ pratītya snehapramodābhyāṃ tiṣṭhati /
T07hvsatssu:6139: yadyupyuktaṃ bhavatā- yadi vijñānaṃ vijñānaṃ pratītya tiṣṭhati /
T07hvsatssu:6145: tatra tṛṣṇodbhavati udbhūtatṛṣṇāpratyayaṃ vijñānaṃ vijñānasthiti rityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:6164: yadi bravīṣi cittaṃ pūrvamutpadyate tanmahimnā caitasikānāmāśraya iti /
T07hvsatssu:6167: yadbravīṣi cittaṃ kleśasaṃkliṣṭamityato jñāyate 'smi samprayoga iti /
T07hvsatssu:6170: tadā sa eva pariśuddhadharmā dūṣyo bhavatīti dharmalakṣaṇaṃ bādhyeta /
T07hvsatssu:6177: tathā ca sattvā api samprayuktāḥ syuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:6196: caitasikāścittajāścittaniśritā iti yat bhavato vacanaṃ tatpūrvameva pratyuktam /
T07hvsatssu:6200: na tu sāhāyyāya mitha ālambane samudācarantīti /
T07hvsatssu:6209: tasmin samaye praśrabdhyādīni trīṇi bodhyaṅgāni bhāvayāmīti /
T07hvsatssu:6225: (pṛ) ājñātaṃ na santi pṛthak caitasikāḥ nāsti ca samprayoga iti /
T07hvsatssu:6250: saṃyogato viyogato vā hetusamanantarālambanādhipatīnāṃ pratyekaṃ viśeṣāccittāni bhidyante /
T07hvsatssu:6255: yathā sūryaraśmiḥ prakṛtito viśuddhā na kadāciddūṣyā bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:6256: yat prakṛtito 'viśuddhaṃ na tat viśodhayituṃ śakyate /
T07hvsatssu:6257: yathā roma prakṛtitaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ nāvadātaṃ kartumarhati /
T07hvsatssu:6262: yathocyate bhikṣurvijñānamupabhuṅkte keṣāṃ vijñānaṃ yaduta sukhaduḥkhāduḥkhāsukhānāṃ vijñānam /
T07hvsatssu:6277: yathā markaṭopasūtra uktam- yathā markaṭaḥ [araṇya upavane caramāṇaḥ] śākhāṃ gṛhṇāti /
T07hvsatssu:6279: evameva cittaṃ [rātryā divasasya ca] atyayena anyadevotpadyata anyannirudhyate /
T07hvsatssu:6284: yat citta- [mityucyate tat rātryāśca divasasya] atyayena anyadevotpadyate 'nyannirudhyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:6288: yathā caikaṃ karma [kṛtaṃ] na punarādeyaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:6301: ratnahārasūtra uktam- yaścittaṃ sadā śraddhayā śīlena tyāgena śrutena prajñayā ca bhāvayati sa mṛto deveṣūtpadyate iti /
T07hvsatssu:6302: dhyānasūtre coktam- prathamadhyānalābhī cittasya paridamanāya prathamadhyānādvitīyadhyānamupasampadya viharati /
T07hvsatssu:6311: tiṣṭha markaṭa mā [dhāvī]rna hi te tat yathā purā /
T07hvsatssu:6313: ato jñāyate- cittamekaṃ pañcendriyadvāreṣu kāyakuṭikāyāṃ paribhramati /
T07hvsatssu:6315: ata āha “mā [dhāvī]rna hi te tat yathāpurā” / iti / āha ca-
T07hvsatssu:6320: ekameva hi cittaṃ karmāṇyabhinirvṛttya punarvipākaṃ vedayate /
T07hvsatssu:6321: cittaṃ mriyate cittamutpadyate cittaṃ badhyate cittaṃ mucyate /
T07hvsatssu:6339: yadekaṃ cittaṃ tadeva rūpaśabdādigrahaṇarūpāṇi nānākarmāṇi karoti /
T07hvsatssu:6340: yathaikaḥ puruṣaḥ pañcachidrake gṛhe sthitaḥ tatra tatra gatān viṣayān gṛhṇāti /
T07hvsatssu:6341: tadeva cittaṃ cakṣuṣi lagnamālokadipratyayamapekṣya rūpaṃ paśyati /
T07hvsatssu:6342: yathā sa eva puruṣa anyatra sahāyamapekṣya [aparaṃ] kāryaṃ karoti /
T07hvsatssu:6344: yathā sa eva pūrvaṃ jñānī san paścādajñānī bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:6345: evaṃ mithyājñānaṃ punaḥ samyak jñānaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:6346: yathā sa eva puruṣaḥ pūrvaṃ viśuddhaḥ paścādaviśuddho bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:6347: evaṃ yat sandigdhaṃ jñānaṃ tadeva niścitaṃ jñānaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:6348: yathā sa eva puruṣaḥ pūrvaṃ saṃśayitaḥ punarniścito bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:6349: yadakuśalaṃ cittaṃ tadeva punaḥ kuśalamavyākṛtañca bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:6350: yathā sa eva puruṣaḥ kadācitkuśalaṃ smarati /
T07hvsatssu:6353: yathā sa eva puruṣo 'tītānāgatādau nāneryāpathān karoti /
T07hvsatssu:6356: yathā sa eva puruṣaḥ pūrvaṃ prasannaḥ paścādaprasanno bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:6358: yathā sa eva puruṣaḥ pūrvamanyaṃ sukhayati paścātpunarduḥkhayati /
T07hvsatssu:6360: yadavādīḥ- ekameva vijñānaṃ na ṣaḍvivaṣayān gṛhṇātīti /
T07hvsatssu:6364: yat vijñānaṃ cakṣuṣi lagnaṃ tat rūpamātraṃ gṛhṇāti /
T07hvsatssu:6370: yathā pradīpa ātmānaṃ prakāśayati anyānapi prakāśayati /
T07hvsatssu:6371: yathā gaṇaka ātmānaṃ gaṇayati anyānapi gaṇayati /
T07hvsatssu:6374: yathā markaṭaḥ śākhāṃ gṛhṇāti tāṃ muttkāparāṃ gṛhṇāti /
T07hvsatssu:6378: svayameva punarvipākaṃ vedayate iti saṃkṣipya pratyavocam /
T07hvsatssu:6382: anyadvedayate anyanmṛnmriyate anyajjāyata ityādayo doṣāḥ syuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:6386: atrocyate / yadabravīḥ- cittamekaṃ kāmādinā ciramupakliṣṭam iti /
T07hvsatssu:6399: tenaiva cittena tadeva smaryata iti kathaṃ bhaviṣyati /
T07hvsatssu:6413: idānīṃ kurvan paścātkariṣyan nitya eko 'vikārītyata ātmā bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:6420: brahmādayo vyāmohagatā evaṃ manyante kāyo 'yamanityaḥ cittaṃ vijñānantu nityam iti /
T07hvsatssu:6425: yaduktaṃ bhavatā- dakṣiṇena dṛṣṭvā vāmena vijānīyāditi /
T07hvsatssu:6430: atītaṃ vastu asadapi smṛtvā vijānanti anāgatamasadapi [ārya]jñānabalādvijānanti /
T07hvsatssu:6448: evaṃ cakṣūrūpayoḥ kṣaṇikatvāt tadāśrityotpannaṃ vijñānamapi kṣaṇikam /
T07hvsatssu:6452: yadavādiḥ- vijñānaṃ cakṣuṣi lagnaṃ sat ālokamapekṣya paśyati /
T07hvsatssu:6453: yathā sa eva puruṣaḥ paśyati śṛṇoti ityādi /
T07hvsatssu:6460: saṃśayajñānādīni niścayajñānādibhyo 'nyāni na saṃśayajñānādīnyeva niścayajñānādīni ityapi vadāmaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:6474: ghaṭādi dravyamapi [paśyati] gaṇakastu ātmarūpamapi jānāti pararūpamapi jānāti /
T07hvsatssu:6485: tathā bandhamokṣādirapi yadavādīḥ- anyat karoti anyadvedayata iti /
T07hvsatssu:6489: saṃvṛtisaṃjñayā karmādīnāṃ vacanaṃ na tu paramārthataḥ /
T07hvsatssu:6502: yadi kṣaṇikaṃ [cittaṃ] tadā rūpādīni na kadāpi pratīyeran /
T07hvsatssu:6504: yathā vidyutprabhā kiñcitsthāyinyapi na punaḥ sujñeyā bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:6509: cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpañca cakṣurvijñāna[mutpadyate] ityanayorabhede vijñānamapyabhinnam /
T07hvsatssu:6523: ekaikasmin tantau pratyekamasti kiñcidvalam iti tatsamavāyaḥ prabhavati /
T07hvsatssu:6540: tathā no cet śabdakarmaṇo na syātpratyāyanam /
T07hvsatssu:6542: pratyakṣaṃ paśyāmaḥ khalvidaṃ kṣaṇikamatha ca pratyāyakamiti /
T07hvsatssu:6558: vijñānañca viṣayaṃ gṛhṇāti mandaṃ vā kṣipraṃ vā iti cittasya nāsti niyamaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:6578: puruṣasya kadāciccittaṃ bhavati yadahamekakālaṃ sarvānalambanān gṛhṇāmīti /
T07hvsatssu:6590: tasyaikameva jñānaṃ samyaṅ mithyā ca sambhavet /
T07hvsatssu:6591: ayaṃ puruṣa iti graha eva ayaṃ na puruṣa iti graha iti yathā darśanaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:6618: ato jñāyate bahūni vijñānāni yugapadekakālamutpannāni sarvān spraṣṭavyān gṛhṇanti iti /
T07hvsatssu:6623: vahūni vijñānānīti kāyāvayaveṣu ca śīghrataraṃ jñānamutpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:6626: na hi sambhavatyekameva vijñānaṃ sarvānavayavān gṛhṇātīti /
T07hvsatssu:6627: ato ekakālamutpannāni bahūni vijñānāni sarvānavayavān gṛhṇantīti //
T07hvsatssu:6630: atrocyate / yaducyate bhavatā- bahūni vijñānāni yugapadekakālamutpadyanta iti /
T07hvsatssu:6638: ato jñāyate vijñānāni manaskāramapekṣya bhavanti naikakālikānīti /
T07hvsatssu:6652: tathā ca sarvadharmāṇāmutpattaye nāvaśyaṃ yatnaṃ kuryāt /
T07hvsatssu:6662: cakṣuṣā paśyāmaḥ khalu bāhyān bījāṅkurādīn kalamāṃsapeśyādirūpāṇi kaumārayauvanajarākārān kramikān /
T07hvsatssu:6664: uktañca sūtre- yadā sukhā vedanā bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:6665: tadā [anye] dve vedane niruddhe yaduta duḥkhā vedanā aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā ityādi /
T07hvsatssu:6666: yadi vijñānānāṃ yugapadutpādaḥ tadā tisro vedanā ekakālaṃ vedyeran /
T07hvsatssu:6668: ato jñāyate vijñānāni naikakāla mutpadyanta iti /
T07hvsatssu:6669: ekasmin kāya ekacittotpattyā ekaḥ puruṣa ityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:6670: vijñānānāṃ yaugapadya ekasmin kāye bahavaḥ puruṣāḥ syuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:6672: ata ekasmin kāye vijñānānāṃ yaugapadyaṃ na sambhavati /
T07hvsatssu:6673: yaugapadye hi ekakālaṃ sarvān dharmān jānīyuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:6685: tathā mamāpi ekasya manasa ekaḥ samanantarapratyayaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:6697: yathoktaṃ sūtre- kecitparīttasaṃjñāḥ kecidbahusaṃjñāḥ kecidapramāṇasaṃjñāḥ kecidakiñcanasaṃjñā iti /
T07hvsatssu:6698: vastutastu te bahu kiñcidādidharmā na santi /
T07hvsatssu:6707: saṃjñā tridhā vibhaktā grahālambanā yaduta priyadvepyodāsīnāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:6712: yathoktam- cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā mā nimittaṃ gṛhvīta iti /
T07hvsatssu:6716: tathā saṃjñayā hi sarvān kleśān prajahāti /
T07hvsatssu:6717: yathoktaṃ sūtre- anityasaṃjñā sādhu bhāvitā sarvaṃ kāmarāgaṃ paryādāpayati /
T07hvsatssu:6730: yathā ca vadanti akṛṣṇāśuklakarmaṇā sarvāṇi karmāṇi kṣapayatīti / vadanti ca-
T07hvsatssu:6733: vastutastu prajñayā tarati na tu śraddhādinā /
T07hvsatssu:6736: yathoktam- āryāstadantevāsino vā prajñābalena sarvān kleśān prajahatīti /
T07hvsatssu:6741: uktañca sūtre- jānan paśyan āsravakṣayaṃ pratilabhate nājānan nāpaśyan iti /
T07hvsatssu:6743: āha ca bhagavān- prajñāskandho vimuktijñānadarśanaskandho bhavati iti /
T07hvsatssu:6746: anukramasūtre coktam- viśuddhaśīladhāriṇo na cittaṃ paritapati yāvadyathābhūtajñānāya cittaṃ samādadhāti iti /
T07hvsatssu:6751: āha ca bhagavān- sarvadharmāṇāṃ yathābhūtajñānamanuttarā prajñā ityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:6753: prajñaiva sarvakleśānāṃ samucchedini na tu saṃjñeti yogo nyānyāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:6755: yathāha mahānidānasūtram- yacca sūtre 'vatarati vinaye ca sandṛśyate dharmatāñca na vilomayati tat grāhyam iti /
T07hvsatssu:6756: api cāha- samyagarthe sthāpanā yathārtha [grahaṇam] samyak rute sthāpanā yathārūta [grahaṇam] iti /
T07hvsatssu:6757: ataḥ sūtre yadyapyuktam anityasaṃjñādayaḥ kleśānāṃ samucchedakā (SSS_185) iti /
T07hvsatssu:6762: ato jñāyate prajñayā sarve kleśāḥ prahīyanta iti /
T07hvsatssu:6766: prajñaptidharmāḥ pañca atītaḥ anāgataḥ saṅketaḥ saṃyogaḥ pudgala iti /
T07hvsatssu:6774: yathoktam- siṃho mṛgarāja iha nadītīre sthitastratra tīre nimittaṃ gṛhītvā oghaṃ tīrtvā niṣkrāmati /
T07hvsatssu:6775: tatra yadi nimittaṃ nāsti tadā idaṃ tīraṃ pratinivṛtya [tannimitta]māmaraṇaṃ na muñcati iti /
T07hvsatssu:6782: kiñcāha- trīṇi nimittāni yaduta samādhinimittaṃ pragrahanimittamupekṣānimittamiti /
T07hvsatssu:6787: tatra pañca dharmā eva nimittāni bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:6793: dharmamudrāyāñcoktam- yo bhikṣuḥ rūpaśabdādinimittaṃ prahīṇaṃ paśyati /
T07hvsatssu:6800: āha ca rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā mā nimittaṃ gṛhṇīteti /
T07hvsatssu:6802: kathaṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā na nimittaṃ gṛhṇāti /
T07hvsatssu:6804: duṣṭanimittaniṣedhārthamāha- rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā na nimittaṃ gṛhṇātīti /
T07hvsatssu:6805: animitta[samādhe]rālambanamapi duṣṭamiti paścānnirodhasatya [varge]vakṣyate yat trividha cittanirodhī animittamādāvupasampadya viharatīti /
T07hvsatssu:6811: yathoktaṃ- dharmanimittasya grāhī na duṣyati iti /
T07hvsatssu:6844: yathā kaścit yadā śītārtaḥ tadoṣṇasparśaḥ sukhamutpādayati /
T07hvsatssu:6845: (pṛ) nanu sa evoṣṇasparśaḥ utkaṭaḥ san duḥkhakaro bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:6853: yadi pūrvameva duḥkhaviyogaḥ tadoṣṇasparśo na sukhakaraḥ /
T07hvsatssu:6863: kiñcāha- rūpasya ka āsvādāḥ ye rūpamupādāya prītisukhajananā iti /
T07hvsatssu:6864: kiñcāha- sukhavedanāyā utpadyamānāyāḥ sukhe sthite sukham /
T07hvsatssu:6866: duḥkhavedanāyā utpadyamānāyā na duḥkhe sthite duḥkham /
T07hvsatssu:6868: aduḥkhāsukhavedanāyā na duḥkhaṃ jñāyate na sukhaṃ jñāyate iti /
T07hvsatssu:6881: na vaktavyaṃ duḥkhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ rāgo 'nuśeta iti /
T07hvsatssu:6887: sarvo lokadhātu ā mahānarakamā ca bhavāgraṃ sarvaṃ duḥkhalakṣaṇam /
T07hvsatssu:6889: yathā kaścit dharmataptaḥ śītasparśaṃ sukhaṃ manyate /
T07hvsatssu:6893: tathā no cet duḥkhālpatve sukhasaṃjñotpadyata ityapi na vaktuṃ śakyate /
T07hvsatssu:6897: na hi paśyāmaḥ kathamapi sūkṣmaṃ sukhamanubhavantaṃ puruṣaṃ bāhumudyamya sudīrghamucchvasantam /
T07hvsatssu:6898: sukhā ca vedanā sūkṣmā pravṛttā upaśamalakṣaṇamityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:6900: ato yaduktaṃ sūkṣme sukhe duḥkhasaṃjñotpadyata iti tat vacanamātram /
T07hvsatssu:6901: bālapṛthagjanānāmalpaduḥkhe sukhasaṃjñā mithyā prādurbhavati iti tu nyāyyam //
T07hvsatssu:6906: cīvarabhojanādayo hi sarve dūḥkhahetavaḥ na sukhahetavaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:6908: annavastrādiṣūtkaṭeṣu duḥkhamapi vardhata iti pratyakṣaṃ khalu /
T07hvsatssu:6915: yathā janā maraṇabhītāḥ [anyaṃ] daṇḍaṃ sukhaṃ manyante /
T07hvsatssu:6916: daṇḍādānaśastrādānakṣuraśaktayo duḥkhahetutayā niyatāḥ na tathā sukhahetutayā /
T07hvsatssu:6917: sarveṣāmavaśyamātyantikaduḥkhatvāt jñātavyaṃ pūrvaṃ [duḥkhaṃ] sadevordhvakālaṃ budhyate pādukākṣayavat /
T07hvsatssu:6927: yasya yatra sukhamabhūt tasya tadeva paścādduḥkhacittajanakamityato jñāyate nāsti sukhamiti /
T07hvsatssu:6932: kiñca janā duḥkhe sukhaviparyāsamutpādya paścāttatrābhiṣvajante sukhaṃ yadi kiñcidasti /
T07hvsatssu:6934: yathā nitya ātmā viśuddhaḥ kimapi vastu nāsti /
T07hvsatssu:6940: sūtre ca bhagavatoktam- sukhā bhikṣavo vedanā duḥkhato draṣṭavyā /
T07hvsatssu:6947: ato bhagavānāha- yatra pṛthagjanānāṃ sukhasaṃjñotpadyate tat duḥkhato draṣṭavyamiti /
T07hvsatssu:6960: apara ādau mṛdurapi ante puruṣaṃ hinasti /
T07hvsatssu:6961: tadvatpadārthā api kecidādau subhakarā ante tu hiṃsrāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:6969: sarve sattvāḥ kāyikaduḥkhena vā caitasikaduḥkhena vā sadānugamyanta ityataḥ kāyo duḥkhamiti jñāyate /
T07hvsatssu:6979: kāyasya ca bahavaḥ śatravo yadutāśīviṣakāraṇḍaḥ pañcotkṣiptāsikā vadhakāḥ kalyāṇamitravañcanāścorāḥ śūnyagrāme grāmaghātakāścorā mahānadyā avaratīram iti /
T07hvsatssu:6982: kiñca jānīmaḥ sattvānāṃ kāyaḥ sarvaduḥkhairanugamyate yaduta jātiduḥkhaṃ,
T07hvsatssu:6983: jarāduḥkhaṃ vyādhiduḥkhaṃ maraṇaduḥkhaṃ vipriyasamāgamaduḥkhaṃ priyaviyogaduḥkhaṃ prārthitādivighātaduḥkham ityādibhiḥ /
T07hvsatssu:6989: yathoktaṃ sūtre- rūpaṃ duḥkhaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāṃ vijñānañca duḥkhaṃ iti /
T07hvsatssu:6990: rūpa utpadyamāne jarāvyādhimaraṇādayaḥ sarva upadravā utpadyeran /
T07hvsatssu:7009: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā sūtre- rūpārāmā[bhikṣavo] devamanuṣyā rūparatā rūpamuditā rūpavipariṇāmavirāganirodhāt (SSS_191)
T07hvsatssu:7027: yathā vanyapakṣiṇāmāhāraḥ matsyānāṃ bhakṣaṇapraskandanañca sarvaṃ grahaṇāya bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:7040: yathoktaṃ sūtre- tṛṣṇā duḥkhasya mūlam iti /
T07hvsatssu:7050: lābhakāle na tṛpyati srotaḥ kabalayan sāgara iva /
T07hvsatssu:7054: sattvāḥ sukhasādhanānveṣaṇakāle prapātacaṅkramaṇā[di]doṣamapi sukhato matvā na citte parikhidyante /
T07hvsatssu:7070: uktañca sūtre- dve ime bhikṣava āśe duṣprajahe /
T07hvsatssu:7073: eṣāṃ kāmānāmupabhogāya yā jīvita pratilābhāyāśā sā jīvitasyāśā /
T07hvsatssu:7075: ataḥ prajñāvatā yathābhūtaṃ sukhavedanālakṣaṇaṃ bhāvayatā duṣprahajā[pi] praheyā /
T07hvsatssu:7082: loke hi prājñā avaśyamuttamabhūmyāsvādamupādāyādharāṃ bhūmiṃ tyajanti /
T07hvsatssu:7091: idānīṃ kena vibhaṅgena santi tisro vedanā iti /
T07hvsatssu:7092: (u) ekasyā eva duḥkhavedanāyā kālabhedena trayaḥ prakārā bhavanti yat viheṭhakaṃ tat duḥkhamityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:7102: (u) puruṣo 'yaṃ tribhiḥ sparśaiḥ spṛṣṭaḥ yaduta duḥkhasparśaḥ sukhasparśa aduḥkhāsukhasparśa iti /
T07hvsatssu:7108: yadbhavato matam- aduḥkhāsukhasparśe na vedanotpadyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:7114: puruṣaṃ prati ālambanaṃ tridhā vibhaktaṃ priyaṃ dveṣyamudāsīnamiti /
T07hvsatssu:7128: pratikūlaṃ yatra cittaṃ tatra duḥkhā vedanā /
T07hvsatssu:7129: yatra na pratikūlaṃ nānukūlaṃ tatrāduḥkhāsukhā vedanā /
T07hvsatssu:7130: lokadharmāścāṣṭau lābho 'lābho nindā praśaṃsā yaśo 'yaśaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhamiti /
T07hvsatssu:7139: ye cittopavicārāḥ kāyavartinaḥ te sarve 'pi sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā vā bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:7142: uktaṃ hi sūtre- aṣṭādaśa manaupavicārāḥ iti tatra kevalamekaṃ manaḥ aṣṭādaśadhāvibhaktaṃ yaduta ṣaṭ saumanasyopavicārāḥ ṣaṭ daurmanasyopavicārāḥ ṣaḍupekṣopavicārā iti /
T07hvsatssu:7146: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- sarvā vedanā duḥkham iti /
T07hvsatssu:7147: ato jñāyate cittopavicāreṣu dehagateṣu sarvaṃ duḥkhamityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:7148: āha ca yo rūpasyotpādaḥ sa duḥkhasyotpāda iti /
T07hvsatssu:7152: ataḥ sarve 'pi cittopavicārā vedanā ityucyanta iti /
T07hvsatssu:7154: vipariṇāme duḥkhatvāt sukhāṃ vedanāṃ duḥkhato bhāvayet /
T07hvsatssu:7156: itīmāstisro vedanā duḥkhāḥ pratyayasāmagryāṃ samutpannāḥ kṣaṇikāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:7162: anāsravā vedanā api āryā anantaraṃ tyajanti /
T07hvsatssu:7168: ya āryā anāsravacittavihāriṇaḥ te sarvatra paraṃ nirvidyante /
T07hvsatssu:7176: te tasmin samaye sarve saṃskṛtā duḥkhamiti vyaktaṃ paśyanti /
T07hvsatssu:7177: yadyanāsravā vedanā sukhā tadā sukhe prāmodyeran na nirvāṇonmukhacittā bhaveyuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:7180: (u) ekaiva vedanā ālambane nānopavicaratīti vibhaktā bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:7190: aduḥkhāsukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ moho 'nuśete iti tasmātsaṃjñāvikalpitā ālambane saumanasyādayo dharmā vedanā ityucyante /
T07hvsatssu:7201: puruṣasya tatra sukhaduḥkhasaṃjñānutpādādvastuno jñānadarśanābhāvācca kevalaṃ mohānuśayaḥ sambhavati /
T07hvsatssu:7202: upekṣālambane yadi rāgadveṣau na samudācarataḥ pṛthagjanāstadutkṛṣṭālambanamiti vadanti /
T07hvsatssu:7205: yathoktaṃ sūtre- prākṛtānāṃ yadrupe bhavatyupekṣā sa sarvā rūpaniścitā /
T07hvsatssu:7207: yo nikṛṣṭaṃ karoti tasya punā rāgadveṣau samudbhavata iti /
T07hvsatssu:7215: yo jānāti tadālambanaṃ tasya sukhaduḥkhe spaṣṭaṃ pratīyete /
T07hvsatssu:7219: (u) puruṣasyāsya tadā tadālambane na sukhacittamutpadyate na ca duḥkhacittam /
T07hvsatssu:7226: (u) puruṣasyāsya tasmin ālambane pūrvaṃ nimittagrahāt tatrālambane yadyavidyānuśayo yadi vā rāgadveṣānuśayo 'sti /
T07hvsatssu:7228: yathoktaṃ sūtre- sa tāsāṃ vedanānāṃ samudayañcāstagamañcāsvādañcādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ na prajānāti /
T07hvsatssu:7229: tasya tāsāṃ vedanānāṃ samudayañcāstagamañcāsvādañcādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtamaprajānato yo 'duḥkhāsukhasyāvedanāyā avidyānuśayaḥ so 'nuśeta iti /
T07hvsatssu:7232: (u) sūtramidaṃ svayamāha- vedanānāṃ samudayāstagamādīnavādīn yathābhūtamaprajānato 'duḥkhāsukhāyāmavidyānuśayo 'nuśeta iti /
T07hvsatssu:7236: ata idaṃ sūtramevaṃ vaktavyam- aduḥkhāsukhāyāḥ samudayādyaprajānato 'duḥkhāsukhāyāṃ vedanāyāmavidyānuśayo 'nuśeta iti /
T07hvsatssu:7245: aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā yathākālaṃ tridhā vibhaktā bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:7247: tasmin samaye duḥkhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ sukhasaṃjñotpadyate aduḥkhāsukhasaṃjñā cotpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:7252: (pṛ) uktaṃ hi sūtre- tasya cet sukhā vedanotpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:7253: sa evaṃ prajānāti- utpannā khalu ma iyaṃ sukhā vedanā iti /
T07hvsatssu:7259: sukhādivedanā kāya āgamya mana ālambate ityato 'pyanavadyam /
T07hvsatssu:7263: ata ucyate sukhā vedanotpadyate cet sa yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti iti /
T07hvsatssu:7267: sūtre tūktam- sukhā vedanā duḥkhā vedanā aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā iti /
T07hvsatssu:7269: kena tadvedyata iti vedayatīti vedanā bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:7277: (u) ayaṃ padasyārthaḥ yat sanimittaṃ tat sakāritram /
T07hvsatssu:7278: prajñaptau sanimittāmimāṃ sukhāṃ duḥkhāmaduḥkhāsukhāṃ [vedanāṃ] kāyagatāṃ cittamanubhavati /
T07hvsatssu:7282: kiṃ tasya tasmin samaye duḥkhasaṃjñā notpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:7283: (u) sarvaṃ duḥkhamityalabdhvā sa tisro vedanā anusmarati /
T07hvsatssu:7286: (u) sarvāsu vedanāsu evaṃ smṛtyunubandhāt syāt idaṃ kāyikaṃ sukham idaṃ caitasikaṃ sukhamiti /
T07hvsatssu:7292: tīrthikā hi vadanti vedanā ātmaniśritā iti /
T07hvsatssu:7293: ato bhagavānāha- vedanāḥ kāyaṃ cittañca niśritā iti /
T07hvsatssu:7302: (u) prahīṇāmiṣasya yā duḥkhā vedanā sā nirāmiṣā /
T07hvsatssu:7303: āmiṣāṇāṃ viruddhā duḥkhā vedanā itīyaṃ nirāmiṣetyucyate /
T07hvsatssu:7309: yathocyate sūtre- asti sāmiṣā prītiḥ asti nirāmiṣā prītiḥ /
T07hvsatssu:7311: sāmiṣā prītiriti pañcakāma guṇān pratītyotpadyate prītiḥ /
T07hvsatssu:7316: (pṛ) pañcasvindriyeṣu kasmādduḥkhā vedanā sukhā vedaneti pratyaṅgaṃ dvidhā vibhaktā /
T07hvsatssu:7325: atastṛtīyadhyāne prītiviśeṣaṃ niśrityocyate kāyena sukhaṃ pratisaṃvedayatīti /
T07hvsatssu:7332: sattvāḥ duḥkhābhihatāḥ sukhārthitvāt ghaniṣṭhaṃ kleśamutpādayanti iti /
T07hvsatssu:7334: yathā pañcakāmaguṇasampannasya puruṣasya maśakapataṅgadaṃśe yo duḥkhānubhavo bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:7345: yathā kṣetre tṛṇavīraṇāni svayaṃ prarohanti na sasyāni /
T07hvsatssu:7346: duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ pratītya guruke pāpakarmaṇi pravartate /
T07hvsatssu:7358: sā ca vedanā triṣu dhātuṣu vyāptā /
T07hvsatssu:7361: tadvedanārāgaṃ pratītya jīvati aśīti mahākalpasahasrāṇi duḥkhalakṣaṇān skandhānanubhavati /
T07hvsatssu:7368: sukhā vedanā duḥkhā vedanā tu laukikamārgasyāpi doṣaprāpiṇī /
T07hvsatssu:7381: sukhendriyaṃ caturthadhyāne nirudhyate upekṣendriyaṃ nirodhasamāpattau nirudhyate /
T07hvsatssu:7387: (pṛ) rūpārūpyadhātau kuśaladharmān samyak bhāvayato duḥkhaṃ daurmanasyaṃ nasyāt /
T07hvsatssu:7395: eṣāṃ vijñānānāṃ yā kācidvedanā sā duḥkhā vā sukhā vā bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:7400: yatkiñcanarūpaṃ [sarvaṃ tat] anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ vipariṇāmadharma iti rūpadhātoḥ sarūpatvāt astyāsvādacittaṃ,
T07hvsatssu:7409: yāvannaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasya saṃjñā vedanā ca śalyam iti /
T07hvsatssu:7416: rūpārūpyadhātvorapi tathāṣṭasaṃskārāḥ samānamuktā iti kasmānnāsti duḥkham /
T07hvsatssu:7420: āha ca sūtram- atra santīrṣyāmātsaryādayaḥ kleśā (SSS_201) iti /
T07hvsatssu:7421: yathā brahmā brahmāṇamāmantyāha- dhrūvamidaṃ sthānam mā bhavantaḥ śramaṇaṃ gautamamupasaṅkramata iti /
T07hvsatssu:7424: api coktaṃ sūtre- tatrāsti mithyādṛṣṭiḥ kleśa iti /
T07hvsatssu:7427: ābhidharmikā āhuḥ- sarve kleśā akuśalā iti /
T07hvsatssu:7429: uktañca sūtre- rūpārāmā [bhikṣavo] devamanuṣyāḥ rūparatā rūpasamuditāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:7436: prākṛtānāmajñānāṃ kasya śaktibalena priyaprāptipratyayaṃ saumanasyaṃ na bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:7438: yathoktaṃ sūtre- mārgaṃ pratipannasyaivāyuṣo 'nte rūpe saumanasyaṃ daurmanasya ñca nāsti iti /
T07hvsatssu:7439: ato jñāyate sarveṣāṃ prākṛtānāṃ saumanasyaṃ daurmanasyaṃ sadānuvartate iti /
T07hvsatssu:7440: bhagavān svayamāha- daurmanasyavigataṃ saumanasyavigatañcaikaṃ cittamupekṣāyāmupavicaratītyayamarhato guṇa iti /
T07hvsatssu:7444: yathoktaṃ sūtre- prākṛtānāṃ yadupekṣācittaṃ sarvaṃ tat rūpaniśritaṃ na rūparāgavimuktam iti /
T07hvsatssu:7446: yathoktaṃ sūtre- sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ rāgānuśayaḥ iti /
T07hvsatssu:7451: uttamabhūmau ca pravṛtte kāyacitte śāntasukhe na mahadanugṛhīte staḥ /
T07hvsatssu:7454: na te tadiryāpatheṣu dīrghakālaṃ sthātuṃ śaknuvanti /
T07hvsatssu:7455: yathoktaṃ sūtre- saptadināni samāviśya vimuktisukhaṃ vedayata iti /
T07hvsatssu:7457: yathoktaṃ sūtre praśrabdhiriti sukhā vedanā iti /
T07hvsatssu:7458: ato jñāyate sarvāsu bhūmiṣu asti sukhā vedaneti /
T07hvsatssu:7469: tasmāt ucyate [tatra] nāsti sukhaṃ nāsti duḥkhamiti /
T07hvsatssu:7470: tatra ca sukhaduḥkhe sūkṣme na pratīte staḥ /
T07hvsatssu:7471: asiśastrādi duḥkhaṃ bandhamaraṇādi daurmanasyañca nāstītyato nāsti duḥkhamiti /
T07hvsatssu:7475: yaducyate triṣu dhyāneṣu sattvā ekakāyā ekanimittā iti /
T07hvsatssu:7477: yathā vadanti- yo dhyānavihārī na samyak styānamiddhauddhatyānyapanayati so 'viśuddhābha iti /
T07hvsatssu:7479: yathā ca laukikā vadanti alpalavaṇe bhojane alavaṇamiti /
T07hvsatssu:7480: evaṃ tatra saumanalyaṃ daurmanasya ñca na pratītamito nāstītyucyate /
T07hvsatssu:7482: uktañca sūtre bhagavatā saṃjñāpratyayo vitarka iti /
T07hvsatssu:7483: atra saṃjñāyāṃ satyāṃ kathaṃ nāsti vitarkaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:7485: [cittasya] audārikatā vitarka iti dhyānadvaye niruddha ityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:7490: sūtra uktam- ṣaṭ cetanākāyāḥ saṃskāraskandha iti /
T07hvsatssu:7493: yathoktaṃ sūtre- avaracetanā avaraprārthanā avarapraṇidhānam / iti /
T07hvsatssu:7498: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- yathāpi [bhikṣavaḥ] yavakalāpī caturmahāpathe vikṣiptā syāt /
T07hvsatssu:7503: kiṃ punaridaṃ bhikṣavo bhavatāṃ manasi vipacyate na vā /
T07hvsatssu:7507: evaṃ hi sa moghapuruṣaḥ suhatataro bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:7518: yatrāsmīti tatreñjitaṃ manaskṛtaṃ prapañjitaṃ spanditaṃ rāgagatam iti /
T07hvsatssu:7521: kiñcāha- yo bālo janmaprabhṛti maitrīmabhyasyati so 'kuśalaṃ karma karoti cetayate na vā /
T07hvsatssu:7524: āha ca cetanā karma cetayitvā ceti /
T07hvsatssu:7528: upālisūtre uktam- nighaṇṭo nāthaputraḥ śītodakapratikṣipta uṣṇodakapratisevī /
T07hvsatssu:7536: sahetusapratyayasūtra uktam- aśrutavataḥ pṛthagjanasya yatprārthitaṃ tṛṣṇaiva sā iti /
T07hvsatssu:7537: mahānidānasūtra uktam- tṛṣṇāṃ pratītya paryeṣaṇā ityādi /
T07hvsatssu:7538: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- duḥkhī bhūyasā sukhārthī kiṃ na prārthayate iti /
T07hvsatssu:7539: āha ca- yadā puruṣaḥ pañcakāmaguṇeṣu rajyate sa rāga eva prārthanā iti /
T07hvsatssu:7540: api cāha- tṛṣṇāpratyayamupādānamiti paryeṣaṇaṃ pūrvaṃ bhavati paścādupādānam iti /
T07hvsatssu:7545: kasmāt upālisūtra uktam- asañcetanikaṃ karma na mahāsāvadyam /
T07hvsatssu:7548: yathā vadanti ko jñānī idaṃ kuryāt /
T07hvsatssu:7555: yathā kañcitpraṇidadhannāha- ahamanāgate 'dhvani īdṛśaṃ kāyaṃ pratilapsya iti /
T07hvsatssu:7559: yathoktaṃsūtre- manaḥsañcetanāyā [bhikṣavaḥ] āhāre parijñāte tisrastṛṣṇāḥ parijñātā bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:7573: kāryaprahāṇāddhetuprahāṇamuktaṃ yaduta manaḥsañcetanāhāraprahāṇāt tisṛṇāṃ tṛṣṇānāṃ prahāṇamiti /
T07hvsatssu:7576: tṛṣṇā hi dvividhā hetubhūtā phalabhūtā ceti /
T07hvsatssu:7579: codayati / yadi hetvavasthāyāṃ tṛṣṇā phalāvasthāyāṃ cetanā /
T07hvsatssu:7582: yo dharmo hetvavasthaḥ so 'nyaḥ phalāvastha ścānyaḥ ityato jñāyate cetanā na tṛṣṇāṅgamiti /
T07hvsatssu:7583: yathoktaṃ sahetusapratyaya sūtre mūḍhasya yatprārthitaṃ tṛṣṇaiva sā /
T07hvsatssu:7586: yasya yasmin vastuni rāgaḥ tasya tasmin vastuni prārthanā /
T07hvsatssu:7601: manasā cet praduṣṭhena bhāṣate vā karoti vā /
T07hvsatssu:7611: yadā puruṣaḥ parasattvānāṃ kuśalamakuśalaṃ vā prārthayate /
T07hvsatssu:7617: ato jñāyate ekaiva cetanā nānānāmabhirucyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:7632: ato jñāyate asti ca caitasika dharmaḥ sparśākhya iti /
T07hvsatssu:7633: ṣaṭ ṣaṭkasūtra uktaṃ- ṣaṭa sparśakāyā iti /
T07hvsatssu:7638: sūtre cāsti dvividhaḥ sparśaḥ eka trayāṇāṃ sannipātaḥ sparśa iti /
T07hvsatssu:7640: ato jñāyate dvividhayoḥ sparśayorekaḥ svarūpasan aparaḥ prajñaptisanniti /
T07hvsatssu:7645: yathā ca bhikṣūṇāṃ samavāyo na bhikṣubhyo 'nyaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:7650: evaṃ sparśo 'pi na cakṣurādibhyo bhidyata iti nāstyavadyam /
T07hvsatssu:7652: prāguktaṃ mayā [yadā] cittamālambanaṃ gṛhāti tasmin samaye sparśa iti /
T07hvsatssu:7657: na vayaṃ svīkurmaḥ sparśo 'yaṃ dvividha iti /
T07hvsatssu:7664: ato jñāyate sa sparśo na tribhyo bhidyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:7665: kiñca yadi sparśaścaitasikadharmaḥ tadā anyebhyaścaitasikebhyo bhidyeta /
T07hvsatssu:7672: yathā vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā na tṛṣṇāpratyayā vedanā /
T07hvsatssu:7673: (u) sparśasya kiṃ viśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ yadanyacaitasikānāṃ noktaṃ syāt /
T07hvsatssu:7676: vedanādyakālīnā tṛṣṇānantarakālīnā iti vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā na tu tṛṣṇāpratyayā vedanā /
T07hvsatssu:7679: na tūcyata iti jñātavyaṃ nāsti vibhinnaḥ [sparśa] iti /
T07hvsatssu:7681: yathāha yo duḥkhopaghātaḥ sa āgatya janakāyaṃ spṛśatīti /
T07hvsatssu:7687: yathā loke vadanti sukha uṣṇasaṃsparśa iti /
T07hvsatssu:7699: ato jñāyate nāsti pāramārthikaḥ pṛthak caitasikadharma iti /
T07hvsatssu:7700: yo dharmaḥ kāyagataḥ sa sparśa ityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:7701: yat vedanādīnāṃ caitasikānāṃ hetukriyāṃ prayacchati tasmin samaye sparśa iti nāma pradīyate //
T07hvsatssu:7712: (pṛ) kiṃ vijñānānāṃ jñānaṃ sarvaṃ manaskārabalenotpadyate kiṃ vā na /
T07hvsatssu:7718: kadācidālambanabalādutpadyate yathā dūrataḥ pradīpaṃ paśyan tasya kampaṃ paśyati /
T07hvsatssu:7730: kadācitsamādhibalādutpadyate yathaikatra pratibaddhacitto vijñāne prakarṣaṃ prajānāti /
T07hvsatssu:7736: saukumāryādutpadyate yathā lomākṣigataṃ sat cittasya duḥkhajanakaṃ nānyatra gatam /
T07hvsatssu:7748: ata evamāha- kasyacit cittāntarajanakamanaskāre 'sati vijñānaṃ notpadyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:7761: yathā vadanti samyak praśnaḥ samyag dūṣaṇaṃ,
T07hvsatssu:7765: (SSS_210) ato jñāyate yuktayanuyāyimanaskāraḥ tattvamanaskāra ityādayaḥ samyaṅ manaskārāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:7780: kiñcāha- yadi bhikṣavo mama śāsane tīvracchandā [vartadhve] /
T07hvsatssu:7781: tada mama śāsanaṃ suciraṃ tiṣṭhet iti /
T07hvsatssu:7786: ayaṃ vīryasahakāriṇā prajñāsamādhiṃ sañcinotītyebhyaścaturbhyo 'bhilaṣitamṛddhyaṅgamiti nāmabhāg bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:7787: āha ca- tvaṃ vihāyasā gamanaṃ chandayasi iti /
T07hvsatssu:7788: tenakhalu samayena sa bhikṣuḥ pūrvaṃ svādhyāyabahulo viharati /
T07hvsatssu:7790: atha khalu tasminvanaṣaṇḍe adhivasantī devatā tasya bhikṣordharmaśṛṇvantī yena sa bhikṣuḥ tenopasaṅkrāntaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:7792: kasmāt dharmapadāni tvaṃ bhikṣurnādhyepi bhikṣubhiḥ sukhaṃ vasan /
T07hvsatssu:7793: śrutvā ca dharmaṃ labhate prasādaṃ dṛṣṭe ca dharme labhate praśaṃsām // iti /
T07hvsatssu:7794: abhūt pūrvaṃ dharmapadeṣu chando yāvadvirāgeṇa samāgato 'smi /
T07hvsatssu:7795: yato virāgeṇa samāgato 'smi yatkiñcidṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ vā mataṃ vā /
T07hvsatssu:7806: bhagavān yat sattvānāṃ nānādhātūn prajānāti tat dhātujñānabalam /
T07hvsatssu:7814: ata āha- sattvānāṃ yathādhātu santānamanuvartata iti /
T07hvsatssu:7826: (pṛ) tathā cet svayaṃ dharmadarśinaḥ śraddhā na syāt /
T07hvsatssu:7832: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- ahaṃ bhagavan asmin vastuni yathā bhagavadvacanaṃ śraddhadha iti /
T07hvsatssu:7836: tasyeyaṃ cintā bhavati sa dharmaḥ paramārthasatyo na mṛṣeti,
T07hvsatssu:7839: tadyathā rogī pūrvaṃ bhiṣagvacane śraddadhāna auṣadhamupasevya rogānmuktaḥ paścāttasmin bhiṣaji prasannacitto bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:7843: jñānajā yathā caturṣu [avetya] prasādeṣu buddhādiṣu cittaprasādaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:7844: sā tridhā vibhaktā kuśalā akuśalā avyākṛtā ceti /
T07hvsatssu:7850: tathā no cet akuśalā vedanā vedanā na syāt /
T07hvsatssu:7853: yā śraddhā indriyeṣu gaṇitā vimuktyanugāminī saptatriṃśabdodhipakṣikeṣu gatā sā niyamena kuśalaiva /
T07hvsatssu:7858: tatrāmyutsāhaḥ sadā cittaikāgratāsamudācāraḥ sa vyavasāya ityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:7860: yat caturṣu samyakpradhāneṣu antargataḥ sa kuśalaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:7863: tasya paścādutpadyate vyavasāyo 'kuśalānāṃ prahāṇāya kuśalānāṃ samādānāya /
T07hvsatssu:7872: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yat ciraviprakṛṣṭānubhūtaṃ smarati na pramuṣati sā smṛtirityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:7885: tatra pratyutpannā prajñaiva na tu smṛtiḥ /
T07hvsatssu:7886: atastathāgato [yadā] pūrvaṃ smṛtināmnā vimuktimuktavān tadā tāmeva prajñetyavocat /
T07hvsatssu:7888: (u) smṛterdharmaṃ evaṃ yat svasantāne yo dharmaḥ [pūrva]mutpannaniruddhaḥ tameva [svasantānikaṃ] viprakṛṣṭaṃ vijñānāntaramālambata iti /
T07hvsatssu:7889: jñānānāṃ vijñānadharmaśca tathā yat vijñānāntarānumūtaṃ vijñānāntaraṃ vijānātīti /
T07hvsatssu:7890: yathā cakṣurvijñānena vijñātaṃ rūpaṃ manovijñānaṃ vijānāti /
T07hvsatssu:7898: yathā bhagavān salyakaṃ nāthaputramavocat pūrvaṃ manasi kṛtvā vyākuruṣva iti /
T07hvsatssu:7900: ato vijñaptyādidharmā api pūrvavastvanusmaraṇarūpā smṛtaya ityucyante /
T07hvsatssu:7904: samādhiḥ prajñā ca samādhivarge prajñāvarge ca vakṣyate //
T07hvsatssu:7907: yat cittaṃ vyagraṃ muharmuhurālambhakaṃ sa vitarkaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:7911: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhagavānāha- savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ prathamadhyānamupasampadya viharāmīti /
T07hvsatssu:7913: yā cittasya vyagratā kiñcitsūkṣmatā sa vicāraḥ /
T07hvsatssu:7920: ato 'pratyakṣavastuno 'nuvitarkaḥ samyagvitarko vā mithyāvitarko vā iti taṃ kathayāmaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:7924: samyagvitarkaḥ yadapratilabdhaṃ tattvajñānamanumitilakṣaṇena jñānena labdhvā yogī nirvedhabhāgīyakuśalamūle vartate /
T07hvsatssu:7928: tasminneva vitarke anena hetunā evaṃ bhavati anena hetunā naivaṃ bhavati iti cintanā vicāraṇā vā sa vicāraḥ /
T07hvsatssu:7943: yat kuśalasyānācaraṇaṃ mithyācaraṇaṃ vā sa pramādaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:7967: [anye] kecidāhuḥ trīṇi tṛṣṇā avidyā prajñā iti /
T07hvsatssu:7969: avyākṛtānugaṃ cittaṃ yaddhetujaṃ sa heturavyākṛtamūlaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:7972: cittasamācaraṇakāle yat kāyaścittaṃ dauṣṭhalyavigataṃ praśāntaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:7976: dhyāneṣu yat sukhaduḥkhaviviktaṃ vimuktiparāyaṇaṃ cittasamācaraṇaṃ sopekṣā /
T07hvsatssu:7984: aprāptiḥ asaṃjñisamāpattiḥ nirodhasamāpattiḥ āsaṃjñikaṃ jīvitendriyaṃ jātiḥ vyayaḥ sthitiḥ anyathātvaṃ jarā maraṇaṃ nāmakāyaḥ padakāyo vyañjanakāyaḥ pṛthagjanatvaṃ ityādayaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:7996: uktaṃ hi sūtre yaḥ puṇyaṃ pāpañca karoti /
T07hvsatssu:7999: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- mṛtasya puṇyaṃ na praṇaśyati yaduta phalaprāpakameva /
T07hvsatssu:8023: na hi nirudhyante pṛthagjanānāṃ cittacaitasikadharmā iti paścādvakṣyate /
T07hvsatssu:8039: bhagavataḥ śāsanaṃ gabhīraṃ yatpratyayānāṃ sāmagryā dharmā (SSS_220)
T07hvsatssu:8045: kiñca vadanti jātyādayo dharmā ekakālīnā iti /
T07hvsatssu:8049: yā teṣāṃ teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tasmin tasmin [sattvanikāye] jātiḥ skandhānāṃ pratilābhaḥ....... [sā jātiḥ] iti /
T07hvsatssu:8052: āha ca- skandhānāṃ jīrṇatā bhugnatā jareti /
T07hvsatssu:8055: vyañjanebhya utpannaṃ nāma yathā vadanti devadatta iti /
T07hvsatssu:8069: tīrthikānāṃ hi sūtreṣūktaṃ- anyo ghaṭo 'nyat ghaṭatvam /
T07hvsatssu:8079: ato gabhīramananuvicintya vavīṣi- asti pṛthagjanatvaṃ pṛthagiti /
T07hvsatssu:8088: śāstramāha- duḥkhasatyaṃ parisamāpya samudayasatyamidānīṃ vakṣyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:8098: (u) ghaṭādi kāyikakarmaṇaḥ phalam na kāyikaṃ karma /
T07hvsatssu:8104: (u) idaṃ kṣaṇikavarge pratyuktaṃ yadekasmin dharma utpadyamāne 'nyasyāpacaya upacayo vā [tat] kāyikaṃ karmeti /
T07hvsatssu:8105: (pṛ) tathā cet kāya eva kāyikaṃ karma bhavet /
T07hvsatssu:8107: na tu kāyena kṛtaṃ kāyikaṃ karma /
T07hvsatssu:8118: atastatsamudayo yadi vā kuśalo [yadi vā] akuśalaḥ na tu sākṣātkāyikaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:8121: (SSS_223) cittabalāt śabdavyavahārasamuditaṃ karma kuśalamakuśalaṃ vācikaṃ karmetyucyate /
T07hvsatssu:8123: ya imaṃ sattvaṃ hanmīti adhyavasitacitto bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:8128: (u) tat dvidhā bhavati mana eva mānasaṃ karma manasa utpannaṃ vā mānasaṃ karma iti /
T07hvsatssu:8129: sattvaṃ hanmīti yadadhyavasitaṃ manaḥ tadakuśalaṃ mana eva manasaṃ karma /
T07hvsatssu:8140: nahyasti tatra kāraṇaṃ kevalaṃ kāyikavācikāvijñaptirevāsti na mānasikāvijñaptiriti /
T07hvsatssu:8141: sūtre coktaṃ dvidhā karma- cetanā vā cetayitvā vā [karme]ti /
T07hvsatssu:8143: cetayitvā [karma] trividham- cetanāsañcitaṃ karma kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ karmeti /
T07hvsatssu:8151: (u) cittaṃ pratītyotpadyamānaṃ puṇyapāpaṃ middhamūrchādikāle 'pi yannityaṃ pravartate /
T07hvsatssu:8156: teṣāṃ divā ca rātriñca sadā puṇyaṃ pravartate // iti /
T07hvsatssu:8172: uktaṃ hi sūtre- vīryavān puruṣa āyurvaśāt bahupuṇyaṃ prasavati /
T07hvsatssu:8177: āha ca vanādiropasya divā rātriñca sadā puṇyaṃ pravardhata iti /
T07hvsatssu:8180: kathaṃ vaktavyaṃ syāt puṇyaṃ sadā pravardhate,
T07hvsatssu:8196: idānīṃ kimidaṃ rūpaṃ kiṃ vā cittaviprayuktasaṃskāraḥ /
T07hvsatssu:8202: (SSS_225) (pṛ) sūtra uktaṃ ṣaṭ cetanākāyāḥ saṃskāraskandha iti /
T07hvsatssu:8204: (u) pratipāditamidaṃ pūrvaṃ yadasti puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ cittaviprayuktamiti /
T07hvsatssu:8233: (pṛ) sūtra uktam- hetukṛtaṃ karma ahetukṛtaṃ karmeti /
T07hvsatssu:8245: yadi yodhājīvo vyavaharasi na tadā gaṇayiṣyāmīti yāvat tridhā pṛcchati /
T07hvsatssu:8246: yadyakaraṇacittapūrvakaṃ karoti- yathā kaścidviharan pādanikṣepaṇena kīṭaṃ hanti /
T07hvsatssu:8252: kṛtānupacitamiti- yathā hananādikarma kṛtvā paścāccittaṃ paritapati /
T07hvsatssu:8256: upacitākṛtamiti- yat anyaṃ hananādi kārayitvā pramuditacitto bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:8257: anyaṃ dānādi kārayitvā ca pramuditacitto bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:8258: kṛtopacitamiti- yat hananādi pāpaṃ kṛtvā dānādipuṇyaṃ kṛtvā ca pramuditacitto bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:8259: akṛtānupacitamiti- na ca karoti nāpi muditacitto bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:8261: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yat karma kṛtamupacitaṃ tasya karmaṇo 'vaśyamasti vipākapratisaṃvedanā iti /
T07hvsatssu:8262: ataḥ kṛtopacitakarmaṇo dṛṣṭadharme vā vipāko vedyate /
T07hvsatssu:8265: (pṛ) yadi hetukṛtopacitakarmaṇo 'vaśyamasti vipākapratisaṃvedanā tadā nāsti vimuktiḥ /
T07hvsatssu:8275: (u) yastattvajñānaṃ na bhāvayati sa pāpakarmaṇo 'nuśayaṃ labhate /
T07hvsatssu:8291: niyatavipākaṃ karma bahu vā alpaṃ vā avaśyavedanīyavipākam /
T07hvsatssu:8300: yathā bhagavati tacchrāvake vā satkāraḥ athavālpamātrānindā /
T07hvsatssu:8311: yathā rājadharme gurupātakī daṇḍya eva na kṣantavyaḥ //
T07hvsatssu:8326: dharmo dharma iti [yat] tannāstīti tasmin vadati kuśaladharmāṇāmacaritāro bahavaḥ sattvāḥ pratihanyanta ityato bhavati gurutaraṃ pāpam /
T07hvsatssu:8330: nāsti pāpaṃ nāsti puṇyaṃ nāsti mātāpitṛsajjānānāṃ satkāravipāka iti yadvacanaṃ tadādimithyādṛṣṭirapi tadvipākaprāpiṇī /
T07hvsatssu:8331: anyaṃ mithyādṛṣṭau pātayan bahūn sattvānakuśalāni kārayaṃśca tadvipākaṃ vedayate /
T07hvsatssu:8332: īdṛśamithyādṛṣṭisūtrāṇi racayanti yathā pūraṇādayo mithyādṛṣṭināmācāryāḥ samyagdṛṣṭivihiṃsayā bahūnāṃ sattvānāmakuśalāya hetupratyayaṃ prakāśayanti
T07hvsatssu:8340: śataṃ sahasrāṇāṃ nirarbudānāṃ ṣaṭ triṃśacca pañca ca arbudānām
T07hvsatssu:8341: yadāryagarhī nirayamupaiti vācaṃ manaḥ praṇidhāya pāpakam / iti /
T07hvsatssu:8343: guruviparītaṃ laghu yaduta tapanapratapanādiṣu hīnanarakeṣu tīryakṣu preteṣu devamanuṣyeṣu cākuśalavipākaṃ pratisaṃvedayate /
T07hvsatssu:8359: evaṃ manuṣyeṣu caturmahārājikānāmadhaḥ pratyekaṃ karmavaśādvipākaṃ vedayate /
T07hvsatssu:8367: (SSS_230) tato jaghanyabhūteṣu caturapramāṇacitteṣu viharan śīlasamādhipratyayavaśācca rūpadhātāvutpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:8372: (pṛ) puṇyakṣetraṃ kiṃ bodhyotkṛṣṭaṃ kiṃ vā prahāṇena /
T07hvsatssu:8376: yathā bhagavān bodhyā śrāvakebhyo 'tiricyate na prahāṇena /
T07hvsatssu:8381: ato yadbodhisattvānāṃ saṃsāre dīrghakālāvāsaḥ sa samyak prahāṇārthaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:8390: āha ca- dandhānāṃ hiṃsayā kāmarāgakalahacittaṃ prarohati /
T07hvsatssu:8398: tasminneva sūtra uktaṃ- tiraścāṃ dānaṃ śataguṇaṃ hitaṃ prāpayati iti /
T07hvsatssu:8399: vastutastu pārāvatapakṣyādīnāṃ dānena pratilabdho vipākaḥ tīrthikānāṃ pañcābhijñānāṃ dānamatiśete /
T07hvsatssu:8401: sūtraṃ tat bahunā hetunāha- nissaraṇārthā prajñā iti /
T07hvsatssu:8408: asmin śrāmaṇere utpannānuttara [bodhi]citte tu arhanneva tatpātracīvaramādāya svayamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā tamanugacchati /
T07hvsatssu:8415: (u) yat karma pareṣāṃ priyaṃ prayacchati tat kuśalam /
T07hvsatssu:8420: yat pareṣāṃ duḥkhaprāpakaṃ tena pāpena bhavitavyam /
T07hvsatssu:8421: yathā āñjanauṣadhaśalyavedhāḥ pareṣāṃ duḥkhajanakāḥ pāpāḥ syuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:8424: yathā paradāragamanaṃ tat tasya sukhajanakaṃ tat puṇyakaramapi syāt /
T07hvsatssu:8426: yat parānukuśaladharme pravartayati tat duḥkhāya bhavati na sukhāya /
T07hvsatssu:8431: tadannapānaṃ kadācidajīryamāṇaṃ sat puruṣasya maraṇaṃ prāpayati /
T07hvsatssu:8432: tadannadāyakaḥ kiṃ pāpaṃ labheta kiṃ vā puṇyam /
T07hvsatssu:8437: (u) idaṃ pūrvameva pratyuktaṃ yadabrahmacaryaṃ niyamena akuśalamiti /
T07hvsatssu:8447: yathā corāṇāṃ nigrahe rāṣṭraṃ nirīti bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:8468: iti prāṇātipātāt kathaṃ puṇyaṃ na bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:8474: āha ca ca sūtram- yo yuddhe hanyate sa svarga utpadyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:8475: yathāha gāthā- mriyamāṇañca saṅgrāme patiṃ barayatepsarāḥ iti / kiñcāha-
T07hvsatssu:8477: hanyādeva na vai pāpaṃ āhantā vindate tu tat // iti
T07hvsatssu:8480: brāhmaṇasya ṣaḍdharmāḥ kṣatriyasya catvāro vaiśyasya trayaḥ śūdrasyaikaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:8481: ṣaḍ dharmā iti yajanamārvijya madhyayatamadhyāpanaṃ dānaṃ pratigrahaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:8488: kṣatriyasya prajāpālanāya prāṇivadhe puṇyameva na pāpam /
T07hvsatssu:8489: veda uktam- prāṇivadhaḥ puṇyaprāpakaḥ yaduta vaidikamantreṇa hatāḥ paśavaḥ svarga utpadyanta iti /
T07hvsatssu:8491: kiñcāha yadvastuto martavyaṃ taddhanane nāsti pāpam- yathā pañcābhijña ṛṣirmantreṇa puruṣaṃ hanti /
T07hvsatssu:8494: ato jñāyate prāṇivadho na pāpaprāpaka iti /
T07hvsatssu:8502: atrocyate / yaduktaṃ bhavatā prāṇivadhenābhīpsitalābhādasti puṇyaguṇa iti /
T07hvsatssu:8514: kecitsattvā api pratyarpaṇīyajīvitadhanā ityato vadhahiṃsayā yadabhīpsitaṃ tallabhate /
T07hvsatssu:8517: yathā loka āhuḥ- ayaṃ puruṣo 'lpapuṇyo bahukurvannapi na vindata iti /
T07hvsatssu:8525: yadbravīṣi sūtra uktaṃ- yo yuddhe hanyate sa svarga utpadyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:8532: yadāha bhavān- caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ pṛthak santi svadharmāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:8536: yathā sūnakādīnāṃ lokānāṃ gṛhyadharmāḥ prāṇivadhāḥ sadā kriyamāṇā na pāpavimuktāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:8539: yadi kṣatriyo rājadharmatvena prāṇān vadhyan apāpo bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:8541: kṣatriyaḥ paraṃ prajāsu karuṇārdracittatayā vairamutsṛjya tadadhīnaṃ puṇyaṃ labhate /
T07hvsatssu:8549: yo mumūrṣuḥ sa brāhmaṇādapyupādānaṃ labhate iti /
T07hvsatssu:8550: ime duṣkarmaṇā jīvanto 'pi nocyante śīlavyasanina iti /
T07hvsatssu:8554: (u) ukta brāhmaṇa dharma eva- cauryakāle dhanasvāmyāgatya rakṣati /
T07hvsatssu:8562: tadā ātmahanane parahanane vā tatpāpamapi tulyam /
T07hvsatssu:8568: corahanane 'pyevaṃ syāt duṣkarmaṇā jīvanta iti yaduktaṃ tatra duṣkarmasattvātkathaṃ puṇyaṃ bhavet /
T07hvsatssu:8569: yadavocaḥ coraṃ purata āgataṃ hanyādeva na vai pāpamahantā tu vindate tat iti /
T07hvsatssu:8576: yadabravīḥ veda uktaṃ prāṇivadhaḥ puṇyaprāpaka iti /
T07hvsatssu:8578: yaduktaṃ vastuto martavyasya kasyacidvadhe nāsti pāpamiti /
T07hvsatssu:8591: evaṃ yaḥ parasmai dadāti tasyāpi na puṇyaṃ syāt /
T07hvsatssu:8592: pratigrahītā pūrvādhvani svācaritadānakarmaka idānīṃ tadvipākaṃ labhate /
T07hvsatssu:8593: na hi sambhavati nāsti puṇyaṃ pāpamiti /
T07hvsatssu:8594: ato jñātavyaṃ sattvānāṃ pūrvādhvakṛtavadhakarmaṇāmapi vadhitā pāpaṃ labhata iti /
T07hvsatssu:8600: tathā nocedṛṣayo rāgadveṣādikleśānāmudaye ṛddhe na hīyeran /
T07hvsatssu:8603: jñātavyaṃ pūrvādhvakṛtapratyayānāmapi sattvānāṃ vadhitā pāpavān syāditi /
T07hvsatssu:8609: yadabravīḥ- kaściccittabalena prāṇātipātaṃ kurvan puṇyaṃ prasūte /
T07hvsatssu:8615: yaḥ kuśalacittena gurutalpago brāhmaṇahantā vā bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:8617: pārasīkādi paryantabhūmigatānāṃ janānāṃ puṇyabuddhayā mātṛbhaginyādigāmināṃ kiṃ puṇyaṃ bhavet /
T07hvsatssu:8625: paśyāmaḥ khalu pratyakṣaṃ bahavaḥ sattvā vadhādīnācaranto bhūyasā tisṛṣu gatiṣu manuṣyagatau ca duḥkhapīḍā anubhavantīti /
T07hvsatssu:8631: devā api sadā yuddhe 'suraiḥ saha vadhyante /
T07hvsatssu:8644: yo vadhahiṃsādibhyo viramati sa punarlābhasukhāyuḥpauṣkalyaṃ labhate /
T07hvsatssu:8647: idānīmauttarā vadanti taṇḍulaṃ svābhāvikaṃ vasanaṃ vṛkṣajam /
T07hvsatssu:8652: ye buddhā bodhisattvāḥ pratyekabuddhāḥ śrāvakā anye ca bhadantāḥ te sarve tān parityajya viramanti /
T07hvsatssu:8667: yo dharmo 'duṣṭaḥ na sa dharmaḥ pariharaṇīyaḥ syāt /
T07hvsatssu:8669: keciddharmāḥ svarūpato 'kuśalā ityataḥ pariharanti yathā madyapānavikālabhojanādayaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:8673: yadanena hetunā janavidviṣṭaṃ kathaṃ tadakuśalaṃ na bhavet /
T07hvsatssu:8679: yathā kaścidrājārthaṃ duṣṭacorāṇāṃ hantā rājapriyo bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:8681: yathā vadanti yo duṣkarmaṇā rājacittaṃ tarpayati /
T07hvsatssu:8689: vadhādidharmāḥ tāḍanahiṃsanavandhanādīnāṃ duḥkho padravāṇāṃ hetava ityato jñāyate 'kuśalā iti /
T07hvsatssu:8692: yo na vadhyati taṃ rājā hanti /
T07hvsatssu:8693: (u) yo na hanti sa hanyata ityahantāraḥ sarve mariṣyamāṇā bhaveyuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:8695: yadi rājā jānāti ayamavadhacitta iti tadā avadhitā pratyuta satkriyate /
T07hvsatssu:8696: ato jñāyate vadhādayo duḥkhahetavo na tvavadhādayaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:8707: yathā sūnako na kadāpīdṛśakarmaṇā satkāraṃ labhate /
T07hvsatssu:8711: dṛṣṭe paśyāmaḥ khalu hiṃsādīnāṃ vipriyaṃ phalaṃ bhavatīti /
T07hvsatssu:8719: gatāgate pādotkṣepaṇe pādāvakṣepaṇe vā sadā sūkṣmasattvān vihanti /
T07hvsatssu:8726: teṣu sattvasaṃjñāmutpādya jighatsābuddhyā tān hatvā hananapāpaṃ labhanta iti /
T07hvsatssu:8728: (pṛ) yathā viṣaṃ pītavāniti hetāvahetāvubhayathā puruṣaṃ hanti /
T07hvsatssu:8729: yathā ca vahniprakramaṇaṃ jñāne 'jñāne ca puruṣaṃ dahati /
T07hvsatssu:8731: jñātavyaṃ prāṇihiṃsā hetāvahetau ca pāpaṃ prāpayati /
T07hvsatssu:8739: sati tu vijñāne budhyate evamasati hetucitte na karma sidhyati /
T07hvsatssu:8748: yathā mātustanagrahaṇe bālako na pāpaṃ labhate /
T07hvsatssu:8751: puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ sarvaṃ cittādhīnaṃ jāyata iti jñātavyam /
T07hvsatssu:8753: tadā vimuktilabdho 'pi asati hetau sattvān pīḍayan pāpaṃ labheta /
T07hvsatssu:8758: yathā kaścitpuṇyaṃ karma kurvan sattvaṃ hatavānasmīti bhrānto bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:8761: hetāvasati puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vā nāstīti jñātavyam /
T07hvsatssu:8763: tadā kathamidaṃ kuśalaṃ idamakuśalaṃ idamavyākṛtamiti vibhāgaḥ syāt /
T07hvsatssu:8765: yathā trayaḥ puruṣāḥ sambhūya stūpapradakṣiṇaṃ kurvanti /
T07hvsatssu:8777: yadi cittavyatiriktaṃ karmāsti asattvasaṃkhyeṣvapi puṇyapāpaṃ syāt /
T07hvsatssu:8778: yathā sabhīraṇonmūlitaparvatopadruteṣu sattveṣu samīraṇe pāpaṃ syāt /
T07hvsatssu:8785: tathā cennārakāḥ sattvāḥ sadā dahyante pacyante ca /
T07hvsatssu:8792: avaśyaṃ hetucittena tadduḥkhamanubhavatāṃ puṇyaṃ bhavati natvahetucittena /
T07hvsatssu:8800: yadi hetucittaṃ vinā puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vāsti /
T07hvsatssu:8808: vastutastu santi brahmakāyikādīnāṃ surucirāḥ kāyā ato jñāyate na hetuṃ vinā puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vāstīti /
T07hvsatssu:8812: pariśuddhena cittena bhojane na punarasti pāpamiti śrutaṃ dṛṣṭavānasi /
T07hvsatssu:8813: tadā cittaṃ vinā nāsti puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vā iti jñātavyam /
T07hvsatssu:8817: tathā no cet sarve prāṇivadhāḥ puṇyaprāpakāḥ pāpaprāpakā vā syuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:8823: ato jñāyate yo hetuṃ vinānyasya viṣaṃ prayacchati /
T07hvsatssu:8839: yaḥ (SSS_240) prājñaḥ sa pañcakāmaguṇeṣu vasannapi na pāpamāk bhavatīti manaso balam /
T07hvsatssu:8841: na hi prājño rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā mithyāsaṃjñāmutpādayati /
T07hvsatssu:8846: tathā ca mānasaṃ karma niṣprayojanaṃ syāt /
T07hvsatssu:8861: annavastrābhyāṃ paramupakurvatā tasmin samaye puṇyaṃ labhyate /
T07hvsatssu:8868: anyapuruṣe ca duṣṭacittamātramutpādayati na kāyavākkarma karoti /
T07hvsatssu:8882: ato jñāyate ātmārthatā na puṇyavatī syāditi /
T07hvsatssu:8889: tat bhagavadguṇāḥ sattveṣu pūjyā iti smṛtvā janāḥ secante śodhayanti ca /
T07hvsatssu:8892: uktañca sūtre- na tathāgataḥ san nāsan,
T07hvsatssu:8893: nāpi sadasat nāpi ca na san nāsan iti /
T07hvsatssu:8896: tadā anirvṛtakālīnaṃ bhagavantaṃ smṛtvā pūjayantaḥ puṇyaṃ labhante /
T07hvsatssu:8897: yathā janāḥ pitarau jananapoṣaṇakālaṃ smṛtvā yajanti /
T07hvsatssu:8898: tathā no cet na pitṛpūjā bhavet /
T07hvsatssu:8914: yathā ca vastradānaṃ yadyapi paraṃ hāpayati /
T07hvsatssu:8916: tathā ca vastradānenāpi na puṇyaṃ bhavet /
T07hvsatssu:8918: yathoktaṃ sūtre- eko bhikṣuḥ snānagṛhe anyasya dehaṃ hastena mārjayati sma /
T07hvsatssu:8923: yadbhavānāha- na ca cittamātreṇa puṇyaṃ labhata iti /
T07hvsatssu:8925: yat kaścitparasyopakāraṃ cakāra karoti kariṣyati vā sarvaṃ tat kuśalacittamūlakam /
T07hvsatssu:8926: yacca parasyāpakāraṃ cakāra karoti kariṣyati vā sarvaṃ tadakuśalacittamūlakam /
T07hvsatssu:8927: karuṇācārī ca karuṇācittavipākena sarveṣāmupakaroti yaduta caṇḍavātavṛṣṭyanupatane 'pi sūryācandramasau nakṣatrāṇi ca na bhraśyanti sadā caranti ca /
T07hvsatssu:8932: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yadi sarve lokāḥ karuṇācittamācaranti /
T07hvsatssu:8937: tatpratyayena apakarṣakaraṇe 'karaṇe vā sarvathā tadādhipatyena pāpaṃ labhate /
T07hvsatssu:8938: bhagavati piḍājananānna pāpamastīti bhavato yadi matam /
T07hvsatssu:8945: akuśalacittavattvāt tasmin śṛṇvati aśṛṇvati vāvaśyaṃ duḥkhaṃ janayet /
T07hvsatssu:8950: yadi paraprabodhito jānāti tadā tasyāvaśyaṃ duḥkhopāyāso jāyeta eva /
T07hvsatssu:8952: tadā [svāmī] prabudhya yadyapi na jānāti tathāpi tasya [paścāt] pīḍāṃ karotyeva /
T07hvsatssu:8959: tathā ca sarve sattvāḥ sadā pāpaṃ labheran yathā parapīḍanā janāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:8962: ato na svadehamātrātpuṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vāstīti jñātavyam /
T07hvsatssu:8963: mārgahetutvādvinaye śīlamidaṃ paribaddhaṃ yaḥ kliṣṭacittenātmānaṃ hanti na saṃkleśātpāpaṃ labhata iti /
T07hvsatssu:8965: yatkarma na kuśalamakuśalaṃ vā na parasattvānāmupakārakaṃ nāpakārakaṃ tadavyākṛtamityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:8968: yatkarma na kuśalaṃ nākuśalaṃ tadavyākṛtamiti vadanti /
T07hvsatssu:8980: (u) bhagavānāha- dvidhā vipākaḥ mithyākāyacaryā apriyavipākaprāpiṇī samyakkāyacaryā priyavipākaprāpiṇīti /
T07hvsatssu:8989: bhagavānāha- trīṇi duścaritāni kāyaduścaritaṃ vāgduścaritaṃ manoduścaritaṃ iti /
T07hvsatssu:8998: pāpamidaṃ svakāyenāpi kriyate yatra svakāyena sattvān hanti /
T07hvsatssu:8999: vācāpi kriyate yatna sattvān hantuṃ paramājñāpayati /
T07hvsatssu:9000: manasāpi kriyate yat kaściccittamutpādayati yena paro mriyate /
T07hvsatssu:9004: kadāciccittotpāde paro jānāti anena pratyayenāpi pāpakaraṃ prāṇātipātādi kuryāditi /
T07hvsatssu:9009: yat kenacitpraśne sthāpite taṃ purata eva vañcayati /
T07hvsatssu:9018: (pṛ) sūtra uktaṃ- sarvāṇi duścaritāni apriyavipākakarāṇi sucaritāni priyavipākakarāṇīti /
T07hvsatssu:9020: yathaikameva rūpaṃ [kasyacit] priyaṃ bhavati [anyasyā] priyaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:9034: (pṛ) samyak caritāni priyavipākakarāṇīti sūtra uktvā kasmātpunarucyate sucaritapratyayaṃ svarga utpadyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:9037: ataḥ sūtre punarucyate sucaritapratyayaṃ svarga upapadyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:9038: duścaritasucarite kuśalākuśalagatikakāyaṃ prāpayataḥ gṛhītakāyastatra sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā (SSS_244) vedayate /
T07hvsatssu:9040: sucaritapratyayaṃ deveṣu manuṣyeṣu vā sukhaṃ vedayate //
T07hvsatssu:9049: yadvandanavastradānādi kuśalaṃ kāyikaṃ karma tat kāyasucaritam /
T07hvsatssu:9057: anye 'pi śīlasaṃvarasaṅgṛhītaṃ sucaritaṃ labhante yathā daśavarṣāyuṣkasya puruṣasya prāṇātipātaviratisamādānādviṃśativarṣāyuṣkaḥ putra utpadyate
T07hvsatssu:9060: (u) ābhidhārmikā āhuḥ- pṛthagjanānāṃ yat kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ mānasaṃ kuśalaṃ karma tat sucaritamityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:9065: kecidāhuḥ- imāni trīṇi caritāni ekasyaivārthasyavibhinnāni nāmāni /
T07hvsatssu:9070: (pṛ) ābhidharmikā āhuḥ- cittameva vyupaśamacaritaṃ na cetaneti /
T07hvsatssu:9076: (pṛ) sūtra uktaṃṃ- sucaritadṛṣṭisampanno devadṛśo vā bhavati devasaṃkhyātadṛśo vā bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:9080: sucarītaśālī yadyapi nāvaśyaṃ deveṣūtpadyate tathāpi ya āryabahumatasthāna utpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:9084: yat samyaṅmithyāvyāmiśraṃ sucaritaṃ [tatra] mithyācaritasya prābalyānna deveṣūtpadyante /
T07hvsatssu:9085: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhagavānānandamavocat- paśyāmyahaṃ kecana trīṇi suritāni caranto 'pi durgatāvutpadyante /
T07hvsatssu:9087: idānīṃ sucaritasyāpi aparipūrṇatvānmaraṇa upasthite mithyādṛṣṭeścittābhimukhyāddargatau patanti /
T07hvsatssu:9093: (pṛ) sūtra uktaṃ- trividhaṃ karma kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ karma rūpadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ karma arūpyadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ karmeti /
T07hvsatssu:9095: (u) yat karma ānarakādāca paranirmitavaśavartidevādantarāle vipākavedakaṃ tatkāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ karma /
T07hvsatssu:9098: (pṛ) avyākṛtaṃ karma aniyatavipākañca karma kimeteṣu nāntargatam /
T07hvsatssu:9105: (pṛ) tathā cedidaṃ tīrthikaśāstraṃ yaduta sarvapratisaṃvedyaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhañca pūrvakarmahetupratyayaṃ bhavatīti /
T07hvsatssu:9106: pūrvakarmavipāko yaduta kuśalamakuśalaṃ karma savipākamavipākamiti vyavasāyaguṇasya nāsti yatkiñcanaprayojanam /
T07hvsatssu:9109: yasya (SSS_246) kleśāḥ karmāṇi karmavipākāśca santi tasya vimuktirnāsti /
T07hvsatssu:9114: tīrthikā hi vadanti sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ paratvamaparatvaṃ pūrvavipākamātramiti /
T07hvsatssu:9116: paśyāmastu vastutaḥ padārthāḥ pratyutpannebhyaḥ pratyayebhyaḥ samutpadyante yathā bījāṅkurādaya iti /
T07hvsatssu:9134: tatra bījādaṅkura utpadyate na tu tuṣādibhyaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:9136: yaduktaṃ bhavatā prayāse na guṇa iti /
T07hvsatssu:9144: tadyathā dagdhaṃ bījaṃ na punaḥ prarohati /
T07hvsatssu:9146: kiñca ya utpannā dharmāḥ sarve te karmamūlakāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:9159: purā kila janāḥ kuśalamācaritavanta ityataḥ śālitaṇḍulāḥ svata ajāyanta /
T07hvsatssu:9160: ato jñāyate karmabhūlakatvāt māṣānmāṣo jāyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:9165: prakāśakarmapratyayalābhāccandrasūryādayo bhavanti iti jñātavyaṃ janyaṃ vastu sarvaṃ karmamūlakamiti /
T07hvsatssu:9175: uktaṃ hi sūtre- asti aprasaṃyuktā vedeneti /
T07hvsatssu:9181: (u) yaḥ kāmarūpārūpyadhātuṣu daśākuśalakarmāṇi samutpādayati sa kāmadhātau vipākaṃ vedayate /
T07hvsatssu:9189: uktaṃ hi sūtre bhagavatā- mithyādṛṣṭirduḥkhakleśānāṃ heturiti /
T07hvsatssu:9191: yathā tiktakāravelle vidyamānāni catvāri mahābhūtāni sarvāṇi tiktarasāni bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:9195: yathā bako brahmā brahmāṇamāmantrayāha- mopagaccha śramaṇaṃ gautamam /
T07hvsatssu:9198: anye 'pi brahma [kāyikā] devāḥ tatra bhavantaṃ tādṛśaṃ puruṣaṃ dūṣayanti /
T07hvsatssu:9205: (u) yadīdamakuśalaṃ karma tadā kāmadhātau vipākaṃ vedayata ityataḥ kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktam /
T07hvsatssu:9214: (pṛ) kathaṃ tatra samutpāditaṃ kuśalaṃ karma kāmadhātuvedanīyavipākaṃ bhavet /
T07hvsatssu:9216: tathā tatra vikṣiptacittasamutpāditakuśalakarmaṇo 'smin loke vipākaṃ vedayate /
T07hvsatssu:9217: yathā ca rūpārūpyadhātusamutpāditākuśalakarmaṇaḥ kāmadhātau vipākaṃ vedayate /
T07hvsatssu:9219: (pṛ) yo rūpārūpyadhātugataḥ na sa utpādayati kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ kuśalaṃ karma /
T07hvsatssu:9220: (u) tatra nāstyayaṃ hetuḥ yat kāmadhātugato rūpārūpya[pratisaṃyuktaṃ] kuśalaṃ karmaiva
T07hvsatssu:9221: samutpādayati na rūpārūpyadhātugataḥ kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ kuśalaṃ karma samutpādayati iti /
T07hvsatssu:9222: ucyate ca yuṣmābhiḥ kāmadhātugataḥ kāmadhātukamavyākṛtaṃ cittaṃ samutpādayatīti /
T07hvsatssu:9225: sūtre bhagavān hastakadevaputrametadavocat- cittaviharaṇe audārikavedanāsaṃjñāṃ manasikuru iti /
T07hvsatssu:9227: ayaṃ kuśalacittena yat dharmaṃ śṛṇoti buddhaṃ pūjayati tat sarvaṃ kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ cittam /
T07hvsatssu:9228: tathā no cet audārikasaṃjñeti nākhyā syāt /
T07hvsatssu:9230: yathāha bhagavān triṣu vastuṣu atṛpto 'smin loke āyuṣo 'nte 'navataptadeveṣūpapatsye yaduta tathāgataṃ paśyāmi dharmaṃ śṛṇomi saṅghaṃ satkaromīti
T07hvsatssu:9248: (pṛ) kimetāni trīṇi karmāṇi niyatavipākāni niyatakālāni ca /
T07hvsatssu:9254: tathā cet pañcānantaryāṇi niyatavipākānīti na syāt /
T07hvsatssu:9261: dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyavipākaṃ karma nāvaśyaṃ dṛṣṭadharma eva vedyate /
T07hvsatssu:9262: vedyate cet dṛṣṭadharma eva vedanīyaṃ syāt nānyatra /
T07hvsatssu:9265: (u) kecidāhuḥ- vyādhyarthakarmaṇo dṛṣṭadharma eva vipākaṃ vedayate /
T07hvsatssu:9266: yathā tathāgata āryeṣu mātāpitrādiṣu samutpāditaṃ yat kuśalamakuśalaṃ karma tat dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyavipākam /
T07hvsatssu:9270: yathā cakravartinaḥ karma bodhisattvasya vā karma /
T07hvsatssu:9271: kecidāhuḥ- trividhakarmaṇāmeṣāṃ yathāpraṇidhānaṃ vipākaṃ vedayata iti /
T07hvsatssu:9274: yathā mallikādevī svānnabhāgadānena praṇidadhāti dṛṣṭa evādhvani rājamahiṣī bhaveyamiti /
T07hvsatssu:9279: (pṛ) yasmin kṣaṇe karmotpadyate tatsamanantarakṣaṇa eva kiṃ vipāko vedyate /
T07hvsatssu:9284: yo garbhamadhyastho ye ca middhonmattādayaḥ te karma sañcinvanti na vā (u)
T07hvsatssu:9287: (pṛ) yo 'syāṃ bhūmau vītarāgaḥ sa pṛthivīkarma karoti na vā /
T07hvsatssu:9296: uktañca sūtre- prahīṇapuṇyapāpakarmako 'rhanniti sa nopacinoti puṇyakarmāṇi apuṇyakarmāṇyāneñjyakarmāṇi ca /
T07hvsatssu:9297: ato vedanāparyavasannaṃ karmeti na nūtnaṃ karmābhisaṃskaroti /
T07hvsatssu:9301: sūtre hyuktaṃ- sa karmāṇi vidhvasya na sañcinoti nopacinoti niruddhaṃ na tathā bhavati ityādi /
T07hvsatssu:9306: aniyataṃ karma kimasti kiṃ vā nāsti /
T07hvsatssu:9308: yat karma dṛṣṭadharmavedanīyavipākaṃ vā upapadyavedanīyavipākaṃ vā tadūrdhvavedanīyavipākaṃ vā bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:9313: (u) ya imāni trividhakarmāṇi vivecayati sa samyagdṛṣṭimutpādayati /
T07hvsatssu:9317: udāsīnasya kadācinmithyādṛṣṭirbhavet yaduta kuśalasyākuśalasya vā nāsti vipāka iti /
T07hvsatssu:9321: pāpo 'pi paśyati bhadrāṇi yāvatpāpaṃ na pacyate /
T07hvsatssu:9322: yadā ca pacyate pāpamatha pāpo pāpāni paśyati //
T07hvsatssu:9323: bhadro 'pi paśyati pāpāni yāvadbhadraṃ na pacyate /
T07hvsatssu:9324: yadā ca pacyate bhadramatha bhadro bhadrāṇi paśyati //
T07hvsatssu:9326: yaḥ pūrvādhvani puṇyavān san āyuṣo 'nte prabalakuśalacittamutpādayati iti /
