T07hvsatssu:9328: ata eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ prajānīyāt //
T07hvsatssu:9349: hetau phalopacāraḥ yathānnasya dātā pañcārthānāṃ dāteti /
T07hvsatssu:9377: tatra saumanasyamapi saṃjñāvikalpādutpadyata iti na vipākaḥ syāt /
T07hvsatssu:9386: tacca daurmanasyaṃ jñānapraheyaṃ kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhamapi pariharati /
T07hvsatssu:9387: daurmanasya triṣvadhvasu kleśaṃ janayati yaduta pūrvamahaṃ duḥkhī idānīṃ duḥkhī āyatyāñca duḥkhīti /
T07hvsatssu:9394: yathā ca rogī kaścit [roga]duḥkhābhihataḥ punaḥ kāyacittapīḍanayātyadhikadaurmanasyopāyāso bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:9403: prasenajitaṃ rājānamapṛcchat- api tvaṃ [mahārāja] kāśīkosaleṣu priyo 'si iti /
T07hvsatssu:9404: uktañca- devā rūpāsaktā rūpakāmāḥ rūpe vinaṣṭe daurmanasyajātā bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:9411: bahavaśca sattvā daurmanasyakaraṃ parān sampīḍayantaḥ sadaurmanasyasampīḍanavipākaṃ labhante /
T07hvsatssu:9414: yaduktaṃ bhavatā- vītarāgāṇāṃ vyāvṛttatvānna vipāka iti /
T07hvsatssu:9417: narakādivipāko na vipāka iti kiṃ sambhavet /
T07hvsatssu:9418: ato na sambhavati vītarāgāṇāṃ vyāvṛttamavipāka iti /
T07hvsatssu:9429: (pṛ) sūtra uktaṃ- trīṇyāvaraṇāni karmāvaraṇaṃ kleśāvaraṇaṃ vipākāvaraṇamiti /
T07hvsatssu:9435: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yo 'yaṃ puruṣo nitayaṃ samāpattau vedanīyavipākaṃ karmopacinoti na sa supade 'vatarati iti /
T07hvsatssu:9438: yat kasyacit kleśā anivāryāḥ tadyathā ṣaṇḍādīnāṃ kāmaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:9440: yannarakādau pāpākuśalopapattyāyatane yathopapattyāyanañca na mārgaṃ bhāvayati /
T07hvsatssu:9442: (pṛ) kecit pūrvaṃ vidyāvihīnebhyaḥ pūrvapuruṣebhyo na prajānanti idaṃ kuśalamiti /
T07hvsatssu:9443: tadā te na dadanti yat sa yadi matto dānaṃ labdhvā akuśalāni karoti tadā ahaṃ bhāgī syāmiti /
T07hvsatssu:9459: kūṭamānādayaḥ kuhanāyāḥ pratyayāḥ iti kretāraḥ pāpinaḥ syuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:9460: pratigrahītā dānasya pratyaya iti puṇyabhāk syāt /
T07hvsatssu:9461: ye kūpataṭākādyupabhoktāraḥ te sarve puṇyabhājaḥ syuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:9462: tathā ca svasya puṇyaṃ na syāt /
T07hvsatssu:9472: bhūyasā te trividhaviṣakaluṣitacittāḥ pañcakāmaguṇāsaktā na vyavasyanti kuśalabhāvanām /
T07hvsatssu:9474: brāhmaṇādaya ātmānaṃ sujanabhāvitadharmacaya iti kīrtayanto na samyak paśyanti samāpatticittasamādhānāni dharmān /
T07hvsatssu:9476: ato dātā avītarāgāya dadan pāpabāhulyaṃ labheta /
T07hvsatssu:9477: janāḥ pitṝn pūjayantaḥ putrabhāryābandhūn samārādhayantaḥ [yadi] jñātvā vijānanti sarve pāpaṃ prāpayeyuriti /
T07hvsatssu:9495: ghanikatvahetoḥ kṛtānāṃ pāpānāmapi dātā bhāgī syāt /
T07hvsatssu:9496: tathā ca brāhmaṇā na dānaṃ pratigṛhṇīyuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:9498: idānīntu brāhmaṇāḥ kevalaṃ pratigṛhṇanti na prayacchanti /
T07hvsatssu:9499: ato jñāyate sa duṣṭaḥ panthā iti /
T07hvsatssu:9500: (SSS_255) yathā ca rājāno yathādharmaṃ prajāḥ pālayantaḥ pāpino 'pi syuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:9511: avītarāga āsvādābhiniviṣṭa ityato dātā pāpī syāt /
T07hvsatssu:9513: tvadannaṃ bhuktvā nākuśalaṃ kariṣyāmīti bhoktāraṃ sadā pratijñāpya paścāddāsyati /
T07hvsatssu:9515: (pṛ) nanu sūtre 'pyuktam- yadi bhikṣurdānapaterannaṃ bhuktvā cīvarañca paridhāyāpramāṇasamādhimupasampadya viharati tatpratyayāt sa dānapatirapramāṇapuṇyaṃ prasūta iti /
T07hvsatssu:9516: tatpratyayena puṇyalābhī cet kathaṃ na pāpabhāk bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:9517: (u) yadi sa bhikṣurdānapaterannaṃ bhuktvā cīvarañca paridhāyāpramāṇasamādhimupasampadya viharati /
T07hvsatssu:9524: na tu pratigrahītuḥ puṇye pāpe vā dātā bhāgaṃ labhate /
T07hvsatssu:9525: ato na tatpuṇyapāpapratyayena dātā puṇyapāpabhāk bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:9527: tathāpi svaṃ puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vā svakṛtatrividhakarmāpekṣya bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:9531: (u) tathā cet pravrajinaḥ śīlādin dhṛtvā sapuṇyo bhavatīdamupekṣitaṃ syāt /
T07hvsatssu:9538: tāni hi karmāṇi hetukāla eva vāryāṇi /
T07hvsatssu:9540: ato buddhā [bhagavanto] hetukāla eva vinayāya dharmamupadiśanti /
T07hvsatssu:9560: yena karmaṇā savyābādhye loke yathāvaivartinaraka upapadyate /
T07hvsatssu:9561: anyatra ca savyābādhye 'kuśala vipākāyatane samupapadyate yadi vā tiryañca ekatyāḥ pretā vā /
T07hvsatssu:9563: yena karmaṇā avyābādhye loka upapadyate yathā rūpārūpyadhātvoḥ kāmadhātau ca devā manuṣyā ekatyāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:9565: yena karmaṇā samutpadyate savyābādhye 'vyābādhye ca loke yadi vā tiryañcaḥ pretā devā manuṣyā ekatyāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:9567: yat karmalokadvayavigarhitaṃ iha vigarhitamamutra ca vigarhitam /
T07hvsatssu:9568: tat pāpaṃ karma puruṣaḥ kṛtvā tamasi patitaḥ san na yaśaḥ śrutavān bhavatīti kṛṣṇamityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:9575: akuśalakriyā ca gurujaneṣu yanmātāpitṛṣu anyeṣu sajjaneṣu ca /
T07hvsatssu:9576: sattvānāmahitaṃ kṛtvā na kiñcidapi kṛpāṃ karoti /
T07hvsatssu:9577: yathā sattvān hanti samastaṃ taddhanaṃ vāpaharati /
T07hvsatssu:9593: tṛtīyaṃ karma durbalaṃ kuśalākuśalavyāmiśratvāt tadvipākaṃ yugapatpratisaṃvedayate /
T07hvsatssu:9595: (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ- yadakuśalaṃ karma durgatau vipākapratisaṃvedakaṃ tadādyaṃ karma /
T07hvsatssu:9597: yat kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ devamanuṣyeṣu vyāmiśravipākapratisaṃvedakaṃ tat tṛtīyaṃ karma /
T07hvsatssu:9604: sa savyābādhyaṃ kāyasaṃskāramabhisaṃskṛtya savyābādhyaṃ vāksaṃskāramabhisaṃskṛtya savyābādhyaṃ manaḥsaṃskāramabhisaṃskṛtya savyābādhye loke utpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:9605: tatra savyābādhye loka utpannaṃ santaṃ savyābādhyāḥ sparśāḥ spṛśanti iti /
T07hvsatssu:9606: ato jñāyate yat sattvānāṃ kṛṣṇaduḥkhalokotpādakaṃ tadādyaṃ karmeti /
T07hvsatssu:9609: yathoktaṃ sūtre- sukhināṃ manuṣyāṇāmapi santi ṣaṭ sparśā iti /
T07hvsatssu:9610: devamanuṣyairanubhūyamānā viṣayā yena amanorūpā na bhavanti tat dvitīyaṃ karma /
T07hvsatssu:9633: loke ślādhyataraṃ sāsravaṃ kuśalaṃ karma śuklamityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:9641: yadi dṛṣṭa eva dharme vedyate tadā savyābādhavipāko laghurbhavati /
T07hvsatssu:9642: tasya gurutvātkrameṇa kṣipraṃ vā avaivartike narake patati /
T07hvsatssu:9643: trīṇyānantaryāṇi puṇyakṣetraguṇagauravādānantaryāṇītyucyante yaduta saṅghabhedaḥ tathāgataśarīre duṣṭacittena lohitotpādanamarhadvadhaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:9648: (pṛ) anyeṣāmāryajanānāṃ vadha ānantaryaṃ labhate na vā /
T07hvsatssu:9651: yastathāgataṃ tāḍayati na tu lohitamutpādayati sa gurutaraṃ pāpaṃ labhate /
T07hvsatssu:9656: tadā ekasminneva kāye vipākavedanā kṣīyate na vā /
T07hvsatssu:9660: (u) yadyadharmamadharmato jñātvā imaṃ dharmaṃ dharmato jānāti /
T07hvsatssu:9664: yat kaścit buddhātsaṅghaṃ prabhidya ātmānaṃ praśaṃsati mahān śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ pūjya iti /
T07hvsatssu:9673: kecidāhuḥ imāni pañca bhikṣuśatāni pūrvādhvani parān vighnayantaḥ kuśalamūlamārgalabdhāstatpratyayamidānīṃ tadvipākaṃ vindanta iti /
T07hvsatssu:9703: ato madyapānaṃ yaḥ śāsti sa pāpāṅgaṃ labhate /
T07hvsatssu:9721: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yaḥ prāṇātipātanirataḥ sa naraka utpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:9727: bhavāṃstu kevalamāha narakeṣu manuṣyeṣu votpadyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:9728: idānīṃ viśiṣya vaktavyaṃ kiṃ karma narakavipākamātravedakamiti /
T07hvsatssu:9734: śīlabhedinā dṛṣṭibhedinā ca kṛtamakuśalaṃ karma narakāya bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:9741: yathā kaścidakuśalaṃ karma kṛtvā paścātprīyā praśaṃsan na parityaktumicchati /
T07hvsatssu:9750: akuśalasvabhāvena janena kṛtaṃ pāpakarma narakāya bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:9752: sadākuśala karmacāriṇā kṛtamakuśalaṃ karma narakāya bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:9757: yaḥ kāyena śīlaṃ manasā ca prajñāṃ nābhyasyati /
T07hvsatssu:9771: sa gurukaṃ pāpakarma kṛtvā narakavipākaṃ vedayate /
T07hvsatssu:9772: yaḥ pāpaṃ kṛtvā na kuśalaṃ pratiśrayate /
T07hvsatssu:9779: sa duṣparipācanamāhāraṃ bhuṅktvā na paripaktuṃ śaknoti /
T07hvsatssu:9781: yathā kaściccauryaṃ kṛtvā laghutaraṃ gurutaraṃ vā badhyate /
T07hvsatssu:9782: yaḥ sarvakuśalamūlaviviktaḥ yathā hastinā yudhyamānaḥ [tasya] hastaṃ na parirakṣati /
T07hvsatssu:9790: gaṇḍasyāntaḥ srāvavat pāpasya mrakṣaṇe narakaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:9791: yo dīrghakālaṃ cittagatamakuśalaṃ na sahasā niyacchati /
T07hvsatssu:9793: yathā cikitsāyai dattaṃ viṣameva puruṣaṃ hanti /
T07hvsatssu:9796: yathā rāṣṭrapālā bahavo vijñāḥ pūrṇādivadakuśalamithyācāramācarantonyānyapi bahūn śikṣayanti /
T07hvsatssu:9797: yacca kṛtaṃ karma bhūyasā sattvānāṃ byābādhāya bhavati yathā vanadāhādi /
T07hvsatssu:9798: bahūnāṃ śāsanaṃ yena adharme te patanti /
T07hvsatssu:9805: karoti sa tathātmānaṃ yathainaṃ icchanti dviṣaḥ // iti /
T07hvsatssu:9813: yathoktaṃ sūtre- dveṣaḥ pāpīyānapi sunigraha iti /
T07hvsatssu:9815: yat hetupratyayaiḥ pāpaṃ karma karoti tadaṇīyo bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:9816: yaḥ pramādāya vyutsṛṣṭaḥ tena kṛtamaśubhaṃ karma narakāya bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:9817: yo vijñaiḥ paripālito bhavati sa deveṣūtpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:9821: (SSS_262) śāriputraprabhāsvaramāhātmyamavalokyācintayat ayaṃ mahātmā na hantavya iti viśuddhacittena saptakṛtvaḥ śāriputramūrdhvamadho vyavālokayat
T07hvsatssu:9825: yathā cāṅgulimālaḥ pāpakaṃ karma bahukṛtvā mātara[mapi]hantumaicchat /
T07hvsatssu:9826: bhagavān tatkuśalābhijñatvāt tasya vimuktiṃ prāpayati sma /
T07hvsatssu:9829: evamādayaḥ puruṣāḥ akuśalakarmakā api na narake patanti /
T07hvsatssu:9830: ata uktaṃ yaḥ pramādāya vyusṛṣṭaḥ tena kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ karma narakāya bhavatīti /
T07hvsatssu:9834: yaḥ kuśalaṃ kartumagaṇayan mriyamāṇo durutpādakuśalacitto bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:9837: sa pūrvākuśalahetukaṃ mithyādṛṣṭi pratyayañca narake patati /
T07hvsatssu:9841: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantryāvocat- yān sattvān paśyatha kāyikamithyācārān vācikamithyācārān mānasikamithyācārān tān jānīta narakaprekṣakāniti
T07hvsatssu:9858: yathā kaścitkarmavipākamajñātvā śraddhayā ca nānāvākkarma tathā karoti yathā vadanti ayaṃ puruṣo markaṭavadaticapala iti /
T07hvsatssu:9872: evamādyakuśalaṃ vācikaṃ karma kṛtvā yathākarma vipākaṃ vedayate /
T07hvsatssu:9875: yo nāgagaruḍādīnāṃ śaktibalaṃ śrutvā praṇidadhāti sa tatrotpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:9876: uktañca sūtre- yo nibiḍasthāne mriyamāṇaḥ praṇidadhāti vipulaṃ sthānaṃ labha iti /
T07hvsatssu:9878: yaḥ paritarṣito mriyate sa jalārthitayā jaleṣūtpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:9880: vyomāhāt laghu karmāṇi kurvan vyāmiśrakuśalatvāt makṣikālīkṣākṛmikīṭādiṣūtpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:9881: yaḥ parānupadiśan asaddharme pātayati so 'vidvatpada utpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:9905: sa kṛpaṇaḥ yācanāṃ kurvati kasmiṃścit nāstīti vadan anṛtavāditvātpreteṣu patati /
T07hvsatssu:9909: kadaryo 'yaṃ dānacāriṇaṃ paraṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ dānapatiṃ dvipyati /
T07hvsatssu:9911: cirādārabhya kadaryacittavāsanayā na svayaṃ dadāti paramapi niṣedhati /
T07hvsatssu:9912: yatkiñcidasti vihāre saṅghadravyaṃ yajñe ca brāhmaṇadravyam /
T07hvsatssu:9913: (SSS_264) tat kaścit svayaṃ kevalamabhilaṣati na parasya dātumicchati /
T07hvsatssu:9917: yo dānapuṇyavigataḥ sa tadupapattyāyatane vipākālābhī tato yācakādhikṣepakarmaṇo duḥkhaṃ tatraivānubhavati /
T07hvsatssu:9918: ayaṃ kṛpaṇaḥ kṣuttṛṣṇārditaṃ paraṃ dṛṣṭvā nirdayacitto bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:9966: yaḥ pitroḥ pūjyānāñca satkāre svabhiruciko bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:9969: manuṣyeṣu ca yo viśuddhakarmapratyayaḥ sa uttara[kuruṣū]tpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:9972: yaḥ śuklakarma samyagācaran parānapīḍayitvā dhanamādatte dānāya nābhiṣvaṅgāya /
T07hvsatssu:9973: svayañca śīlamācaran na pūrvāparaparivāreṣu śīlaṃ bhedayati /
T07hvsatssu:9983: manuṣyeṣūktavat praṇidhānahetunā ca viśrutadeveṣu sukhavedanāpratyayaṃ kṛtakuśalakarmakāḥ sarve tatra janmagatiṃ praṇidadhati /
T07hvsatssu:9984: yathoktaṃ- aṣṭapuṇyasargasthāne yaḥ karuṇāmuditopekṣāsu viharati sa utpadyate brahmaloke yāvadbhavāgram /
T07hvsatssu:9988: yasya samyak prahīṇāni sa viśuddhataraprabho bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:9996: idaṃ karma narakeṣu preteṣu tiryakṣu deveṣu manuṣyeṣu vā vedyate /
T07hvsatssu:9997: (pṛ) anyāsu catasṛṣu gatiṣu kuśalakarmavipāko vedayituṃ śakyate /
T07hvsatssu:10000: yathā [kaści]darcirnarakādvimukto dūrato vanaṣaṇḍaṃ dṛṣṭvā muditacitta āśu tasmin vane praviśati /
T07hvsatssu:10001: śītavātakampite tasmin vane [yāvat] asitomarāṇi na patanti /
T07hvsatssu:10003: athavā kṣāranadīṃ dṛṣṭvā idaṃ prasannasalilamiti drutagati pradhāvya muhūrtaṃ sukhabhāgbhavati /
T07hvsatssu:10009: ya eṣāṃ saptānāṃ vastunāṃ samagro vā asamagro bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:10019: kecidāhuḥ- rājānaḥ pratipakṣiṇo rājñaḥ śāsanāvasare etadakuśalasaṃvarasamanvitā iti /
T07hvsatssu:10027: (pṛ) kiṃ vadhitasattvāt saṃvaramimaṃ labhate kiṃ vā sarvasattvebhyaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:10029: yathā kaścit śīladhārī sarvasattvebhyaḥ śīlasaṃvaraṃ labhate /
T07hvsatssu:10054: yo bhikṣuḥ parāvṛttendriyaḥ na sa vinaṣṭasaṃvaro bhavati iti /
T07hvsatssu:10056: (pṛ) pañcasu gatiṣu kasyāṃ gatau sattvā akuśalasaṃvarasamanvitā bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:10058: kecidāhuḥ- [tathā nocet] siṃhavyāghrādayaḥ sadā duṣkarmaṇopajīvino 'pi samanvitāḥ syuriti //
T07hvsatssu:10062: (pṛ) asattvākhyebhya imaṃ kuśalasaṃvaraṃ labhate na vā /
T07hvsatssu:10065: kuśalasaṃvaro 'yaṃ trividhaḥ- śīlasaṃvaro dhyānasaṃvaraḥ samādhisaṃvara iti /
T07hvsatssu:10068: ābhidharmikā āhuḥ- asti punaḥ prahāṇasaṃvaro yaduta kāmadhātuvīta[rāgaḥ] tasmin kāle kuśalasaṃvaraṃ labhate /
T07hvsatssu:10071: (pṛ) tīrthikā imaṃ śīlasaṃvaraṃ labhante na vā /
T07hvsatssu:10074: ācāryaḥ śīlamupadiśati adyaprabhṛti prāṇātipātādipāpaṃ mā kuryā iti /
T07hvsatssu:10075: (pṛ) anyāsu gatiṣu imaṃ śīlasavaraṃ labhante na vā /
T07hvsatssu:10076: (u) uktaṃ hi sūtre- nāgādayo 'pi dinamekaṃ śīlamupādadate /
T07hvsatssu:10091: (pṛ) asti ca pratiṣedho vinaye pātakinīcavṛttikabhikṣuṇīdūṣakādayo na bhikṣucaryāṃ śṛṇvanti iti /
T07hvsatssu:10099: (pṛ) kiṃ vadhyādisattvebhyaḥ kiṃ kuśalasaṃvaraṃ labhate kiṃ vā sarvasattvebhyaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:10101: tathā no cet saṃvaraḥ prādeśikaḥ syāt /
T07hvsatssu:10103: ayaṃ tu saṃvara upacīyamāno 'pacīyamāno nirgranthaputradharmasamaśca yaduta śatayojaneṣvantaḥ prāṇātipātādibhyo viratiḥ iti /
T07hvsatssu:10105: ya āha asya puruṣasya vadhādviramāmi na tasya puruṣasyeti /
T07hvsatssu:10116: ekāhorātraṃ vā ekadinamātraṃ vā ekarātrimātraṃ vā ardhadinamātraṃ vā ardharātraṃ vā yathaśakti kālaṃ svīkaroti /
T07hvsatssu:10118: ya āha- āhamekamāsamātraṃ māsadvitayamātraṃ vā ekavatsaramātraṃ vā [śīlaṃ samādada iti] /
T07hvsatssu:10121: (pṛ) yaḥ kuśalasaṃvaraṃ labhate sa punaḥ saṃvarādbhraśyati na vā /
T07hvsatssu:10124: (pṛ) kiṃ pratyutpannasattvebhyaḥ śīlasaṃvaraṃ labhate kiṃ vā traikālikasattvebhyaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:10126: yathā (SSS_269) kaścidatītān pūjyān pūjayitvāpi puṇyaguṇo bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:10133: yathaikasya puruṣasya tathā sarvasattvānāṃ samantādapi pratikṣaṇaṃ sadā pratilābhādapramāṇaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:10153: yasmādayaṃ śīlasaṃvaraḥ sarvasattveṣu sadā pratikṣaṇaṃ labhyate /
T07hvsatssu:10154: tasmāducyate catvāro ratnākarā nārhanti ṣoḍaśīṃ kalāṃ dinamekaṃ saṃvarasyeti /
T07hvsatssu:10168: tadā sampīḍanīyasattvebhya eva kuśalasaṃvaro labhyeta ityayamasti doṣaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:10182: avadātavasanānāṃ kuśaladharmo bhūyasā hīnaḥ mārgasya kāraṇatāmātraṃ karoti /
T07hvsatssu:10186: kecidāhuḥ- eme dharmā ekamupavāsadinaṃ rātriñca bhavanti iti /
T07hvsatssu:10188: bahvalpaṃ śīlaṃ yathā [balaṃ] upādāya ardhadinaṃ vā yāvadekaṃ māsaṃ vā sambhavatīti ko doṣo 'sti /
T07hvsatssu:10191: asatyanyasmin manasā smaran vācā vadati- ahamaṣṭaśīlāni dhārayāmīti /
T07hvsatssu:10198: ya idṛśopavāsasamarthaḥ tasya catvāro mahāratnākarā naikāmapi kalāmarhanti /
T07hvsatssu:10201: bhagavān taṃ vigarhya [avocat]- yaḥkṣīṇāsravaḥ tena hīyaṃ gāthā vaktavyā / yathoktam-
T07hvsatssu:10203: sa pumān puṇyamāpnoti mayā ca sadṛśo bhavet // iti /
T07hvsatssu:10204: yo dinamupavasati sa upavāsapuṇyamupabhuñjānaḥ śakratulyo bhavati /

T07hvsatssu:10211: (u) bhadantā brahmā devā bhagaddraṣṭārastaṃ śāsayitvā grāhayeyuḥ //
T07hvsatssu:10218: adṛṣṭvā adrākṣamiti van [vyavahāre] pṛṣṭo vadati nādrākṣamiti /
T07hvsatssu:10219: dṛṣṭvā nādrākṣamiti brūvan pṛṣṭo vadati- adrākṣamiti /
T07hvsatssu:10224: dṛṣṭvā nādrākṣamiti brūvan pṛṣṭho vadati nādrākṣamiti /
T07hvsatssu:10225: adṛṣṭvā adrākṣamiti bruvan pṛṣṭho vadati adrākṣamiti /
T07hvsatssu:10244: navavidhaṃ karma- kāmadhātupratisaṃyuktaṃ karma trividhaṃ vijñaptiravijñaptirnavijñapti nāvijñaptiriti /
T07hvsatssu:10254: tasmādyanmanasā praṇidhāya paścātkāya[kṛtaṃ] tanmānasaṃ karmāpi cetanetyucyate /
T07hvsatssu:10258: (pṛ) avijñapteḥ kāyajātāyā api kiṃ tāratamyavibhāgo bhaviṣyati na vā /
T07hvsatssu:10304: yathā puṣpaṃ tilaṃ vāsayati na tṛṇavṛkṣādi /
T07hvsatssu:10317: yaduktaṃ bhavatā na tatra vitarkavicārau sta iti /
T07hvsatssu:10319: (pṛ) āryā aparyavasannasaṃyojanaprahāṇā vijñaptikarma kurvanti na vā /
T07hvsatssu:10321: (pṛ) śvādīnāṃ sattvānāṃ [vāg]dhvaniḥ vākkarma bhavati na vā /
T07hvsatssu:10323: yadi vā vyaktalakṣaṇaṃ yadi vāhvānaṃ yadi vā veṇvādi sarvaṃ [tat] vākkarmetyucyate /
T07hvsatssu:10326: ataḥ puruṣāḥ svakāyikaṃ karma paśyanti svavācikaṃ karma śṛṇvanti ca /
T07hvsatssu:10327: manovijñānasamutpannaṃ karma santatyāvicchinnaṃ sat svayaṃ paśyanti śṛṇvanti ca //
T07hvsatssu:10335: (u) pañcaskandhāḥ pratikṣaṇavināśino 'pi punaḥ punaḥ santatyā samutpadyante /
T07hvsatssu:10343: atha vā dṛḍhāsinābhihatya sahasā sattvān hanti /
T07hvsatssu:10355: adattādānamiti yadvastu yatpuruṣasambandhī tat tasmātpuruṣāccauryeṇa gṛhṇāti /
T07hvsatssu:10367: bhūmāvupari gataṃ dravyaṃ paraṃ rājasambandhi syāt /
T07hvsatssu:10369: anāthapiṇḍadādaya āryā api hīdaṃ dravyaṃ gṛhṇanti /
T07hvsatssu:10371: yaḥ svābhāvikadravyasya lābhaḥ na tat cauryam /
T07hvsatssu:10375: yat [yasya] puruṣasya karmahetubalatiśayādhiṣṭhitaṃ tat dravyaṃ tatsambandhi /
T07hvsatssu:10378: (u) bhagavataḥ saṅghasya vā dravye nāsti mamatācittam /
T07hvsatssu:10380: dravyamidaṃ niyamena bhagavataḥ saṅghasya vā sambandhi /
T07hvsatssu:10381: tasya caurye adattādāne vā akuśalacittaṃ samutpannamityataḥ pāpaṃ labhate /
T07hvsatssu:10390: tayā saha kāmacāraḥ kathaṃ na kāmamithyācāraḥ /
T07hvsatssu:10392: yathoktaṃ vinaye- alpavayaskā jāyā yāvadekena śmaśrṛṇāntaritā iti /
T07hvsatssu:10393: (pṛ) yadi kācidasvāminī strī svayamāgatya prārthayate jāyā bhavāmīti /
T07hvsatssu:10418: (pṛ) yadi kaścidvastuviparyayāt adṛṣṭvā vadati adrākṣamiti tasya kathaṃ na mṛṣāvādaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:10424: (pṛ) yathā vastusati sattva utpannasattvasaṃjño vadhapāpaṃ labhate /
T07hvsatssu:10427: natvadṛṣṭe dṛṣṭasaṃjñāmutpādayan na pāpaṃ labhata iti /
T07hvsatssu:10429: ataḥ sattve satyapi sattvasaṃjñāvihīno na labhate pāpam /
T07hvsatssu:10431: asati sattve sattvasaṃjñāvān [vastutaḥ] sattvasyābhāvādapi na pāpaṃ labhate /
T07hvsatssu:10432: sati sattve sattvasaṃjñāvān prāṇātipātapāpaṃ labhata eva /
T07hvsatssu:10453: yat kaścitkaṭu vadati hitakarañca na bhavati parasyopāyāsamātramicchati /
T07hvsatssu:10455: yastu karuṇācittena hitaṃ kurvan kaṭu vadati /
T07hvsatssu:10458: [cikitsārthaṃ] kasmiṃścitkāyadeśe sūcyā vedhanaṃ kaṭvapi na pāpaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:10472: satyavacane 'pi kāle cāhite amūlamanarthamakramaṃ vacanaṃ sambhinnapralāpaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:10475: kintu bhūyasā vākkṛtameva vyavahārataḥ sambhinnapralāpa ityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:10476: anyāni trīṇi vākkarmāṇi sambhinnapralāpasaṃmiśrāṇi bhavanti na vivekabhāgīni /
T07hvsatssu:10478: tadā dvidhā bhavati mṛṣāvādaḥ sambhinnapralāpa iti /
T07hvsatssu:10480: tadā tridhā bhavati mṛṣāvādaḥ paiśunyaṃ sambhinnapralāpa iti /
T07hvsatssu:10488: ato buddhā eva bhagavadvādaprasādhane śraddheyāḥ nānye /
T07hvsatssu:10491: (u) kecidvadanti- puṇyaṃ pāpamavaśyaṃ kāyavāgadhīnaṃ na cittamātrāt iti /
T07hvsatssu:10493: trividhasyāsya mānasakarmaṇo balādutpadyate kāyikaṃ vācikamakuśalakarma iti /
T07hvsatssu:10496: sarveṣāṃ leśānāmakuśalakarmotpādakatve 'pi idaṃ trividhaṃ paraṃ sattvānāmupāyāsakaratvādakuśalakarmapatha ityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:10497: yadi rāgo madhyamo 'varo vā na sa karmapatho bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:10498: rāgo 'yamadhimātraḥ paramadhirajya saṃpīḍecchayā sopāyaḥ kāyikavācikakarmotpādakatvāt rāgerṣyā karmapatho bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:10500: yadi moha eva sarvakleśātmaka ucyata iti matam /
T07hvsatssu:10508: yadi [vā] kaściddhanalābhāyākuśalaṃ karma karoti tadyathā suvarṇakārṣāpaṇāya prāṇinaṃ hanti /
T07hvsatssu:10509: dveṣeṇa vā [akuśalaṃ karma karoti] tadyathā amitraṃ coraṃ vā hanti /
T07hvsatssu:10510: atha vā na dhanalābhāya na dveṣeṇa,
T07hvsatssu:10511: api tu mohabalenaiva parāparāvijñānāt prāṇinaṃ hanti /
T07hvsatssu:10513: rāgato dveṣato bhayato mohataśca durgatiṣu patantīti /
T07hvsatssu:10516: yaducyate bhayata iti tanmohata eva bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:10518: na jñānī yāvadāyurvināśapratyayamapi akuśalaṃ karma karoti /
T07hvsatssu:10520: yat kleśavivṛddhiḥ kāyikavācikarmotpādayati sa kālo 'kuśalakarmapatha ityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:10541: (pṛ) āryāḥ kimakuśalaṃ karma kuvanti na vā /
T07hvsatssu:10544: (pṛ) sūtra uktam- śaikṣā anyān śapamānā āhuḥ samucchinnavṛṣaṇo bhava iti /
T07hvsatssu:10547: ayaṃ kṣīṇāsrava puruṣaḥ prahīṇakleśamūlaḥ cittameva notpādayati /
T07hvsatssu:10555: yadyāryā ihādhvani akuśalaṃ karma kṛtvā durgatau na patanti /
T07hvsatssu:10557: (u) āryāṇāṃ manasi tattvajñāne samutpanne sarve 'kuśalakarmapathā mandā bhavanti yathā dagdhaṃ bījaṃ na punaḥ prarohati /
T07hvsatssu:10558: trīṇi ca viṣāṇi dvividhāni- durgatiprāpakāṇi tadaprāpakāṇīti /
T07hvsatssu:10564: te ca tīkṣṇaprajñāvidyā akuśalaṃ karma kṣapayanti /
T07hvsatssu:10567: kadācid buddhān smṛtvā kadācitkaruṇāṃ smṛtvā kuśalakarmahetubhi[rvā] akuśalebhyo vimuktiṃ labhante /
T07hvsatssu:10573: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yo nityaṃ kāyena śīlaṃ cittena prajñāmabhyasyati sa narakavedanīyaṃ karmābhimukhībhūya laghu vedayate iti /
T07hvsatssu:10576: gurukarmāṇi sarvāṇi na kiñcidupayanti ca // iti /
T07hvsatssu:10579: āryāṇāṃ kuśalaṃ karma sudūragāmi khadira vṛkṣamūlavat /
T07hvsatssu:10581: alpamakuśalaṃ bahukuśaleṣu vartamānaṃ na balavat yathā gaṅgāyāṃ kṣiptamekapalalavaṇaṃ na vikārayati tadrasam /
T07hvsatssu:10586: yathāryāḥ satyapi pāpe na narakaṃ praviśanti /
T07hvsatssu:10594: tadyathā gṛdhro vā kaṅka iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:10598: dvividhasaṃyojanasamanvāgamāddhi durgatau patito yathākarma vipākaṃ vedayate /
T07hvsatssu:10602: yathā pūrvaṃ ṣaṭkarmavarge pratipāditaṃ naraka[vedanīyaṃ] karmalakṣaṇam /
T07hvsatssu:10633: sattvānāṃ vidyamānāḥ sarvā akuśalaparābhavahānipīḍā akuśalaiḥ [karmabhi]reva bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:10635: yathā sainikavyādhādayo nānena karmaṇā bahumānaṃ labhante /
T07hvsatssu:10636: coravadhapratyayaṃ dhanabhānaṃ labhata iti yat bhavata āśayaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:10650: akuśalacārī tamasastamaḥ praviṣṭaḥ pravṛttimārgatritayānna niryāṇaṃ labhate /
T07hvsatssu:10656: kiñcākuśalacārī svakāyaṃ kāmayannapi na vastutaḥ svātmānaṃ kāmayate /
T07hvsatssu:10659: puruṣo 'yaṃ kāyasaṅgataḥ tadyathāmitracoreṇa [saṅgataḥ] svātmana eva duḥkhakārakatvāt /
T07hvsatssu:10663: akuśalakarmacaryā yadyapīdānīṃ nābhivyajyate vipāke tu adhyavasīyate /
T07hvsatssu:10666: yathā vā ṛṇamalpamapi krameṇa vṛddhyā vardhate /
T07hvsatssu:10667: parasya kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ paraḥ sadā na vismarati /
T07hvsatssu:10675: akuśalakarmaphalāt vihāyasā gatvā samudre nimajyāpi na vimuktisthānaṃ labhate /
T07hvsatssu:10679: uktañca sūtre- pramādaḥ śatruvatkuśaladharmān hanti iti /
T07hvsatssu:10681: kiñcākuśalaṃ karma buddhabodhisattvairarhadbhirāryaiḥ pañcabhijñairmaharṣibhiḥ puṇyapāpavedibhiravigītaṃ na bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:10683: paśyāmaḥ khalu pratyakṣamakuśalacittavaipulya eva bhāvavyāmohavikṣepopāyāsādhiduḥkhairvikṛtamukhavarṇaḥ pumānaprīto dṛśyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:10688: triṣu karmasu kiṃ gurutaraṃ- kiṃ kāyikaṃ karma,
T07hvsatssu:10689: vācikaṃ karma kiṃ vā mānasaṃ karma /
T07hvsatssu:10696: yathā kaścidimaṃ sattvaṃ hanmīti cittamutpādya kāyavāgbhyāṃ tatkarma sādhayati /
T07hvsatssu:10707: mānasaṃ karma mahattaramiti cet [tadā] dānapuṇyaṃ labheta /
T07hvsatssu:10714: ācaritā kasmāt sulabhamidaṃ karma tyaktvā durācaraṇaṃ dānādikarma kuryāt /
T07hvsatssu:10725: cittaṃ laghu calaṃ durdamamityato 'kuśalākaraṇaṃ na kiñcit /
T07hvsatssu:10736: uktañca sūtre- kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ karma audārikam /
T07hvsatssu:10743: utpadyamānaṃ vijñaptikarma sarvaṃ kāyavacasā bhavati na mānasakarmaṇā /
T07hvsatssu:10744: yathā parapuruṣanindā avaśyaṃ vākkarmādhīnā mṛṣāvādapāpaṃ gamayati /
T07hvsatssu:10748: jighatsācittaṃ tajjīvitoccheda iti caturbhirvastubhiḥ pāpaṃ sidhyati /
T07hvsatssu:10750: yathā cāha bhagavān- yo bālaka ājanma karuṇāmabhyasyati /
T07hvsatssu:10751: sa kimakuśalaṃ karmotpādayituṃ śankoti akuśalaṃ karma cetayate vā iti /
T07hvsatssu:10752: ato jñāyate kāyikaṃ karmaivotpādayati na mānasaṃ karma iti /
T07hvsatssu:10753: atrocyate / yat bhavānāha- kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ karmaiva gurutaraṃ na mānasam iti /
T07hvsatssu:10757: cittaṃ dharmasya vai mūlaṃ cittaṃ prabhuśca kiṅkaraḥ /
T07hvsatssu:10758: śubhāśubhaṃ tatsmarati vacanaṃ caraṇañca tat // iti /
T07hvsatssu:10762: vinā cittaṃ nāsti kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ karma /
T07hvsatssu:10763: sūtre vacanācca vijñaptikarma kṛtvā niyamena vipākaṃ vedayate /
T07hvsatssu:10768: yathāha sūtram- purāhaṃ saptavarṣāṇi karuṇāsamudācaraṇānneemaṃ lokaṃ saptamahākalpān pratinivartāmīti /
T07hvsatssu:10774: yathā kuśalacārī āyuṣo 'nte mithyādṛṣṭimutpādayan narake patati /
T07hvsatssu:10778: āha- yo lokottarāṃ samyagdṛṣṭimutpādayati sa varṣaśatasahasyāṇi saṃsāre saṃsarannapi na durgatau patati iti /
T07hvsatssu:10780: yathoktamupālisūtre- tīrthiko maharṣiḥ [āgatya vadet] ekena manodaṇḍena nālandaṃ bhasmīkaromīti iti /
T07hvsatssu:10783: yathoktaṃ (SSS_283) sūtre- yo 'yamatra mṛtaḥ sa eva narakaṃ praviśati /
T07hvsatssu:10790: yanmanasā kāyaṃ vācañca niśritya kuśalamakuśalaṃ vā carati tatkāyikaṃ vācikaṃ karmetyucyate /
T07hvsatssu:10792: na tu vinā mānasaṃ karma kāyikasya vācikasya vā vipākaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:10793: ato jñāyate mānasaṃ karma gurutaraṃ na kāyikaṃ vācikam / iti /
T07hvsatssu:10794: yadbhavatoktaṃ kāyikavācikakarmaṇorniyamena satyatvāt yathā pañcānantaryāṇi kāyaṃ vāca[ñcopādāya] kriyanta ityato gurutarāṇīti /
T07hvsatssu:10796: yasmāt cetanā gurvī vastu ca guru tasmātkarma guru /
T07hvsatssu:10799: yathā cittabalamātreṇa saddharmapadaṃ praviśati tathā cittabalenaiva cānantaryapāpaṃ sampādayati /
T07hvsatssu:10802: uktaṃ bhavatā kāye vāk ca karma vastu niṣpādayatīti /
T07hvsatssu:10809: yaduktaṃ bhavatā- vṛthācittotpādamātreṇa nāsti vipāka iti /
T07hvsatssu:10811: yathoktaṃ sūtre- dṛḍhacittamutpādya tadaiva deveṣūtpadyate narake vādhaḥ patati iti /
T07hvsatssu:10813: yaduktaṃ bhavatā- nāpi praṇidhānamātreṇa vastu sādhayatīti /
T07hvsatssu:10819: yathāha bhagavān- santi vividhāni pāpāni kāyikavācikamānasapāpānīti /
T07hvsatssu:10825: yaduktaṃ bhavatā puṇyaṃ pāpañca sulabhaṃ syāditi /
T07hvsatssu:10827: cittabalasya tanutvāt janāḥ sulabhaṃ tyaktvā durlabhaṃ kurvanti /
T07hvsatssu:10831: sattvā avarajñānabalāḥ karuṇādi mānasaṃ karma carituṃ na samarthā ityato (SSS_284)
T07hvsatssu:10836: sa yadi bodhibalayuktaḥ tadā akṣīṇaṃ kuśaladharmaṃ labhetaiva /
T07hvsatssu:10837: yaduktaṃ mānasaṃ karma na kasyacidupakaroti apakaroti vā iti /
T07hvsatssu:10844: yathā kalpādau taṇḍulāni svayamutpadyante puruṣāṇāṃ daśavarṣāyuḥkāle prāpte tatsarvaṃ nābhūta /
T07hvsatssu:10870: yathāha sūtrama- śīlavrataḥ prāṇihitaṃ mano 'nuyāyi bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:10884: yaduktaṃ tvayā- utpadyamānaṃ vijñaptikarma kāyavāgbhyāṃ bhavatīti /
T07hvsatssu:10885: tat sāmānyataḥ pratyuktaṃ yaduta kāyikavācikakarmadharmabhede mānasakarmadharmabhedaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:10886: kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ karma avaśyaṃ vijñāpayitrā sidhyati /
T07hvsatssu:10887: yathā caturbhiḥ pratyayaiḥ siddhaṃ prāṇātipātapāpaṃ na mānasakarma vinā bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:10888: laukikāḥ satvā vadanti kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ karmākuśalaṃ na tathā mānasamiti /
T07hvsatssu:10889: (SSS_285) mānasaṃ karma ca na janeṣūpaprayujyate nāpyupalabhyate 'stīti /
T07hvsatssu:10891: tallakṣaṇatvānmānasaṃ karmaiva gurutaraṃ na kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ vā //
T07hvsatssu:10909: ato vaktavyaṃ kāraṇaṃ kathaṃ jñāyate karmata utpadyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:10912: padārthā nānāviprakīrṇajātaya iti jñātavyaṃ heturapi bhidyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:10913: yathā paśyāmaḥ alakasandukakodravādīnāṃ bhedaḥ tadbījamasamaṃ jñāpayati iti /
T07hvsatssu:10916: kiñca sajjanāḥ śraddhadhante yat karmopādāya kāya upādīyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:10921: yadi karmopādāya śarīramupādīyate tadā tat nivartanīyam /
T07hvsatssu:10926: īśvarādīnāṃ kāraṇatve tu na nivartayituṃ śakyate /
T07hvsatssu:10936: paśyāmaḥ khalu pratyakṣaṃ padārthāḥ karmasambhūtā iti /
T07hvsatssu:10940: ato jñāyate karmataḥ śarīramupādīyate na maheśvarādibhya iti /
T07hvsatssu:10941: laukikāḥ svayaṃ jānanti padārthāḥ karmahetasambhūtā iti /
T07hvsatssu:10945: ato jñāyate karmato vipāko labhyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:10946: janā īśvarādīn kāraṇaṃ vadanto 'pi karmāṇi niśrayante yaduta svadehaṃ khedayanta upavāsādīn svīkurvanti ca /
T07hvsatssu:10949: sarve cāryāḥ śīlādikuśaladharmān niśrayante yato jānanti karmahetorloko 'stīti /
T07hvsatssu:10957: yathā upari vṛkṣe phalaṃ dṛṣṭvā jānanti vṛkṣastaddheturiti /
T07hvsatssu:10959: durgatau mohādayaḥ prabalā iti jñātavyaṃ kleśāḥ durgatikāraṇam /
T07hvsatssu:10968: sajjānānāṃ citte yadyakuśalamutpadyate tadaiva prayatnena nigṛhyate /
T07hvsatssu:10971: tathā nocet yatheṣṭaṃ kuryaḥ idameva paramaṃ sukhamiti /
T07hvsatssu:10972: tadā hatvā sattvānāṃ bhojanaṃ paradravyāpahāraḥ yadi vā parastrīgamanaṃ imānyapi sukhāni bhaveyuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:10982: catussatyajñānāt satyāśrayāḥ kleśā na kadāpi punarudbhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:10988: yathā śuṣkabhūmau bīje ca dagdhe na sarvo 'ṅkuraḥ prarohati /
T07hvsatssu:10989: evaṃ vijñānasthitikṣetre tṛṣṇāsnehānabhiṣyandite karmabīje ca tattvajñānadagdhe nordhvadehāṅkuraḥ prarohati /
T07hvsatssu:10990: vidvānetadvastu prajñāya vijñānasthitikṣetraṃ śoṣayituṃ karma bījaṃ dagdhuñca vīryamadhiṣṭhāya prayatate /
T07hvsatssu:10991: ato jñāyate karma kāyopādānasya pratyaya iti //
T07hvsatssu:11010: yathoktaṃ sūtre- kāmatṛṣṇā bhavatṛṣṇā vibhavatṛṣṇā iti /
T07hvsatssu:11012: sattvā duḥkhābhihatā skandhakāyaṃ parijihīrṣavo vibhavaṃ sukhaṃ manyante /
T07hvsatssu:11014: yathoktaṃ sūtre- aihikaṃ saumanasyamāmuṣmikaṃ saumanasyaṃ ihalaukikasukhavedanā āmuṣmikasukhavedanā ityarthamabhidadhāti iti /
T07hvsatssu:11015: kiñcāha- aihikaṃ daurmanasyamāmuṣmikaṃ daurmanasyaṃ ihalaukikaduḥkhavedanā āmuṣmikaduḥkhavedanā ityarthamabhidadhāti /
T07hvsatssu:11016: yathoktaṃ devatāpraśne- kiṃ nandati putraiḥ putravān /
T07hvsatssu:11026: yathoktaṃ sūtre- samudayasatyaṃ yaduta tarṣaṇaṃ iti /
T07hvsatssu:11046: uktañca sūtre- nirodhaṃ varjayitvā rāgo daurmanasyañca sarve 'kuśalā dharmā iti /
T07hvsatssu:11049: yathocyate dveṣo daurmanasyamiti tadā jñāyate nandiḥ rāga ityupyucyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:11050: ato 'ṣṭādaśamanaupavicāreṣu na kleśā ucyante kevalaṃ vedanā ucyante /
T07hvsatssu:11056: tṛtīyavedanāyāmucyate pṛthagjanā asyā vedanāyā na jānanti samudayaṃ,
T07hvsatssu:11059: na jānanti ādīnavaṃ na jānanti nissaraṇam /
T07hvsatssu:11061: ime pṛthagjanāḥ sadā pañcadharmān tān na jānantītyato 'duḥkhāsukhavedanāyāṃ sadāvidyānuśayaṃ rvanti /
T07hvsatssu:11070: saptānuśayānāmaṅgaṃ dvidhā bhavati- kāmarāgo bhavarāga iti /
T07hvsatssu:11075: asati rāge na janma bhavati ityataḥ pṛthagucyate bhavarāga iti /
T07hvsatssu:11080: pradarśayati ca bhagavān tatra[āpi] bhavaḥ sūkṣmaḥ pravartata iti /
T07hvsatssu:11082: daśākuśalakarmapatheṣu caturṣu bandhaneṣu ca kāmarāga ityākhyā bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:11088: ayaṃ rāgo yadyadhamācaraṇaḥ tadā akuśalarāga ityākhyā /
T07hvsatssu:11092: yadi vā mātṛbhaginīsvasrācāryapatnīḥ pravrajitapatnīṃ svapatnīṃ vāmārgeṇa jigamiṣati /
T07hvsatssu:11101: yadalpadravyasyālpadānaṃ labdhvā priyataraṃ kāmayate na tṛpyati /
T07hvsatssu:11105: ayañca rāgo dvividhaḥ kāmarāgaḥ upakaraṇarāga iti /
T07hvsatssu:11123: yathā kaścit anena vastunā duḥkhito vastvantaraṃ paryeṣate /
T07hvsatssu:11124: yathoktam- sukhī na paryeṣate duḥkhī tu bahu paryeṣate /
T07hvsatssu:11151: tadyathā priyarūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā citte idaṃ [priya]miti vacanaṃ karoti /
T07hvsatssu:11166: yadi vā tadrūpe yadi vākāre yadi vā sparśe yadi vā subhāṣite [mithyāmanaskāramutpādayati] /
T07hvsatssu:11175: yathā śuddhaṃ vastra [mapagatakalaṅkaṃ] samyaṅ malena dūṣyate /
T07hvsatssu:11183: tadyathā gṛdhro vā kaṅko vā iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:11184: aśucyādi vilokya apratihatālambanasya kāmarāgo vegaṃ labhate /
T07hvsatssu:11187: strīrūpādyalambane prīto nimittaṃ gṛhṇāti paricchedañca gṛhṇāti /
T07hvsatssu:11197: kāmarāgasya hitāsvādamātraṃ dṛṣṭvā tadānīnavamajānataḥ kāmarāga utpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:11198: ṛtunā ca kāmarāga utpadyate yathā vasantādayaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:11199: sthānavaśena ca kāmarāga utpadyate yathā kiñcitsthānaṃ yatra cirādārabhya kāmacāro bahuśo 'bhyastaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:11205: pakṣiṇāṃ kalaravaṃ strīṇāṃ sukumārabhūṣaṇarutāni subhāṣitāni vā śṛṇvataḥ kāmarāga utpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:11213: alabdhacittasamādhānasya antaḥ sattvaṃ paśyato bahiḥ rūpādi paśyataśca kāmarāgo bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:11219: (pṛ) kāmarāgasya ke doṣāḥ santīti kāmaḥ prahātavyaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:11233: yathoktaṃ- tṛṣṇāpratyayamupādānaṃ yāvanmahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudaya iti /
T07hvsatssu:11236: kiñcāha- vidyamānāni duḥkhāni bhikṣavaḥ kasmādbhavantīti manasikṛtvā jānīdhvaṃ [tāni] kāmahetukāni /
T07hvsatssu:11238: kiñcāha- kabalīkāre [bhikṣava] āhāre 'sti nandi asti rāgaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:11245: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yathā śvā raktaliptamasthikaṅkālaṃ svādayitvā [sva]lālāyogānmanyate yanmadhura[mida]miti /
T07hvsatssu:11246: tathā rāgyapi nīrase kāme mithyāviparyāsabalena manyate yadidaṃ rasāsvādamiti /
T07hvsatssu:11250: sattvānāṃ kāmarāgapratyayaṃ sukhamalpaṃ duḥkhaṃ bahu kena kim [syāt] /
T07hvsatssu:11251: kāmatṛṣṇāvān sukhahetoḥ sarvaduḥkhānyanubhavati yadutārjanakāle duḥkhaṃ rakṣaṇakāle duḥkhamupabhogakāle 'pi duḥkham /
T07hvsatssu:11252: yathā kṛṣivāṇijyasaṃgrāmarājasevāparicaryādīni arjane duḥkhaṃ hānabhītyā rakṣaṇe duḥkhaṃ,
T07hvsatssu:11254: iṣṭasaṅgame prītiralpā virahe ca duḥkhaṃ bahu /
T07hvsatssu:11256: yathāha bhagavān- kāmatṛṣṇāyāḥ pañcādīnavāḥ- alpāsvādo bahuduḥkhaṃ,
T07hvsatssu:11261: kleśā rāgamupādāya bhavanti yathā kāmarāgāt kleśāḥ sarve samudbhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:11266: yathā kṛṣṇaśuklā gauḥ svayamabaddhā rajjunā paramabaddhā /
T07hvsatssu:11271: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- pūrvā koṭirna [prajñāyate] avidyānīvaraṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ tṛṣṇāsaṃyojanānāṃ sandhāvatāṃ saṃsaratām iti /
T07hvsatssu:11272: api coktaṃ sūtre- rāgaprahāṇādrūpaṃ prahīyate yāvadvijñānaṃ prahīyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:11282: kāmarāgaḥ sadā kusumāramukhataḥ samudācaratītyataḥ paramamakuśalaṃ nāma /
T07hvsatssu:11283: kiñca sattvāścittapramodena kāmarāge pravartante yāvanmaśakapipīlikā[daya]ḥ sarve 'pi āhāramaithunayoḥ pravartante /
T07hvsatssu:11284: sa kāmarāgo nānākāraṇaiḥ puruṣāṇāṃ cittaṃ badhnāti yaduta mātṛpitṛsvasṛbhaginīpatnīsaṃjñā dhanādayaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:11292: yathā rūpāṇāmāsvādādhyavasānamityuktaṃ yaduta rūpaṃ pratītyotpadyate sukhaṃ saumanasyam /
T07hvsatssu:11297: yasmāt sattvāḥ kāmaḥ sukhaṃ dhyānaṃ sukhaṃ samāpattiḥ sukhamiti saṃrajyante /
T07hvsatssu:11300: yathoktaṃ- yasya vairāgyaṃ sa paramaṃ sukhamanuprāpnoti iti /
T07hvsatssu:11301: kiñcāha- yaḥ sarvasukhalābhamicchati tena sarvāṇi kāmasukhāni tyaktavyāni /
T07hvsatssu:11307: yasya cittaṃ rāgatṛṣṇāviviktaṃ tasya sarve duḥkhopāyāsā niruddhāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:11314: unmattavat pramattavacca na jānāti kurūpaṃ surūpam /
T07hvsatssu:11317: kāmarāgo na vijānāti dharmaṃ andhatamasi ajñānavat /
T07hvsatssu:11324: yathoktabhāvanāyogī so 'yaṃ tarati vai tadā // iti /
T07hvsatssu:11334: sākūtasakākusasmitābhilāṣī durlabhakopaḥ sulabhapramodo bhūyasā dayālucittaḥ punaḥ
T07hvsatssu:11341: yathoktaṃ- rūpasukhino [bhikṣavo] devamanuṣyā rūparāgino rūpamuditā rūpavipariṇāme duḥkhacittā viharanti iti /
T07hvsatssu:11343: bhagavān tatra tatra sūtre nānādṛṣṭāntairimaṃ kāmarāgaṃ garhayati yaduta [āśī] viṣopamaḥ,
T07hvsatssu:11366: (u) yaḥ sarvamanityamiti prajānāti na tasya kāmarāgo 'sti /
T07hvsatssu:11367: yathoktaṃ sūtre- anityasaṃjñā [bhikṣavaḥ] bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā tadā sarvaḥ kāmarāgaḥ
T07hvsatssu:11368: paryādīryate sarvaḥ rūparāgaḥ paryādīryate sarvo bhavarāgaḥ paryādīryate sarvāvidyā
T07hvsatssu:11370: yaḥ paśyati loko duḥkhaṃ duḥkhahetuḥ rāga iti /
T07hvsatssu:11372: yo nityaṃ smarati mayā jātijarāvyādhimaraṇānyanubhavitavyānīti sa imaṃ rāgaṃ prajahāti /
T07hvsatssu:11379: kuśalapratyayasampannasya kāmarāgaḥ prahīyate yaduta śīlaviśuddhyā dīnyekādaśasamādhyupakaraṇānīti paścānmārgasatye vakṣyate /
T07hvsatssu:11386: yathā jñāyate rūgṇasya trivastusampannasya tasminneva samaye vyādhiḥ śāmyati iti /
T07hvsatssu:11387: (pṛ) yathoktaṃ sūtre- aśubha[bhāvanayā] rāgaṃ nirvāpaya iti /
T07hvsatssu:11388: kasmāt bhavān bravīti aśubhādi anityatādi ca /
T07hvsatssu:11391: ādau aśubhayā rāgo vāryate paścādanityatājñānena prahīyate /
T07hvsatssu:11392: aśubhayā audariko rāgo 'panīyata itīdaṃ bahūnāṃ jñātameva /
T07hvsatssu:11405: kaścit dveṣī parān nindituṃ daṇḍena tāḍayituñcecchati /
T07hvsatssu:11417: kaścit dveṣī sahasā kiñcit gṛhītvā nānākāraṇai[rna] tyaktumicchati /
T07hvsatssu:11422: kaścit dveṣī hitalābhinaṃ paraṃ dṛṣṭvā citte mātsaryamutpādayati /
T07hvsatssu:11424: kaścit dveṣī sadā kalahapriyo dhṛṣṭamanovāg bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:11427: kaścit dveṣī ciramātsaryeṇa śīlamupadiṣṭo 'pi punaḥ pratilomayati /
T07hvsatssu:11430: kaścit dveṣī kiñcidabhīṣṭasya amanaḥprahlādanasya vastuno lābhe kṣubhitacitto bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:11433: kaścit dveṣī asukumāravacanaḥ sadā bhrukuṭilālaso na manaḥ pūrvamālāpaṃ yojayati /
T07hvsatssu:11439: kaścit dveṣī kāyavāṅmanobhiḥ satīrthyaṃ saṃspṛṣṭopāyāsaṃ karoti /
T07hvsatssu:11442: kaścit dveṣī sadā garhāprakaṭanaprīto vigītavastupriyaśca bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:11445: dveṣo 'yaṃ dvividhaḥ- kadācitsattvamupādāya bhavati kadācidasattvamupādāya iti /
T07hvsatssu:11455: durjanasahavṛttyā vā vyāpāda utpadyate yathā saunikavyādhādayaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:11456: mandajñānabalādvā dveṣa utpadyate yathā vṛkṣāṇāṃ śākhopaśākhā vāteritā bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:11457: cirasamupacitadveṣānuśayasya āniryātanabhāvaṃ dveṣa utpadyate saunikavyādhasarpāṇāmāgamādvā dveṣa utpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:11458: paradoṣānusmṛtipremṇā vā dveṣa utpadyata iti yathā navakleśeṣūktam /
T07hvsatssu:11460: jātyā vā dveṣa utpadyate yathā sarpādīnām /
T07hvsatssu:11464: ātmabuddhimadhyayasya [tatra] mānaparipoṣaṇaṃ padārthādhyavasānañcetyevamādipratyayeṣu satsu dveṣa utpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:11466: (u) uktaṃ sūtre- dveṣaḥ kāmarāgād gurutaraṃ pāpam iti /
T07hvsatssu:11479: sattvāḥ sadā duḥkhinaḥ punardveṣeṇa pīḍitāḥ vraṇe prayuktakṣāravat /
T07hvsatssu:11480: kiñca sūtre bhagavān svayaṃ dveṣadoṣānāha- dveṣabahulaḥ kutsitaḥ kharvākāro 'praśāntabuddhiśayaḥ sadā bhīrucitto janānāmaśraddheya iti /
T07hvsatssu:11483: bhrukuṭikṣepeṇa durabhigamo 'saṃśliṣṭamukhavarṇo durvimokasulabhakopaḥ sadā vyāpādopanāhamudito vigrahabhūṣaṇāyudheṣu prīto durmitrapakṣapātī
T07hvsatssu:11493: (u) yaḥ paragarhādiduḥkhaṃ kṣamate sa kuśaladharmapuṇyaṃ labhate /
T07hvsatssu:11501: yo bhikṣuḥ kṣamāvān sa pravrajyādharmā syāt /
T07hvsatssu:11504: ya ākāraveṣābhyāṃ bhikṣuḥ bhinnavyavahāro dveṣacittasahagataśca na sa bhavyo bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:11508: dveṣakārī parān vyābādhituṃ kāmayānaḥ svātmānameva vyābādhate /
T07hvsatssu:11511: ato jñāyate dveṣo mahāntamātmāpakarṣaṃ karoti iti /
T07hvsatssu:11512: ataḥ prājñenātmano hitaṃ kartukāmena mahadduḥkhaṃ mahatpāpañcāpākurvatā kṣāntirācaritavyāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:11514: (u) yo 'nityatāṃ bhāvayati bahulīkaroti pratibudhyate sarvadharmā kṣaṇikāḥ,
T07hvsatssu:11517: śūnyatācittasya samyak bhāvanayā kṣamamāṇa evaṃ cintayati dharmeṣu vatustaḥ śūnyeṣu ko nindakaḥ ko vā nindāvedaka iti /
T07hvsatssu:11519: ahaṃ satyato doṣavān iti pūrvapuruṣāḥ satyaṃ vadanti,
T07hvsatssu:11524: aśubhanindāṃ śṛṇvan evaṃ cintayet sarve lokā yathākarma vipākaṃ vedayante /
T07hvsatssu:11538: mayā śabdasyāsya nimittagrahaṇādeva daurmanasyopāyāsāḥ sambhavanti ityahameva duṣṭaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:11540: kasmāt dveṣādīni pāpāni na sattvānāṃ doṣāḥ,
T07hvsatssu:11542: yathā bhūtacikitsako bhūtoccāṭanādhyavasito bhūtameva dviṣati na tu rogiṇam /
T07hvsatssu:11546: yathā nindāpaṭavo brāhmaṇādayo buddhaṃ vividhaṃ nindanti /
T07hvsatssu:11549: kiñcedaṃ cintayet lokā akuśabahulā ātmajīvitamahṛtvaiva kaṭukaṃ kurvanti /
T07hvsatssu:11551: kiñcaivaṃ cintayet- aśubhanindādinā na mama duḥkhamiti vedanā kṣantavyā /
T07hvsatssu:11552: yathā bhagavān bhikṣūn śāsti- kāye krakaceṇa vidīrṇe 'pi vedanā kṣantavyā /
T07hvsatssu:11555: nindāyāṃ labdhāyāṃ nirvedaṃ bhūyasā mātrayā suniśritamavagamyākuśalamācarati /
T07hvsatssu:11556: sa jānāti ca nindāyā akṣamā ante duḥkhaṃvipākavedanā ityevaṃ cintayan narake mā bhūt pāta iti gurvīmapi nindāṃ vedayate /
T07hvsatssu:11557: so 'tīva hryapatrapāsāpekṣaḥ cintayati ahaṃ mahāpuruṣasya bhagavataḥ śrāvako mārgabhāvayitā /
T07hvsatssu:11559: kṣānticāribhirbodhisattvaiḥ śakrādibhiśca labhyaṃ kṣāntibalaṃ śrūyate ca /
T07hvsatssu:11567: dharmāṇāṃ samavāyaḥ kevalaṃ prajñaptyā puruṣa ityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:11576: sūtre ca vidyāyā artho vivṛtaḥ- yasya kasyacit jñānaṃ vidyeti /
T07hvsatssu:11587: avidyā tu vikalpinīti na tarupāṣāṇayoḥ samānā /
T07hvsatssu:11589: yathā puruṣasya cakṣuṣā rūpādarśanaṃ nādarśanadharmo bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:11594: pañcaskandheṣu asti pudgala iti mithyākalpanā ghaṭaśakale ca suvarṇasaṃjñotpadyata iti kasmādbhavati /
T07hvsatssu:11599: (pṛ) na vidyā avidyā iti cet idānīṃ vidyāṃ vihāya sarve dharmā abhāvāḥ syuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:11605: evamiyaṃ vidyā savikalpāpi yathābhūtaṃ na prajānātītyavidyetyucyate /
T07hvsatssu:11615: vidyāyā abhāvo 'vidyeti yathā vadanti loke- adho 'rūpadarśī,
T07hvsatssu:11617: viparītā vidyā avidyeti- yathā rātrau sthāṇuṃ dṛṣṭvā puruṣa iti buddhirbhavati /
T07hvsatssu:11625: arhato buddhadharmeṣu vidyā nāstīti vidyāvidyā syāt /
T07hvsatssu:11639: ato jñāyate sarve kleśā avidyā iti /
T07hvsatssu:11644: ato jñāyate avidyāṅgāni sarve kleśā iti /
T07hvsatssu:11662: puruṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā astīti buddheḥ pūrvameva puruṣamanaskāra utpadyate paścānniścaya ityato 'vidyetyucyate /
T07hvsatssu:11672: yathoktaṃ sūtre- avidyānivṛtasya [bhikṣavo vālasya] tṛṣṇāsamprayuktasyaivamayaṃ kāyaḥ samudāgata iti /
T07hvsatssu:11673: siṃha nādasūtre coktam- upādānāni tṛṣṇānidānānīti / gāthā cāha-
T07hvsatssu:11677: pṛthagjanā vedayante [sukhata] imān skandhān pañca [ye] 'śucayo 'nityā duḥkhāḥ śunyā anātmakāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:11678: ya āryāḥ te tān duḥkhān vedayante /
T07hvsatssu:11680: yathoktaṃ sūtre- ātmasaṃjñā mithyāviparyāsa iti prajānato na punarutpadyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:11685: tathā sattvā api dṛṣṭe 'lpāsvādagṛddhā bahūnādīnavān na pratīkṣante /
T07hvsatssu:11686: tīrthikagranthairutpannamithyādṛṣṭikā vadanti na santi puṇyādīni iti /
T07hvsatssu:11692: buddho bhagavān sarvajñaḥ śāstā trayāṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ samyak caryāviśuddha āryavinīta ityādi tīrthikā na vivicya prajānanti /
T07hvsatssu:11698: yathā kalpādau janā āsvādastuccha ityanabhijñāya [tatra] rāgādhyavasāyamutpādayāmāsuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:11700: ato jñātavyamavidyayā sarve lābhāḥ pramuṣitā iti /
T07hvsatssu:11708: yathoktaṃ sūtre- avidyā pāpīyasī gurvī durvimokā ca iti /
T07hvsatssu:11714: karmaṇāmanupacayādvijñānādīnyaṅgāni na punaḥ prādurbhavanti ato jñāyate avidyā sarvaduḥkhānāṃ mūlamiti /
T07hvsatssu:11718: yathā ca māyā mūḍhānāṃ puraḥ pradarśayati mṛdaṃ suvarṇamiti /
T07hvsatssu:11719: prākṛtā mūḍhā dṛṣṭe pāpādhiṣṭhitā abhidhānenollapanīyā bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:11720: tathā lokā api cakṣuṣā aśuci dṛṣṭvā tadvañcitā bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:11729: susthāne prītivigataḥ sajjanadveṣī durjanasnidgho 'bhiprāyasya viparyayagrāhī priyamitre sadā pratikūlaḥ tucchavastuṣu sāragrāhī alpahrayapatrapo na vicikitsāpratīkṣī,
T07hvsatssu:11730: na pareṣāṃ tarpaṇa ātmanāpi durniṣevaṇo mūḍho 'vijñātā sujīrṇamalinavastro bhramati /
T07hvsatssu:11732: ātmanaivātmānaṃ mahāniti ślāghamānaḥ parasya laghūkaraṇe tṛpyati /
T07hvsatssu:11736: apariśuddho 'nairyāṇiko bhāṣaṇe 'paṭuḥ sadā krodhopanāhamuditaḥ paropadeśaṃ viparyayato gṛhītvā [tatra] paramādhyāvasito durlabhamabhyasya suvinaśvaraṃ labhate /
T07hvsatssu:11745: kasmātsūtra uktam- avidyāyā bhaiṣajyaṃ pratītyasamutpādaḥ pratītyasamutpādabhāvanā vā iti /
T07hvsatssu:11747: hetau bhrāntā vadanti- īśvarā dayo lokakāraṇamiti /
T07hvsatssu:11759: yathā ghaṭapadaṃ śṛṇvato manasi saṃśaya udeti kiṃ rūpādiḥ ghaṭaḥ kiṃvā rūpādivyatirikto 'nyo 'sti ghaṭa iti /
T07hvsatssu:11760: evaṃ pañcaskandhātmakaḥ puruṣaḥ kiṃ vā tadvyatirikto 'nyo 'sti puruṣa iti /
T07hvsatssu:11761: samāhitacittaḥ kāya evātmā kāyādanya ātmā iti śāśvatocchadākhye 'ntadvaye na patati /
T07hvsatssu:11762: yaḥ prajānāti ghaṭaḥ pratītyasamutpanno rūparasagandhasparśamaya iti /
T07hvsatssu:11767: nāma sarvamadhvabhāvi nāma bhūyo na vidyate /
T07hvsatssu:11768: ekadharmasya nāmno 'sya sarve dharmā vaśānugāḥ // iti /
T07hvsatssu:11772: api coktam- saṃskārāṇāṃ santatiṃ pañcaskandhānāṃ saṃsaraṇaṃ vadanti /
T07hvsatssu:11774: ukta ñca sūtre- yaḥ pratītyasabhutpādaṃ paśyati sa dharmaṃ paśyati /
T07hvsatssu:11775: yo dharmaṃ paśyati sa buddhaṃ (SSS_307) paśyatīti /
T07hvsatssu:11776: evaṃ yo nāmajaṃ saṃśayaṃ prajahāti so 'parapratyayaḥ paramārthato buddhaṃ paśyati /
T07hvsatssu:11779: saṃkṣepata uktaṃ caturaśītidharmaskandhe- yā kācana prajñā sarvā sāvidyāvyāvartinīti /
T07hvsatssu:11780: avidyā ca sarvakleśānāṃ mūlaṃ sarvakleśānāṃ sahakāriṇī cetyevaṃ pratītyasamutpāda [jñāne] avidyā prahīyate //
T07hvsatssu:11803: yathā sthaviraḥ kṣemaka āha- na khalvāyuṣman rūpamasmīti vadāmi,
T07hvsatssu:11809: api ca ma āyuṣman pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu anusahagato 'smīti mānaḥ asmīticchandaḥ asmītyanuśayo 'samuddhataḥ /
T07hvsatssu:11814: (u) dhyānābhyāse 'lpāsvādalābhāt saṃyojanā nuśayaṃ vyāvartayati na punaścitte samudācarati /
T07hvsatssu:11821: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yo bhikṣuḥ kathayati ahaṃ samuddhatavicikitsaḥ pratilabdhamārga iti /
T07hvsatssu:11822: [tasya] purata evaṃ kathayet- atigabhīraḥ pratītyasamutpādo lokottaradharma iti /
T07hvsatssu:11826: adhimānini buddhā bhagavanto mahākāruṇikā api [taṃ] dūrīkṛtya na dharmāvavādaṃ kurvanti /
T07hvsatssu:11831: tathāyamapi buddhaśāsanārṇavagataḥ alpaṃ dhyānasukhaṃ pratilabhya pāramārthikamārga iti tatrāsaṅgaṃ janayati /
T07hvsatssu:11832: adhimānī ante maraṇakāle na mārgaṃ vedayate /
T07hvsatssu:11844: yat sujane pūjye pṛṣṭhato 'satkāra uddhatamānaḥ saḥ /
T07hvsatssu:11848: yathoktaṃsūtre- ye kecit [śramaṇā brāhmaṇā vā] anityena rūpeṇa [duḥkhena vipariṇāmadharmeṇa] śreṣṭho 'hamasmīti samanupaśyanti /
T07hvsatssu:11849: sadṛśo ['hamasmāti samanupaśyanti] hīno ['hamasbhīti samanupaśyanti] kimanyatra yathābhūtasyādarśanāt /
T07hvsatssu:11856: kaḥ prājña imamapekṣya ucco 'smīti [manyeta] evamādikāyānusmṛtipratyaye tu nāsti mānaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:11857: prājño jānāti sarve sattvā yadi vā daridrī yadi vā dhanī yadi vā pūjyo yadi vā jadhanyaḥ sarve 'pi asthimāṃsasnāyusirāpañcasandhipeśīkalalasamavāyamayakāyāḥ,
T07hvsatssu:11860: ābhyantaraṃ bāhyaṃ cittaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ sarvaṃ kṣaṇikamiti paśyato na bhavati mānaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:11861: cittasamādhiñca samyak bhāvayato na bhavati mānaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:11865: kiñca prājñasya śīlādiṣu satsu na bhavati mānaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:11867: śīlādayo hi sarve eṣāṃ kleśānāṃ kṣayakarāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:11870: kaḥ prājño 'nityena duḥkhena aśucinā padārthena mānaṃ kuryāt /
T07hvsatssu:11875: na tadā mānalakṣaṇamājñāsiṣam ahamiti vedanāvyākaraṇaṃ kutracidutpatsyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:11892: anena rāgeṇa labdho gotrādimānastu vipulaṃ vardhate /
T07hvsatssu:11898: (u) ayaṃ samupāttadhārṣṭyo duḥsahabhāṣaṇo 'satkāracitto 'lpabhayaḥ svairācāramuditaḥ svayañca mahāduḥśāsano yatkiñcijjadhanya[mapi]svayaṃ bahumānī,
T07hvsatssu:11904: śāstramāha- vicikitsā nāma tattvārthe buddhyaviniścaḥ kimasti vimuktiḥ kiṃ vā nāsti /
T07hvsatssu:11908: (pṛ) vṛkṣe saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ sthāṇuḥ kiṃ vā puruṣa iti /
T07hvsatssu:11909: mṛtpiṇḍe saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ mṛtpiṇḍaḥ uta kokila iti /
T07hvsatssu:11910: madhukare saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ madhukaraḥ kiṃ vā jambūphalamiti /
T07hvsatssu:11911: sarpe saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ sarpaḥ kiṃ vā rajjuriti /
T07hvsatssu:11912: ghoṭakamṛge saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ prabhā kiṃ vā salilaṃ iti /
T07hvsatssu:11914: dhvanau saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ mayūrakṛta uta manuṣyakṛta iti /
T07hvsatssu:11915: gandhe saṃśayo bhavati kimutpalagandhaḥ uta saṃparkagandha iti /
T07hvsatssu:11916: rase saṃśayo bhavati kiṃ māṃsarasa uta māṃsābhāsarasa iti /
T07hvsatssu:11917: sparśe saṃśayo bhavati kimautpattikatantava uta paripakvatantava iti /
T07hvsatssu:11919: yathā kimayaṃ dharmo dravyavān uta guṇamātram /
T07hvsatssu:11920: vimastyātmā uta na ityevamādayaḥ kiṃ saṃśayā na santi /
T07hvsatssu:11922: sthāṇurvā puruṣo va ityevamādibhistu na kleśā bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:11923: na ca te punarbhavasya pratyayā bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:11928: pūrvaṃ dvidhāvasthitaṃ padārthaṃ sthāṇuṃ puruṣañca dṛṣṭvā paścāddūrataḥ paśyati (SSS_311)
T07hvsatssu:11929: puruṣādi vastu tadā saṃśeta sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti /
T07hvsatssu:11931: dvidhāśravaṇam- yadi kaścicchṛṇoti asti puṇyaṃ pāpamiti /
T07hvsatssu:11934: dvidhājñānam- yadā deve varṣati nadī samṛddhā bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:11941: adṛśyaṃ vastu yathā vṛkṣamūlaṃ pṛthivyāmadhastāt jala[sthaṃ]vā /
T07hvsatssu:11942: kiñcidavastu adṛśyañca yathā dvitīyaṃ śiraḥ tṛtīyo bāhuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:11950: vimate vastuni yāvadviśiṣṭalakṣaṇaṃ na paśyati tāvatsaṃśayo bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:11956: yathā bodhisattvo bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇo 'vadat vyavasāyena brāhmaṇalabdhaṃ gamīraṃ dharmamabhisametya pratyayān jānan paśyaṃśca prakṣīṇasaṃśayajālo bhaveyamiti /
T07hvsatssu:11958: yathā jñānī saṃskārāṇāṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ śrutvā vijñāya ca nirdhāsyati saṃsāro 'nādirityevamādi /
T07hvsatssu:11960: (u) vicikitsābahulasya laukikaṃ lokottaraṃ sarvaṃ na sidhyati /
T07hvsatssu:11962: sandidghaḥ pumān na kāryaṃ karma karoti /
T07hvsatssu:11970: kiñcāha bhagavān- vicikitsā nāma tamaso rāśiriti /
T07hvsatssu:11971: sa tamaso rāśistrividhaḥ atīto 'nāgataḥ pratyutpanna iti /
T07hvsatssu:11974: vinā bhagavacchāsanaṃ na samyaksamādhimān iti vaktuṃ śakyate /
T07hvsatssu:11976: tadyathāha- aṣṭakādayaḥ pañcābhijñā maharṣayaḥ saṃśayālīḍhā vipannā iti /
T07hvsatssu:11977: saṃśayānasya dānādi kurvataḥ puṇyamavipākaṃ vā syādalpavipākaṃ vā /
T07hvsatssu:11980: tasya puruṣasya cittaṃ sadā vicikitsākaluṣitamityato nāsti kuśalam /
T07hvsatssu:11981: uktañca sūtre- vicikitsitacitto dānaṃ datvā pratyantabhūmau vipākaṃ vedayata iti /
T07hvsatssu:11997: na tasmin samaye cittaṃ nirdhārayati ayaṃ sthāṇurayaṃ puruṣa iti /
T07hvsatssu:11999: mithyādarśanādasti vā nāsti veti vicikitsanna śraddadhate /
T07hvsatssu:12004: samyadgarśanasambhavā śraddhā dṛḍhā bhavati śravaṇasambhavā tu naivaṃ bhavati //
T07hvsatssu:12012: (pṛ) pañcasu skandheṣu ātmeti nāmakaraṇe ko doṣaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:12022: evaṃ bruvataḥ pañcaskandhā eva nityāḥ syuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:12024: tathā sati pañcaskandhā eka eva syuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:12029: ātmīye sati rāgadveṣādayaḥ sarve kleśāḥ samudbhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:12037: ima ātmakalpanayā kāyaśiraścakṣurhastapādasyaudārikaṃ vivekameva na labhante /
T07hvsatssu:12043: yathoktaṃ sūtre- pṛthagjanāḥ śūnyānātmatāṃ śrutvā mahābhītimutpādayanti ātmā na bhaviṣyati /
T07hvsatssu:12045: evaṃ pṛthagjanā yāvatpāmopahataṃ kāyaṃ prārthayamānā na nirvāṇāya prayante /
T07hvsatssu:12049: tuṣṭa āyuḥkṣaye bhoti rogasyāpagame yathā // iti /
T07hvsatssu:12050: ātmāstīti yo vadati sa mithyādṛṣṭau patati /
T07hvsatssu:12051: yadyātmā nityaḥ tadā sukhaduḥkhayorvikāro na syāt /
T07hvsatssu:12052: asati vikāre nāsti puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vā /
T07hvsatssu:12055: svabhāvato vimuktasyāpi nāsti puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ vā /
T07hvsatssu:12060: yo nairātmyaṃ paśyati tasya yātāyātaṃ samucchidyate /
T07hvsatssu:12063: (u) martyo devaḥ pumān strī iti nāmanimittaṃ śṛṇvataḥ saṃjñāvikalpādātmabuddhirutpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:12065: hetvabhāvenātmabuddhirutpadyate yaduta yadyātmā nāsti kaḥ sukhaṃ sukhaṃ vedayet,
T07hvsatssu:12075: tadyathā andha[kalpa]sya śakalādi labdhvā suvarṇamaṇisaṃjñā bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:12078: (pṛ) paśyāmaḥ khalu pratyakṣaṃ rūpakāye keśanakharomādyavayavān pratyekaṃ vibhinnān /
T07hvsatssu:12089: aṇoraṇiyān mahato mahīyān ātmā guhāyāṃ nihito 'sya jantoḥ /
T07hvsatssu:12108: vedanādaya ime rūpe pratibaddhā ityata ucyate rūpa[vān] ātmeti /
T07hvsatssu:12126: tadā eka eva pumān bahvātmā syāt /
T07hvsatssu:12127: rūpādīnāṃ saviśeṣatvāt vaktuṃ śakyaṃ rūpamevā na vedanādaya iti /
T07hvsatssu:12134: lokasatyato 'styātmā paramārthato nāstyātmeti vacanaṃ samyak dṛṣṭiḥ /
T07hvsatssu:12135: paramārthato nāsti saṃvṛtito 'stīti vadan na dṛṣṭau patati /
T07hvsatssu:12137: yathā vyāghrī svapotaṃ mukhenāpaharati atiniṣṭhuragrahaṇe kṣataṃ [bhavediti] atiśithilagrahaṇe bhraṃśo [bhavediti] /
T07hvsatssu:12144: paramārthato nāstīti vadan saṃvṛtito 'stīti ca vadan antadvayaṃ parityajya madhyamāyāṃ pratipadi caratītyākhyāyate /
T07hvsatssu:12151: (pṛ) yo dharmaḥ paramārthato nāsti sa sutarāṃ nāstīti syāt /
T07hvsatssu:12153: (u) sarvairlaukikairvyavahriyate astīti yaduta karma karmavipāko yadi vā bandho yadi vā mokṣa iti /
T07hvsatssu:12156: ime pañcaskandhāḥ śūnyā māyopamāḥ jvālāvacca santānenotpannatvāt /
T07hvsatssu:12159: tadā pṛthagjanā vyāmuhya yadi vā ucchedavāde pateyuḥ yadi vā skandhānāṃ nāstītākathane avineyāḥ syuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:12160: puṇyapāpādikarmabhirbandho vā mokṣo vā na sidhyet /
T07hvsatssu:12169: saṃvṛtyāstīti kathane na tadā punaḥ paramārthato (SSS_317)
T07hvsatssu:12171: uktañca sūtre- yaḥ sarvadharmān niḥsvabhāvān prajānāti sa śūnyatāyāmavatarati /
T07hvsatssu:12173: ato jñāyate pañca skandhā api na santīti /
T07hvsatssu:12176: mahāśūnyatāsūtra uktam- yadidaṃ jarāmaraṇamiti vacanaṃ yadi vāyaṃ puruṣo jarāmaraṇa[-lakṣaṇa] iti vacanaṃ /
T07hvsatssu:12177: yadi vā tīrthikānāṃ vacanaṃ kāya eva jīvaḥ,
T07hvsatssu:12180: kāya eva jīvaḥ anyaḥ kāyo 'nyo jīva itīdaṃ vacane na brahmacaryaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:12181: yaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ ayaṃ puruṣo jarāmaraṇa[lakṣaṇa] iti nairātmyasyābhidhānam /
T07hvsatssu:12182: yaḥ pratiṣedha idaṃ jarāmaraṇamiti tat jarāmaraṇasya vyāvartanam /
T07hvsatssu:12187: kiñcoktaṃ rādhasūtre- rūpaṃ rādha yūyaṃ vikirata vidhamata vidhvaṃsata vikrīḍanakaṃ kuruta [tṛṣṇā]kṣayāya [pratipadyata] tadyathā pāṃsvāgārikāḥ
T07hvsatssu:12194: yadā tu mahāvāte opūyate jalena vā pravāhitaḥ tadā vṛkṣasaṃjñā nirudhyate /
T07hvsatssu:12195: evaṃ yadā vidhvaṃsitāni vikrīḍanakaṃ kṛtāni vikīrṇāni vidhmātāni niruddhāni pañcaskandhalakṣaṇāni,
T07hvsatssu:12197: yathāha sūtram- rādha yūyaṃ [rūpaṃ] vidhvaṃsata vikrīḍanakaṃ kuruta vikirata vidhamata bhāgaśo vidalayata sattvakṣayāya iti /
T07hvsatssu:12198: asmin sūtra uktam- pañcaskandhā anityāḥ sattvaśūnyāḥ na santīti /
T07hvsatssu:12199: pūrvasmin sūtra uktam- pañcaskandhā vikīrṇā niruddhāḥ te dharmaśūnyā bhavanti iti //
T07hvsatssu:12202: dharmāḥ samucchidyante vā śāśvatā vā iti yadidaṃ vacanaṃ tadanta[graha]dṛṣṭirityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:12203: kecidābhidharmikā āhuḥ- yadā kaścidāha ātmā śāśvato vā aśāśvato veti iyamevāntagrahadṛṣṭiḥ na sarve dharmāḥ[śāśvatā vā aśāśvatā vā] iti /
T07hvsatssu:12205: dṛṣṭaṃ khalu pratyakṣaṃ [yat] bāhyaṃ vastu samucchidyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:12212: asti ca nāsti ca karma paraṃ maraṇādityatra yadastīti sa śāśvata[vādaḥ] yannāstīti sa ucchedavādaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:12214: (pṛ) ayaṃ caturtho graho na dṛṣṭiḥ syāt /
T07hvsatssu:12217: uktañca sūtre- ṣaṭ sparśāyatanāni nirudhyante santyanyānīti śāśvatavādaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:12219: ātmā pūrvamakarot paścātkariṣyatīti yaddarśanaṃ sā śāśvatadṛṣṭiḥ ātmā pūrvaṃ nākarot paścānna kariṣyatītīyamucchedadṛṣṭiḥ /
T07hvsatssu:12220: api cāha mithyādṛṣṭisūtram- puruṣasya saptakāyāḥ pṛthivyaptejovāyavaḥ sukhaṃduḥkhaṃ jīvitamiti /
T07hvsatssu:12222: kiñcāha- kṣureṇa ca krakacena prāṇino hatvā [eka]māṃsapuṃñca kuryāt nāsti [tato nidānaṃ]pāpaṃ [nāsti pāpasyāgama] iti /
T07hvsatssu:12225: asti paralokaḥ yaḥ kārakaḥ sa eva vedaka iti yadvacanam /
T07hvsatssu:12228: (u) yena hetunā bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāditi vadanti tato nidānaṃ śāśvatadṛṣṭirbhavati /
T07hvsatssu:12229: yena hetunā na bhavati tathāgataḥ paraṃ maraṇāditi vadanti tato nidānamucchedadṛṣṭirbhavati /
T07hvsatssu:12237: kathaṃ vaktavyaṃ [yathā] kṣīṇāsravo 'rhan kāyasya bhedā [ducchetsyati vinaṃkṣyati] na bhavati paraṃ maraṇāditi /
T07hvsatssu:12249: ato jñāyate nocchedo na śāśvata iti /
T07hvsatssu:12250: kāyādanya upalabhyata ityato naikaḥ kāyena bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:12252: pañcaskandhāḥ punaḥ santanyanta ityataḥ sattvo jāyate mriyata iti vaktameva na prabhavati /
T07hvsatssu:12253: santānena pravṛttatvādanya iti na vaktuṃ śakyate /
T07hvsatssu:12255: (SSS_320) ime skandhāste skandhāścānya ityabhidhānāt śāśvatavādo na bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:12256: svasantānapratyayabalena pravartata ityata ucchedavādo na bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:12259: vastutaḥ satsu dharmeṣu nāstīti cittotpādanaṃ mithyādṛṣṭiḥ /
T07hvsatssu:12260: yathā vadanti na santi catussatyāni trīṇi ratnānītyādi /
T07hvsatssu:12268: na santi śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ samyaggatāḥ samyak pratipannā ya imaṃ lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ
T07hvsatssu:12269: svayamabhijñāya sākṣātkṛtya pravedayanti- kṣīṇā me jātiruṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ
T07hvsatssu:12272: iṣṭhaṃ iti vedokto devānāṃ kṛte yāgaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:12276: sukṛtaduṣkṛtakarmaṇāṃ [phalaṃ] vipākaḥ ihalokaśubhāśubhakīrtyādiḥ devakāyādayaḥ pāralauke vipākaśca /
T07hvsatssu:12283: sattvānāṃ saṃkleśo vyavadānaṃ jñānadarśanamajñānadarśanam- idaṃ sarvamahetukam /
T07hvsatssu:12286: saṃkṣipyedaṃ brūmaḥ- yadviparyayacittaṃ sarvaṃ tanmithyādṛṣṭiḥ iti /
T07hvsatssu:12296: abhidharme yāḥ pañcadṛṣṭayaḥ brahmajālasūtre ca dvāṣaṣṭidṛṣṭayaḥ sarvā[stā] mithyādṛṣṭayo bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:12303: laukikāḥ padārthā ahetukā apratyayā iti yadvadanti /
T07hvsatssu:12304: yadi vā vadanti īśvarādihetukā na tṛṣṇāhetukā iti /
T07hvsatssu:12315: atha vā manyante buddhaḥ puruṣāṇāṃ pūjyo nāsti puruṣa ityato nāsti [sa] buddha iti draṣṭavyam /
T07hvsatssu:12317: samyakcaryayā taddharmapratilābhino na santītyato nāsti saṅghaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:12322: kṛpaṇastu dhanika ityādibhiḥ nāsti kāraṇairvadanti dattamiti /
T07hvsatssu:12328: yadi jīvo nityaḥ tadā nāsti sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtam /
T07hvsatssu:12330: nāsti paro loka ityato nāsti sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ,
T07hvsatssu:12335: maraṇātparaṃ na bhavati pratītyasamutpāda ityato vadanti nāsti paro loka iti /
T07hvsatssu:12342: dharmāṇāṃ kṣaṇikatvāt mātā pitā ca kiṃ karoti /
T07hvsatssu:12348: tadā cakṣuṣā paridṛśyamāno 'yaṃ kāyaḥ khanyamāno mṛdbhavati /
T07hvsatssu:12352: akāyātmaka ityayaṃ dvividho yadi cittātmako yadi vā cittavyatirikta iti /
T07hvsatssu:12362: sa kṣudhitaḥ sarvān dṛṣṭvā annaṃ prārthayate /
T07hvsatssu:12375: paśyāmaḥ khalu sarve sattvāḥ prajñaptikāraṇakā iti /
T07hvsatssu:12377: paśyāmaśca sarvān sattvān karmakāraṇatantrān na svatantrān /
T07hvsatssu:12378: ato vadanti nāsti balaṃ nāsti vīryaṃ [nāsti] ca tatphalamiti /
T07hvsatssu:12382: vadanti ca dharmā nirudhyamānāḥ punaḥ paramāṇavo bhavantīti /
T07hvsatssu:12397: asti punaḥ sattvo yena śucīkriyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:12400: skandhānāṃ santānena pravṛttiṃ dṛṣṭvā ekalakṣaṇaṃ gṛhṇāti /
T07hvsatssu:12406: brahmā svayamāha- ahamasmi mahābrahmā prabhurdevānāṃ kartā jagata ityevamādi /
T07hvsatssu:12407: kecidāhuḥ- yadi kaścitpañcakāmānāṃ sukhavedanāsampannaḥ ayamutkṛṣṭa dharma iti /
T07hvsatssu:12408: kecitpunarāhuḥ - yadi kaścidviraktaḥ prathamadhyāna[mārabhya]yāvaccaturthadhyānamupasampadya viharati ayamutkṛṣṭa dharma iti /
T07hvsatssu:12414: kecittasmin anutkṛṣṭasaṃjñāmutpādya vadanti- ayaṃ kṣatriyaḥ alpakālikaśikṣāmārgaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:12415: buddhavacanañca na cāṭukāvya[vat] kleśagurukaṃ na vedasadṛśam /
T07hvsatssu:12422: śīladhāraṇa brahmacaryamātra āsajya devapūjādayaśca [vyavadānamārga ākhyāyeta] īśvara [prasādena] ca viśuddhiṃ labhata iti ca vadanti /
T07hvsatssu:12425: punaḥ prayataḥ snātvā brahmayajñapaṭhanatadūrdhvabhojanaṃ viśuddhimārga iti /
T07hvsatssu:12428: yat dharmā lokasatyataḥ santo 'pi abhāva ityucyante /
T07hvsatssu:12429: abhāve bhāvasaṃjñeti yaducyate santi dravyāṇi astyavayavīti /
T07hvsatssu:12445: (u) sarve doṣā vipattivyasanāni ca mithyādṛṣṭyā bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:12446: sa āha- nāsti pāpaṃ nāsti puṇyaṃ sukṛtaduṣkṛtānāṃ phalaṃ vipāka iti /
T07hvsatssu:12447: ato dṛṣṭadharma eva na santi suvṛttāni /
T07hvsatssu:12451: yathoktaṃ ṣaṭpādābhidharme- krimipipīlikāhananaṃ puruṣahananād gurutaram iti /
T07hvsatssu:12452: sa mithyādṛṣṭikaḥ puruṣaḥ lokadūṣakaḥ satvānāṃ bhūyasāpakārāya pravartate /
T07hvsatssu:12454: tena kṛtaṃ kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ mānasaṃ karma sarvamaśubhavipākāya bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:12455: yathoktaṃ sūtre- mithyādṛṣṭikasya [bhikṣavaḥ] puruṣapudgalasya yatkāyakarma yathādṛṣṭisamāttaṃ
T07hvsatssu:12456: samādattaṃ yacca vākkarma........yacca manaḥkarma yā cetanā yā prārthanā yaḥ praṇidhiḥ
T07hvsatssu:12457: ye ca saṃskārāḥ sarve te 'niṣṭāya akāntāya amanāpāya ahitāya duḥkhāya saṃvartate /
T07hvsatssu:12458: tadyathā tiktakālābubījaṃ koṣātakībījaṃ picumandabījamādrāyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ nikṣiptaṃ
T07hvsatssu:12459: yaccaiva pṛthivīrasamupādīyate yaccāporasaṃ tejorasaṃ vāyurasamupādīyate sarvaṃ tat
T07hvsatssu:12462: evameva mithyādṛṣṭikasya puruṣapudgalasya cittacaitasikā dharmā aniṣṭāya [akāntāya (SSS_325)
T07hvsatssu:12465: atastasya puruṣapudgalasya kṛtamapi dānādi neṣṭaphalaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:12470: asya puruṣapudgalasya nāsti sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtamityato na yataḥ kutaścitprativiratiḥ /
T07hvsatssu:12473: yaśca vadati nāsti sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ veti sa sadā citte 'kuśalameva kāṅkṣate /
T07hvsatssu:12483: tathā ca pudgalo madhyamadeśa utpanna iṣṭāniṣṭavivekāya ṣaḍindriyasampanno 'pi na mārgapratilābhapravaṇo bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:12488: yathā karmavarge narakavimocakaṃ karma ityanena kāraṇena tatpuruṣakṛtaṃ sarvaṃ narakāya saṃvartate /
T07hvsatssu:12489: na ca sa pāpakamakuśalaṃ karma kṣapayati /
T07hvsatssu:12493: samucchinnakuśalamūlasya hi yadā kuśalaṃ na pravartate tadanantaraṃ narakānnaiva vimuktiḥ /
T07hvsatssu:12494: citte mithyādṛṣṭikatvāt tasya kuśalamūlaṃ kathaṃ pravarteta /
T07hvsatssu:12502: abhūtavastuni idameva satyamanyanmithyeti vacanaṃ dṛṣṭiparāmarśa ityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:12505: (u) sa puruṣo nyūnaguṇaṃ labdhvā ātmānaṃ pūrṇaṃ manyate /
T07hvsatssu:12513: yathāndho ghaṭaśakale suvarṇasaṃjñāmutpādya cakṣuṣmatāṃ laghu hāsyo bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:12515: yat kaścit bodhimupekṣamāṇaḥ snānādiśīlena viśuddhiprāptiṃ kāṅkṣate tat śīlavrataparāmarśa ityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:12520: (u) ye doṣā uktā dṛṣṭiparāmarśasya “nyūnaṃ vastu [labdhvā] sampūrṇaṃ manyate ityādinā ta eva doṣāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:12525: yathoktaṃ sūtre- govratikaḥ saṃsiddha[vrata]ḥ [kāyasya bhedātparaṃ maraṇāt] gavāṃ sahavyatāmupapadyate /
T07hvsatssu:12538: kasmāt ya ādito nācarati tasya mārgacaraṇaṃ sukaram /
T07hvsatssu:12540: śatrurapi (SSS_327) na tathā pudgalaṃ glapayati yathā mithyādṛṣṭiḥ /
T07hvsatssu:12542: na hi śatrustathā pudgalaṃ paribhāvayati yathā mithyādṛṣṭayanugāmināṃ tīrthikācaritānāṃ nānāduḥśīlānāṃ nagnatānirlajjatābhasmarajaḥkāyatākeśolluñcchanādīnāṃ samādānam /
T07hvsatssu:12546: sukhaṃ prārthayitvā duḥkhaṃ labhamāno vimuktiṃ prārthayitvā bandhaṃ labhamānaḥ puruṣaḥ kiṃ na mattaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:12549: tasya puruṣasya mithyācāracāritvāt dānāya kāyajīvite satyapi na kiñcana hitaṃ bhavati //
T07hvsatssu:12562: yadasantaṃ guṇaṃ khyāpayati tena janā vadanti astīti /
T07hvsatssu:12564: lābhasatkārāyādbhutaṃ prakhyāpya pareṣāṃ manaḥprahlādinī vāk lapanā /
T07hvsatssu:12565: paradravyalipsayā tallipsāmupagūhya vadati idaṃ vastu sundaramityādi /
T07hvsatssu:12567: yadetatpuruṣanindāyai anyaṃ stauti- tava pitā vyavasāyī tvantu neti /
T07hvsatssu:12569: yat dānena dānaṃ prārthayamāno vadati- idaṃ dānavastu amukātpatyantāllabdhamityādi /
T07hvsatssu:12571: yat puruṣasya nidrāvyādhau niratiḥ sā tandrītyucyate /
T07hvsatssu:12573: yat puruṣasya kāyasya jṛmbhaṇā adamanaṃ styānamiddhasya pratyayaḥ sā vijṛmbhikā /
T07hvsatssu:12578: yo mahāmātrāṇāṃ vacanaṃ na satkaroti na bibheti /
T07hvsatssu:12591: trayaḥ kleśā sāvānāṃ cetasi bhūyasā vartante /
T07hvsatssu:12593: sarveṣāmavītarāgāṇāṃ maśakapipīlikāparyantānāmime trayaḥ kleśā eva cittavartinaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:12599: yasya nāsti mohaḥ na tasya rāgadveṣau /
T07hvsatssu:12602: santi ca tisra eva vedanā na punarasti caturthī /
T07hvsatssu:12603: āsu tisṛṣu vedanāsu trayaḥ kleśā anuśayā bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:12610: yathoktaṃ sūtre- sukhavedanīyasparśaṃ labhamānasya bhavati prītiḥ /
T07hvsatssu:12617: tadā [khalvasya] tatra bhavati nirvāṇasaṃjñā vā vimuktisaṃjñā vā aduḥkhāsukhasaṃjñā vā ātmasaṃjñā vā /
T07hvsatssu:12619: (pṛ) anuśayāḥ kiṃ dharme 'nuśerate ki vā sattve 'nuśerate /
T07hvsatssu:12641: ayamanuśayo yadi prahīṇo yadi vāprahīṇaḥ sa ālambanataḥ saṃprayogataśca /
T07hvsatssu:12646: ato jñāyate sattvamātre 'nuśayo na dharma iti /
T07hvsatssu:12657: sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ rāgo 'nuśaya iti sūtroktaṃ virudhyeta /
T07hvsatssu:12659: vaktavyaṃ khalu sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ samutpanno rāgaḥ sattve 'nuśeta iti /
T07hvsatssu:12662: (u) saṃjñānusmaraṇavikalpaprītyādinā rāga utpadyate na tu rūpādimātrāt /
T07hvsatssu:12664: yathā vadanti- sukhī na prārthayate duḥkhī tu bahu prārthayate /
T07hvsatssu:12667: duḥkhasya pīḍanātmakatvāt puruṣasya sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāmeva rāga utpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:12671: ata ucyate sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ rāgānuśaya iti /
T07hvsatssu:12672: tāsu triṣu vedanāsu trayaḥ kleśā anuśayā ityatastraya evocyante //
T07hvsatssu:12675: (pṛ) sūtra uktam- traya āsravāḥ- kāmāsravo bhavāsravo 'vidyāsrava iti /
T07hvsatssu:12677: (u) kāmadhātāvavidyāṃ varjayitvā anye sarve kleśāḥ kāmāsravā ityucyante /
T07hvsatssu:12685: (u) vastuta āsravā dvividhāḥ satyadarśanaheyā [ye] āsravāṇāṃ mūlabhūtāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:12694: (pṛ) catvāra oghāḥ kāmaugho bhavaugho dṛṣṭyodho 'vidyaugha iti /
T07hvsatssu:12696: (u) dṛṣṭimavidyāñca varjayitvā tadanye kāmadhātukakleśāḥ sarve kāmaugha ityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:12713: kiñcittīkṣṇendriya evaṃ cintayati- yadi jīvo nityaḥ tadā aduḥkhasukhavikāraḥ,
T07hvsatssu:12716: (pṛ) catvāro granthāḥ abhidhyākāyagrantho vyāpādaḥ kāyagranthaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśaḥ kāyagranthaḥ idaṃ satyābhiniveśaḥ kāyagrantha iti /
T07hvsatssu:12722: yaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśakaḥ kāmayate anena śīlavratena viśuddhiṃ labheya iti /
T07hvsatssu:12727: catvāra ime granthā avaśyaṃ kāyavāṅmayā iti kāyagrantha ityucyante /
T07hvsatssu:12728: kecidāhuḥ- catvāra ime dharmā jananamaraṇe saṅgra 'thnantīti granthāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:12729: (pṛ) pañca nīvaraṇāni- kāmacchando vyāpādaḥ styānamiddhaṃ auddhatyakukṛtyaṃ vicikitsā ceti /
T07hvsatssu:12733: īrṣyādayaḥ kleśāḥ kaśāśastrādiduścaritāni ca kāmacchandādutpadyante iti /
T07hvsatssu:12736: styānamiddhena kiñcidviśramya punā rāgadveṣavikṣiptacitto na dhyānasamādhiṃ labhate /
T07hvsatssu:12738: aśuddhakarmakasya puruṣasya citte sadā daurmanasyakaukṛtyaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:12745: kecit teṣāṃ nīvaraṇānāṃ varjanāya vadanti- idaṃ kuśalamidamakuśalamiti /
T07hvsatssu:12746: sa tatra vicikitsate kimasti kiṃ vā nāstīti /
T07hvsatssu:12748: eṣu pañcasu nīvaraṇeṣu trīṇi dṛḍhabalānīti kevalaṃ nīvaraṇamityucyante /
T07hvsatssu:12749: anye dve nīvaraṇe tanubale iti dvau dharmau sāṃsargikau /
T07hvsatssu:12750: ime dve nīvaraṇe jananakāraṇasahite ityataḥ sāṃsargike ityucyeta /
T07hvsatssu:12753: auddhatyakaukṛtyasya catvāro dharmāḥ pratyayāḥ- jñātivitarko janapadaḥvitarko 'maraṇavitarkaḥ,
T07hvsatssu:12765: pañcāvarabhāgīyeṣu saṃyojaneṣu kāmacchando vyāpādaḥ śīlabrataparāmarśaḥ avaragamanārthatvādavarabhāgīyāni /
T07hvsatssu:12766: tadyathā govratikaḥ saṃsiddhaḥ kāyasya bhedātparaṃ maraṇāt (SSS_333)
T07hvsatssu:12785: tāni śaikṣajanānāṃ citta ucyante na pṛthagjanānām /
T07hvsatssu:12786: (pṛ) auddhatyaṃ kasmāt rūpārūpyadhātukaṃ saṃyojanaṃ na kāmadhātukam /
T07hvsatssu:12790: keṣāñcit rūpe ārūpye ca vimuktisaṃjñā bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:12796: [tatra] āvāsamātsaryam- ahameva atra vasāmīti nānyān prayojayati /
T07hvsatssu:12799: lābhamātsaryamiti- ahamevātra dānaṃ lapsya mānyebhyaḥ prayacchatu iti /
T07hvsatssu:12818: mātsaryacittena dātarguṇaṃ pratigrahīturdeyañca samucchedayatītyato gurutaraṃ pāpaṃ labhate /
T07hvsatssu:12820: tadyathā jātyandhasya sapatnabahulānāñca janma na svātantrayaprāpakam /
T07hvsatssu:12822: triṣu adhvasu daśasu dikṣu [gatānāṃ] buddhānāṃ śatruḥ san saṃsāre saṃsaran sadā mūḍho bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:12832: yathoktaṃ sūtre- santyāvāsamātsaryasya pañca doṣāḥ- anāgatasya subhikṣorāgamanāya necchati /
T07hvsatssu:12841: lābhamātsaryasya pañca doṣāḥ- sadā sambhārasambhavāya klamati /
T07hvsatssu:12844: varṇamātsaryasya pañca doṣāḥ- anyeṣāṃ varṇaṃ śrutvā vyākulakaṣāyacitto bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:12848: sarveṣāṃ mātsaryāṇāṃ sāmānyata ime doṣāḥ santi- prabhūtadhanasañcayaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:12854: pañca cetaḥ khilāḥ- [ihāyuṣmanto bhikṣuḥ] śāstari vicikitsate,
T07hvsatssu:12859: varṇavādī, tasmin jane anāttamanā āhatacitto bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:12861: śāstari vicikitsaka evaṃ cintayati- kiṃ śāstā mahān,
T07hvsatssu:12863: dharme vicikitsaka [evaṃ cintayati] kiṃ śāstuḥ pravacanamutkṛṣṭamuta vedasyeti /
T07hvsatssu:12866: śikṣāyāṃ vicikitsate kiṃ mānapānādi dharmo nirvāṇaṃ gamayati uta neti /
T07hvsatssu:12867: anāttamanā āhata [citto] vyāpādabuddhyā bhayagauravacittaṃ vinā sajjanān garhayati /
T07hvsatssu:12874: sa ca bālo mūḍho 'jño na tathāgatadharmānyadharmayorvivekaṃ prajānāti /
T07hvsatssu:12879: na ca vedadīn granthān śṛṇoti adhyeti vā /
T07hvsatssu:12881: adhvanyadhvani bahulamithyāvicikitsaḥ sadā kaluṣitacittatayā śāstrādau vicikitsate /
T07hvsatssu:12883: sa ca mithyādṛṣṭibahulaiḥ puruṣaiḥ samānakṛtyatayā vicikitsate /
T07hvsatssu:12884: kiñca vedavyākaraṇādīni mithyādṛṣṭisūtrāṇyadhīyānaḥ paribhinnasamyakprajño bhavati ityato vicikitsate /
T07hvsatssu:12885: dharmāṇāṃ [yathāśrute] 'rthe prītaḥ kusmṛtiṃ janayan na sūtrakṛdāśayaṃ labdhuṃ śaknoti /
T07hvsatssu:12886: ato vicikitsate sarvadā svahitālābhapratyayataḥ śāstrādiṣu vicikitsate /
T07hvsatssu:12887: pañca cetaso vinibandhāḥ- yaḥ kāyo 'vigatarāgo sa kāya āsajyate /
T07hvsatssu:12895: abhilāṣāvyākulatayā āryavacane upaśamapradarśane dharme na prahṛṣyati /
T07hvsatssu:12896: ataḥ śīlabāhuśrutyadhyānasamādhyādiṣvalpaṃ hitaṃ vastu labdhvā tenātmānaṃ pūrṇaṃ manyate /
T07hvsatssu:12899: (SSS_336) ayaṃ yadyaṣṭākṣaṇavihīnaḥ [saḥ] puruṣakāyaṃ duṣkaraṃ labdhvavānityataścittaikāgryeṇa vīryamārabheta /
T07hvsatssu:12901: asya samagrasya pratyayasya vigame 'nye pratyayā bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:12911: (u) sūtra uktaṃ- pṛthagjano viṃśatidhā svacittaṃ nigṛhyaivaṃ cintayet- mama vibhinnākāraveṣamātrasya vṛthā,
T07hvsatssu:12929: naivāsti sukhalayaḥ kṛtayoḥ kuśalākuśalayornaiva vismṛtirvināśo vā āmaraṇaṃ na dānto bhaviṣyāmi iti /
T07hvsatssu:12948: evaṃ krameṇa santatyā vardhata ityanuśaya ityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:12949: (pṛ) ayamanuśayaḥ kiṃ cittasamprayuktaḥ kiṃ vā cittaviprayuktaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:12955: saumanasyamidaṃ yadi sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ vartate [tadā] rāgānuśaya ityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:12962: uktaṃ hi sūtre- bālānāṃ maithunacittameva nāsti /
T07hvsatssu:12967: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- satkāyadṛṣṭisamucchede 'nuśayāḥ sahaiva samucchidyante iti /
T07hvsatssu:12970: tathā nocet āryamārgeṇa kasya samucchedaḥ syāt /
T07hvsatssu:12972: pṛthagjanāḥ śaikṣajanāśca yadā kuśalacitte 'vyākṛtacitte ca vartante /
T07hvsatssu:12989: yathā ca caturdinajvarārto dinadvaye [jvarā]nudbhave 'pi jvarārta ityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:12994: yaducyate bhavatā nāsti cetanā nāsti vikalpaḥ vijñānasyamālambanamasti iti /
T07hvsatssu:12996: yadāha bhavān- satkāyadṛṣṭiranuśayena saha samucchidyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:13009: yathā kaścinmāsavarjanadharmamasamādāno māṃsamabhuñjannapi na varjitamāṃsa ityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:13024: mithyājīvo [yena] māyāśāṭhyādayaḥ pañcadharmāḥ puṣṭiṃ labhante sa mithyājīvaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:13028: vinaye yatpratiṣiddhaṃ tena ca svātmajīvanaṃ mithyājīvaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:13036: mārgāvacara evaṃ cintayet- bhagavataḥ śāsane 'vatāro mārgācaraṇārthaḥ na (SSS_339)
T07hvsatssu:13049: evaṃ cintayati- ahamanena śīlena svarga utpatsya iti /
T07hvsatssu:13067: śīlavrataparāmarśaḥ sthūladarśana ityato bahūnāṃ satvānāṃ gocaraḥ /
T07hvsatssu:13083: anena kāraṇena ca daridrāṇāṃ nīcānāṃ kutsitānāmatejasvināñca sthāne patanti /
T07hvsatssu:13098: yathā kasyacitsvata utkṛṣṭavastulābhinaṃ putrameva paśyataścittaṃ duṣprītikaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:13107: (pṛ) daśakleśamahābhūmikadharmāḥ tadyathā aśrāddhayaṃ kausīdyaṃ muṣitasmṛtitā vikṣepo 'vidyāsamprajanyamayoniśomanaskāro mithyādhimokṣa auddhatyaṃ pramādaśca /
T07hvsatssu:13118: ato jñāyate na sarvakleśacitteṣu te daśa dharmāḥ santīti /
T07hvsatssu:13129: sūtra uktam- mahābrahmā brahmakāyikānāmantryāha mā bhavanto śramaṇaṃ gautamamupasaṅkramantu /
T07hvsatssu:13133: uktañca sūtre- [atha khalu kevadhaṃ] mahābrahmā taṃ bhikṣuṃ bāhau gṛhītvā ekamantamapanayitvā
T07hvsatssu:13134: taṃ bhikṣumetadavocat- ahamapi na jānāmi yatremāni catvāri mahābhūtānyapariśeṣāṇi nirudhyante iti /
T07hvsatssu:13139: īdṛśānāṃ pāpakānāṃ kleśānāṃ sattvāt jñātavyamasti ca [tatrā] akuśalamiti /
T07hvsatssu:13140: kecidābhidharmikā āhuḥ- mātāpitrupādhyāyācāryādiṣu yo rāgaḥ sa kuśalarāgaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:13147: yanmānaṃ niśritya mānaṃ samucchedayati ayaṃ kuśalamānaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:13150: kiñcāhurābhidharmikāḥ- yaḥ kuśalaḥ na [sa] kleśo bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:13167: varaṃ saṃśaya eva pātayati na mithyādṛṣṭāvatārayati /
T07hvsatssu:13180: ato jñāyate tṛṣṇayā sarve bhavasantānāṃ bhavantīti /
T07hvsatssu:13190: (u) ime sarve dvidhāpi bhavanti satyadarśanaheyā bhāvanāheyāśceti /
T07hvsatssu:13191: kenedaṃ jñāyate yathā nāthaputrādayo bhagavacchrāvakān satkāralā bhino dṛṣṭvā īrṣyācittamutpādayamāsuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:13197: yathā srotaāpannasya narakapatanapratyayaḥ aṣṭamaloke kāyavedakamāyā ca satyadarśanaheyāpi /
T07hvsatssu:13198: (pṛ) kleśeṣu kati duḥkhadarśanaheyāḥ kati samudayanirodhamārgadarśanaheyāḥ kati bhāvanāheyāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:13199: (u) pūrvoktāḥ satyadarśanaheyāḥ ṣaḍanuśayāścaturdhā bhavanti duḥkhadarśanaheyāḥ samudayanirodhamārgadarśanaheyāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:13215: yogī samudayasambhūtaṃ duḥkhaṃ dṛṣṭvā ucchedadṛṣṭiṃ vyāvartayati /
T07hvsatssu:13219: ato duḥkhaṃ paśyan prajānāti- śīlaṃ duḥkhaṃ,
T07hvsatssu:13231: (pṛ) rāgo māno mithyādṛṣṭiṃ varjayitvā anyāścatasro dṛṣṭayo duḥkhadaurmanasyendriye varjayitvā [tadanya]trividhendriyasamprayuktāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:13238: paścādapi vakṣyate pañcasu vijñāneṣu nāsti kleśa iti /
T07hvsatssu:13240: mātsaryantu na tathā ityatra nāsti hetuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:13242: evaṃ māno na daurmanasyendriyasamprayukta ityatrāpi nāsti hetuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:13245: samudayasatya[darśana]heyāśca mithyādṛṣṭidṛṣṭiparāmarśavicikitsā rāgapratighamānaviprayuktāvidyāśca ime sarvatragānuśayā anye 'sarvatragānuśayāḥ
T07hvsatssu:13265: yathā kāmadhātukakleśārūpadhātvālambanāḥ tathā rūpadhātukādṛṣṭayādayaḥ kleśā api kāmadhātvālambanāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:13269: rāgaḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇālambano 'pi caturo devān tadadhastanāṃśca saṃkleśayati /
T07hvsatssu:13270: yathāha dīrghanakhasūtram- sarvaṃ kṣamata itīdaṃ saṃrāgāya /
T07hvsatssu:13277: uktaṃ hi sūtre- īdṛśīṃ dṛṣṭimutpādya īdṛśaṃ vastu vadati yadasti jīva ityādi /
T07hvsatssu:13283: tathā no cet satkāyadṛṣṭyādayo 'pi pañcasu vijñāneṣu varteran /
T07hvsatssu:13285: cakṣuṣā rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā vadati ahaṃ paśyamīti /
T07hvsatssu:13288: kathamucyate pañcasu vijñāneṣu na kleśāḥ santīti /
T07hvsatssu:13292: manovijñāne hi vidyamānaṃ vikalpakāraṇaṃ na pañcasu vijñāneṣu /
T07hvsatssu:13293: ato jñāyate pañca vijñāneṣu na santi kleśā iti //
T07hvsatssu:13296: (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ- kleśā navavidhā- adhamamadhyamottamā adhamādhamādhamamadhyamādhamottamā madhyamādhama madhyamamadhyamamadhyamottamā uttamādhamottamamadhyamottamottamā iti /
T07hvsatssu:13306: karmakaro hastena paraśumādāya cakṣuṣā muṣṭipradeśaṃ dṛṣṭvā yānyaṃśasahasrāni pratidinaṃ kṣīyamāṇāni tānyagaṇayanannapi kṣīṇamātraṃ dṛṣṭvā prajānāti idaṃ kṣīṇamiti /
T07hvsatssu:13307: tathā sa bhikṣurapi mārgacaryāṃ bhāvayan kānyadya kṣīṇāṇyāsravasahasrāṇi kāni hyaḥ kṣīṇānyāsravahasrāṇīti agaṇayannapi kṣīṇamātre prajānāti kṣīṇa āsrava iti /
T07hvsatssu:13308: ato jñāyate 'pramāṇai jñānaiḥ kleśāḥ kṣīyanta natvaṣṭha nava vā iti /
T07hvsatssu:13309: (pṛ) kaṃ samādhiṃ niśritya kaḥ kleśa prahīyate /
T07hvsatssu:13311: yathoktaṃ sūtre bhagavatā- prathamadhyānamupādāyāsravāṇāṃ kṣayo yāvadākiñcanyāyatanamupādāyāsravāṇāṃ kṣaya iti /
T07hvsatssu:13312: tāni saptapratiśaraṇāni vināpi āsravāṇāṃ kṣayaṃ karoti /
T07hvsatssu:13314: ato jñāyate kāmadhātukasamādhiṃ niśrityāpi āsravakṣayaṃ pratilabhata iti /
T07hvsatssu:13319: (pṛ) pūrvaṃ prathamadhyānādvītarāgaḥ kiṃ krameṇa dvitīyadhyānādīn prāpnoti kiṃ vā ekakālameva /
T07hvsatssu:13324: yathā ca yāmyā devāḥ pariṣvaṅge kāmaṃ sādhayanti /
T07hvsatssu:13325: tuṣitā devāḥ pāṇiṃ gṛhītvā kāmaṃ sādhayanti /
T07hvsatssu:13327: paranirmitavaśavartino devā ākāraṃ dṛṣṭvā kāmaṃ sādhayanti /
T07hvsatssu:13338: (u) yathā satyadarśanaheyāḥ sarve kleśā nirodhasatyadarśanena prahīyante /
T07hvsatssu:13341: ūṣmadharmādārabhya anityādyākāraiḥ pañcaskandhalakṣaṇāni bhāvayitvā ādau praheyāḥ kleśā nirodhadarśanena kṣīyante /
T07hvsatssu:13350: (pṛ) [nanu] sūtra uktam- pañcaskandhānanityādinā bhāvayitvā srotaāpattipalaṃ yāvadarhatphalaṃ vindate iti /
T07hvsatssu:13356: ayaṃ rūpanirodha iti sarvadā mama paśyato dharmaṃ vijānataḥ kleśāḥ prahīyanta iti /
T07hvsatssu:13361: ato jñāyate skandhānāṃ nirodhaṃ paśyataḥ kleśāḥ kṣīyanta iti /
T07hvsatssu:13368: ato jñāyate 'saṃskṛtālambano mārga eva kleśān prajahātīti /
T07hvsatssu:13384: yat satvā viśuddhaṃ paramaṃ nirvāṇasukhamupekṣante pratyutātitucchaṃ kāmasukhaṃ bhavasukhaṃ kāmayante tadidaṃ sarvaṃ kleśānāṃ doṣaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:13415: yathoktaṃ bhagavatāsūtre- yaḥ pratilabdhavidyaḥ sanyastāvidyaḥ sa kiṃ pāpakaṃ karma puṇyaṃ karma āneñjyañca karma karoti na vā /
T07hvsatssu:13418: ato jñāyate prajñaptyanuyāyī kevalaṃ karmāṇi karotīti /
T07hvsatssu:13419: anāsravaṃ cittaṃ na prajñaptimavalambata iti na karmāṇi karoti /
T07hvsatssu:13425: anāsravaṃ cittañca na caryālakṣaṇamityato nāstyanāsravaṃ karma /
T07hvsatssu:13428: ato jñāyate vidyamānaḥ kāyaḥ kleśahetu[ka] iti /
T07hvsatssu:13435: ato jñāyate kleśaiḥ sahaiva sarve jāyanta iti /
T07hvsatssu:13436: pratyakṣaṃ paśyāmaḥ khalu sattvā bahavo varcaḥkuṭyādiṣu prasūyante na tu śilādiṣu /
T07hvsatssu:13443: mriyamāṇā dūrato narakaṃ dṛṣṭvā idaṃ padmasara iti tadāsaṅgāttatrotpadyante /
T07hvsatssu:13444: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yo nibiḍitasthāne vipulaṃ sthānaṃ labheyamiti mriyate sa pakṣiṣūtpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:13446: yaḥ śītārto mriyate sa tapananarake jāyate /
T07hvsatssu:13449: ya āhārāsaktaḥ sa kuṇapeṣu kīṭo jāyate /
T07hvsatssu:13463: muhūrtaṃ daṇḍe viramatyapi [cakram] bhramatyeva na tu śāmyati /
T07hvsatssu:13470: evaṃ jñānāgninā vijñānasthitiṣu dagdhāsu na vijñānabījaṃ prarohati /
T07hvsatssu:13478: arhatastveṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ vaikalyānnāyatyāṃ kāyo bhavati iti jñātavyaṃ kleśapratyayā kāyavedaneti /
T07hvsatssu:13481: ato jñāyate vigatakleśo nopapatiṃ vedayata iti /
T07hvsatssu:13489: bhavatoktaṃ yathā daśanaṃ paścātkrameṇa bhavati tathā kleśā apīti /
T07hvsatssu:13493: yathā dagdhaṃ bījaṃ na punaḥ prarohati /
T07hvsatssu:13494: pratyakṣaṃ khalu loke 'smin kleśajaḥ kāya iti /
T07hvsatssu:13497: ato jñāyate āyatyāṃ pañcaskandhā api kleśajā iti /
T07hvsatssu:13507: jñātavyamime sattvā avaśyaṃ pūrvābhyāsasañcitamaithunarāgādikleśā ityatasteṣūtpadyanta iti /
T07hvsatssu:13513: tebhyaḥ pāpebhyo dṛṣṭa eva badhabandhanādiduḥkhamanu bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:13521: kleśavivṛddhyā durgatau patati sa eva pāpakāyamanubhūya kleśān punarvardhayati /
T07hvsatssu:13532: teṣāmeva mahatvato duḥsthāne janmānuvartate yathā sūkaraśvādayaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:13533: alpakeśatvataḥ susthāne jāyata iti yathā [kaścit] kleśatanutvāt dānaśīlādikarmācaran ṣaṭsu kāmadeveṣūtpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:13538: paśyāmaḥ khalu sattvā kudeśabhūmau ratā durjanaiḥ saha kutsitamadhivasantīti sarvamāsaṅgādbhavati /
T07hvsatssu:13543: śalabhā ime na jānanti agnirduḥkhasparśa ityatastatra patanti /
T07hvsatssu:13548: yathā ca kaścit kāmāsaktyā viprakṛṣṭāṃ vidiśaṃ gacchan na pratinivartate /
T07hvsatssu:13550: yathā vṛkṣasya mūle 'nunmūlite sa vṛkṣaḥ punaḥ prarohati /
T07hvsatssu:13553: yathāpi mūle 'nupadrute dṛḍhe cchinno 'pi vṛkṣaḥ punareva rohati /
T07hvsatssu:13554: evamapi tṛṣṇānuśaye 'nuddhṛte nirvartayati duḥkhamidaṃ punaḥ punaḥ // iti /
T07hvsatssu:13556: svato 'vidyāṃ vinā ko jñānī tat vyayaduḥkhaṃ kāmayamāno vedayeta /
T07hvsatssu:13568: yathā viṣasarpasampūrṇe gṛhaprakoṣṭhe 'prajvalite ca dīpe sukhādhyavasānaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:13570: tathā sattvā api avidyāyāṃ satyāṃ loke 'bhiramante /
T07hvsatssu:13575: prārthanā hi dvividhā- kāmaprārthanā bhavaprārthanā iti /
T07hvsatssu:13582: bhavapratyayā jātiriti jñātavyaṃ kleśāḥ kāyasya mūlamiti /
T07hvsatssu:13602: catasro jātayaḥ- aṇḍajo jarāyujaḥ saṃsvedaja upapāduka iti /
T07hvsatssu:13606: ato jñāyate catvāro jātivibhāgāḥ kāmatṛṣṇādhīnā iti /
T07hvsatssu:13607: catasraḥ kāyavedanāḥ- kaścidātmaghātako na paraghātaka ityādayaścatasraḥ /
T07hvsatssu:13610: catasro vijñānasthitayaḥ- rūpopagaṃ vijñānaṃ tiṣṭhat rūpapratiṣṭhitaṃ rūpārambaṇaṃ nandyupasevanam /
T07hvsatssu:13650: kleśā vedanāniśritā ityataḥ pañca vedanā indriyāṇi bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:13658: [te] sarve kleśānāṃ nirodhāya bhavanti jñānī taddhitaṃ dṛṣṭvā tān skandhānupāśrayate /
T07hvsatssu:13666: evaṃ kleśānāṃ kramaśo nirodhātkāyo 'pi kramaśo nirudhyate /
T07hvsatssu:13670: draṣṭavyamavaśyaṃ rāgādipratyayamidānīmāyatyāñca glānyupāyāsān labhanta ityato 'vaśyaṃ [teṣāṃ] prahāṇaṃ prārthayante /
T07hvsatssu:13678: bhagavānāha- tatra tatra sūtre nandirāgakṣayātsamyagvimuktiṃ labhata iti /
T07hvsatssu:13697: śāstramāha- trividhacittānāṃ nirodho nirodhasatyaṃ yaduta prajñapticittaṃ dharmacittaṃ śūnyatācittam /
