T07hvsatssu:13705: (u) skandhānupādāya ye vikalpā tadyathā pañcaskandhānupādāya puruṣa ityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:13710: evaṃ skandheṣu satsveva bhavati sattveti saṃvṛtiḥ // iti /
T07hvsatssu:13711: yathā ca bhagavān bhikṣūnavocat- dharmā anityā duḥkhāḥ śūnyā anātmānaḥ pratītyasamutpannā aniyatasvabhāvā nāmamātramanusmaraṇamātraṃ bhogamātram
T07hvsatssu:13712: imāneva pañcaskandhānupādāya nānā nāma pravartate sattvo manuṣyo deva ityādi iti /
T07hvsatssu:13714: kiñcāha bhagavān- dve satye paramārthasatyaṃ saṃvṛtisatyamiti /
T07hvsatssu:13725: buddhā bhagavanto laukikānāṃ prajñaptito viyojanāya lokasatyena vyavaharanti /
T07hvsatssu:13729: purā kila janā vastūpabhogakāmanayā vahuvastunāmutpattikāle ghaṭa ityādi nāma sthāpayāñcakruḥ /
T07hvsatssu:13736: na patati mithyādṛṣṭau sukhānte duḥkhānte ca /
T07hvsatssu:13740: anena dharmeṇa taccittaṃ damayitvā mārgaśāsanaṃ grāhayitvā paścātparamārthasatyamupadiśati /
T07hvsatssu:13741: evaṃ jinaśāanamādāvagādhagabhīram- tadyathā mahāsamudraḥ kramaśo gabhīraḥ /
T07hvsatssu:13743: yo mārgasya lābhajñānaṃ sādhayati [sa] paramārthadharmopadeśārho bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:13744: yathā bhagavata evaṃ cetaḥ parivitarka udabhut- paripavkāḥ khalu rāhulasya [bhikṣoḥ] vimuktiparipacanīyā dharmāḥ yannūnamahaṃ rāhulaṃ uttara āsravānāṃ kṣaye vinayeyamiti /
T07hvsatssu:13745: tadyathā ghrāṇapākaḥ tadvināśe sukhaṃ janane durbhedanam /
T07hvsatssu:13746: evaṃ lokasatyena cittaṃ damayitvātha paramārthajñānena vināśayati /
T07hvsatssu:13747: uktañca sūtre- dharmāṇāṃ pravicayapūrvakaṃ nirvāṇaṃ parijñātavyamiti /
T07hvsatssu:13748: yogī pūrvaṃ dharmāḥ [kiṃ] prajñaptisantaḥ [kiṃ vā] paramārthasanta iti jñātvā paścānnirodhasatyaṃ sākṣātkaroti /
T07hvsatssu:13760: yathoktaṃ sūtre- lokasamudayaṃ paśyataḥ nāstīti dṛṣṭirna bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:13761: lokanirodhaṃ paśyataḥ astīti dṛṣṭirna bhavati iti /
T07hvsatssu:13763: lokasatyato bhagavataḥ śāsanaṃ sarvaṃ satyameva yaduta astyātmā nāstyātmā ityādi paryāyāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:13768: asti vastutaḥ sattva iti yā dṛṣṭiḥ ayaṃ mahāmohaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:13776: jananamaraṇavedakaḥ sattvo nāstīti vacanaṃ hi mithyādṛṣṭiḥ /
T07hvsatssu:13777: yadi śūnyatābuddhipratilābhī vadati nāsti sattva iti /
T07hvsatssu:13779: yathoktaṃ sūtre- arhantī bhikṣuṇī pāpīyāṃsaṃ māramavocat-
T07hvsatssu:13780: kiṃ nu sattva iti pratyeṣi māradṛṣṭigataṃ nu te /
T07hvsatssu:13790: (u) yasya puruṣasya śūnyatātattvajñānaṃ notpannaṃ tasyāstyātmeti matirbhavati /
T07hvsatssu:13792: yathāha bhagavān- ye bālāḥ pṛthagjanāḥ śūnyo nāstyātmā,
T07hvsatssu:13793: na punaḥ karoti iti śrutavantaḥ te mahābhītā bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:13795: ato jñāyate apratilabdhaśūnyatājñānaḥ astyātmeti matyā nirvāṇādbibheti /
T07hvsatssu:13799: apratilabdhaśūnyatātattvo nāsti kiñcanetidṛ ṣṭyā durgatau patati yadutocchedadṛṣṭi[rūpa]mithyādṛṣṭiḥ /
T07hvsatssu:13800: yo 'yaṃ lokasatyato 'styātmeti prajñāya asti karmaphalamiti śraddadhānaḥ paścāt saṃskārā anityā utpattinirodhalakṣaṇā iti bhāvayitvā nirodhaṃ sākṣātkaroti /
T07hvsatssu:13802: sa yadi nāsti kiñcaneti vacanaṃ śṛṇoti /
T07hvsatssu:13805: kecittīrthikā apavadanti śramaṇo gautamaḥ paramārthata ātmānaṃ dūṣayatīti /
T07hvsatssu:13806: ato bhagavānāha- lokasatyato vadāmi asti sattva iti /
T07hvsatssu:13807: samyagdṛṣṭiṃ prakāśayan vadāmi santi sattvāḥ sandhāvantaḥ saṃsaranta iti /
T07hvsatssu:13820: yathā citritaḥ pradīpaḥ pradīpa ityukto 'pi na pradipavṛttiko bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:13821: evaṃ ghaṭo 'stīti kathito 'pi na vastusan bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:13822: santi pañcaskandhā ityuktā api na paramārthāḥ //
T07hvsatssu:13825: (pṛ) kathaṃ ghaṭādayaḥ prajñaptitaḥ santi na vastutaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:13827: yathā vadanti idaṃ rūpaṃ idaṃ ghaṭarūpamiti /
T07hvsatssu:13845: yathā vedanā na vedayate vijānāti ca /
T07hvsatssu:13859: yathā kaścidaśvaṃ dṛṣṭvā vadati- aśvaṃ paśyāmīti /
T07hvsatssu:13875: manovijñānamapi sattvādau vikṣipati yaduta kāyaḥ sattvaḥ cittaṃ sattva iti /
T07hvsatssu:13876: evaṃ rūpādaya eva ghaṭa athavā rūpādivyatirikto ghaṭa ityādi /
T07hvsatssu:13877: paramārthavacane tu cittaṃ samādadhāti na vikṣipati /
T07hvsatssu:13878: rūpaṃ paśyāmīti [vat] śabdamapi paśyāmīti na vaktuṃ śakyate /
T07hvsatssu:13883: rūpādayo dharmā jñeyādāvanabhidheyā iti na vyapadiśyante /
T07hvsatssu:13890: yaḥ kāyavāṅmanobhiḥ kuśalaṃ karoti sa vidvān /
T07hvsatssu:13900: yathāha bhagavān- vidvān mūḍhaśca sarvaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vedayate /
T07hvsatssu:13909: yathāha- [kṣipraṃ] dharmaṃ vijānāti vijño jihvā sūparasaṃ yathā /
T07hvsatssu:13922: rūparasagandhasparśānupādāya hi ayaṃ ghaṭa iti vyavahāraḥ /
T07hvsatssu:13924: (13) prajñaptau ca bhavati saṃśayaḥ yathā sthāṇurvā puruṣo vā iti /
T07hvsatssu:13925: rūpādiṣu tu na saṃśayo bhavati rūpaṃ vā kiṃ vā śabda iti /
T07hvsatssu:13926: (pṛ) rūpādāvapi saṃśayo bhavati kimasti rūpaṃ kiṃ vā nāsti rūpamiti /
T07hvsatssu:13928: rūpaṃ paśyan naiva saṃśete ayaṃ śabda iti /
T07hvsatssu:13929: anyasmāt kāraṇāt saṃśayo bhavati kimasti rūpaṃ kiṃ vā nāsti rūpamiti /
T07hvsatssu:13930: yathā rūpaṃ śūnyamiti śrutvā punā rūpaṃ paśyan saṃśete kimasti kiṃ vā nāstīti /
T07hvsatssu:13932: (pṛ) nirodhasatye 'pi saṃśayo bhavati kimasti nirodhaḥ kiṃ vā nāsti nirodha iti /
T07hvsatssu:13933: (u) abhiniviṣṭeṣu saṃśayo bhavati na tu nirodhasatye /
T07hvsatssu:13934: asti nirodha iti mataṃ nāsti nirodha iti matañca yaḥ śṛṇoti tasya bhavati saṃśayaḥ kimasti kiṃ vā nāstīti /
T07hvsatssu:13937: nirodhasatyaṃ paśyato na punaḥ saṃśayo bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:13952: snehadveṣādivikalpo yaḥ kaścana sa sarvaḥ prajñaptisan /
T07hvsatssu:13958: pradāhyate ityādi yā kācana kriyā sarvā sā prajñaptisatī /
T07hvsatssu:13965: prāṇātipātādi pāpaṃ prāṇātipātaviratyādi puṇyaṃ sarvaṃ na paramārthasat /
T07hvsatssu:13979: tathā śūnyatayā yat khaṇḍanaṃ tattu paramārthasat /
T07hvsatssu:13990: anirvacanīyatvam- rūpādaya eva vā ghaṭaḥ kiṃ vā tadvayatirikto ghaṭa iti na nirvaktuṃ śakyate /
T07hvsatssu:13997: (u) ekatvavāde doṣo yaduta rūpādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ pratyekaṃ vibhaktam /
T07hvsatssu:14005: (pṛ) yathā ekaikaṃ tilaṃ na kalāpaṃ sādhayati /
T07hvsatssu:14020: ato jñāyate rūpādaya eva na pṛthivīti /
T07hvsatssu:14021: laukikā vadanti- pṛthivīrūpaṃ pṛthivīgandhaḥ pṛthivīrasaḥ pṛthivīsparśaṃ iti /
T07hvsatssu:14022: na paśyāmo rūparūpamiti vadantaṃ yaṃ kañcana /
T07hvsatssu:14023: anyadharmalakṣaṇenāvaśyaṃ pradarśyate- yathā amukasya puruṣasya kuṭīti /
T07hvsatssu:14030: tathāpi svātmarūpeṇaiva svātmapradarśanaṃ [iti vadataḥ] ko doṣaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:14031: (u) yadyucyate pṛthivī rūpādinā svātmānameva pradarśayatīti nāyaṃ nyāyo bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:14035: śilāpuruṣasya hasta iti pradarśane tadanyaḥ kāyaḥ śilāpuruṣa iti syāt /
T07hvsatssu:14038: tasmin samaye śilāpuruṣa eva na punastadanyo 'stītyucyate /
T07hvsatssu:14039: yathā bhagavānāha- santyasmin kāye keśā romāṇi raktaṃ māṃsaṃ ityādi /
T07hvsatssu:14042: ato jñāyate śilāpuruṣa iti vacanamapi mṛṣāvacanam, iti /
T07hvsatssu:14051: rūparasagandhasparśavatī pṛthivī iti tu vaktuṃ śakyate /
T07hvsatssu:14067: na (SSS_363) syāt rūpamātre pṛthivīṃ paśyāmīti pṛthivīsaṃjñā /
T07hvsatssu:14072: yathā kaścid vṛkṣaśākhāṃ chindan vadati- vṛkṣaṃ chindāmi,
T07hvsatssu:14080: yathā pūrvamuktaṃ- śabdo rūpādivyatiriktaḥ kṣaṇikaḥ santānapravṛttaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:14082: ato jñāyate na sarvāṇi bhautikāni śabdavantīti //
T07hvsatssu:14104: ato jñāyate na pṛthak santi pṛthivyādayo dharmā iti /
T07hvsatssu:14108: kāyendriyeṇa spṛṣṭvāpi jānīmaḥ ayaṃ ghaṭa iti /
T07hvsatssu:14115: na hyandhakāre vivecayati ghaṭo vā jighrayate kapālaṃ vā /
T07hvsatssu:14116: ghaṭo vā rasyate kapālaṃ vā iti /
T07hvsatssu:14117: (u) yadyapi na vivecayati kiṃ ghaṭa uta kapālamiti /
T07hvsatssu:14121: tadā dṛṣṭvā spṛṣṭvā vā na nirdhārayati kimayaṃ ghaṭa śarāvaḥ kiṃ vā ghataśakalamiti /
T07hvsatssu:14122: ato jñāyate cakṣurindriyaṃ kāyendriyañca na ghaṭaṃ gṛhṇīyāt iti /
T07hvsatssu:14123: andhakāre ghaṭabuddhirutpannāpi na vivecayati suvarṇaghaṭo rajataghaṭo vā iti /
T07hvsatssu:14124: ato jñāyate cakṣurindriyaṃ kāyendriyamapi na ghaṭaṃ gṛhṇīyāt /
T07hvsatssu:14127: yathā [cakṣuḥ] puṣpādi paśyati na vivicya jānāti gandhaḥ surabhirasurabhirvā raso madhuro 'madhuro vā ityādi /
T07hvsatssu:14128: ato yadi mataṃ cakṣuḥkāyendriyābhyāṃ jānīmo dravyaṃ na ghrāṇajihvābhyāmiti /
T07hvsatssu:14130: yathā ghrāṇajihve dravyaṃ pṛthakkṛtya na vikalpayataḥ /
T07hvsatssu:14131: tathā cakṣuḥkāyendriye api dravyamapṛthagbhūtamapi na vikalpayataḥ /
T07hvsatssu:14143: na tu sarvo rūpātpṛthagbhūto dharmo dṛśyaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:14149: yadi ca dṛśyadharmeṇa tadanyadharma upalabhya dṛśyo bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:14157: indriyeṇa rūpaṃ dṛśyamitīdaṃ rūpalakṣaṇaṃ punaralakṣaṇaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:14169: na tatrāsti vinigamanā rūpamātramupalabdhikaraṃ nānye dharmā iti /
T07hvsatssu:14177: yathā andho 'bhyastaghaṭaparimāṇo vinaṣṭacakṣuṣko 'pi spṛṣṭvā ghaṭaṃ jānāti /
T07hvsatssu:14181: bhavatāṃ sūtre 'pyuktam- kāyāgataspṛṣṭaḥ sparśo na pṛthivyaptejasāṃmiti jñātavyam- adṛṣṭaliṅgo vāyuriti /
T07hvsatssu:14184: andha imaṃ vāyuṃ jānannapi na jānāti vāyurayaṃ kiṃ dṛśyaḥ kiṃvā adṛśya iti /
T07hvsatssu:14193: (u) asmanmate rūpaṃ vihāya nāstyanyo dharmo dṛśyaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:14194: ato jñāyate mate ['smin] yatra rūpamutpannamasti tatra cakṣuḥ paśyati /
T07hvsatssu:14198: ato rūpadi vihāya pṛthagasti ghaṭa itīdaṃ na nyāyyam //
T07hvsatssu:14212: yathā cakṣurvijñānena rūpaṃ jñāyate, na śabdādi /
T07hvsatssu:14224: ato jñāyate paramārthato nānirvācyāḥ dharmāḥ prajñaptāveva ekatvanānātvasatvāducyate 'nirvācya iti //
T07hvsatssu:14228: (u) abhāvatve na puṇyapāpādīnāṃ vipāko vimuktyādayaḥ sarve dharmāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:14229: vidyamānaṃ nāstīti grahe sa graho 'pi abhāvaḥ syāt /
T07hvsatssu:14231: asti nāstīti vādāḥ śraddhayoktāḥ pratyakṣajñānaśraddhayā vā bhavanti anumitijñānaśraddhayā vā bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:14233: yatkiñcana nāstīti yat vacanaṃ tadeṣu triṣu na bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:14234: sūtraṃ vānusarāma iti bhavatāmāśayo [yaḥ] nāyaṃ yujyate /
T07hvsatssu:14250: sarve dharmā abhāvā iti bhavata āśaye jñānamidaṃ kiṃ pratītya bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:14255: tadā sarve janā yathābhipretaṃ yatkiñcana kuryuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:14261: tathā ca kena kāraṇenāha- sarvamabhāva iti /
T07hvsatssu:14263: yadi kāraṇena na prakāśayati [tadā] paragṛhītaṃ prakṛtitaḥ sidhyet /
T07hvsatssu:14265: yo bhāvaḥ kāraṇena sādhyaḥ na so 'bhāva ityucyate //
T07hvsatssu:14275: avayavinyagrāhye 'pi avayavā grāhyā iti bhavato yanmatam /
T07hvsatssu:14286: sūkṣmāvayavān paśyato 'vayavabuddhiḥ sadā bhavati na ghaṭabuddhiḥ /
T07hvsatssu:14315: na hi cakṣuḥ sūkṣmaṃ rūpaṃ paśyati /
T07hvsatssu:14316: na ca mano gṛhṇāti pratyutpannaṃ rūpam /
T07hvsatssu:14319: manovijñānantu atīte anāgate vartate na rūpe vartate /
T07hvsatssu:14348: kiṃ rūpaṃ prāpya paśyati kiṃ vāprāpya paśyati /
T07hvsatssu:14359: (u) yadi cakṣuraprāptamapi jñānagocara ityucyate sarvasthaṃ rūpaṃ jñānagocaraḥ syāt /
T07hvsatssu:14362: yadi sati pūrvameva cakṣuṣi rūpe ca paścāccakṣurvijñānamutpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:14373: tathā hi- yadi ca cakṣurvijñānaṃ cakṣurāśritaṃ,
T07hvsatssu:14375: yadi padārtho nirāyatanaḥ tadā āśritya tiṣṭhatīti na labhyate /
T07hvsatssu:14376: yadi bravīṣi vijñānaṃ cakṣuṣo 'lpabhāga utpadyate yadi vā vyāpyotpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:14383: ekaikavijñānāvayavo na vijānāti avayavī tu vijānāti /
T07hvsatssu:14400: ato jñāyate śabdo na śrāvya iti /
T07hvsatssu:14405: śabdo 'yaṃ prāpya aprāpya vā ubhayathāpi na śravaṇīyaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:14434: pūrvoktavat gandhaḥ prāpto vā aprāpto gṛhyata ityubhayathāsti doṣaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:14438: sūkṣmādyavayaveṣveva sparśajñānaṃ notpadyata iti yathāpūrvaṃ vaktavyam /
T07hvsatssu:14444: manovijñānaṃ hi na pratyutpannān rūparasagandhasparśān gṛhṇāti /
T07hvsatssu:14447: (pṛ) yadi manovijñānaṃ rūpādīn dharmān na jānāti /
T07hvsatssu:14457: (u) yathā kasyacit cittaṃ svātmānamajñātvāpi cintā bhavati ahaṃ cittavāniti /
T07hvsatssu:14469: hetau pūrvaṃ san vā guṇa utpadyeta /
T07hvsatssu:14477: ato na hetau pūrvaṃ san guṇaḥ phalamutpādayati /
T07hvsatssu:14478: bhavato yadi mataṃ hetau pūrvamasan guṇaḥ phalamutpādayatīti /
T07hvsatssu:14482: dṛṣṭe paśyāmaḥ khalu śuklatantuḥ śuklapaṭaṃ sādhayati /
T07hvsatssu:14484: yadi (SSS_372) hetau pūrvamasan guṇaḥ phalaṃ sādhayati /
T07hvsatssu:14485: kasmāt śuklatantuḥ śukla[paṭa]meva sādhayati na kṛṣṇam /
T07hvsatssu:14486: ato na hetau pūrvamasan guṇaḥ phalamutpādayati /
T07hvsatssu:14495: (pṛ) dṛṣṭe paśyāmaḥ khalu ghaṭaṃ kiyamāṇam kathaṃ nāsti ghaṭa iti /
T07hvsatssu:14525: hetau niruddhe kena phalamutpadyeta yathā avidyamānaḥ pitā kathaṃ putramutpādayet /
T07hvsatssu:14529: yadi hetuḥ phalañca samakālam na tarhi ayaṃ nyāyaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:14530: yathā dve śṛṅge yugapadudbhūte nocyete vāmadakṣiṇe 'nyonyahetuke /
T07hvsatssu:14541: laukikā na paśyanti kañcana dharmaṃ hetuphalayorapṛthagbhāvarūpam /
T07hvsatssu:14551: na ca paścāmaḥ kañcana dharmaṃ svātmānaṃ (SSS_373) kurvantam /
T07hvsatssu:14558: cakṣuṣo rūpasya naivaṃ bhavati- āvāṃ saha vijñānamabhinirvartayāva iti /
T07hvsatssu:14570: garbhe 'pi bālānāṃ cakṣurādikāyāvayaveṣu kaḥ sacittatvaṃ karoti /
T07hvsatssu:14579: dṛṣṭe ca karmakaraṇe citte vikalpayati- evaṃ kartavyaṃ,
T07hvsatssu:14589: yat bhavān nānākāraṇairbravīti- sarve dharmāḥ śūnyā iti /
T07hvsatssu:14609: tathāgatāḥ paraṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sarvākāraṃ prakṛtito naissvābhāvyaṃ viśeṣasāmānyalakṣaṇāni sarvāṇi pratividhyanti /
T07hvsatssu:14613: (pṛ) yathā bhagavatā bodhimaṇḍagatena dharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ pratilabdham /
T07hvsatssu:14618: tadyathā bhagavānupadiśati sarvadharmāḥ pratītya samutpannā iti /
T07hvsatssu:14621: vicitrāṅkādīni rūpāṇi nṛttagītādayo nādā gandharasasparśā apramāṇaviśeṣā nopadeśyāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:14622: upadeśe 'pi nāsti mahaddhitam ityata īdṛśaṃ vastu nopadiśati bhagavān /
T07hvsatssu:14624: yathā kaścit citrāṅkanādidharmavikalpamajñātvā vadati tāni na santīti /
T07hvsatssu:14625: tathā bhavānapi yatkimapyasādhayitvā vadati nāstīdaṃ- vastu iti /
T07hvsatssu:14628: yathā jātyandho vadati nāsti kṛṣṇamavadātaṃ vā,
T07hvsatssu:14631: yadyevam, pratītyasiddhatvānna santi sarve dharmā iti vaktuṃ pāryate /
T07hvsatssu:14633: tathāgatastu āha- santi pañca skandhā iti /
T07hvsatssu:14634: ato jñāyate rūpādayaḥ sarvadharmāḥ santi yathā ghaṭādayaḥ saṃvṛtitaḥ santīti //
T07hvsatssu:14641: (u) santi vastutaḥ pañcaskandhā iti cittaṃ dharmacittamityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:14642: pañcaskandhān śūnyān dṛṣṭvā samyagbhāvayato dharmacittaṃ nirudhyate /
T07hvsatssu:14643: (pṛ) yogī paśyati pañcaskandhān śūnyān yaduta pañcaskandheṣu nāsti nityadharmaḥ sthiradharmo 'vināśadharmo 'vipariṇāmadharma ātmāmīyadharma iti /
T07hvsatssu:14655: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yogāvacara idaṃ rūpaṃ paśyati yāvadidaṃ vijñānaṃ śūnyaṃ ṣaśyati iti /
T07hvsatssu:14656: na tu rūpādayaḥ pañcaskandhā na santīti jñātavyam /
T07hvsatssu:14659: yathoktaṃ dharmamudrāsūtre- yogāvacaraḥ paśyati rūpādīn dharmān anityalakṣaṇān vikṣepalakṣaṇān vināśalakṣaṇān māyālakṣaṇān nirvedalakṣaṇān iti
T07hvsatssu:14662: taddarśanaṃ tāvadvayavadānā[tmakam] ato jñāyate pañcaskandhānāṃ nirodhaṃ paśyatīti /
T07hvsatssu:14666: pañcaskandhānāṃ nirodhaṃ sākṣātkurvatastu na tat punarabhimukhībhabati /
T07hvsatssu:14669: tadyathā kaścana vṛkṣaḥ krakacakṛtto bhasmasātkṛtaḥ prakṣīṇaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:14675: kiñcāhaikaṃ sūtrama- rūpaṃ rādha tathā vibhida,
T07hvsatssu:14677: ato jñāyate yaḥ sattvaparibhedaḥ iyaṃ prajñaptiśūnyatā /
T07hvsatssu:14679: bhāvanā ca dvividhā- śūnya[tā]bhāvanā nairātmyabhāvanā iti /
T07hvsatssu:14681: yathā kaścit jalaṃ nāstīti ghaṭa śūnyaṃ paśyati /
T07hvsatssu:14682: tathā pañcaskandheṣu pudgalo nāstīti [tān] śūnyān paśyati /
T07hvsatssu:14693: bhagavānāha- saṃskārāḥ saṃvṛtitaḥ santi māyāvat nirmitavat /
T07hvsatssu:14695: paramārthataḥ śūnyamiti vacanam- ayamarthasatyataḥ śūnyo na saṃvṛtisatyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:14696: paramārthaśca yaduta rūpaṃ śūnyamakiñcanam yāvadvijñānaṃ śūnyamakiñcanam /
T07hvsatssu:14697: ato yadrūpādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ śūnyatādarśanaṃ tat paramārthaśūnyatādarśanamityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:14702: tadarthamucyante pañca skandhāḥ paramārthataḥ śūnyā iti /
T07hvsatssu:14703: (pṛ) kiṃ nu khalu sūtre noktam asti karma asti phalam,
T07hvsatssu:14705: (u) ayaṃ hetuḥ dharmaṇāṃ kārakākhyo nopalabhyata itīdaṃ prajñaptiśūnyatābhidhānam /
T07hvsatssu:14707: prajñaptisaṃjñā ca yaduta avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā yāvajjarāmaraṇaduḥkhasamudayanirodho bhavati iti /
T07hvsatssu:14708: asmādvacanāt jñāyate pañcaskandhā api paramārthato na santīti /
T07hvsatssu:14711: ya āha- sa eva jīvaḥ tadeva śarīram,
T07hvsatssu:14715: yeṣāmeṣā dṛṣṭiḥ na te macchrāvakā na brahmacāriṇa iti /
T07hvsatssu:14716: yat tasya jarāmaraṇaṃ pratiṣidhyate tat prajñaptikhaṇḍanam /
T07hvsatssu:14724: uktañca sūtre- yo dharmo māyā sa mṛṣā /
T07hvsatssu:14732: asat dṛṣṭaṃ sadābhāsamasadvai parayā dhiyā // iti /
T07hvsatssu:14740: ato jñāyate pañcaskandhā na paramārthasanta iti /
T07hvsatssu:14743: na sambhavati skandhāḥ satyaṃ skandhābhāvo 'pi satyamiti vaktum /
T07hvsatssu:14746: tathā yo 'mugdhaḥ na sa paśyati skandhān /
T07hvsatssu:14750: yathāhānandaḥ- dharmānupādāya asmīti sidhyati yaduta rūpaskandhaṃ yāvadvijñānaskandhamupādāyeti /
T07hvsatssu:14752: kṣemakaḥ pratyāha- na khalvāyuṣmanto rūpamasmīti vadāmi /
T07hvsatssu:14767: ato jñāyate pañcopādānaskandhā api śūnyā iti /
T07hvsatssu:14771: na tīrthikānāmiva rūpaprahāṇakāle jñāyate vastusat rūpaṃ,
T07hvsatssu:14773: yogī avaśyaṃ rūpādīnāṃ skandhānāṃ nirodhaṃ paśyati nirodhadarśanāt animitte 'vatarati /
T07hvsatssu:14774: ato jñāyate rūpādayo na paramārthasanta iti /
T07hvsatssu:14778: phenasūtre bhagavānāha- yadi puruṣaḥ phenapiṇḍaṃ paśyet yoniśa upaparīkṣeta /
T07hvsatssu:14793: ato jñāyate skandhā na paramārthasanta iti /
T07hvsatssu:14809: yathāha bhagavān- yaccakṣuṣi māṃsapiṇḍe khakkaṭaṃ kharagataṃ sa pṛthivī [dhātu]ḥ ityādi /
T07hvsatssu:14810: ya imāṃ śūnyatāṃ pratilabhate sa vadati nāsti yatkiñciditi /
T07hvsatssu:14814: ato jñāyate sarve saṃskārā niruddhā bhavantīti /
T07hvsatssu:14815: yadi vastusantaḥ saṃskārāḥ tadā na syuḥ samyak prahāṇavimuktinirodhāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:14817: ato draṣṭavyaṃ paramārthataḥ saṃskārāḥ sarve 'bhāvātmakāḥ saṃvṛtitastu santi saṃskārā iti //
T07hvsatssu:14834: śāstramāha- etāni trīṇi cittāni nirodhayato yogāvacarasya karmakleśā naiva punaḥ samudācaranti (pṛ)
T07hvsatssu:14837: yathā pradīpo dharmaśca sati niśraye vartate /
T07hvsatssu:14841: anāsravā samyagdṛṣṭiḥ sarvāṇi nimittāni tathā pradahati yathā na kiñcidavaśiṣyate /
T07hvsatssu:14843: nimittābhāvāt karmakleśānāṃ na punaḥ samudayo bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:14845: arhataḥ śūnyatājñānagatiṃgatasya asmimānarahitasya na punaḥ samudyanti /
T07hvsatssu:14848: yathā dagdhaṃ bījaṃ na punaḥ prarohati /
T07hvsatssu:14849: asati ca tṛṣṇācitte na karmāṇi pacyante /
T07hvsatssu:14850: yathā anabhiṣyanditāyāṃ bhūmau bījaṃ na prarohati /
T07hvsatssu:14851: yogāvacarasyāsya sarvavijñānasthitiṣu sarvanimittanirodhe vijñānaṃ nirāśrayaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:14856: sa kleśābhāvāt vikalahetupratyayaḥ satsvapi karmasu nopapattiṃ vedayate /
T07hvsatssu:14858: kāyaṃ vedayata ityataḥ tasya karmāṇi vipākaṃ prayacchanti /
T07hvsatssu:14861: yathā adharmeṇa prabalamadhitiṣṭhati uttamarṇo nāvakāśaṃ labhate /
T07hvsatssu:14863: saṃsāre 'vartamānasya santyapi karmāṇi na vipākaṃ prayacchanti /
T07hvsatssu:14864: yathā baddhaṃ puruṣamanye janā yatheṣṭaṃ nindanti /
T07hvsatssu:14865: evaṃ kleśabaddhānāṃ sattvānāṃ karmatāratamyavaśāt [kleśāḥ] vipākaṃ prayacchanti /
T07hvsatssu:14868: śūnyacaryāvihāritvādasya puruṣasya dharmeṣu svalakṣaṇa[saṃjñā] nāstītyataḥ karmāṇi na vipākaṃ prayacchanti /
T07hvsatssu:14872: kleśavege kṣīṇe tu na tāni pravartante /
T07hvsatssu:14873: yathā cakraṃ gatisthamapi vegakṣayānna punaḥ pravartate /
T07hvsatssu:14876: yathā sutavatsalāyā mātuḥ raktaṃ stanyaṃ pariṇamate /
T07hvsatssu:14882: ataḥ sadapi prāktanaṃ karma na vipākaṃ prayacchati /
T07hvsatssu:14894: mārgasatyam- āryo 'ṣṭāṅgiko mārgaḥ samyak dṛṣṭiryāvat samyak samādhiḥ /
T07hvsatssu:14902: yadi bahuvāraṃ na bhāvayati tadā kṣiprameva vikṣipyate /
T07hvsatssu:14919: yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti duḥkhamāryasatyaṃ duḥkhasamudayaṃ dukhanirodhaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāmimārgamāryasatyam iti /
T07hvsatssu:14923: ato jñāyate laukikaṃ lokottarañca hitaṃ samāhitacittenaiva labhyate /
T07hvsatssu:14926: yathoktaṃ sūtre avidyā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvaṅgamākuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ samāpattaye /
T07hvsatssu:14928: (SSS_383) vidyā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvaṅgamā kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ samāpattaye anvageva hrīḥ apatrāpyam /
T07hvsatssu:14931: ato jñāyate sarvaṃ satkuśalaṃ samādhimupādāya bhavatīti /
T07hvsatssu:14935: (pṛ) uktaṃ bhavatā cittasyaikatrāvasthānaṃ samādhilakṣaṇamiti tatra samādhiścittañcaikaṃ uta bhinnam /
T07hvsatssu:14955: yathā pūrvamuktam- yatra cittaṃ sukhi bhavati tasminnālambane 'vatiṣṭhata iti /
T07hvsatssu:14964: tasya kālasya dvividhaṃ nāma samādhiriti prajñā ceti /
T07hvsatssu:14970: sā samādhirdvividhā ekā vimuktihetuḥ aparā avimuktihetuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:14978: cittaṃ kiñcitkālamavasthāya yadi parīttamālambanaṃ paśyati[tadā] parīttetyucyate /
T07hvsatssu:14985: yathā suvarṇakāraḥ suvarṇaṃ dravayati tāpayati secayati kāle ca sthapayati /
T07hvsatssu:14998: samādherasyāstrividha upāyaḥ samādhyavatāropāyaḥ samādhyavasthānopāyaḥ samādhivyutthānopāya iti /
T07hvsatssu:15006: (u) yogāvacaraḥ svacittalakṣaṇaṃ gṛhṇan evaṃ pragṛhṇan evaṃ vyuttiṣṭhan evaṃ parityajan samādhāvavatarati /
T07hvsatssu:15015: yathā kiñcidviśuddharūpaṃ kiñcitprakāśarūpañca dṛṣṭvā vadeta- mahāhitaṃ labdhamiti /
T07hvsatssu:15016: anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyamityādyanusmarataḥ cittaṃ na sukhi bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:15035: prathamadvitīyau yadi dāntau samau tadā labhete //
T07hvsatssu:15041: (u) ekāṅgabhāvana iti yat samādhiṃ bhāvayati na prajñām /
T07hvsatssu:15043: ubhayāṅgabhāvana iti samādhiṃ bhāvayati prajñāñca bhāvayati /
T07hvsatssu:15048: yathā sthaviro bhikṣurāha- yogāvacaraḥ samādhinā cittaṃ bhāvayan prajñāmupādāya kleśān pratiṣedhayati /
T07hvsatssu:15049: prajñayā cittaṃ bhāvayan samādhimupādāya kleśān pratiṣedhayati /
T07hvsatssu:15050: samādhinā prajñayā ca cittaṃ bhāvayan svabhāvamupādāya vimucyate /
T07hvsatssu:15051: svabhāvo nāma yaḥ prahāṇasvabhāvaḥ viyogasvabhāvo nirodhasvabhāvaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:15054: (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ- ekāṅgabhāvana iti yadi samādhimupādāya raśmiṃ paśyati na rūpāṇi /
T07hvsatssu:15056: ubhayāṅgabhāvana iti yat rūpañca paśyati raśmiñca paśyati /
T07hvsatssu:15057: āryaḥ samyaksamādhiriti yat śaikṣāśaikṣābhyāṃ pratilabdhaḥ samādhiḥ (SSS_386) iti /
T07hvsatssu:15059: (u) raśmimātraṃ paśyati na rūpamiti nāsti kiñcana sūtram sūtre kevalamuktam- ahaṃ prakṛtito raśmimapaśyaṃ rūpamapyapaśyam /
T07hvsatssu:15062: bhavatā ca vaktavyaṃ kena kāraṇena raśmiṃ paśyati na rūpam ityādi /
T07hvsatssu:15064: (pṛ) sūtra uktaṃ- trayaḥ samādhayaḥ śūnyato 'nimitto 'praṇihita iti /
T07hvsatssu:15066: (u) yadi yogāvacaro na paśyati sattvaṃ nāpi dharmam /
T07hvsatssu:15075: śūnyaṃ bhāvayan hitaṃ labhate yaduta nimittaṃ na paśyatīti /
T07hvsatssu:15082: kecidābhidharmikā āhuḥ yaḥ samādhiḥ śūnyānātmākāreṇa bhavati ayaṃ śūnya ityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:15083: ya ākāro 'nityato duḥkhato hetutaḥ samudayato janakataḥ pratyayato mārgato yathāvadācarato niryāṇato bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:15085: ya ākāro nirodhata upaśamataḥ praṇītato viyogato bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:15088: (u) yadāha bhavān- anityato duḥkhata ākāraḥ apraṇihita iti /
T07hvsatssu:15091: bhagavān sadā vadati yadanityaṃ tadeva duḥkham /
T07hvsatssu:15095: hetutaḥ samudayato janakataḥ pratyayata ākāra iti matam /
T07hvsatssu:15098: uktaṃ hi sūtre- yatkiñcitsamudayalakṣaṇaṃ sarvaṃ tannirodhalakṣaṇamiti paśyan nirvidyate iti /
T07hvsatssu:15102: yathāsūtramuktam hīnaṃ madhyamaṃ praṇidhānaṃ na mārga āsaktijanakam /
T07hvsatssu:15104: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- pañcānāṃ skandhānāṃ nirodhānnirodha ityucyate iti jñātavyam /
T07hvsatssu:15108: ato jñāyate ime traya ekārthakā iti na syādbheda iti /
T07hvsatssu:15113: (u) śūnyena pañcaskandhān śūnyān dṛṣṭvā ekena śūnyena punarimaṃ śūnyaṃ śūnyīkaroti /
T07hvsatssu:15115: apraṇihitena pañcaskandhān nirvidya apraṇihitena punarimamapraṇihitaṃ nirvedayati /
T07hvsatssu:15117: animittena pañcaskandhān praśāntān dṛṣṭvā animittena punaranimittaṃ na gṛhṇāti /
T07hvsatssu:15119: (pṛ) ābhidharmikā āhuḥ- traya ime samādhayaḥ sāsravā iti /
T07hvsatssu:15135: yogāvacareṇa hi sāsravāṇāmanāsravāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirodho 'dhigantavyaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:15146: bhagavānāha- dvitīyadhyānaṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ nāmne saṃvartate anyadharmāya saṃvartate yathā piṇḍapātāya śrāvastyāṃ praveśa iti /
T07hvsatssu:15164: tadarthamāha- pañcakāmasukhānāṃ viyoge paramaṃ dṛṣṭadharmasukhaṃ pratilabhadhva iti /
T07hvsatssu:15167: laukikā vadanti sukhaṃ gṛhasthasya na pravrajitasyeti /
T07hvsatssu:15168: ato bhagavānāha- idaṃ pravrajitasya dṛṣṭadharme sukhamiti /
T07hvsatssu:15174: dvitīyā samādhibhāvanā laukikahitāya bhavati yaduta jñānadarśanam /
T07hvsatssu:15183: yogāvacaro yā vedanā vitarkāḥ saṃjñā utpadyante sarvā[stāḥ] pratijānāti iti /
T07hvsatssu:15194: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yogāvacaraḥ pañcānāṃ skandhānāmudayavyayānudarśī skandhānāṃ nirodhaṃ sākṣātkaroti iti /
T07hvsatssu:15196: sarvāṇi laukikāni lokottarāṇi hitāni caturṣu saṅgṛhītānīti /
T07hvsatssu:15197: (pṛ) kecidābhidharmikā āhuḥ- caturthadhyāne 'rhatphalaṃ pratilabhamānasya ānantaryamārga āsravakṣaya ityucyate iti /
T07hvsatssu:15199: (u) na hi tatrāsti viśiṣṭahetuḥ caturthadhyānamātrasyānantaryamārga āsravakṣayo nānyasyeti /
T07hvsatssu:15216: yathā suvijñaḥ suvijñāya sadā hitaṃ prārthayate /
T07hvsatssu:15217: tathā yogāvacaro 'pi sarvasatvānāṃ kṛte sadā sukhaṃ prārthayate /
T07hvsatssu:15220: (u) nityaṃ lakṣyata aihikāmuṣmikahitasukhaprakarṣaprārthanāṃ kurvan naiva viruddhāsukhaprārthanām /
T07hvsatssu:15221: tathā yogāvacaro 'pi sattvānāṃ sukhameva prārthayate nāsukham /
T07hvsatssu:15226: (u) citte dveṣasmṛtimutpādya satvān tāḍayituṃ vihisituṃ vā icchati /
T07hvsatssu:15232: yogāvacarasya sarvasattvānāṃ lābhaprakarṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahatī prītirbhavati yathātmano hitalābhe /
T07hvsatssu:15237: na kaścidadviṣan duḥkhinaṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā dayate /
T07hvsatssu:15238: yadā sarveṣu sattveṣu paramaṃ maitracittaṃ kaścidduḥkhopadravasambhrāntaṃ putraṃ dṛṣṭveva samācaratitasmin samaye pravṛttaṃ maitracittaṃ karuṇetyucyate
T07hvsatssu:15239: atha vā kaścit parasya duḥkhe karuṇāmutpādayannapi na parasyotkarṣe pramuditacitto bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:15242: kiṃ punarlabdhavijayaṃ putraṃ dṛṣṭvā [na] pramodyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:15243: yogāvacaraḥ sarvasattvān samṛddhilābhino dṛṣṭvā svābhedataḥ pramuditacitto bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:15245: ato jñāyate maitrīcittaviśeṣaḥ karuṇā muditā ceti /
T07hvsatssu:15247: (u) śatruṃ mitrañca paśyato maitracittaṃ na samamasti /
T07hvsatssu:15252: ato yogāvacaro mitre maitramupekṣya śatrau śātravamupekṣya cittasāmyaṃ cikīrṣati /
T07hvsatssu:15255: ataḥ sūtra uktam- rāgapratighaprahāṇāyopekṣāṃ bhāvaya iti /
T07hvsatssu:15261: yathā vadanti uttamamaitracittena trīṇi dhyānāni bhāvayatīti /
T07hvsatssu:15272: ] nāsmai agnirvā viṣaṃ vā śastraṃ vā kramate /
T07hvsatssu:15275: yogāvacaro 'nusmarati- ahaṃ vyāpādamutpādya ahameva vipākamanubhavāmi nānya iti /
T07hvsatssu:15277: kiñca yogāvacaro manasi karoti ahamalpakena pāpakena anyasya kṛtena bahūni pāpakāni tacchataguṇāni tadabhinnānyanubhavāmi /
T07hvsatssu:15284: garbhiṇī prasavitrī ca madarthaḥ duḥkhaṃ vyavasyamānā syāt /
T07hvsatssu:15285: atha vā syāt mama pitā bhrātā bhāryā putro vā /
T07hvsatssu:15288: anusmareccāgāminyadhvani mama pitā mātā bhrātā vā bhavet iti /
T07hvsatssu:15289: arhan pratyekabuddho buddho vā bhavediti [anusmaraṇaṃ] kuryāt /
T07hvsatssu:15293: pūrvañca nibhṛtaṃ paśyet janasya svabhāvaḥ kuśalo 'kuśala iti /
T07hvsatssu:15303: kṣāntiguṇo yogāvacaro 'nuvicintayati- ahaṃ yadi paraṃ dviṣāmi /
T07hvsatssu:15304: tadā pṛthagjanasya grāmīṇasya tasya [mama] ca nāsti bhedaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:15311: na kṣametādhamaḥ sattvaḥ śilavṛṣṭiṃ yathā khagaḥ //
T07hvsatssu:15313: kṣameta hi māhasattvaḥ puṣpavṛṣṭiṃ yathā gajaḥ // iti /
T07hvsatssu:15317: yogāvacara ime sattvā mūḍhā avijñā bālasamānā na vidveṣyā iti prajānāti /
T07hvsatssu:15322: atyantasukhāsaktān dṛṣṭvā ca cintayati- kathamahaṃ parapraṇihitaṃ hāpayeyamiti /
T07hvsatssu:15324: duḥkhinaṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭadharme duḥkhitvāt duḥkhī bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:15325: sukhinaṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā anitya[sukha]tvāt duḥkhī bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:15326: ataḥ sarve sattvā duḥkhabhāgina ādāvante vā na vimuktilābhina ityanena pratyayena karuṇāyate /
T07hvsatssu:15328: (u) yogāvacaraḥ parahiterṣyālutā pṛthagjanalakṣaṇamiti dṛṣṭvā muditāṃ bhāvayati /
T07hvsatssu:15339: (u) viṣamacitte doṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā cittasāmyacikīrṣayā upekṣāṃ carati /
T07hvsatssu:15343: (pṛ) ābhidharmikāḥ kecidāhuḥ- tṛtīyadhyānādūrdhvaṃ nāsti saumanasyendriyam iti /
T07hvsatssu:15364: yaḥ sattvānāṃ sukhākāṃkṣī sa sukhavipākaṃ labhate /
T07hvsatssu:15367: ākāśe ca rūpaṃ nāstītyato vijñānānantyāyatanacittasyālambane paramasukhavihāritvāt /
T07hvsatssu:15379: bhagavānapramāṇasūtra āha- iha bhikṣurmaitrasahagatena cetasā ekāṃ diśaṃ[sphuritvā viharati /
T07hvsatssu:15380: tathā] dvitīyāṃ tathā tṛtīyāṃ caturthī ityūrdhvamadhastiryak[sarvadā sarvatratāyai] sarvāvantaṃ lokaṃ [maitrasahagatena cetasā] sphuritvā viharati iti /
T07hvsatssu:15381: rūpārūpyakadhātukasattvā anityā bhaṅgurā durgati gāmina ityasti hetuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:15382: (pṛ) ābhidharmikā āhuḥ- kāmadhātugato yogāvacara evāpramāṇānyupasampadya viharatīti /
T07hvsatssu:15385: (pṛ) yadi tanna jātā api upasampadya viharanti /
T07hvsatssu:15392: (u) astīdṛśaṃ karma satyapi nivṛttihetau na nivartante /
T07hvsatssu:15400: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yadi kaścidekāgracittena dharmaṃ śṛṇoti /
T07hvsatssu:15408: ata ucyate maitrī bhāvanayā anāgāmiphalaṃ labhata iti /
T07hvsatssu:15421: bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāṃ duḥkhaṃ dṛṣṭvā tatkṣayāya vīryamārabhate /
T07hvsatssu:15424: duḥkhaṃ dṛṣṭvā [tat] apaneṣyāmīti niyamena cittoddhāpanaṃ mahākaruṇā /
T07hvsatssu:15428: karuṇācittaṃ hi parasya pāpakaṃ smṛtvā pratighātamutpādayet /
T07hvsatssu:15434: ātmano hitaṃ tyaktvā parasya hitamātramākāṃkṣata iti mahākaruṇā /
T07hvsatssu:15440: uktaṃ hi sūtre- pañcāṅga[bhūtā] āryasamādhayaḥ yaduta prītiḥ sukhaṃ cittaviśuddhiḥ prakāśalakṣaṇaṃ bhāvanālakṣaṇamiti /
T07hvsatssu:15446: prakāśalakṣaṇaṃ bhāvanālakṣaṇasya hetuṃ kṛtvā pañcaskandhān paribhedayati /
T07hvsatssu:15451: (u) bhagavān svayamāha- yogī cintayati mamāyaṃ samādhirāryo nirāmiṣa iti prathamajñānamutpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:15453: samādhirayaṃ śāntaḥ praṇītaḥ prītipraśrabdhilabdha iti tṛtīyajñānamutpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:15454: ayaṃ samādhiḥ pratyutpannasukha āyatyāñca sukhavipāka iti caturthajñānamutpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:15455: sa khalu punarahamimaṃ samādhiṃ smṛta eva samāpadye smṛta eva vyuttiṣṭhāmīti pañcamaṃ jñānamutpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:15461: samādhiṃ kṛtvā āryaṃ nirāmiṣaṃ chandayāmītīdaṃ prathamajñānamucyate /
T07hvsatssu:15477: ato nityaṃ smṛto vyuttiṣṭhati smṛtaḥ samādhimusampadyate /
T07hvsatssu:15484: (pṛ) uktaṃ sūtre- samādhayaḥ ṣaṭ aṣṭyekalakṣaṇabhāvanā ekalakṣaṇatvāya saṃvartate /
T07hvsatssu:15498: ekalakṣaṇā bhāvanā ekalakṣaṇanānālakṣaṇatvāya saṃvartata iti yadi kaścit samādhimupādāya dhyānasamādhiṃ pañcaskandhopāya ñcotpādayati /
T07hvsatssu:15500: (pṛ) kecidārmidharmikā āhuḥ- ekalakṣaṇā bhāvanā ekalakṣaṇatvāya saṃvartata iti yadi kaścit caturthadhyānamupādāya arhatphalaṃ sākṣātkaroti tat
T07hvsatssu:15501: ekalakṣaṇā bhāvanā nānālakṣaṇāya saṃvartata iti yat kaścit caturthadhyānamupādāya pañcābhijñāḥ sākṣātkaroti tat /
T07hvsatssu:15502: ekalakṣaṇā bhāvanā ekalakṣaṇanānālakṣaṇāya saṃvartata iti yat kaścit caturthaṃ dhyānamupādāyārhatphalaṃ pañcābhijñāśca sākṣātkaroti tat /
T07hvsatssu:15503: nānālakṣaṇā bhāvanā nānālakṣaṇāya saṃvartata iti yat kaścit pañcāṅgabhūtasamādhīnupādāyārhatphalaṃ pañcābhijñāśca sākṣātkaroti /
T07hvsatssu:15519: (u) kecidābhidharmikā āhuḥ yogī nirodhasamāpattāvatāramicchatītyato dhyāneṣu samāpatti (= praveśa)
T07hvsatssu:15521: tasmānna syāt yadi vānulomyena yadi vā prātilomyena yadi vānulomyaprātilomyena vyutkramādiḥ /
T07hvsatssu:15523: yogī nirodhasamāpattiṃ prāpayituravaśyaṃ kramaśo 'vataret kramaśaśca vyuttiṣṭhet /
T07hvsatssu:15527: yathā ca vidagdho jano na punarabhiramate mūḍhe /
T07hvsatssu:15536: yathā kaścit śreṇimāruhya ekaṃ sopānaṃ vyutkramet na dvau /
T07hvsatssu:15541: sūtre yadyapyuktaṃ bhagavatā nirvāṇaṃ samāpadyamāno 'nulomapratilomaṃ vyutkramya dhyānasamādhīn samāpadyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:15546: yadi yogino nirodhasamāpattāvatāraṃ vadati tadānulomyena samāpattiḥ syāt naikakṣaṇe pañcadhā /
T07hvsatssu:15547: yogī yadi sākṣānnirodhasamāpattyavatāramicchati tadā naikakṣaṇe syāt /
T07hvsatssu:15549: vaśitvāparihāṇitvāt anulomapratilomaṃ vyuttiṣṭhati samāpadyate vyutkrāmati ca /
T07hvsatssu:15558: yaduktaṃ yathā na kaścit bālakrīḍāyāmabhiramata iti /
T07hvsatssu:15560: yathā kaścidvṛddho naṭaḥ sarvadā nṛtyati na tṛpto bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:15562: evamāryaḥ anulomapratilomaṃ dhyāneṣu vyuttiṣṭhati samāpadyate vyutkrāmati ca devamanuṣyāṇāṃ pradarśanakāmitvāt maharṣīṇāṃ samādhiṣu vaśitābalācca
T07hvsatssu:15563: bhagavān parinirvāṇagamanakāle paramapraṇītadhyānasamādhibhirvāsitaśarīratvāt svatantraṃ samāpadyata vyudatiṣṭhat anulomaṃ pratilomaṃ vyudakrāmīt
T07hvsatssu:15569: [tat] bodhisattvapiṭaka uktaṃ vyuktrāntilakṣaṇam- prathamadhyānāt vyutkramya nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:15574: śāstramāha- sapta niśrayāḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ niśrityāsravakṣayaṃ labhate /
T07hvsatssu:15580: samādhimimaṃ niśritya āsravāṇāṃ kṣayākhyaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ dharmaṃ prārthayīta /
T07hvsatssu:15583: (u) bhagavānāha- yogī yenākāreṇa yenālambanena prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate sa yogī tadākāraṃ tadālambanaṃ na punaḥ smarati /
T07hvsatssu:15584: kintu paśyati prathamadhyāne yadrūpāṇi yadi vā vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni rogato gaṇḍataḥ śalyato 'ghato 'nityato duḥkhataḥ śūnyato 'nātmataḥ
T07hvsatssu:15588: yogī kāmadhātumohitaḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ nirvāṇamiti paśyati /
T07hvsatssu:15594: (u) uktaṃ hi susīmasūtre- atikramya sapta niśrayān asti āryamārgapratilambhanam iti /
T07hvsatssu:15596: (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ- prathamadhyānasāmantakamaprāptabhūmiṃ niśritya [api] arhatphalaṃ labhata iti /
T07hvsatssu:15609: kasmādāha bhagavān saptaniśrayāḥ sapta saṃjñāsamādhaya iti /
T07hvsatssu:15611: sarve niśryāḥ saṃjñākaluṣitā na vimokṣāya bhavanti ityataḥ saṃjñāsamādhirityākhyā /
T07hvsatssu:15612: āryāstu saṃjñāṃ bhaṅktvā samādhimimaṃ niśritya āsravāṇāṃ kṣayamupādadate /
T07hvsatssu:15614: yathoktaṃ yogī dharmānimān paśyati rogato gaṇḍata iti /
T07hvsatssu:15618: śāstramāha- sūtra uktaṃ- aṣṭau vimokṣāḥ- adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati iti prathamo vimokṣaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:15621: dvitīyavimokṣe hyuktam- adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi iti /
T07hvsatssu:15623: ato jñāyate yogāvacaraḥ prathamavimokṣe krameṇa kāyarūpamabhibhavatīti /
T07hvsatssu:15627: ato na paśyati adhyātmaṃ bahirdhā rūpañca /
T07hvsatssu:15631: antarbahiśca no paśyan ahaṃ pṛcchāmi vastvidam // iti /
T07hvsatssu:15633: yathoktaṃ ṣaḍdhātusūtre- yo bhikṣavaḥ pañcasu dhātuṣu atyantanirviṇṇaḥ,
T07hvsatssu:15651: (u) tīrthikā vimokṣādhimuktyā rūpalakṣaṇaṃ vināśayanti na tu śūnyabhāvanayā /
T07hvsatssu:15653: yathābhāvanādhimuktiprayogaṃ mṛtaparityaktaṃ kāyaṃ śmāśānikakṛmayo bhakṣayanti ityādi paśyanti /
T07hvsatssu:15658: āryāḥ punarārūpyasamādhimupādāya caturaḥ skandhān rogata ityādyaṣṭabhirākāraiḥ paśyanti /
T07hvsatssu:15667: na tu vivicya ayaṃ cittanirodhaḥ ayaṃ kleśakṣaya iti /
T07hvsatssu:15668: yathoktaṃ sūtre- nirodho dvividhaḥ [kṣaya]nirodhaḥ anupūrvanirodha iti /
T07hvsatssu:15673: kiñcoktaṃ (SSS_402) sūtre nirodhasamāpattimupasampanno bhikṣuḥ kṛtakaraṇīya iti /
T07hvsatssu:15677: (u) sūtra uktaṃ śaikṣo navānupūrvasamādhīn labhata iti /
T07hvsatssu:15679: yogāvacaro yadi kṣayanirodhaṃ pratilabdhvā na dhyānasamādhīn samāpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:15681: yadi dhyānasamādhīn samāpadyate na kṣayanirodhaṃ labhate /
T07hvsatssu:15689: (pṛ) anupūrva[vihāre]ṣu nirodho vimokṣeṣu nirodhaśca kiṃ nānā /
T07hvsatssu:15702: naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ samāpannasya ākiñca nyāyatanasaṃjñā niruddhā bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:15703: nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpannasya saṃjñā ca vedanā ca niruddhā bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:15705: eṣu nirodheṣu nirodho viśiṣṭo yaduta yogāvacaro rāgadveṣamohebhyo nirviṇṇo vimucyate /
T07hvsatssu:15706: (pṛ) kathaṃ jñāyate anupūrveṣu cittacaittānāṃ nirodhaḥ vimokṣeṣu kleśānāṃ nirodha iti /
T07hvsatssu:15717: jñātavyaṃ nirvāṇaṃ sakṣātkurvataḥ sarve kleśā nirudhyanta iti /
T07hvsatssu:15725: kathaṃ sa kāyacittaśūnyatāṃ labhate kleśāṃśca kṣapayati /
T07hvsatssu:15729: yathoktaṃ sūtre- mama bhikṣavaścīvaramupāditsoḥ kleśo bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:15736: kecidāhuḥ- catvāri dhyānāni catvāro 'rūpasamādhayaḥ sarve dhyānamityucyante /
T07hvsatssu:15739: samāpattiḥ dhyānavimokṣasamādhiṣu vaśitābalalābhaḥ yathāha- śāriputraḥ- saptabodhyaṅgeṣu samāpattiṃ vyutthānañca vaśīkaromi iti /
T07hvsatssu:15746: yadyupekṣācittaṃ nāsti tadāsamāpattiṃ samāpadyate iti nāsti dūṣaṇam /
T07hvsatssu:15747: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yogāvacaraścatura ṛddhipādān samyagabhyasan himavantaṃ parvatarājaṃ tathā dhamati yathā reṇuparyavasannaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:15749: ato jñāyate aṣṭavimokṣeṣūcyate āsravakṣayanirodhaḥ na nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpadyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:15750: uktañca sūtre- asti vidyāsvabhāvaḥ asti śūnyasvabhāvaḥ,
T07hvsatssu:15753: svabhāvaḥ astyākiñcanyāyatanasvabhāvaḥ asti naivasaṃjñāsaṃjñāyatanasvabhāvaḥ asti nirodhasvabhāvaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:15761: pañcaskandhān prajñaptilakṣaṇān yo na paribhedayati tasyāvidyā bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:15764: yathā bhagavān ekaṃ bhikṣumanuśāsti- śūnyeṣu sarvasaṃskāreṣu saṃskārān śūnyān bhāvayitvā damaya svacittam iti /
T07hvsatssu:15765: yathā kaścitpradīpamādāya śūnyāgāraṃ praviśya paśyati sarvaṃ śūnyamiti /
T07hvsatssu:15771: yogāvacara[ścintayati]- yatkiñcanamanaskāraḥ yatkiñcanakṛtakaraṇam sarveṣāṃ nirodhaḥ śreyāniti /
T07hvsatssu:15773: (pṛ) ime svabhāvāḥ kaṃ samādhiṃ niśritya pratilabhyante /
T07hvsatssu:15774: (u) sūtra uktam- vidyāsvabhāvo yāvat naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasvabhāvaḥ sarvaṃ khayaṃ samādhisamāpattiviharaṇātpratilabhate yaduta saṃskṛtamārgaviharaṇātpratilabhata iti /
T07hvsatssu:15777: dvitīyasvabhāvo 'pi rūpopādāno rupamupādāya tathā vivecayati yathā śūnyaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:15779: sarve saṃskṛtadharmāḥ śūnyā iti nirodhasamāpattyā nirodhaṃ pratilabhate /
T07hvsatssu:15781: ato jñāyate atrokto nirodhaḥ kṣayanirodho nirvāṇamiti /
T07hvsatssu:15783: (u) yogāvacaro rūpaparibhedecchayā kāmadhātupratilabdhaṃ samādhiṃ vā rūpadhātupratilabdhaṃ vā samādhiṃ niśrayamāṇo rūpaṃ śūnyaṃ pratilabhate
T07hvsatssu:15785: (pṛ) eṣu vimokṣeṣu kati sāsravāḥ kati anāsravāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:15789: adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī [eko] bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati parīttāni suvarṇadurvarṇāni /
T07hvsatssu:15793: adhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati adhimātrāṇi[suvarṇadurvarṇānīti vistaro yāvat] idaṃ dvitīya[mabhibhvāyatana]m /
T07hvsatssu:15794: adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati parīttāni [suvarṇadurvarṇānīti yāvat] idaṃ tṛtīya[mabhibhvāyatana]m /
T07hvsatssu:15795: adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhī rūpāṇi paśyati adhimātrāṇi [suvarṇadurvarṇānīti yāvat] idaṃ [caturthamabhibhvāyatana]m /
T07hvsatssu:15796: adhyātmamarūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati nīlāni nīlavarṇāni nīlanirbhāsāni tadyathā
T07hvsatssu:15797: umakāpuṣpaṃ[sampannaṃ] vārāṇaseyaṃ vā vastraṃ[nīlaṃ nīlavarṇaṃ nīlanidarśanaṃ nīlanirbhāsam /
T07hvsatssu:15805: na kevalaṃ santīmāni nīlādīni catvāri rūpāṇi /
T07hvsatssu:15814: (u) pūrvaṃ sāsravāṇi santi śūnyatayā rūpāṇāṃ paribhede 'nāsravāṇi bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:15817: ato bhagavān śrāvakāṇāṃ kṛta āha- abhibhvāyatanamiti /
T07hvsatssu:15821: navānupūrvavihārāḥ- catvāri dhyānāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ nirodhasamāpattiśca /
T07hvsatssu:15822: prathamaṃ dhyānam- yathoktaṃ sūtre yogāvacaro vivicyaiva kāmairvivicyākuśalai (SSS_406)
T07hvsatssu:15823: dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānamupasampadya viharatīti /
T07hvsatssu:15828: na hi kaściccakṣuṣā rūpaṃ na paśyati /
T07hvsatssu:15835: yathoktam- rūpādayaḥ padārthā na kāmā iti /
T07hvsatssu:15837: vyavasāyī khalu rūpādiṣu sthitvaiva kāmaṃ prajahāti /
T07hvsatssu:15838: yathoktaṃ sūtre- rūpādayastadbhāgā na kāmā bhavanti iti /
T07hvsatssu:15840: yasya rāgacittaṃ bhavati sa kāmān paryeṣate /
T07hvsatssu:15842: yathoktaṃ mahānidānasūtre- tṛṣṇāṃ pratītya paryeṣaṇā ityādi /
T07hvsatssu:15848: yathoktaṃ sūtre- savitarka savicāraṃ vihāraṃ viharāmīti /
T07hvsatssu:15851: yadā samādhipariniṣpattyā cittaṃ na bhūyasā vikṣipati tadā vicāraḥ /
T07hvsatssu:15854: prītiriyaṃ prathamalabdhā kāyaṃ sukhayatīti sukhaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:15859: tadā na syāt pañcāṅgaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam /
T07hvsatssu:15862: uktañca sūtre- prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ savitarkaṃ savicāram /
T07hvsatssu:15865: tadā saptasambodhyaṅgeṣu prasrabdhibodhyaṅgaṃ na pṛthaguktaṃ syāt /
T07hvsatssu:15870: prathamaṃ dhyānamapi pañcakāma[guṇā]nāṃ pratyāsannamiti [te] aṅgāni vaktavyāni syuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:15880: [tato] vyāvartane punassamādhinimittamupādāya tatrālambane cittaṃ samādhāya maulikaṃ nimittaṃ manasi karoti /
T07hvsatssu:15890: yathā śiṣyeṇa saha gacchatīti kiñcidviprarṣe 'pi sahetyucyate /
T07hvsatssu:15892: yathā bhūtapīḍitaḥ puruṣo [bhūta] anudgrame 'pi pīḍita ityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:15897: yathoktaṃ sūtre- praśrabdhakāyaḥ sukhaṃ vedayata iti /
T07hvsatssu:15898: (pṛ) tathā cet kathaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ pañcāṅgamityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:15900: yathā saptabodhyaṅgāni kālābhisandhiṃ labdhvā caturdaśa bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:15909: prītau jātamātrāyāṃ kāyacitte aduṣṭhule sukumāre dānte ca bhavata ityataḥ praśrabdhirityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:15911: arogiṇaścaturmahābhūtānāmudayaḥ tadā ayaṃ puruṣaḥ sukhīti nāma /
T07hvsatssu:15914: yathoktaṃ sūtre- saṃskārāṇāmanupūrvanirodhaḥ- tathāhi- prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpannasya vāk niruddhā bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:15915: yāvannirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpannasya saṃjñā vedanā ca niruddhā bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:15918: yadi mataṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ vitarkavicārasamprayuktamiti tadapi na yuktam /
T07hvsatssu:15920: uktaṃ hi sūtre- yadi yogāvacaraḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:15921: tadā vāk niruddhā bhavati iti vitarkavicārau ca vāco hetuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:15931: ato jñāyate prathamadhyāne vitarkavicārau syātām iti /
T07hvsatssu:15934: uktañca sūtre- prathamadhyānasya śabdaḥ kaṇṭaka iti /
T07hvsatssu:15937: (u) prathamadhyāne samādhigataṃ cittaṃ kusume salilavat peśalam /
T07hvsatssu:15947: [punaśca yogāvacaraḥ] vitarkavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśamāt adhyātmaṃ samprasādanaṃ cetasa ekotibhāvamavitarkamavicāraṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyadhyānamupasampadya viharati /
T07hvsatssu:15951: (u) yathā prathamadhyāne duḥkhendriye 'satyapi dvitīyadhyāne duḥkhendriyavyupaśama ucyate /
T07hvsatssu:15956: (u) prathamadhyāne santyapi vijñānāni na duḥkhendriyasyāśrayā bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:15959: (u) tathā ce ddaurmanasyendriyaṃ manovijñānasvabhāvajamiti sarvatra bhavet /
T07hvsatssu:15973: ucyate ca duḥkhasya sukhasya ca prahāṇāt caturthadhyānamupasampadya viharatīti /
T07hvsatssu:15975: yogāvacaraḥ prathamadhyāne 'paripūrṇasamādhiḥ sadā vitarkavicārābhyāṃ vikṣipyata ityata ucyate dvitīdhyāne vitarkavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśama iti /
T07hvsatssu:16015: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yasmin samaye yogāvacaro dharmaṃ śṛṇoti /
T07hvsatssu:16016: asya pañca nīvaraṇāni tasmin samaye na bhavanti,
T07hvsatssu:16017: saptabodhyaṅgāni ca tasmin samaye bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchanti /
T07hvsatssu:16022: pūrvaṃ prītau samutpannāyāṃ paścādanāsravaṃ yadyathābhūtadarśanaṃ pratilabhate /
T07hvsatssu:16023: na ca sarvāḥ praśrabdhayaḥ prītiṃ pratītya bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:16027: na vayaṃ brūmo jñānavinirmukto 'sti pṛthagvedanādharma iti /
T07hvsatssu:16033: bhagavān sadopekṣācitte viharatītyata āha- asti bhagavataḥ prītiriti /
T07hvsatssu:16041: (pṛ) yathā dvitīyadhyāye 'sti prītiḥ nāsti tu daurmanasyam /
T07hvsatssu:16044: (u) sarveṣu dhyānasamādhiṣu asti daurmanasyaṃ yathā indriyārtheṣūcyate /
T07hvsatssu:16050: anāsrave citte ca prīti rna bhavet /
T07hvsatssu:16053: uktaṃ hi sūtre- prathamadvitīyadhyānayoḥ kevalaṃ prītirasti na caitasikaṃ sukhamiti /
T07hvsatssu:16060: kintu paśyati prathamadhyānagatāni rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni rogato gaṇḍato yāvadanātmataḥ /
T07hvsatssu:16061: (pṛ) rogato gaṇḍataḥ śalyato 'ghata ityetāni catvāri lokacaritāni nānāsravāṇi /
T07hvsatssu:16062: ata idaṃ sūtraṃ pramāṇīkṛtya nānāsravaṃ sādhayituṃ śaknoṣi /
T07hvsatssu:16069: (pṛ) uktaṃ hi sūtre- prītisukhacittena catvāri satyāni pratilabhata iti /
T07hvsatssu:16075: kiñca tatsūtraṃ prakāśayati na prītyā paramārthajñānaṃ pratilabhata iti /
T07hvsatssu:16079: prītyāśca virāgādupekṣako viharati smṛtaḥ samprajānan sukhañca kāyena pratisaṃvedayate yadāryā ācakṣante upekṣakaḥ smṛtimān sukhavihārīti tṛtīyaṃ dhyānamupasampadya viharati /
T07hvsatssu:16086: yogāvacaraḥ śāntaṃ tṛtīyadhyānaṃ labhamāno dvitīyadhyānaṃ prajahāti /
T07hvsatssu:16089: yathā kaścit putrabhāryādibhiḥ sadā na prīto bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:16092: tathā yogāvacaro 'pi prītiṃ prathamata āgatāṃ tu sukhaṃ manyate /
T07hvsatssu:16096: yogāvacaraḥ kena duḥkhena pīḍitaḥ tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ sukhaṃ manyate /
T07hvsatssu:16098: yogāvacaro 'nayā prītyā pīḍita iti aprītisamādhau sukhasaṃjñāṃ karoti /
T07hvsatssu:16107: yathā bhagavān kauśāmbibhikṣuvivikta āha- ahaṃ sukhīti /
T07hvsatssu:16124: ataḥ sukhañca kāyena pratisaṃvedayata iti nāma /
T07hvsatssu:16130: puruṣo 'yaṃ prajñāyopekṣate yat prītāvādīnavaṃ dṛṣṭvā nirvidyata ityataḥ sūpekṣāṃ labhate /
T07hvsatssu:16138: (u) nāhamasmin śāstre vadāmi vedanāvyatiriktaṃ pṛthagasti upekṣāsukhamiti /
T07hvsatssu:16157: sukhasya ca duḥkhasya ca prahāṇātpūrvameva saumanasyadaurmanasyānāmastaṅgamādaduḥkhamasukhamupekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānamupasampadya viharati /
T07hvsatssu:16170: sukhasya duḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt cittaṃ neñjate /
T07hvsatssu:16184: caturthadhyānaṃ prāpya sukharāgasya prahāṇāt smṛtiḥ pariśuddhā /
T07hvsatssu:16203: (u) tathā cet aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā nānāsravā syāt /
T07hvsatssu:16211: atra kāmadoṣo 'tisūkṣmaḥ duravabodhaḥ ato 'vaśyaṃ vaktavyaṃ syāt /
T07hvsatssu:16221: parvataṃ vā ārohati tadāśvāsaḥ sthūlo bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:16235: uktaṃ hi sūtre- sukhavedanāyāṃ tṛṣṇānuśaya iti /
T07hvsatssu:16247: sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramāt pratighasaṃjñānāmastaṅgamāt nānātvasaṃjñānāmamanaskārā danantam ākāśam ityākāśānantyāyatanamupasampadya viharati
T07hvsatssu:16252: etāḥ saṃjñā vividhakleśānāṃ vividhakarmaṇāṃ vividhaduḥkhānāṃ hetavaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:16257: tatra saṃkṣepānnoktam asya samatikramādasya nirodha iti /
T07hvsatssu:16258: kecidāhuḥ- sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñeti cakṣurvijñānāśritā saṃjñā iti /
T07hvsatssu:16264: pratighasaṃjñā nirudhyata iti vadato rūpaṃ saṅgrahītameva /
T07hvsatssu:16266: rūpasaṃjñāṃ pratighasaṃjñāñca vinā nāsti pṛthaṅmanovijñānāśritaṃ rūpam /
T07hvsatssu:16273: kiñcāyaṃ kāyo maraṇavipannaḥ smaśānāgninā dagdhaḥ praṇaśyati /
T07hvsatssu:16274: ato jñāyate kāyo 'yaṃ pūrvaṃ sākāśa iti /
T07hvsatssu:16276: (u) ādita ākāśālambanaḥ svīyaskandhālambanaḥ parakīyaskandhālambanaśca siddho bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:16278: karuṇāśīrṣaka evaṃ cintayati- sattvā dayanīyā rūpasaṃjñāpīḍitā iti /
T07hvsatssu:16284: rūpe tu cittaṃ na suprabuddhaṃ nābhiraktaṃ nābhyāsaktam /
T07hvsatssu:16285: yathoktaṃ sūtre- āryaḥ pañcakāmaguṇān dṛṣṭvā saṃsmaran na tatrābhinandati na prabodhayati nādhyavasāya tiṣṭhati /
T07hvsatssu:16290: yathā ca yogāvacaro rūpasaṃjñāvivikto 'pi ākāśāntena caturthadhyānamavalambate /
T07hvsatssu:16308: (pṛ) asti punaḥ sūtravacanam- ālokaṃ pratītyākāśaṃ jānīma iti /
T07hvsatssu:16309: na rūpaṃ vihāyāstyanyo dharma ālokaṃ pratītya jñāpyaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:16337: (u) ākāśaṃ na pratyakṣadṛśyamiti pūrvameva dūṣitatvāt- yat tamasyapi jñāpyamityādi /
T07hvsatssu:16342: (pṛ) uktañca sūtre- ṣaḍ dhāturayaṃ puruṣakāya iti /
T07hvsatssu:16347: (u) yo vastusan dharmaḥ sa sarvaḥ pratiṣṭhito bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:16354: rūpe rūpaṃ pratihanyate rūpamasati viruddharūpe vivardhate /
T07hvsatssu:16356: [yat] bhavānāha- na hi śaśaśṛṅga madṛśyamarūpamapratighamityucyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:16366: abhāvamātreṇa kṛtakāstitālābhādabhāvadharma iti jñāyate ato 'yaṃ samādhiradita ākāśamavalambate /
T07hvsatssu:16369: (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ- arūpasamāpattayo nirodhālambanā api ayaṃ anumānajñānabhāgīyaṃ nirodhamātramālambate /
T07hvsatssu:16382: yathā kāmadhātau rūpadhātau cābhijñābalādanyasmin rūpe anyasmin citte sthito 'pi na cyavate /
T07hvsatssu:16389: samādhiṃ vinā yadi saṃkleśaḥ yadi vā vvavadānam sarvamākāśānantyāyatanamityākhyāyate ? //
T07hvsatssu:16392: sarvaśa ākāśānantyāyatanaṃ samatikramya [anantaṃ vijñānamiti] vijñānānantyāyatanamupasampadya viharati /
T07hvsatssu:16396: tathā yogāvacaro 'pi ākāśaṃ pratītya rūpaṃ paribhedayan [ākāśa]mapi parijihīrṣati /
T07hvsatssu:16397: vijñānānantyāyatanamiti yogāvacaro vijñānenānantamākāśamityavalambamānaḥ tadā anantaṃ vijñāna[mapi ālambate] /
T07hvsatssu:16404: tatpariśramanirviṇṇo vijñānaṃ paribhidya tatparijihīrṣayā ākiñcanyāyatanamupasampadya viharati /
T07hvsatssu:16411: saṃjñā ca duḥkhopāyāyāsāya bhavati rogato gaṇḍataḥ /
T07hvsatssu:16412: yasya saṃjñā nāsti sa punarmūḍho bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:16415: yogāvacaraḥ saṃjñāṃ vipadaṃ āsajñikaṃ sammohaṃ paśyati /
T07hvsatssu:16423: yadi rūpadhātau cittaṃ niroddhumalaṃ bhavanti kasmādārūpyadhātau nālam /
T07hvsatssu:16426: idānīṃ punaścittaṃ nirudhyate rūpacittayoryugapannirodhaṃ paśyata utrāsasammohaḥ syāt /
T07hvsatssu:16436: yathā nirmitagataṃ rūpam nirmitacitte punaḥ phalamutpādayati /
T07hvsatssu:16441: asaṃjñi samāpattau ca na cittaṃ nirudhyeta /
T07hvsatssu:16447: yathoktaṃ sūtre- dīrgharātraṃ [hyetat bhikṣavaḥ] aśrutavataḥ] pṛthagjanasya adhyavasitaṃ mamāyitaṃ parāmṛṣṭam etanmama eṣo 'hamasmi eṣa ma ātmeti
T07hvsatssu:16449: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- tīrthikāḥ trayāṇāmupādānānāṃ samucchedaṃ nirodhamupadiśanti nātmavādopādānasya iti /
T07hvsatssu:16451: yathā markaṭopamasūtram [aśrutavān] pṛthagjanaḥ kāyaṃ virajyeta na cittam /
T07hvsatssu:16452: varaṃ [bhikṣavaḥ aśrutavān] pṛthagjana imaṃ cāturmahābhautikaṃ kāya[mātmata] upagacchet na tveva cittam /
T07hvsatssu:16454: dṛśyate 'yaṃ [bhikṣava ścāturmahābhautikaḥ] kāya [ekamapi varṣaṃ] tiṣṭhan.....daśa varṣāṇi [tiṣṭhan] yāvacchatavarṣāṇyapi tiṣṭhan /
T07hvsatssu:16455: yacca khalu [etadbhikṣava] ucyate cittamityapi mana ityapi vijñānamityapi tat rātyāśca divasasya cātyayena anyadevotpadyate anyannirudhyate
T07hvsatssu:16459: ekameva bhikṣavo yadidamucyate cittamityapi mana ityapi vijñānamityapi /
T07hvsatssu:16460: tat rātyāśca divasasya cātyāyena anyadevotpadyate anyannirudhyate /
T07hvsatssu:16461: ] tatra śrutavān [bhikṣavaḥ] āryaśrāvakaḥ pratītya samutpādameva sādhukaṃ yoniśo manasikaroti /
T07hvsatssu:16464: sarve tīrthikā avikalpapratyayajñānatvāt na cittaṃ nirodhayitumalam /
T07hvsatssu:16472: pṛthagjanānāñca dharmo [yat] uttamāṃ bhūmiṃ pratītyāvarāṃ bhūmiṃ vijahāti /
T07hvsatssu:16474: kintu samādhibalena sūkṣmasaṃjñāmabhimukhīkṛtya cittasya prabodhāt vadati nāsti saṃjñeti /
T07hvsatssu:16479: yathā vā sammūrchābhraṣṭacetanāḥ suṣuptāḥ krimayaḥ śītibhūtamakarāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:16481: tathā tatrāpi vastutaḥ saṃjñāyāṃ satyāmapi saṃvṛtito 'saṃjñītyucyate /
T07hvsatssu:16484: sarvaśonaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ samatikramya saṃjñāvedayitanirodhaṃ kāyena spṛṣṭvā viharati /
T07hvsatssu:16488: (u) uktaṃ khalvasmābhiḥ dhyānasamādhiṣu santi vitarkavicāraprītisukhādayo dharmā iti ato nocyate sarvaśaḥ samatikramyeti /
T07hvsatssu:16498: (pṛ) yat sahaivoktaṃ asti kaṇṭako yaduta rūpasaṃjñā ityādi /
T07hvsatssu:16508: yat bhavatā pūrvamuktaṃ navānupūrvikeṣu cittacaittānāṃ nirodha iti tat virudhyate /
T07hvsatssu:16510: kleśānāṃ kṣayarūpā vimokṣeṣu vartate kleśānāmakṣayarūpā anupūrvaṃ [vihāre]ṣu vartate /
T07hvsatssu:16516: atra saṃjñānāṃ vyupaśame 'pi anyasaṃyojanānāṃ sattvāt punaranutpādikā na bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:16526: yathā caturthadhyāne cittacaittān nirundhya āsaṃjñike praviśati /
T07hvsatssu:16530: niruddhacittameva nirodha ityucyate na punaranyo 'sti dharmo nirodha iti /
T07hvsatssu:16531: ato jñāyate imā navabhūmīrvihāyāpyasti cittanirodha iti /
T07hvsatssu:16537: saṃjñākārāṇāṃ prajñaptigatatvāt prajñaptiśca dvividhā- hetusaṃghātaprajñaptiḥ dharmaprajñaptiśceti /
T07hvsatssu:16540: ataḥ saṃjñāveditanirodha ityuktau sarvanirodha ukto bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:16551: saṃjñāveditanirodha ityuktau ca sarvacittacaittānāṃ nirodha ukto bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:16565: (u) aṣṭavimokṣāḥ sarve kāyena spṛṣṭvā viharantīti vaktavyāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:16575: loke ca nāsti ko 'pi sattvo 'cittaka ityato 'yuktam /
T07hvsatssu:16576: uktañca sūtre- āyurūsma vijñānamime trayo dharmāḥ sadāvyabhicāriṇa iti /
T07hvsatssu:16592: cittameva cetanā manaskāro bhavatītyavaśyaṃ nirodhena taṃ samatikrāmati /
T07hvsatssu:16604: atrocyate / yadbhavānāha- nāstyacittakaḥ sattva iti acitta[tā] sāmye 'pi maraṇe 'sti bhedaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:16605: yathā sūtre paripṛcchati- yo 'yaṃ [bhante] mṛtaḥ [kālakṛtaḥ] yaścāyaṃ (SSS_425)
T07hvsatssu:16612: āyurūṣma tu kāyād vibhaktaṃ vartate iti /
T07hvsatssu:16634: yathā cakṣū niruddhaṃ sat na tadvijñānaṃ janayati /
T07hvsatssu:16637: yanmanaḥ yacca manovijñānam ime dve mithaḥ pratisambandhinī /
T07hvsatssu:16640: yadavocaḥ santānasamuccheda eva cittaṃ nirudhyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:16642: trividho hi nirodhaḥ- rūpanirodhaḥ cittanirodhaḥ kadācidrūpacittobhayanirodhaḥ,
T07hvsatssu:16643: kadācidrūpasya nirodho na tu cittasya yathā nirodhasamāpattisamāpanne /
T07hvsatssu:16645: yadavocaḥ nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpanno na mṛta ityucyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:16649: puruṣasyāsya ca āyurūṣma pratītya cittaṃ punarutpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:16651: yaduktaṃ bhavatā- yadi niruddhaṃ cittaṃ punarjāyate, (SSS_426)
T07hvsatssu:16658: yathā nirodhasamāpattivarga uktam- nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpannaḥ ṣaḍāyatanāni kāyajīvitañca pratītya punarvyuttiṣṭhata iti /
T07hvsatssu:16660: nirvāṇaṃ praviṣṭasya cittaṃ paraṃ na punarutpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:16664: yathoktaṃ sūtre- nirodhasamāpattervyutthitasya cittaṃ nirvāṇabhāgīyam iti /
T07hvsatssu:16672: yathā sukṛṣṭe kṣetre sasyamavaśyaṃ bahulaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:16687: asyāḥ samāpattervyutthito nirvāṇālambana ityataḥ prajñaptisaṃjñayā viviktaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:16688: api coktaṃ sūtre- yasya dānapateḥ satkāraṃ bhuṅktvā apramāṇasamādhimupasampadya (SSS_427) viharati /
T07hvsatssu:16693: kiñca aṣṭabhirguṇai ralaṅkṛtamidaṃ puṇyakṣetram- samyak dṛṣṭiḥ,
T07hvsatssu:16694: nirvāṇālambanaṃ cittaṃ anyāni cāṅgāni taiḥ samanvāgataṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:16708: nirvāṇaṃ pratītya hi nānye skandhāḥ samutpadyante /
T07hvsatssu:16711: yogāvacarāṇāmīdṛśo dharmaḥ syāt nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpanne praṇihitānugamanāccittaṃ na pravartate /
T07hvsatssu:16713: (pṛ) imāṃ samāpattimevānupūrvaṃ samāpadyata iti kimanupūrvameva vyuttiṣṭheta /
T07hvsatssu:16716: (pṛ) sūtra uktamnirodhasamāpattervyutthitaṃ cittaṃ prathamaṃ trayaḥ sparśāḥ spṛśanti- aniñjyaḥ [sparśaḥ] animittaḥ [sparśaḥ] apraṇihitaḥ [sparśa] iti /
T07hvsatssu:16718: (u) asaṃskṛtālambane citte vidyamānaḥ sparśaḥ aniñjyaḥ animittaḥ apraṇihita iti nāma /
T07hvsatssu:16724: ata ucyate vyutthāne trayaḥ sparśāḥ spṛśantīti /
T07hvsatssu:16729: yogāvacara etatsamāpattisamīpsayā prathamata eva sarvān saṃskārān paribhedayati /
T07hvsatssu:16733: sūtra uktam- [saṃjñāvedayita]nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpadyamānasya bhikṣornaivaṃ bhavati] ahaṃ [saṃjñāvedayita]nirodhaṃ samāpadye iti /
T07hvsatssu:16741: ataḥ sūtramāha [atha khalvasya] pūrvameva tathācittaṃ bhāvitaṃ bhāvati [yat tat tathātvāya] upanayati iti /
T07hvsatssu:16743: tadā asaṃskṛtālambanaṃ cittaṃ bhāvayitvā kamupakāraṃ labhate /
T07hvsatssu:16744: (u) dīrghakālaṃ bhāvitatvāt samāpattidārḍhye jñānadarśanaṃ suniścitaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:16745: yathā saṃskṛtālambanaṃ cittaṃ paśyato 'pi nāsti kṣaṇikādanyat /
T07hvsatssu:16751: yogāvacaraḥ parīttanimittaṃ gṛhītavān adhimuktibalena tat vipulayati /
T07hvsatssu:16765: (u) dīrghakālaṃ tat bhāvayan sadā pṛthivīnimittaṃ gṛhṇāti /
T07hvsatssu:16767: (pṛ) yoginā dṛṣṭaṃ pṛthivīnimittaṃ dravyataḥ pṛthivī na vā /
T07hvsatssu:16768: (u) adhimuktibalāt darśane pṛthivī bhavati na dravyato bhavati pṛthivī /
T07hvsatssu:16769: (pṛ) nirmāṇabalāt bhūyamānaṃ nirmitamapi kiṃ na dravyam /
T07hvsatssu:16770: (u) nirmitaṃ samādhibalātsiddhamityataḥ kṛtakaṃ vastu yaduta prabhā aptejādi ca /
T07hvsatssu:16771: (pṛ) kecidābhidharmikā āhuḥ- aṣṭakṛtsnāyatanāni caturthadhyānamātre vartanta iti /
T07hvsatssu:16773: (u) yadi vartanta kāmadhātau triṣu dhyāneṣu ca ko doṣaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:16774: antime dve kṛtsnāyatane pratyekaṃ svabhūmau bhavetām /
T07hvsatssu:16778: (u) yogī adhimuktyā ca cakṣuḥśrotrādyākāśalakṣaṇaṃ śūnyaṃ gṛhṇāti /
T07hvsatssu:16781: (pṛ) uktañca sūtre- sarvapṛthivīsamādhiṃ samāpannasyaivaṃ bhavati- ahameva pṛthivī,
T07hvsatssu:16797: (pṛ) vastuto nāsti khalu sarvaṃ pṛthivī ityādīni /
T07hvsatssu:16810: vedanādi ca cittasya prabheda iti pratipāditameva pūrvam /
T07hvsatssu:16811: kiñca yogī na paśyati vedanādi sarvatra vyāpi /
T07hvsatssu:16835: yathā tīrthikānāṃ sūtramāha- triṇāciketasya kartā śāśvate pade jāyate iti /
T07hvsatssu:16837: (u) bhavatāṃ śāsane 'pyuktam śakro devānāmindraḥ kratuśataṃ kṛtvā punaḥ patatīti /
T07hvsatssu:16838: uktañca gāthāyām- śakrādayaḥ śatasahasrādhikānāṃ kratūnāmanuṣṭhātāro 'nityāḥ kṣīyanta itri /
T07hvsatssu:16854: bhavatāṃ śāsane hyuktam- brahmā sahāṃpatirapi guṇānāṃ [prakarṣāya] sadā kratuṃ yajamāno vrataṃ dhatte iti /
T07hvsatssu:16857: śrūyate ca bhavatāṃ granthe vacanam- asti brahmaṇaḥ [sahāṃ] patermaithunarāgaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:16858: sati ca tasmin dveṣādayaḥ sarve kleśā avaśyaṃ bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:16860: evaṃ pāpī kathaṃ nityaṃ vimokṣaṃ pratilabheta /
T07hvsatssu:16861: na ca sarva ṛṣayo devān yajante /
T07hvsatssu:16871: śīlasamādhiprajñādyapramāṇaguṇasampannā mahānto dīpaṅkarabuddhādayaḥ pratyekabuddhā mahāsammatādayaḥ kalpādyā rājānaḥ sarve 'pyanityāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:16875: yathoktaṃ gomayapiṇḍisūtre- atha khalu bhagavān parīttaṃ gomayapiṇḍaṃ pāṇinā gṛhītvā
T07hvsatssu:16876: taṃ bhikṣumetadavocat- nāsti kiñcidīdṛśaṃ rūpaṃ [yat rūpaṃ] nityaṃ dhruvaṃ [śāśvataṃ]
T07hvsatssu:16878: asminneva sūtre punarvistaraśa uktam- śakrabrahmacakravartirājānāṃ [ye] phalavipākāḥ [te sarve] 'pi atītā niruddhā vipariṇatā iti /
T07hvsatssu:16901: sukhavedināṃ sadā saṃvāsaṃ priyaṃ vā vastutastu vidvān sarvathā vimuktimeva prārthayate /
T07hvsatssu:16902: ato jñāyate samudayadharma na nityaṃ bhavatīti /
T07hvsatssu:16903: atha punarvaktavyaṃ samudayadharma sarvaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ muhūrtamapi na tiṣṭhati /
T07hvsatssu:16907: yathoktaṃ sūtre- anityasaṃjñā bhāvitā [bahulīkṛtā] sarvaṃ kāmarāgaṃ paryādāti /
T07hvsatssu:16912: yathā kaścit subhikṣakālo na dīrgha iti budhyan maithunarāga āsajyate /
T07hvsatssu:16913: kusumaṃ nāticiraṃ navaṃ bhavatīti jānan sukhāyāśu tadupabhuṅkte /
T07hvsatssu:16914: parasya [dayitājanasya] surūpaṃ na nityaṃ bhavatīti jānan maithunarāgaṃ drutataraṃ vardhayati /
T07hvsatssu:16918: yāvattiryañcaḥ anityamiti jānanto 'pi na kleśān bhindanti /
T07hvsatssu:16927: so 'nātmā ityanityamanātma ca bhāvayato yogino nātmabuddhirbhavati /
T07hvsatssu:16930: anityasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayan svaparakāyaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ maraṇa[dharma] ca paśyati /
T07hvsatssu:16935: yathā kaścidvālakaḥ śūnye hastaḥ tuccha iti jñātvaiva na [tatra]saṅgaṃ janayati /
T07hvsatssu:16937: yathā kaścit bhaṅguratvāt bhājane na pramudyate /
T07hvsatssu:16938: yathāpi ca kācinnārī amukasya puruṣasyāyurna saptadinānyeṣyatīti śrutvā [vadati] satsvapi subhikṣakālārjavabahumānadhanaprabhāvabaleṣu ko vā prīyeta iti /
T07hvsatssu:16944: tadā sa bāhyaṃ vastvanityaṃ paśyan śocyate /
T07hvsatssu:16948: vidvāṃstu duḥkhahetau sthita eva na duḥkhaṃ nirodhyamiti jñātvā tyajati duḥkhahetuṃ yaduta pañcaskandhān /
T07hvsatssu:16949: ayaṃ yogī ābhyantaraskandhān paribhettuṃ anātmasaṃjñāṃ pratilabhate /
T07hvsatssu:16951: anātmapratilābhī kiṃ punaḥ prārthayīta anityasajñyapi na kiñcitprārthayate /
T07hvsatssu:16954: ata uktaṃ sūtre- ekāgreṇa cittena pañcaskandhānanityān bhāvayet /
T07hvsatssu:16955: ya ādhyātmikān skandhān aparibhidya bahirdhā vastu anityaṃ paśyati /
T07hvsatssu:16960: eṣāṃ satyapi anityajñāne na sādhubhāvanā bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:16969: ata ucyate- ekāgracittena anityamiti samyambhāvanā kleśān vināśayati / iti / iti /
T07hvsatssu:16971: sati tattvajñāne na bhavanti kāmādayaḥ kleśāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:16982: dharmā anityā iti jñānānna moha utyadyate /
T07hvsatssu:16989: pratyutpanne vastuto duḥkhaṃ yadasiśastrādi tad duḥkhaduḥkham /
T07hvsatssu:16992: śūnyānātmajñānalābhino yaccittaṃ bhavati saṃskṛtadharmāḥ sarve viheṭhanā iti /
T07hvsatssu:16998: na hi duḥkhasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayitā kāmaprītiṃ sevate /
T07hvsatssu:17002: dharmā anityā anātmakā api na duḥkhajanakāḥ tadā naiva tyājyāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:17005: sarve sattvā atitarāṃ bhītā bhavanti yadidaṃ duḥkhamiti /
T07hvsatssu:17006: yadi taruṇo vṛddho vā pāmaraḥ paṇḍito vā āḍhyo daridro vā jānāti idaṃ duḥkhalakṣaṇamiti /
T07hvsatssu:17008: sarve yogacāriṇaḥ puruṣā nirvāṇe śāntopaśamasaṃjñotpādakā bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:17015: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yat rūpaṇamanityaṃ duḥkhaṃ vipariṇāmadharma,
T07hvsatssu:17021: ato bhagavānāha- ye duḥkhaṃ budhyanti teṣāmahaṃ duḥkhamāryasatyaṃ vyākaromi iti /
T07hvsatssu:17028: anayā saṃjñayā ca sarvasattvānāṃ saṃsāre yātāyātānāṃ mānasaṃ kliśyati /
T07hvsatssu:17038: duḥkhasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayato mano na catasṛṣu vijñānasthitiṣu sukhaṃ viharati sarvatra duḥkhadarśitvāt /
T07hvsatssu:17039: yathā mugdhāḥ śalabhāḥ sukhasaṃjñayā pradīpe patanti /
T07hvsatssu:17051: yogī sarve dharma bhaṅgavipariṇāmalakṣaṇā iti paśyati /
T07hvsatssu:17052: yasmin rūpe āttmatayābhiniviśate idaṃ rūpaṃ vipariṇāmadharma /
T07hvsatssu:17055: yathā kaścit girinirjharānuvāhito yatkiñcidavalambya tadvihāya mucyate /
T07hvsatssu:17061: pṛthagjanā ātmasaṃjñayā paramārthato duḥkhe na duḥkhaṃ paśyanti /
T07hvsatssu:17062: anātmasaṃjñayā tu atyalpe 'pi duḥkhe tadupaghātaṃ budhyate /
T07hvsatssu:17076: nāstyātmātmīyamiti cintayato dharmeṣu vinaṣṭheṣu na duḥkhamutpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:17080: idaṃ vastu ātmano hitamityataḥ kāmarāga utpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:17083: ahamāyuṣo 'nte kariṣyāmi na kariṣyāmiti dṛṣṭivicikitsā bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:17087: cittaviśuddhyā ca kāñcanaṃ loṣṭaṃ candanamasidhārāṃ praśaṃsāṃ nindāñca samaṃ manyate /
T07hvsatssu:17101: svakāye puruṣasaṃjñāṃ parakāye ca strīsaṃjñāmutpādya [tatra] abhiniviśate /
T07hvsatssu:17113: kāmadhātau yāni santi duḥkhāni sarvāṇi tāni annapāna maithunarāgaṃ pratītya bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:17115: yathā kalpādau sattvāḥ svargādāgatya loke 'smin upapādukā abhūvan /
T07hvsatssu:17118: evaṃ krameṇa jarāvyādhimaraṇaśālinaḥ yāvadvatsaraśataṃ bhūyasā duḥkhaiḥ pīḍitāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:17119: āhārābhiniveśavaśāt sarve te tādṛśemyaḥ phalemyaḥ praṇaṣṭāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:17123: tebhyo 'kuśalaṃ karma kurvanti akuśalakarmataḥ trīn doṣān vardhayitvā devamanuṣyāṇāmapakurvanti /
T07hvsatssu:17124: tasmāt sarvāḥ kleśavipattaya āhārakāmāt bhavanti jarāvyādhimaraṇalakṣaṇāni annapānādhīnāni /
T07hvsatssu:17128: yadi vā bālo vṛddho gṛhasthaḥ pravrajito vā anāhārapīḍito bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:17139: ye samucchinnāhārāḥ teṣāṃ kleśā na kṣīyante /
T07hvsatssu:17148: dantena carvitaṃ lālayā siktaṃ liṅgaṃ vāntavadāmāśayapatitaṃ kāyasya hitakaram /
T07hvsatssu:17151: yadi kaścinmadhuramāhāraṃ labhamāno 'pi punarvāntaṃ na bhunakti /
T07hvsatssu:17159: yathoktaṃ karmavarge- yastarṣito mriyate sa jalakrimibhāvenotpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:17171: ayañca yogī bhāvayati prītiviviktaṃ samādhiṃ tadyathā anātmasaṃjñāṃ duḥkhasaṃjñāmāhāre pratikūlasaṃjñāṃ maraṇasaṃjñām /
T07hvsatssu:17183: pratyutpanno daridro na pratyayopalabhyanirgama iti prajānānaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:17187: yathoktaṃ sūtre- alpatarāḥ susthāna utpadyante bahutarā dusthāna utpadyante /
T07hvsatssu:17190: puruṣo 'yaṃ paśyati kāmādayo doṣāḥ kleśāssadā santānamanuvartanta iti /
T07hvsatssu:17196: sa cettu pāpakaṃ karma kariṣyati karoṣi vā /
T07hvsatssu:17203: tadyathā āśīviṣakaraṇḍaḥ pañcokṣiptāsikā vadhakāḥ śūnye grāme coraḥ /
T07hvsatssu:17206: tadyathā lavaṇatiktatṛṣṇānadīvāhitaḥ pañcakāmaguṇaviṣaśalya [viddhaḥ] avidyāndhakārāṅgārakarṣau [patitastādṛśāni] duḥkhāni sattvānanuvartante
T07hvsatssu:17209: kasmāt, [yasmāt] pratidīnaṃ lokaistūyamānā vanaṣaṇḍaprasūtasphītaphalasamṛddhiśālino ['pi] bhūpā na dīrghakālasukhalābhino dṛśyante /
T07hvsatssu:17215: tāṃ saṃjñāṃ bhāvayatā kṣipraṃ mokṣo labhyate /
T07hvsatssu:17219: asya ca citte na kleśā udbhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:17228: (u) yogī paśyati kāyasya bījamaśubhaṃ yaduta mātāpitoraśucimārgajaśukraśoṇitasaṅghātaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:17230: upapattisthānañcāśuci yaduta mātuḥ kukṣau paripūrṇamaśuci bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:17234: annaṃ pānaṃ vastraṃ puruṣakāyagataṃ parīhitaṃ sarvaṃmaśuci bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:17247: aśucilūkṣāmakṣikāmaśakādayaḥ sarvā aśucikrimayaḥ sarvadāgatya kāyaṃ spṛśantītyaścāśuciḥ /
T07hvsatssu:17259: asmin kāye tu śatasahasradhā krimayaḥ sadā jāyante mriyante ca /
T07hvsatssu:17268: surabhikusumagandhamālālaṅkṛto 'yaṃ kāyaḥ iti veditavyaṃ kāyo 'yaṃ svabhāvato 'śuciriti /
T07hvsatssu:17283: samantato 'yaṃ kāyaḥ sadā aśuci nissārayati yaduta navarandhrāṇi aśucidvārāṇi romakūpeṣu ca naikamasti śuci /
T07hvsatssu:17289: ayaṃ hi kāyo durgandhamalairaśuciścarmāvṛtatvātparaṃ na jñāyate /
T07hvsatssu:17300: yathoktaṃ sūtre- asti vṛkṣe viśuddhatā iti /
T07hvsatssu:17303: evaṃ vinīlakalohitakādilakṣaṇaṃ dīrghakālaṃ bhāvayato 'śubha[saṃjñā] sampūrṇā bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:17316: maraṇasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayataḥ svasya hitaṃ bhavati yaduta cittaikāgryeṇa kuśaladharmāṇāmupacayaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:17317: (SSS_442) laukikāḥ sattvā bhūyasā parihitābhiratā svahitaṃ tyajantyeva /
T07hvsatssu:17320: ājavañjavamanughāvatāṃ hi lokānāṃ sadā maraṇaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:17330: mṛṇmayo 'yaṃ ghaṭo yadi [samyak] prayogapālitaḥ kadācit ciraṃ tiṣṭhet /
T07hvsatssu:17331: ayaṃ kāyastu ciratamaṃ tiṣṭhamāno na vatsaraśatamatikrāmati /
T07hvsatssu:17334: saṃkṣepataḥ sarve sattvā asattvāśca kāyasya paripanthino dharmā draṣṭavyāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:17336: kiñca yogī paśyati kāyaḥ kṣaṇikanityo vipariṇāmalakṣaṇo naikaṃ kṣaṇamapyārakṣya iti /
T07hvsatssu:17338: yogī dṛṣṭadharme ca paśyati bālyayauvanavārdhakyāni savyādhīni nirvyādhīni vā na maraṇaparihārīṇīti /
T07hvsatssu:17349: na sāntvavacanenollāpanīyaṃ dhanenānuneyaṃ vigraheṇa vā mocanīyam /
T07hvsatssu:17350: yathā mahati śaile caturbhyo digbhya āgate nāsti palāyanasthānam /
T07hvsatssu:17355: kevalaṃ parāmṛśati kiṃ kuśalacārī kiṃ vākuśalacārīti /
T07hvsatssu:17357: ato yogī kāyo 'niśrayo 'śaraṇo maraṇavartmagata iti paśyan maraṇasaṃjñāmanusmarati /
T07hvsatssu:17358: kiñca yogī sadā paśyati kāyo 'yaṃ jarāvyādhiparipīḍito 'dhruvasvabhāvaḥ pratikṣaṇamutpannavināśī (SSS_443)
T07hvsatssu:17360: kiñcāyaṃ yogī paśyati maraṇaṃ niyataṃ jīvitamaniyatam /
T07hvsatssu:17370: uktañca sūtre- maraṇaṃ nāma mahātāmastram araśmikamarakṣaṇam asahāyakamanupasthāpakaṃ paramabhayasthānaṃ iti /
T07hvsatssu:17373: traidhātuke sarvasyāsti maraṇaṃ na tathā jarā vyādhiśca /
T07hvsatssu:17387: yathā caturṣu samyakpradhāneṣūktam- utpannānāṃ pāpakānāmakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya [chandaṃ janayati vyāyamati]vīryamārabhate /
T07hvsatssu:17389: ime ca pāpakā akuśalā dharmā narakādiduḥkhakleśānāṃ pratyayāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:17396: (pṛ) imāṃ prahāṇasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayan kiṃ hitaṃ vidante /
T07hvsatssu:17397: (u) tāṃ saṃjñāṃ bhāvayan sadā na pāpakān dharmānanuvartate /
T07hvsatssu:17401: kleśaprahāṇābhirati dharmacī varasaṃvṛtaliṅgasya pravrajitasya hitam tayā nocet svakāyameva manyeta /
T07hvsatssu:17411: yathoktaṃ sūtre- kāmarāgasya prahāṇāt pañcaskandhāḥ prahīyante iti /
T07hvsatssu:17420: uktañca sūtre- trayaḥ svabhāvāḥ prahāṇasvabhāvo virāgasvabhāvo nirodhasvabhāva iti /
T07hvsatssu:17421: yaducyate prahāṇasvabhāvo virāgasvabhāva iti tadarhata eva bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:17423: yaducyate nirodhasvabhāva iti tadāyuṣo 'nte jīvitavyapagame prahīṇasantānasya /
T07hvsatssu:17426: yadabhihitaṃ prahāṇamiti tat avidyāṃ prajahātīti prajñā vimucyate /
T07hvsatssu:17427: yadvirāga iti tat tṛṣṇāṃ vivarjayatīti ceto vimucyate /
T07hvsatssu:17435: yāvannirodhasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayati sa kṛtasarvakṛtyo niruddhasarvakleśaḥ prahīṇaskandhasaṃyojanasantatirnirupadhiśeṣanirvāṇaṃ samāpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:17438: (pṛ) pūrvamuktaṃ bhavatā- mārgasatyaṃ [dvividhaṃ] yat samādhiḥ tatpariṣkāraśceti /
T07hvsatssu:17441: yasmāt sati samādhipariṣkāre samādhiḥ sidhyati na tvasati /
T07hvsatssu:17457: mṛṣāvāda piśunavācā paruṣavācā sampralāpa itīme catvāri vācikakarmāṇi /
T07hvsatssu:17461: tathā hi tadyathā suvarṇakāraḥ pūrvaṃ sthūlamalamapanayati /
T07hvsatssu:17471: imāṃ samāṃ bhūmiṃ vyavasthāpya catvāri satyāni paśyati iti /
T07hvsatssu:17477: pūrva śīlabhedāpattiṃ śīlasamādānahitañca pratisaṃkhyayā vicārya śīlaṃ samādatte /
T07hvsatssu:17485: tathā kleśavyādhicikitsāyā asati śīle na sampadyata auṣadham /
T07hvsatssu:17495: pariśuddhaśīlo na vikṣipatītyato niyamena nirvāṇamadhigacchati gaṅgāsrotasi dāruskandhavat /
T07hvsatssu:17505: yathā pārarahite kṣetre jalaṃ na tiṣṭhati /
T07hvsatssu:17516: tathāgatamārgārthī mahākaruṇācittena sarvasattvānāṃ kṛte na śīlalakṣaṇaṃ samādatte /
T07hvsatssu:17520: uktaṃ hi sūtre- dvau khalvāyuṣman pratyayau samyakdṛṣṭerutpādāya parato ghoṣo yoniśo manaskāra iti /
T07hvsatssu:17523: (u) uktaṃ hi sūtre- [anyataro] 'rhan bhagavantaṃ pṛcchati sma ekānte niṣaṇṇasya mama evamabhavat- abhisambodhisampadā tu mārgapratilābhasya vikalaḥ pratyaya iti /
T07hvsatssu:17525: maivaṃ vocaḥ yābhisaṃbodhiḥ sā tu mārgasya pratilābhasya sakalaḥ pratyayaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:17527: jātijarāvyādhimaraṇāḥ sattvā ātmano 'bhisambodhiṃ labhamānā hi jātijarāvyādhimaraṇebhyo vimucyante iti /
T07hvsatssu:17529: tadyathā sālavṛkṣo himavantamupādāya pañca vastūni vardhayati /
T07hvsatssu:17536: tadaiva smṛtirudapādi pratilabdho mayā dharmaḥ yamupādāyābhisambuddhaḥ tameva dharmamupaniśrayiṣya iti /
T07hvsatssu:17537: brahmādayo deva api prāśaṃsan nāsti kaścit buddhādviśiṣṭaḥ,
T07hvsatssu:17540: (SSS_448) yathā kaścit sacakṣuṣko 'pi pradīpaṃ vinā na paśyati /
T07hvsatssu:17541: tathā yoginaḥ puṇyaguṇatīkṣṇendriyatāpratyaye satyapi abhisambodhiṃ vinā na bhavati kaścanopakāraḥ /
T07hvsatssu:17544: sarve ca sajjanāḥ saddharme pratitiṣṭhanti [iti sā] sarvā devamanuṣyalokeṣvabhisambodhiḥ /
T07hvsatssu:17552: indriyāṇāmagopane nimittodgrahaṇāt kleśāḥ pañcendriyāṇi strotovat pravartayanti /
T07hvsatssu:17554: ya indriyeṣu guptadvāro bhavati tasya śīlādayaḥ sudṛḍhā bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:17560: yaḥ saddharmāduparamate tasya mārgo na bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:17562: yadi kaścit kuśalasya bhāvanāyai na bhunakti /
T07hvsatssu:17571: (u) yat bhojanaṃ śītoṣṇādi vyādhiṃ kāmakrodhādyādhiñca na vardhayati /
T07hvsatssu:17574: bhojanamidamasmin kāle śītoṣṇakāmakrodhādhivyādhiṃ vardhayatīti prajānan na bhuñjyāt /
T07hvsatssu:17575: (pṛ) tīrthikā vadanti- yaḥ pariśuddhamāhāraṃ bhuṅkte sa pariśuddhaṃ puṇyaṃ vindate /
T07hvsatssu:17576: yat yatheṣṭhamabhimatarūparasagandhasparśavat approkṣitamabhinimantritaṃ bhuñjyate tat pariśuddhamityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:17589: āhāraḥ pūrvamevāśuciḥ paścādapi kāyaṃ praviṣṭo naikadhāśucirbhavati /
T07hvsatssu:17593: (u) prāṇātipātādviratiradattādānādviratirmithyā jīvādviratirityādinā anurūpamāhāraṃ labdhvā āhāre ca pratikūlasaṃjñāṃ dṛṣṭvā prajñājalaprokṣitamatha tāvadbhuṅkte /
T07hvsatssu:17604: kathaṃ kaścit loke corāṇāṃ raṇabhūmau nidrāsyati /
T07hvsatssu:17610: kiñca yogī paśyati- manuṣyakāyo labdhaḥ samagrāṇīndriyāṇi,
T07hvsatssu:17619: yadi kaścidanidrannapi akuśalavitarkānutpādayati yaduta kāmavitarko vyāpādavitarko
T07hvsatssu:17620: vihiṃsāvitarko jātivitarko janapadavitarko 'maraṇavitarkaḥ parānugrahavitarkaḥ parāvamanyanāvitarka ityādayaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:17625: yat kāmaṃ niśritya pañcakāmaguṇeṣūtpannavitarkaḥ paśyati hitaṃ sukhamiti /
T07hvsatssu:17643: yathoktaṃ sūtre- ayaṃ valmīko rātrau dhūmāyati /
T07hvsatssu:17645: [yatkhalu bhikṣo divā karmāntānārabhya rātrā]vanuvitarkayati [anuvicārayati] idaṃ [rātrau] dhūmāyanam /
T07hvsatssu:17646: [yatkhalu bhikṣo rātrāvanuvitarkayitvā divā] karmāntān [prayojayati kāyena vācā manasā /
T07hvsatssu:17664: yoginā smartavyaṃ sarveṣu sattveṣu jananamaraṇapravāhapravṛtteṣu nāsti jñātirajñātiḥ /
T07hvsatssu:17675: yogī [kaścit] cintayati- amuko janapadaḥ sukhaḥ kṣemaḥ śivaḥ,
T07hvsatssu:17676: tatra gatvā nibhṛtaṃ sukhaṃ lapsya iti /
T07hvsatssu:17685: evamādayo vividhā doṣāḥ santītyato na cintayet /
T07hvsatssu:17687: yatrābhirataḥ kuśaladharmaṃ vardhayati ayaṃ ramaṇīya ityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:17689: sarvo janapado dūrata eva śrāvyo nāvaśyaṃ gatvā ślāghanīyaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:17693: duḥkhahetumimaṃ kāyaṃ dhṛtvā yatra yatra gacchati tatra tatra duḥkhānyanubhavati /
T07hvsatssu:17702: kalyāṇamitramupasthāya caturastūpān vanditvā janāna mahādānaṃ kartuṃ protsāhya ca paścānmārgo bhāvayitavya iti /
T07hvsatssu:17708: vṛttyantareṣu vyāpṛtena na mārgo bhāvituṃ śakyaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:17710: mayāyaṃ kāyo vṛthā poṣitaḥ na kiñcillabdham /
T07hvsatssu:17712: yathoktaṃ sūtre- pṛthagjano viṃśatidhā svacittaṃ nigṛhyevaṃ cintayet- vibhinnākāraveṣamātraṃ mama vṛthā [sarvaṃ] na kiñcillabdham,
T07hvsatssu:17717: akṛtyaṃ te na sevante nityaṃ sātatyakāriṇaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:17724: ko jñānī tṛṇāgre 'vaśyāyabinduvat jīvitamadhruvaṃ jñātvā kṣaṇamekaṃ jīveyamiti [manyeta] /
T07hvsatssu:17725: uktañca sūtre- bhagavānavocat kathaṃ pūnaryūyaṃ bhikṣavo bhāvayatha maraṇasmṛtim /
T07hvsatssu:17726: [anyataro (SSS_453) bhikṣu]rbhagavantamavocat- [iha mamaivaṃ bhavati- aho vata] ahaṃ sapta varṣāṇi na jīveyamiti /
T07hvsatssu:17728: anya[taro bhikṣurbhagavantametadavocat] ahaṃ ṣaḍ varṣāṇi na jīveyamiti /
T07hvsatssu:17730: evamukte bhagavān tān bhikṣūnetadavocat- yūyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ pramattā [viharatha,
T07hvsatssu:17732: anyataro bhikṣu [rbhagavanta]mupetyāvocat[mamaivaṃ bhavati aho bata] ahaṃ [tadantaraṃ] na jīveyaṃ yadantaraṃ āśvasitvā praśvasāmi praśvasitvā vāśvasāmi iti /
T07hvsatssu:17733: bhagavānavocat- sādhu sādhu tvaṃ [khalu bhikṣo] bhāvayasi maraṇasmṛtim iti /
T07hvsatssu:17740: nānayā smṛtyā parasya sukhaṃ dukhaṃ vā prāpayati /
T07hvsatssu:17743: (u) yogī mārgamarthayan cintayetpāramārthikaṃ hitaṃ yaduta anityatādi /
T07hvsatssu:17751: yadyogī cintayati- gotravaṃśākṛtirūpadhanamānanaipuṇyeṣu śīlatīkṣṇendriyatvadhyānasamādhiprajñādiṣu ca nāyaṃ matsama iti /
T07hvsatssu:17760: sarveṣāṃ sattvānāmadhyātmaṃ bahirdhā ca duḥkhavihiṃsāpi samā na (SSS_454) viṣamā /
T07hvsatssu:17778: yathoktaṃ tathāgatavarge- tathāgatasya khalu dvau vitarkau nityamupatiṣṭhato yaduta yogakṣemavitarkaḥ pravivekavitarkaśca iti /
T07hvsatssu:17786: kiñca yogī pravivekāmilāṣayā bahūnāṃ kuśaladharmāṇāmupacayādāśu vimucyate /
T07hvsatssu:17787: aṣṭamahāpuruṣavitarka iti alpecchasyāyaṃ dharmo nā[yaṃ dharmo] mahecchasya /
T07hvsatssu:17795: niṣprapañcārāmasyāyaṃ dharmo nāyaṃ dharmaḥ prapañcārāmasya itīme 'ṣṭau /
T07hvsatssu:17800: kaścit [kenacit] kāraṇena vā śīlāya vā parasya cittaprasādanāya vālpaṃ gṛhṇāti na tu santuṣṭacitto bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:17811: na tu yathā laukikā yaśomaṇḍanavardhanāya bahu gṛhṇānti /
T07hvsatssu:17815: pravrajito na bahu sañcinvannavadātavasanaiḥ samo bhavet /
T07hvsatssu:17830: dṛśyate ca deyasya padārthasya pratyarpaṇaṃ duṣkaram /
T07hvsatssu:17833: (SSS_456) yathāha bhagavān- nāhaṃ lābhasatkāramanuprāpnomi mā lābhasatkāro māmanuprāpnotviti /
T07hvsatssu:17835: yathāha bhagavān- devā na pratilabhante naiṣkramyasukhaṃ pravivekasukhamupaśamasukhaṃ yathā mayā pratilabdham /
T07hvsatssu:17839: samīkṣe sarvavastūni kheṭapiṇḍān yathā bahiḥ // iti /
T07hvsatssu:17840: kiñca yogī paśyati na kāmopabhogena tṛptirbhavati /
T07hvsatssu:17841: yathā lavaṇodakaṃ piban na tarṣaṇamapanayati iti prajñāṃ prarthayānastṛpto bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:17842: mahecchaḥ sadā prārthanāmutpādayan bahu prārthayitvālpaṃ vindate /
T07hvsatssu:17844: paśyāmaśca bhikṣārthī janairavamanyate na satkriyate yathālpecchaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:17848: pravivikta iti yat gṛhasthapravrajitayoḥ kāyikapravivekasamācāraḥ kleśeṣu mānasapravivekasamācāraḥ ayaṃ pravivekaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:17851: avadātavasanādayaḥ tatsthānagatastrīrūpavikṣepāvakṛṣṭā na tatra kadācitsukhino bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:17857: bhagavān grāmopakaṇṭhe niṣaṇṇaṃ bhikṣuṃ dṛṣṭvā aprītamanasko bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:17858: śūnyāyatane ca śayānaṃ bhikṣuṃ dṛṣṭvā bhagavān prītamanasko bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:17860: grāmopakaṇṭhe niṣṣaṇṇasya bhikṣorbahubhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ samāhitacittavikṣepe labdhavyaṃ na labhyate sākṣātkartavyaṃ na sākṣātkriyate /
T07hvsatssu:17861: śūnyāyatane śayānasya kiñcitkausīdye satyapi samādhyāśāsambhave cittaṃ parigṛhyate /
T07hvsatssu:17864: śūnyāyatane na rūpādīni nimittāni santīti kleśāḥ suprahāṇāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:17866: uktañcasūtre- yo bhikṣuḥ saṅgaṇikāvihārarataḥ sambhāṣyarataḥ [sa] gaṇādavivikta ityataḥ sāmayikīmeva vimuktiṃ na (SSS_457)
T07hvsatssu:17868: kaḥ punarvādaḥ akopyāṃ vimuktiṃ pratilabhata iti /
T07hvsatssu:17874: yogī yadi samyakpradhānamācaran akuśaladharmān prajahāti kuśaladharmāṃśca sañcinoti /
T07hvsatssu:17883: ārabdhavīryasya ca kṣaṇe kṣaṇe kuśaladharmo nityamabhivardhate,
T07hvsatssu:17885: vīryaprakṛṣṭamācarannāpnoti prakṛṣṭaṃ sthānaṃ yaduta buddhānāṃ gatim /
T07hvsatssu:17886: yathoktaṃ sūtre bhagavatā ānandaṃ prati prakṛṣṭaṃ vīryamabhyasan buddhagatiṃ yātīti /
T07hvsatssu:17894: evaṃ kusīdasya doṣamārabdhavīryasya guṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā vīryamanusmarati /
T07hvsatssu:17897: (pṛ) eṣāṃ caturṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ smṛtyā kīdṛśaṃ hitaṃ vindate /
T07hvsatssu:17900: yathā ca ghaṭaḥ pūrṇo na punarudakamādatte /
T07hvsatssu:17901: evamasya puruṣasya kuśaladharmasampūrṇasya na pāpakāni prasajyante /
T07hvsatssu:17902: yo bhāvitasamyaksmṛtikaḥ sa vimuktibhāgīyān sarvān kuśaladharmān saṅgṛhṇāti /
T07hvsatssu:17903: yathā samudrāmbupāyinaḥ sarvāṇi strotāṃsi pītāni bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:17907: asya ca cittaṃ supratiṣṭhitaṃ duṣkampanaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:17911: yathoktaṃ bhikṣuṇīsūtre- bhikṣuṇya ānandametadavocan- iha bhadanta [ānanda] vayaṃ
T07hvsatssu:17912: catṛṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu supratiṣṭhitacittā viharantya [udāraṃ] pūrveṇāparaṃ viśeṣaṃ samprajānāma iti /
T07hvsatssu:17913: ānando 'vocat- evametat bhaginya evametat bhaginya iti /
T07hvsatssu:17916: yathoktaṃ sūtre- samāhito yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti iti /
T07hvsatssu:17917: anena manuṣyakāyenātimānuṣadharmo bhavati yaduta kāyenodakarmamagniñcā[vagāhya] nirgacchati /
T07hvsatssu:17919: kiñcāsya sukhaṃ bhavati yat yāvaddevāḥ sahāṃpatibrahmādayo 'pi nāpnuvanti /
T07hvsatssu:17922: samāhitasya saddharmaḥ sadā vardhate samāhitasya cittaṃ nānutapyate /
T07hvsatssu:17928: yadi samāhitasya siddhirbhavati tadā āryamārgasya pratilābho bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:17932: na hi dānādinā īdṛśaṃ kāryaṃ pratilabhate yadekāntataḥ pāpakānāmakaraṇam /
T07hvsatssu:17933: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yo daharo yuvā ājanma maitrīṃ bhāvayati /
T07hvsatssu:17942: yogī sarvāṇi laukikāni lokottarāṇi smaranneva kuryāt na klamathena kāryaṃ prayojayan /
T07hvsatssu:17943: anye pudgalāstena labdhaṃ pramātuṃ cittameva notpādayanti /
T07hvsatssu:17948: tadaiva nirudhyante yathā taptāyaḥpātre patitā jalakaṇikā /
T07hvsatssu:17951: tadaiva nirudhyante yathā tṛṇāgre 'vaśyāyabinduḥ sūrya uditamātre śuṣyati /
T07hvsatssu:17962: prajñāvān bhagavacchāsane samāhito na kampate tadyathā śailo na vāyunā kampyate /
T07hvsatssu:17970: yathā ānandaḥ śāriputraṃ pṛcchati- ṣaṇṇām [āyuṣman] sparśāyatanānāmaśeṣavirāganirodhādasti anyatkiñcit /
T07hvsatssu:17976: naivāsti no ca naivāstyanyaditi ca praśne prativacanamapi tathā syāt /
T07hvsatssu:17978: (u) ayaṃ vastuta ātmadharmapraśnaḥ yadyekaḥ yadi vāneka iti /
T07hvsatssu:17986: yadi paśyati sattvaṃ śūnyaṃ dharmāśca śūnyā iti sa niṣprapañcārāmaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:18000: (u) yogī lokamanityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyamanātmakaṃ dṛṣṭvā nirvāṇe upaśamasaṃjñāmutpādayati /
T07hvsatssu:18003: yadi vā kalyāṇamitrāt yadi vā sūtrādhyayanāt saṃsāra ādīnavaṃ śṛṇoti /
T07hvsatssu:18014: śraddhāvān nāma[yaḥ] triṣu ratneṣu caturṣu satyeṣu ca vigatavicikitso bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:18024: adhimuktakulotpannaḥ śrāddhena sahavṛttikaḥ sadādhimukticittaṃ bhāvayan apratilabdhasamādhirapi vicikitsāṃ na karoti / evamādi /
T07hvsatssu:18035: ato 'gniṃ manthāno na viramamāṇo sahasāgniṃ vindate /
T07hvsatssu:18037: prajñāvattvena caturṇāmaṅgānāṃ phalaṃ bhavati yaduta mārgaphalam /
T07hvsatssu:18043: sarveṣāṃ pāpakānāṃ parivarjanaṃ sarveṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ sañcayaśca yogino 'ṅgam /
T07hvsatssu:18046: ihaśāstā [anyataro vā] gurusthānīyaḥ [sa brahmacārī] bhikṣūnāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
T07hvsatssu:18048: tathā tathā [tasmin dharme] arthapratisaṃvedī ca dharmapratisaṃvedī ca bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:18055: yatra bhikṣo[rapramattasyātāpinaḥ] prahitātmano viharato ['vimuktaṃ] cittaṃ vimucyate /
T07hvsatssu:18061: pañcamaṃ samādhinimittasya sugrahaṇaṃ yaduta navanimittādīni yathāpūrvamuktāni /
T07hvsatssu:18062: (pṛ) śāstā [anyataro] vā gurusthānīyaḥ sabrahmacārī kasmāt bhikṣūṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
T07hvsatssu:18069: ime pudgalā viśuddhaśīlādiguṇasampannāḥ tadyathā subhājanaṃ samṛddhiṃ samādātuṃ bhavyam ityato dharmadeśanāṃ karoti /
T07hvsatssu:18072: abhābhyāmubhābhyāṃ jāyate prītiḥ yāvatsamāhitasya yathābhūtajñānaṃ jāyate /
T07hvsatssu:18074: āsāṃ trisṛṇāṃ prajñānāṃ trīṇi phalāni bhavanti yaduta nirvedo vairāgyaṃ vimuktiḥ /
