T07hvsatssu:18075: dharmaṃ śrutvādhītya ca pareṣāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
T07hvsatssu:18100: uktañca sūtre- bahuśrutasyāniśaṃsā yaduta paraśāsanaṃ nānuvartate,
T07hvsatssu:18106: asminnupaśamadharme śrotā vā adhyetā vā anuvicintayitā vā kṣipraṃ vimucyate /
T07hvsatssu:18111: prajñayā āsravāṇāṃ kṣayaṃ vindate na puṇyaṃ gauravaṃ vā /
T07hvsatssu:18116: ānandaḥ kasmāt prathame 'ntime ca yāme vimuktiṃ nālabhata /
T07hvsatssu:18117: (u) ānando na yāvanmastakamupadhāne nyadhatta tāvadeva vimuktimalabhata /
T07hvsatssu:18130: yo 'kṣaṇebhyomuktaḥ sa mārgaṃ samādātuṃ bhavyo bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:18132: [tāni] pratirūpadeśavāsaḥ satpuruṣopāśrayaḥ ātmasamyakpraṇidhiḥ pūrve ca kṛtapuṇyatā iti /
T07hvsatssu:18133: [sa] catvāri srotaāpattyaṅgāni ca sādhayati yaduta satpuruṣasaṃvāsaḥ saddharmaśravaṇaṃ,
T07hvsatssu:18136: yathoktaṃ sūtre- trīn dharmānaprahāya na jarāvyādhimaraṇāni santarati / iti /
T07hvsatssu:18153: [iha bhikṣurekatya ekatyo] 'nyataraṃ devanikāyaṃ praṇidhāya brahmacaryaṃ carati /
T07hvsatssu:18166: yadi kaścitkāyāsaktaḥ sukhī bhavatītyato ['paraḥ] kaścidāgatya laghu (SSS_465) nindati /
T07hvsatssu:18172: nandirāgādayo madhyaugha āvartaḥ pūtibhāvo 'pi ca na syuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:18179: yathā kumbhasadṛśaṃ stanamiti vacanaṃ tadākāramātraṃ gṛhṇāti na kāṭhinyaṃ mārdavaṃ vā /
T07hvsatssu:18180: yathā ca candropamaṃ vadanamiti vacanaṃ śobhā pauṣkalyaṃ gṛhṇāti na tadākāram /
T07hvsatssu:18182: na tu yathāyaṃ dāruskandhaḥ strotomadhyagatastasmin pāre 'smin vā āsajyate pūtībhavati vā / ityādi /
T07hvsatssu:18183: śāstrācārya āha- yathā gaṅgāstroto niyamena mahārṇavaṃ prāpnoti /
T07hvsatssu:18189: ānāpānasya ṣoḍaśākārā yaduta sasmṛta evāśvasiti smṛta eva praśvasiti /
T07hvsatssu:18190: dīrghaṃ vā āśvasan dīrghamāśvasimīti prajānāti dīrghaṃ vā praśvasan dīrghaṃ praśvasimīti prajānāti //
T07hvsatssu:18225: tathā yogyapi audārike citte pravṛtte hrasvaṃ [śvasati] /
T07hvsatssu:18227: dīrghaṃ śvasatīti yadi yogī sūkṣmacitte sthitaḥ,
T07hvsatssu:18231: yathā tasyaiva klāntasya viśrāntasya āśrāsapraśvāsā sūkṣmā anupatanti /
T07hvsatssu:18232: tasmin samaye dīrghā aśvāsa praśvāsā bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:18234: yogī kāye tucchādhimuktaḥ sarvaromakūpeṣu vāyumantarbahiścāriṇaṃ paśyati /
T07hvsatssu:18236: dhātubalalābhino vyupaśāntacittasya yogina audārikā āśvāsapraśvāsā vyupaśāntā bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:18253: vedanāyāṃ rāgo jāyata ityato vedanāṃ cittasaṃskāraṃ paśyati /
T07hvsatssu:18259: yogī praśrambhayan vedanāsvādaṃ paśyati cittaṃ śāntaṃ na līnaṃ noddhatam /
T07hvsatssu:18275: (pṛ) kasmādānāpānasmṛtirāryavihāra iti divyavihāra iti brahmavihāra iti śaikṣavihāra iti aśaikṣavihāra iti cocyate /
T07hvsatssu:18286: (u) aśubhabhāvanayā alabdhavairāgyasya ātmadurviṇṇasya kāyacitte vyāmohite syātām /
T07hvsatssu:18289: yathā valgumuttitīrṣayā bhikṣavo 'śubhabhāvanayā atīva nirviṇṇā viṣapānabhṛgupatanādibhirvividhairātmānaṃ dhnanti sma /
T07hvsatssu:18290: na tathā ime ṣoḍaśākārā vairāgyaprāpakā api na durnivedajanakā bhavantītyato viśiṣyante /
T07hvsatssu:18298: sarve hi kleśā vitarkaṃ pratītya jāyante /
T07hvsatssu:18308: yathā anyadvastu smarati citte sadā āśvāsapraśvāsā bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:18310: yathā ca pratibimbaṃ svayaṃ pravartate na puruṣaḥ karoti /
T07hvsatssu:18323: ya (SSS_469) ānāpānabhūmigataḥ [tasya] asti tu ānāpānabhūmi- cittam /
T07hvsatssu:18335: [ṣaṭ pratyayā] yaduta gaṇanā anubandhanā śamatho vipaśyanā vivartanaṃ pariśuddhiḥ /
T07hvsatssu:18337: triprakārā gaṇanā samā vā atiriktā vā nyūnā vā /
T07hvsatssu:18338: samā nāma daśasu satsu daśeti gaṇayati /
T07hvsatssu:18342: vipaśyanā nāma yogī āśvāsapraśvāsān kāyānubaddhān maṇiṣu sūtravatpaśyati /
T07hvsatssu:18344: vivartanaṃ nāma cittaṃ pratītya kāyasya pravṛttiḥ,
T07hvsatssu:18347: pariśuddhirnāma yogini sarvakleśaiḥ sarvākṣaṇaiśca vimukte cittaṃ pariśudhyati /
T07hvsatssu:18351: yato yogī kevalamānāpāne cittaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayan sarvān vitarkānupacchedayati /
T07hvsatssu:18352: yaḥ ṣoḍaśavidhamācarituṃ samarthaḥ sa paripūrṇa ityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:18362: pañcaskandheṣu nirākṛteṣu prajñaptirnirākṛteti kaḥ punarupayoga ānāpānasmṛtyā /
T07hvsatssu:18373: uktañca sūtre yogī ānāpānaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ dīrgha[māśvasan] vā [śikṣate] hrasvaṃ vā sarvakāyapratisaṃvedī vā praśrambhayan kāyasaṃskāraṃ vā [śikṣate]
T07hvsatssu:18379: anyasmin sūtretūktam- yogī ānāpāne [sthitaḥ] kāye samudayadharmānudarśī vyayadharmānudarśī,
T07hvsatssu:18387: yathoktaṃ sūtre- mamaudārikaṃ prītiprāmodyaṃ cittasya dūṣaṇamabhūt iti /
T07hvsatssu:18391: (u) yoginaḥ śūnya tāmanusmarato na prītipramodyaṃ jāyate /
T07hvsatssu:18392: asti sattva iti saṃjñayā hi prītiprāmodyaṃ jāyate /
T07hvsatssu:18395: yogī evamanusmaret- hetupratyayai vividhā dharmā jāyate yadutātapālokādayo dharmāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:18397: ye prītiprāmodyakarā dharmāḥ te sarve parimārgitā vyagravikṣepakā iti paśyato yogina audārikaṃ prītiprāmodyaṃ nirudhyate /
T07hvsatssu:18401: yogī nirodhalakṣaṇaṃ lābhaṃ paśyatītyato nātapālokādibhiḥ [tasya] prītiprāmodyaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:18402: ayaṃ yogī upaśamaṃ bhāvayan kleśānāṃ kṣayamicchati /
T07hvsatssu:18407: loke yāni bhairavasthānāni tāni sarvāṇi yogī paśyati /
T07hvsatssu:18408: tāni sarvāṇi anityaṃ vikṣepakamiti parīkṣya [tāni] nānuvidadhīta /
T07hvsatssu:18419: na hiṃsāprayogapratyaya ityanusmarato na bhavati bhīrutā /
T07hvsatssu:18420: yogyayaṃ mārge paramābhirata ityataḥ kāyajīvite 'napekṣo bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:18443: yathā vā dāntā vīṇāyāstantryo 'tyāyatā vātiśithilā vā ubhayathā na svaraṃ sādhayanti /
T07hvsatssu:18445: yathā bhagavānanuruddhamāha- atyārabdhavīryasya kausīdyaṃ bhavet iti /
T07hvsatssu:18471: punastrividhaṃ samādhau samāpattilakṣaṇaṃ sthitilakṣaṇaṃ vyutthānalakṣaṇam iti /
T07hvsatssu:18474: yadāha- ahameva samādhimupasampadya viharāmi na tu sa itīdaṃ mānaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:18475: yadāha- sa evopasampadya viharati nāhamitīdaṃ mānakalpaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:18480: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yo bhikṣurekadharmeṇa samanvitaḥ sa na paśyati cakṣuranityamiti /
T07hvsatssu:18482: (pṛ) sarve 'vītarāgāḥ sattvā kiṃ na paśyanti cakṣuranityamiti /
T07hvsatssu:18485: samutpannarāgo na paśyati cakṣuranityamiti iti vaktavyam /
T07hvsatssu:18491: sūtre coktā srayodaśa kṛṣṇadharmāḥ samādhipratikūlāḥ trayodaśa śukladharmāḥ samādhyanukūlāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:18492: yadbhagavānāha- trīṇa dharmānaprahāya na jarāvyādhimaraṇaṃ tarati /
T07hvsatssu:18497: atha santi trayo dharmāḥ ayoniśomanaskāro duścaritamatilīnacittatā /
T07hvsatssu:18500: atha santi trayo dharmā auddhatyamindriyeṣvaguptadvāratā śīlavipannatā /
T07hvsatssu:18501: atha santi trayo dharmāḥ asrāddhyaṃ dauśśīlyaṃ kausīdyamiti /
T07hvsatssu:18502: atha santi trayo dharmāḥ sajjane 'ratiḥ saddharmaśravaṇe dveṣaḥ paradoṣaprakaṭane prītiḥ /
T07hvsatssu:18503: ata santi trayo dharmaḥ agauravatā saṃkathyadūṣaṇaṃ duṣprajñasevanam /
T07hvsatssu:18504: trīn dharmānaprahāya na prajahāti asatkāraṃ saṃkathyadūṣaṇaṃ duṣprajñasevanam [katame trayaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:18506: ahrīkyamanapatrāpyaṃ pramādaṃ prahāya prajahāti asatkāraṃ saṃkathyadūṣaṇaṃ duṣprajñasevanam /
T07hvsatssu:18507: [evaṃ] yāvatsatkāyadṛṣṭiṃ śīlavrataparāmarśaṃ vicikitsāṃ prajahan prajahāti rāgadveṣamohān jarāvyādhimaraṇāni ca tarati /
T07hvsatssu:18512: muṣitasmṛtyasaṃ prajanyavikṣiptacittānāṃ samuccheda eva yat caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānāṃ bhāvanā /
T07hvsatssu:18517: ahrīkyānapatrāpyapramādānāñca samuccheda eva yat gṛhiṇaḥ pariśuddhiḥ /
T07hvsatssu:18518: kasmāt / yat kaścit rahogataḥ pāpakaṃ kṛtvā na lajjate tadāhrīkyam /
T07hvsatssu:18519: yat sa pāpakacittapravṛtterūrdhvaṃ saṅghamadhye 'pi pāpakaṃ kṛtvā nāpatrapate /
T07hvsatssu:18525: evaṃ sati ācāryaṃ parivarjya ciraṃ durjanopasadanaṃ duṣprajñasevanam /
T07hvsatssu:18529: ato 'śrāddho bhūtvā dauḥśīlyaṃ samādāya kusīdo bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:18530: durjanaṃ sevamānaḥ [ārya]śāsanamaśraddadhāna āha- nāsti duṣkṛtasya vipāka iti /
T07hvsatssu:18531: duṣkṛtamācaran vipākaṃ vindata iti śṛṇvanmātro vā kukkaṭaśvādidharmaṃ samādāyātyantikapāpameva kāṅkṣate /
T07hvsatssu:18533: kausīdyāt sajjane 'prīto bhavati yat tattvato nāsti samyak caryāvihārīti /
T07hvsatssu:18534: saddharmaśravaṇaṃ dviṣan āha samyak caritadharmā mithyādharmāḥ nāsti tataḥ kaścanopakāra iti /
T07hvsatssu:18535: cittakaṣāyāt paradoṣaprakaṭane prīta āha- parasya dharmacaryāto matsadṛśaṃ nāsti kiñcilabdhamiti /
T07hvsatssu:18544: cittasya mohāt na trīṇi saṃyojanāni samucchedayati /
T07hvsatssu:18549: tasmin varṣe māse ayane samādhimamukaṃ nālabha iti cintayato yoginaḥ śoko jāyate /
T07hvsatssu:18554: saṃkṣipya yāvaccīvarapiṇḍapātādayo dharmāḥ kuśalamūlāpakarṣaḥ akuśalamūlaprakarṣaśca sarvāṇi samādherapakṣālāni bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:18558: (pṛ) bhagavān tatra tatra sūtre bhikṣūnāmantryāha- [iha bhikṣuḥ] araṇyagato vāyatanagato
T07hvsatssu:18559: vā vṛkṣamūlagato vā śūnyāgāragato vā manasi kuryāt dvau dharmau yaduta śamatho vipaśyanāca iti /
T07hvsatssu:18564: sarve ca kuśaladharmā bhāvanājātā iti dvāvimau parigṛhītau /
T07hvsatssu:18597: laukikāḥ sattvāḥ sarve sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā iti dvayorantayoḥ patitāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:18628: (pṛ) yadi śamatho vipaśyanā cittaṃ bhāvayati prajñāṃ bhāvayati /
T07hvsatssu:18640: yathoktaṃ sūtre- śamatho bhāvito rāgaṃ prajahātīti /
T07hvsatssu:18645: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yogī nirāmiṣāṃ prītiṃ labhamānaḥ sāmiṣāṃ prītiṃ jahāti iti /
T07hvsatssu:18649: avidyāprahāṇāddhi rāgādayaḥ kleśāḥ prahīyante nirudhyante nāvaśiṣyante /
T07hvsatssu:18655: asti ca dvidhā vimuktiḥ sāmayikavimuktiḥ akopyavimuktiriti /
T07hvsatssu:18663: samayavimukto hi yat adhikabalena kañcitkālaṃ saṃyojanāni vighnayati nātyantaṃ prajahāti /
T07hvsatssu:18681: ato māraḥ śaikṣo vivṛttakāyaskandhaṃ mṛta iti ācaturdigantaṃ tadvijñāpanāya yena bhagavān tenopasaṃkramya bhagavantametadavocat /
T07hvsatssu:18684: atha khalu bhagavān [māra iti viditvā ta]mavocat /
T07hvsatssu:18699: nāsti tu kaścit [kevalaṃ] śamathaṃ spṛṣṭvā rāgamātyantikaṃ prajahātīti /
T07hvsatssu:18700: tathā cet tīrthikā api rāgamātyantikaṃ prajahyuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:18715: yadi smṛtyupasthānādīni nirvedhabhāgīyāni spṛṣṭvā cittaṃ parigṛhṇāti /
T07hvsatssu:18717: sarve ca yogino dvāvimau dharmau niśritya cittaṃ nirudhya vimuktiṃ spṛśanti //
T07hvsatssu:18723: (u) pratyakṣaṃ paśyāmaḥ khalu kāyikaṃ karma pratikṣaṇavināśyapi bhāvanāvaśādvibhinnakauśalaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:18724: bhāvanāvaśāt ciraṃ punaḥ punaḥ pravartyamānaṃ sat sukaraṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:18726: anuvihitāvṛtti āvṛttyā ca praguṇīkṛtaṃ dṛḍhībhūtañca susmaraṇaṃ bhavati yathādhyayanādi /
T07hvsatssu:18727: mānasaṃ karma ca kṣaṇikamapi bhāvayitavyamiti jñātavyam /
T07hvsatssu:18733: yathā kaścit punaḥ punarmaithunacittaṃ bhāvayan bahūn kāmānabhinirvartayati /
T07hvsatssu:18735: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yo yadvastucittaṃ manasi karoti sa tatra pratipannaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:18739: ato jñāyate cittamidaṃ kṣaṇikamapi bhāvayitavyaṃ bhavatīti /
T07hvsatssu:18742: yathoktaṃsūtre- yogī khalu ayoniśo manasikārāt kāmādīnāsravānanutpannānutpādayati /
T07hvsatssu:18746: tadyathā bījādaṅkuramaṅkurātkāṇḍaṃ kāṇḍānnāḷaṃ nāḷāt patraṃ patrātpuṣpaṃ puṣpātphalamiti pratyakṣato hetuto 'nupūrvaṃ vivardhate /
T07hvsatssu:18748: pratyakṣato dṛṣṭaṃ khalu vāsitatilasya gandhaḥ saṃṅgkrātyā vardhata iti /
T07hvsatssu:18751: ato jñāyate kṣaṇikā dharmā api bhāvayitavyā iti /
T07hvsatssu:18756: (u) nāsti kaścidvidyamānadharmaḥ sarve ca dharmāḥ kṣaṇikā iti pūrvameva sādhitam /
T07hvsatssu:18760: svarūpata eva sadāsthitasya bhāvanayā ka upakāraḥ /
T07hvsatssu:18770: ato 'prāptaṃ na bhāvyata iti tava vacanaṃ na dūṣaṇāya bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:18771: pratyakṣato dṛśyate ca hetuphalayorayaugapadye 'pi bhavatyeva hetoḥ phalaṃ bhavatīti /
T07hvsatssu:18774: evaṃ prajñā pūrvacitaṃ bhāvayati tadūrdhvacittamupacitaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:18787: yathā bhavatāṃ sūtra uktaṃ- agnisaṃyogādaṇuṣu kṛṣṇavarṇe niruddhe raktavarṇaṃ jāyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:18790: yadyādāvagnisaṃyuktadharmasya raktavarṇamutpadyata iti punaḥ paścādagnisaṃyuktadharmaḥ kimartham /
T07hvsatssu:18795: yadi bhavatāmabhisandhiḥ raktavarṇaṃ kramaśo jāyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:18798: sarve dharmā sahetusapratyayā api kramaśo jāyante /
T07hvsatssu:18800: evaṃ prajñāsamādhyādayo dharmāḥ kṣaṇikā api avaramadhyottamadharmakrameṇa jāyante /
T07hvsatssu:18802: yathā pakṣacchadasyoṣmaṇi mṛdunyapi aṇḍaṃ kramaśo vikriyate /
T07hvsatssu:18814: yathā bahubhiḥ puṣpairekasmin samaye tilaṃ vāsayati na yathā puṣpālpāni kramaśaściraṃ vāsayanti /
T07hvsatssu:18815: medasā paripuṣṭiḥ jale [naukā] nimajjanaṃ bhittinirmāṇaṃ ityādirapi tathā /
T07hvsatssu:18819: bālakādīnāṃ śarīraṃ stanyapānādinā paripacyata itīdamapi tathā syāt /
T07hvsatssu:18820: ato jñāyate dharmabhāvanā sūkṣmā praṇītā duravabodhā ceti /
T07hvsatssu:18829: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yaḥ kuśaladharmeṣu na bhāvanāyogamanuyuktaḥ kuśaladharmānanupādāya kevalaṃ praṇidadhāti āsravebhyaścittavimokam /
T07hvsatssu:18838: kintu pariśuddhatailaṃ pariśuddhavartikāñcobhayamapekṣya [anya]vastusaṃsparśacāñcalyarāhitye ca tatprakāśaḥ pariśuddho bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:18841: nāpi ca praṇidhānamātrāt deho rūpaṃ balañca labhate /
T07hvsatssu:18845: ko jñānī hetoḥ phalaṃ jāyata iti prajānan taddhetumupekṣya anyasmātphalamākāṃkṣeta /
T07hvsatssu:18846: dharma bhāvayan dṛṣṭa eva phalavipākaṃ paśyati /
T07hvsatssu:18847: yathoktaṃ sūtre- tiṣṭhantu saptadināni mayā śāsitāḥ śrāvakā muhūrtaṃ tāvatkuśaladharmaṃ bhāvayanto 'pramāṇavarṣeṣu nityaṃ sukhāṃ vedanāṃ spṛśanti iti /
T07hvsatssu:18848: bhikṣuṇyo bhadantamānandamavocan- vayaṃ smṛtyupasthāneṣu supratiṣṭhitacittā viharantyaḥ pūrveṇāparaṃ viśeṣaṃ samprajānīma iti /
T07hvsatssu:18849: sūtre ca bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantryāha- aśaṭhasya māmupasaṅkramato yanmayā prātarupadiṣṭo dharmaḥ tadartha sāyaṃ vindate /
T07hvsatssu:18850: yat sāyamupadiṣṭo dharmaḥ prātastaddhitaṃ vindata iti /
T07hvsatssu:18851: yaccārhanmārgaṃ spṛśati na tat parapudgalaḥ prayacchati /
T07hvsatssu:18854: anuttaraṃ buddhamārga eva nanu kuśaladharmasyopacitabhāvanayā spṛśati /
T07hvsatssu:18855: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantryāha- dvau dharmau niśrityāhamanuttaraṃ mārgaṃ samāpannaḥ yat śubhābhiratāvanirvedo mārgabhāvanāyāmaklāntiśca iti /
T07hvsatssu:18870: yogī sucaritacaryāyā asti phalavipāka ityanusmṛtya alabhamāno 'pi na viṣādaṃ karoti /
T07hvsatssu:18871: kiñca yogī manasi kuryāt- mayā bhāvanāyāḥ phalavipāko 'nuprāpta eva /
T07hvsatssu:18878: vimuktāvapi cādhimuktatā abhyāgatasambuddhitā ityetaiḥ pratyayaiḥ samanvitaḥ kathaṃ
T07hvsatssu:18882: (SSS_484) kleśānāṃ prahāṇamatisūkṣmaṃ dūravabodhaṃ vāśījaṭāyāṃ kramaśaḥ kṣayavat /
T07hvsatssu:18885: ato jñāyate kuśalaṃ bhāvayituṃ vīryamuttamaṃ bhavatīti /
T07hvsatssu:18886: alpīyasī prajñāpi kleśān vināśayati yathā alpīyān prakāśo 'ndhakāramapanayati /
T07hvsatssu:18893: yogī samanucintayet samādhisamāpattiratikṛcchrā yathā purā bodhisattvaḥ puṇyena prajñayā ca ghaniṣṭhaḥ ṣaṭvarṣāṇi vyavasyan ante 'nuprāptaḥ
T07hvsatssu:18908: sadā kuśalasya bhāvayitā dṛṣṭa eva kāyena āsravāṇāṃ kṣayaṃ spṛśet /
T07hvsatssu:18909: yadi vā maraṇakāle spṛśet yadi vā āyuṣo 'nte susthāna upapadya tadantarā spṛśet /
T07hvsatssu:18911: yogī adhyātmaṃ cittaṃ vīralakṣaṇaṃ puraskṛtyaivaṃ cintayati ahaṃ kleśāvaraṇamaparyādāya na kadācidvṛthā pratinivarta iti /
T07hvsatssu:18912: kiñca yogī mānacittamāśrityaivaṃ cintayati- śraddhādīni kuśalendriyāṇi santīti anye samādhiṃ pratipadyante /
T07hvsatssu:18915: yathā purā bodhisattvaḥ arāḍādibhyo munibhyo dharmaṃ śrutvaivamacintayat ime śraddhādikuśalendriyatvāt dharmamanuprāpnuvan /
T07hvsatssu:18917: yogī prajānāti- kleśā durbalāḥ prajñā balavatī /
T07hvsatssu:18919: yathoktaṃ- bhikṣuḥ ṣaḍbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgato mukhamārutena himavantaṃ [parvatarājamapi] pradalayet /
T07hvsatssu:18921: kiñca yogī cintayati- ahaṃ pūrvādhvani na samādhiṃ bhāvitavān /
T07hvsatssu:18927: api ca yogī cintayati- yadyahaṃ sadā vīryamārabhe yadi cānanuprāptamanuprāpnomi /
T07hvsatssu:18935: prajñāptau prajñeti saṃjñā na tu jñānam /
T07hvsatssu:18938: āryaśrāvakāḥ prajñāsinā saṃyojanānubaddhān anuśayaparyavanaddhān sarvān kleśān samucchedayati /
T07hvsatssu:18946: yathoktaṃ sūtra- anityasaṃjñā bhāvitā [bahulīkṛtā] sarvaṃ kāmarāgaṃ paryādāti /
T07hvsatssu:18950: prajñayā yaḥ kleśānāṃ samucchedaḥ [sa eva] saṃjñayetyucyate /
T07hvsatssu:18951: (SSS_486) asti bhagavato dvividhaṃ vacanaṃ- paramārthavacanaṃ saṃjñāvacanamiti /
T07hvsatssu:18953: ayaṃ maitrīdharmaḥ paramārthato na saṃyojanaṃ samucchedayati /
T07hvsatssu:18955: yathoktaṃ- jñānāsiḥ sarvān kleśān samucchedayati iti /
T07hvsatssu:18956: ato jñāyate maitrī saṃyojanaṃ samucchedayatīti saṃjñāvacanam /
T07hvsatssu:18959: yat anityaṃ rūpaṃ anityamiti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T07hvsatssu:18969: tattvajñānameva kleśān samucchedayatītyataḥ prajñaiva tattva[jñāna]miti jñāyate /
T07hvsatssu:18971: yogī paśyati vai loke sarve devāśca mānuṣāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:18973: laukikā bhūyasā tucchakaṃ nityaṃ sukhaṃ subhamityādi dṛṣṭvā tattvajñānādbhaṣṭā bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:18977: āha ca bhagavān sūtre- yasya dhanaṃ vinaṣṭhaṃ,
T07hvsatssu:18983: āhaca- pradyotānāṃ candrasūryapradyota alpīyān prajñāpradyoto 'gra iti /
T07hvsatssu:18993: ato jñāyate prajñā vastutaḥ paramārthālambanā bhavatīti /
T07hvsatssu:19004: uktaṃ hi sūtre- kiṃ vijānāti vijñānam /
T07hvsatssu:19009: ato laukikaṃ cittaṃ prajñaptimātramālambate na tattvamiti bhavadvacanamayuktam /
T07hvsatssu:19012: kiñcāha bhagavān- dve samyak dṛṣṭī laukikī lokottareti /
T07hvsatssu:19013: puṇyapāpādyastitva [samyak dṛṣṭi]laukikī yadāryaśrāvakāṇāṃ duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgānālambya anāsravasmṛtyā samprayuktā prajñā lokottarā /
T07hvsatssu:19016: adhvanāṃ śatasāhasraṃ na yāvaddurgatau gataḥ // iti /
T07hvsatssu:19017: uktañca sūtre- mithyācāriṇaḥ susthāne janma bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:19024: āha ca bhagavān- trividhā prajñā śrutamayī prajñā,
T07hvsatssu:19031: āha ca pañcadharmā aparipavkaṃ vimukticittaṃ vipācayanti iti /
T07hvsatssu:19039: bhagavān svayamāha- dharmajñānamanvayajñāna paracittajñānañca laukikaṃ jñānamiti /
T07hvsatssu:19041: api cāha- dharmāṇāṃ sthitijñānaṃ nirvāṇajñānaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:19046: (pṛ) yo dharmo bhave pātakaḥ sa sāsravaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:19052: yadbhavatoktam- asti laukikaṃ cittamaprajñaptyavalambanaṃ yadviṣayādīnāṃ vijñānamiti /
T07hvsatssu:19055: āha khalu bhagavān- pṛthagjanāḥ satataṃ prajñaptimanudhāvantīti /
T07hvsatssu:19057: sarvapṛthagjanacittaṃ prajñaptiṃ na paryādātītyataḥ sadā asmitālakṣaṇamanudhāvati /
T07hvsatssu:19062: ato jñāyate sarvaṃ laukikaṃ cittaṃ prajñaptimavalambata iti /
T07hvsatssu:19063: yaduktaṃ bhavatā- laukikī prajñā yaduta dvidhā samyagdṛṣṭirityādi iti /
T07hvsatssu:19064: tatredaṃ prativaktavyam- asti cittadvaividhyaṃ mohacittaṃ jñānacittamiti /
T07hvsatssu:19072: idaṃ pṛthagjanacittaṃ sadā prajñaptigataṃ sat prajñaptimavalambate /
T07hvsatssu:19075: idānīṃ yadi sarvaṃ laukikaṃ jñānaṃ prajñaptimavalambate /
T07hvsatssu:19091: pṛthagjanā yadvadanti ghaṭa iti pudgala iti /
T07hvsatssu:19093: śaikṣā ātmadṛṣṭivihīnā api samyaksmṛtipramoṣat pañcasu skandheṣu asmimānalakṣaṇena vadanti- ayaṃ pudgalaḥ ayaṃ ghaṭa iti /
T07hvsatssu:19096: yathā mahākāśyapaḥ saṅghāṭiṃ dṛṣṭvā āha- iyaṃ mameti [yat] divyarddhau vicikitsāṃ janayati /
T07hvsatssu:19097: bhagavān tadvivṛṇvannāha- ayamatyantasamuddhatamānendriyaḥ pradagdhahetupratyayaḥ kathaṃ sābhimānaḥ syāt /
T07hvsatssu:19101: dve samyagdṛṣṭī ityādī sūtraṃ kathaṃ neyam /
T07hvsatssu:19103: bhagavān dharmāṇāṃ tattvalakṣaṇapratisaṃvedī vineyasattvānanusṛtya vividhaṃ nāma sthāpayati /
T07hvsatssu:19106: api cāha anityādisaṃjñā bhāvitā sarvān kleśān paribhedayatīti /
T07hvsatssu:19107: āha ca- caturthamakṛṣṇamaśuklaṃ karma sarvakarmāṇi śaikṣacetanākhyāni kṣapayatīti /
T07hvsatssu:19108: kiñcāha- manasā sarvānabhiviveśān prajahātīti / āha ca-
T07hvsatssu:19117: vaktavyā ca dvividhā saṃjñā lokaṃ pratītya satyaṃ,
T07hvsatssu:19121: kācit mohakāṣṭhātmikā saṃjñā yāvat laukikakuśalākuśalāni na vijānāti /
T07hvsatssu:19125: itīyaṃ saṃjñā skandhalakṣaṇaparibhedakaṃ jñānamanukūlayatītyato bhagavānupadiśati jñānamiti /
T07hvsatssu:19126: iyañca saṃjñā tattvajñānasya hetuṃ karotītyato jñānami tyucyate /
T07hvsatssu:19133: saptāsravasūtre ca vacanaprahāṇavṛttiprahāṇādaya āsravahetava āsravā ityucyante /
T07hvsatssu:19140: (pṛ) smṛtyupasthāneṣu uṣmādiṣu ca gataṃ cittaṃ tattvadharmamālambate /
T07hvsatssu:19143: ato yatra prajñaptividhamanaṃ cittaṃ tadanu samāgataṃ cittamanāsravaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:19149: anātmasaṃjñayā cittaṃ bhāvayatāṃ kṣipraṃ rāgadveṣamohebhyo vimucyate ityādi /
T07hvsatssu:19151: anātmasaṃjñayā hi cittaṃ bhāvayatāṃ duḥkhasaṃjñā pratitiṣṭhati /
T07hvsatssu:19161: (u) sūtra uktam- anityasaṃjñābhāvitaṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ cittamanātmasaṃjñāyāṃ pratitiṣṭhati iti /
T07hvsatssu:19165: ātmavādī hi paralokasādhanāyāha- ātmā nitya iti /
T07hvsatssu:19166: ataḥ pañcaskandhā anityā iti paśyan anātmāna iti prajānāti /
T07hvsatssu:19171: ātmā ma utpadyate vyeti cetyasyāgataṃ bhavati / iti /
T07hvsatssu:19189: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā vāśījaṭopamasūtre- jānataḥ paśyata āsravāṇāṃ kṣayaṃ vadāmi /
T07hvsatssu:19190: kiṃ jānataḥ kiṃ paśyata āsravāṇāṃ kṣayo bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:19197: evameva bhāvanānuyogamanuyuktasya bhikṣornaivaṃ jñānaṃ bhavati etāvatko bata me 'dyāsravāṇāṃ kṣīṇam /
T07hvsatssu:19199: atha khalvasya kṣīṇe kṣīṇānta eva jñānaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:19204: ato jñāyate smṛtyupasthānādigato mārgāṅgabhāvanānuyogamanuktaḥ srotaāpattiphalapratipannaka iti /
T07hvsatssu:19205: yadyekasmin kṣaṇe yadi vā pañcadaśasu kṣaṇeṣu na bhāvanānuyogaṃ vindate /
T07hvsatssu:19209: iti vedanā iti jñānamiti prathamamuktamādyaphalasya mārgaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:19219: ataḥ smṛtyupasthānādau pūtibhūtaḥ san pṛthagjano bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:19223: ato jñāyate smṛtyupasthānādigataḥ viprakṛṣṭaḥ pratipannaka ityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:19224: kiñcogreṇa saṅghe nimantrite devatā upasaṅkramya ārocayanti- amuko gṛhapate arhan yāvadamuka ādyaphalapratipannaka iti /
T07hvsatssu:19228: kiñcoktaṃ bhagavatā sūtre- yasya [khalu bhikṣava imāni] pañcendriyāṇi (śraddhādīni) na santi /
T07hvsatssu:19229: tamahaṃ bāhyaḥ pṛthagjanapakṣe sthita iti vadāmīti /
T07hvsatssu:19234: ayamābhyantaraḥ pṛthagjana ārya ityupyucyate pṛthagjana ityapyucyate /
T07hvsatssu:19243: atha ca [tatra] channasya [cittaṃ] na dharmaniyāme praskandati /
T07hvsatssu:19248: (u) yo nirodhaṃ paśyati sa tattvataḥ pratipannakaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:19249: yo dūrabhāgīyakuśalendriyagataḥ paśyati pañcaskandhā anityāḥ duḥkhā śūnyā anātmāna iti /
T07hvsatssu:19253: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhikṣavo bhagavantaṃ pṛcchanti- kathaṃ dharmaṃ paśyema iti /
T07hvsatssu:19255: tatsahabhuvo vedanāsaṃjñā cetanādayaḥ sarve [dharmā] anityā vipariṇāmadharmāṇaḥ aśraddheyāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:19265: yoginaścitta evaṃ bhavati- idaṃ praṇītamupaśamapadaṃ yat sarveṣāṃ mṛṣābhūtānāṃ kāmatṛṣṇānāmapagamaḥ kṣayo virāgo nirodho nirvāṇam /
T07hvsatssu:19266: yadasmin dharme cittaṃ praskandati adhimucyate neñjate na parāvartate na śocate na paritrāsate /
T07hvsatssu:19268: ato jñāyate yogī anityādyākāraiḥ pañcaskandhānavalokayan viprakṛṣṭaḥ pratipannaka ityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:19269: teṣāṃ nirodhaṃ paśyan sannikṛṣṭaḥ pratipannaka iti /
T07hvsatssu:19270: yathā channaḥ sthavirān prativadati- mamāpyevaṃ bhavati- rūpamanityaṃ [vijñānamanityaṃ rūpamanātmā,
T07hvsatssu:19274: atha ca punarme] sarvasaṃskārasamarthe tṛṣṇākṣaye nirodhe nirvāṇe cittaṃ na praskandati,
T07hvsatssu:19280: ] na khalvimaṃ dharmaṃ paśyato bhavati / iti /
T07hvsatssu:19281: kiñcāha- yogī yadasmin dharme mṛduprajñayā kṣāntiṃ śraddadhate sa śraddhā[nusārī] pratipannakaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:19283: yastīkṣṇaprajñayā kṣāntiṃ śraddadhate sa dharmā[nusārī] pratipannakaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:19287: ato jñāyate nirodhaṃ paśyan sannikṛṣṭaḥ pratipannako bhavatīti /
T07hvsatssu:19293: bhagavān dvādaśanidānānāṃ nirodhaṃ dṛṣṭvā anuttaramabhisambuddho 'bhūt iti /
T07hvsatssu:19294: dharmamudrāyāñcoktam- pañcaskandhānanityān vipralopān mṛṣābhūtānasārān śūnyāṃśca paśyato yogino jñānadarśanamaviśuddhaṃ bhavati iti /
T07hvsatssu:19295: sūtramidamanta āha- yogina evaṃ bhavati- yanmayā dṛśyate śrūyate ājighryate rasyate spṛśyate manyate tat sarvaṃ pratītyasamutpannaṃ vijñānam
T07hvsatssu:19296: yadasya vijñānasya hetupratyayā nityā vā anityā vā iti /
T07hvsatssu:19298: anityebhyo hetupratyayebhya utpannaṃ vijñānaṃ kathaṃ nityaṃ bhavet /
T07hvsatssu:19299: ataḥ sarve pañcaskandhā anityāḥ pratītyasamutpannāḥ kṣayalakṣaṇāḥ vipariṇāmalakṣaṇā viyogalakṣaṇā nirodhalakṣaṇā iti paśyati /
T07hvsatssu:19310: sūtre hi bhagavatoktam- caturṇāmaryasatyānāṃ yathābhūtamananubodhāt evamidaṃ dīrghamadhvānaṃ [sandhāvitaṃ] saṃsaritaṃ mama ca yuṣmākañca idānīmimāni catvāri satyānyanubaddhāni /
T07hvsatssu:19318: āha ca- ye hi kecit dharmakañcukā ninditakāyāḥ samyakpravrajyāṃ śraddadhante /
T07hvsatssu:19320: ye hi kecit srotaāpattiṃ sakṛdāgāmitāmanāgāmitāñca lipsanti /
T07hvsatssu:19322: ye hi kecit arhatāṃ pratyekabuddhatāṃ buddhamārgañca lipsanti /
T07hvsatssu:19326: dharmacakrapravartane coktam- idaṃ duḥkhamayaṃ duḥkhasamudayaḥ ayaṃ duḥkhanirodhaḥ
T07hvsatssu:19327: iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipaditi paśyato mama teṣu cakṣurudapadyata jñānamudapadyata
T07hvsatssu:19330: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- avadātavasane hrade prakṣipte sati rūpaṃ [yathā] vedayate /
T07hvsatssu:19331: evamayaṃ puruṣa ekatra niṣaṇṇaścatvāri satyāni paśyati iti /
T07hvsatssu:19332: kiñcāha pariśuddhacittaḥ samyak bhāvayati- duḥkhasatyaṃ yāvanmārgasatyam /
T07hvsatssu:19333: evaṃ paśyataḥ kāmāsravāt bhavāsravādavidyāsravāt cittaṃ vimucyate /
T07hvsatssu:19338: bhagavānāha catvāri jñānāni duḥkhajñānaṃ samudayajñānaṃ nirodhajñānaṃ mārgajñānamiti /
T07hvsatssu:19341: yathā bhiṣak rogaṃ jñātvā roganidānaṃ rogavināśaṃ rogavināśauṣadhañca jānīyāt /
T07hvsatssu:19342: evaṃ yogī duḥkhānāṃ nissaraṇamicchan duḥkhaṃ duḥkhanidānaṃ duḥkhanirodhaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminīṃ pratipadañca jānīyāt /
T07hvsatssu:19343: yadi na jānāti duḥkhaṃ kena jñāsyati duḥkhanidānaṃ duḥkhanirodhaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminīṃ pratipadañca /
T07hvsatssu:19345: atrocyate / yat keṣāñciduktaṃ- catussatyānāṃ pratilābha iti /
T07hvsatssu:19346: sarvaṃ [tat] skandhadhātvāyatanādiṣūktam- yadidaṃ rūpaṃ ityādi ayaṃ rūpasya samudaya ityādi ayaṃ rūpasya vyaya ityādi prajānata āsravāḥ kṣīyanta iti /
T07hvsatssu:19347: kiñcāha bhagavān- rūpādīnāṃ skandhānāṃ yathābhūtamāsvādamādīnavaṃ nissaraṇaptaprajñāyānuttaraṃ mārgamaspṛśamiti na vadāmi /
T07hvsatssu:19349: nagaropamasūtre coktam- yadā mama na jñānamabhūt- [iti] jarāmaraṇaṃ jarāmaraṇasamudayo jarāmaraṇanirodho jarāmaraṇanirodhagāminī pratipat /
T07hvsatssu:19350: yāvat saṃskārāḥ saṃskārasamudayaḥ saṃskāranirodhaḥ saṃskāranirodhagāminī pratipat iti /
T07hvsatssu:19351: na (SSS_496) tadā vadāmi- adhigato mārga iti /
T07hvsatssu:19353: evamādi [vacanāni] dṛṣṭvā yadi [vadāmaḥ] ayameva darśanamārgādhigama iti /
T07hvsatssu:19359: tathā no cet nidānaṃ vaktavyaṃ- catussatyadarśanaṃ mārgādhigamakālīnaṃ pañcaskandhādidarśanaṃ sammarśanakālīnamiti /
T07hvsatssu:19361: pañcaskandhādīnāṃ sammarśanaṃ na kleśānāṃ prahāṇāya bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:19369: kecit dvādaśāyatanāni vā aṣṭādaśadhātūn vā dvādaśanidānāni vā anyāni vā paśyanto mārgamadhigacchanti iti /
T07hvsatssu:19370: ato jñāyate na catussatya[darśana]mātreṇa mārgādhima iti /
T07hvsatssu:19371: yadi bhavato mataṃ satyapyasmin vacane naitaddarśanena kleśān prajahātīti /
T07hvsatssu:19374: catussatyavibhaṅga uktam- jātirapi duḥkhaṃ jarāpi duḥkhaṃ vyādhirapi duḥkhaṃ maraṇamapi
T07hvsatssu:19375: duḥkhaṃ vipriyasaṃyogo duḥkhaṃ priyaviyogo duḥkhaṃ yadiṣṭaṃ na labhyate tadapi duḥkhaṃ
T07hvsatssu:19377: kiñcāha duḥkhasamudayo yeyaṃ tṛṣṇā paunarbhavikī tatra tatrābhinandinī iti /
T07hvsatssu:19379: idaṃ sarvaṃ lokasatyaṃ na tu paramārthasatyam /
T07hvsatssu:19385: pañcopādānaskandhā duḥkhamiti paśyataścittameva vikṣipyate na mārgo 'dhigamyate /
T07hvsatssu:19392: ato jñāyate yogī cittata eva saṃskṛtadharme vartate na paramārthata iti /
T07hvsatssu:19393: yathoktaṃ sūtre- saṃskṛtadharmā anṛtā māyopamā jvālopamā svapnopamā ṛṇopamā iti /
T07hvsatssu:19396: asat dṛṣṭaṃ sadābhāsaṃ asadvai parayā dhiyā // iti /
T07hvsatssu:19397: strī puruṣa iti dharmo yathābhūtaṃ nāsti /
T07hvsatssu:19398: pañcaskandhānāṃ kalāpamātre strī puruṣa iti sudṛḍhaṃ kīrtayantaḥ pṛthagjanā viparyayamugdhā vadanti /
T07hvsatssu:19401: yogī tu ime pañcaskandhāḥ śūnyā anātmāna iti bhāvayati /
T07hvsatssu:19403: yathoktaṃ dharmamudrāsūtre- yogī bhāvayati rūpamanityaṃ śūnyaṃ viyogalakṣaṇamiti /
T07hvsatssu:19406: śūnyamiti yathā ghaṭe jale 'sati śūnyo ghaṭa iti vadanti /
T07hvsatssu:19407: evaṃ pañcaskandheṣu nāstyātmā ityataḥ śūnyā bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:19410: ante tu nirodhaṃ paśyati yaduta yogina evaṃ bhavati yanmayā dṛṣṭaṃ śrutamityādi /
T07hvsatssu:19411: ato jñāyate nirodhaṃ paśyata eva kleśāḥ kṣīyanta iti /
T07hvsatssu:19416: yathā kasyacit prathamadhyāne prītisukhamalabdhavato na pañcakāmaguṇeṣu nirvedasaṃjñā jāyate /
T07hvsatssu:19417: yathā ca avitarkāvicārasamādhimalabdhvā na savitarkasavicārasamādhau doṣaṃ manyate /
T07hvsatssu:19419: ato jñātavyaṃ nirodhasatyaṃ paśyata eva duḥkhasaṃjñā sampannā bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:19429: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yogī [yat] samudayalakṣaṇaṃ tat nirodhalakṣaṇamiti prajānan suviśuddhaṃ dharmacakṣuranuprāpnoti /
T07hvsatssu:19432: skandhā anityā duḥkhā iti paśyannapi na nirodhamanuprāpnoti /
T07hvsatssu:19435: kasmāt bhagavān pudgalaḥ sukumāramatirityādi dṛṣṭvā catussatyānyudeśayati,
T07hvsatssu:19441: (pṛ) mārgalābhasamaya eva yadi satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ prahīyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:19443: (u) yogī mārgamanuprāpya dharmāḥ śūnyā anātmāna iti dṛṣṭataḥ paśyan na punarvicikitsate /
T07hvsatssu:19445: mārgasatyaṃ paśyan prajānāti idamekameva tattvaṃ nānyadastīti /
T07hvsatssu:19447: (pṛ) yadi mārgalābhakāla eva satyadarśanapraheyāḥ kleśāḥ kṣīyante /
T07hvsatssu:19450: yathā bhagavān bhīkṣūn pṛcchati- kena vastunā kiṃ vastūpādāya kiṃ vastvabhiniviśya īdṛśī dṛṣṭirbhavati /
T07hvsatssu:19451: asmin kāye mriyamāṇa eva īdṛśādayaḥ sarvā dṛṣṭayo nirudhyante /
T07hvsatssu:19455: bhagavānāha- rūpe khalu sati rūpamupādāya rūpamabhiniviśya saktāyadṛṣṭirbhavati /
T07hvsatssu:19457: ato jñātavyaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭimupādāya sarve kleśāḥ sambhavantīti /
T07hvsatssu:19459: satyāṃ hi satkāyadṛṣṭau vadanti- ayamātmā nityo vānityo veti /
T07hvsatssu:19480: dharmalakṣaṇaṃ sākṣātkurvato yogino na vicikitsā bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:19486: śīlavratasamucchedāt mārgaṃ prayujya jñāne jñeyadharmeṣu ca na vicikitsate /
T07hvsatssu:19488: sa eva samudayaṃ prahāya nirodhamadhigacchan catussatyasampanna ityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:19489: ata eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ vacanameva nirvicikitsālakṣaṇaṃ pradarśayati /
T07hvsatssu:19491: yathoktaṃ sūtre- ādyābhisambodhilakṣaṇaṃ yaduta dharmaṃ paśyati dharmaṃ pratilabhate dharmaṃ prajānāti dharmaṃ pratisaṃvedayate /
T07hvsatssu:19493: bhagavacchāsane ca vaiśāradyabalamanuprāpya phale supratitiṣṭhati / iti //
T07hvsatssu:19499: āyataneṣu dhātuṣu cokteṣu padārthā ālambanāni viṣayā jñeyā ityādayaḥ sarve dharmā bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:19508: (pṛ) uktaṃ hi sūtre- dvābhyāṃ pratyayābhyāṃ vijñānamutpadyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:19513: (u) yat bhavānāha- dvābhyāṃ pratyayābhyāṃ vijñānamutpadyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:19517: kiñcit ṣaṣṭhasya vijñānasya svakalāpe sarvathā asadālambanaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:19530: na vastutaḥ sparśasya ṣaḍāyatanāni pratyayā bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:19533: evaṃ caturaḥ pratyayān pratiṣidhyāha bhagavān dve āyatane iti /
T07hvsatssu:19537: (pṛ) anenaiva hetunā atītānāgatādayoḥ dharmāḥ santaḥ syuḥ /
T07hvsatssu:19548: yo dharma utpadya niruddhaḥ sa smaraṇīyaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:19550: kiṃ smaryeta yathā dharmaḥ pūrvaṃ sattvākhya idānīmatīto 'pi sattvākhyaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:19551: evaṃ tasmin dharme pūrvaṃ smṛtyutpādāt tadeva cittaṃ punaḥ smaryate /
T07hvsatssu:19554: tasmin dharme niruddhe 'pi tatsaṃjñānusmaraṇamutpādya [taṃ dharmaṃ] vikalpayati /
T07hvsatssu:19555: yo dharmastasya citte jāyate sa dharmo vinaṣṭaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:19556: paścāt [ta]nmanovijñānaṃ tat vastu vijānāti ida[meva] nimittālambanaṃ vijñānamityākhyayate /
T07hvsatssu:19568: yathā āryā anāgataṃ vastu jñātvā vadanti- idaṃ vastu tathā syāt,
T07hvsatssu:19570: (u) āryajñānabalaṃ hi tathā dharmamasantamapi prāk prajānāti /
T07hvsatssu:19571: yathā āryāḥ pāṣaṇabhittiṃ bhittvā apratihatamunmajjanti nimajjanti ca /
T07hvsatssu:19574: yathā cakṣurvijñānaṃ na strīti puruṣa iti vā vikalpayati /
T07hvsatssu:19582: yathā devadatta iti vacane naikaṃ vijñānaṃ catvāryakṣarāṇi vijānāti /
T07hvsatssu:19586: yathā ca puruṣasya svarūpaṃ naikakṣaṇena parijñeyamam /
T07hvsatssu:19590: bhavānavādīḥ- dṛṣṭāntaṃ pratītya nāsti kiñcit svātmālambanaṃ jñānamiti /
T07hvsatssu:19592: yogī cittavipaśyanāmanusarati atīte 'nāgate tu cittaṃ nāsti iti vacanāt /
T07hvsatssu:19594: no cet na jātu kaścitpratyutpannacittasamprayukta dharmaṃ vijānāti /
T07hvsatssu:19596: sarve dharmā anātmānaḥ prajñayā yadi paśyati /
T07hvsatssu:19597: atha nirvindate duḥkhe eṣa mārgo viśuddhaye // iti /
T07hvsatssu:19598: iyaṃ prajñā ātmānaṃ sahabhūdharmānanyāni sarvadharmālambanāni cāpanayati /
T07hvsatssu:19602: tasyāṃ hi gāthāyāmuktam- atha nirvindate duḥkha iti /
T07hvsatssu:19619: bhagavānāha- sādhu sādhu khalu bhikṣava iti /
T07hvsatssu:19622: vā bahirdhā vā audārikaṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā [hīnaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā] yaddūre 'ntike vā sarvaṃ
T07hvsatssu:19624: evaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyak prajñayā paśyati iti /
T07hvsatssu:19629: rūpamanityaṃ tucchaṃ māyāvat bālālāpanaṃ vadhakaṃ steyakamanātmā anātmīyamiti /
T07hvsatssu:19630: kiñcāha bhagavān- atra niṣaṇṇaḥ kaścinmūḍho 'vidyāṇḍagato 'vidyāndhībhūtaḥ parityajya buddhaśāsanamimāṃ mithyādṛṣṭimutpādayati- yadi rūpaṃ nātmā,
T07hvsatssu:19635: kathamanātmā karma kṛtvā ātmanā anubhavati iti /
T07hvsatssu:19637: sūtre ca anātmajñānaṃ sarvadharmanālambata iti vacanasthānaṃ na kiñcanāsti /
T07hvsatssu:19642: āha ca- daśa śūnyatāḥ sarvadharmālambanā iti /
T07hvsatssu:19648: sarve dharmā anātmāna ityuktatvāt jñātavyaṃ yat saṃskārā iti vacanaṃ tat saṃskṛtābhidhāyakam /
T07hvsatssu:19649: yat dharmā iti vacanaṃ tat sarvā[bhidhāyaka]miti /
T07hvsatssu:19650: āha ca- ka ekalakṣaṇadharmaṃ lakṣaṇāntaradharmañcābhimukhaṃ samprajānāti yathā vidyācakṣuṣā rūpaṃ (SSS_504) paśyati /
T07hvsatssu:19651: kevalaṃ buddhā bhagavantaḥ samyak sambuddhā vimuktilābhina ekalakṣaṇadharmaṃ lakṣaṇāntaradharmañcābhimukhaṃ samprajānanti yathā vidyācakṣuṣā rūpaṃ paśyanti iti /
T07hvsatssu:19656: sarvasaṅgrāhakamiti yathā bhagavānāha- aśaṃ sarvajña iti /
T07hvsatssu:19660: yathā ca tathāgatavarge uktam- tathāgataḥ sarvatyāgī sarvajayī iti /
T07hvsatssu:19670: bhikṣurayaṃ sāmānyena sarve dharmā anityā iti prajānātītyataḥ sarvajño bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:19694: ato jñāyate sarvamanātmeti vacane satyapi pañcopādānaskandhāna[bhisandhāya] uktaṃ,
T07hvsatssu:19703: (pṛ) laukikī śūnyatā sarvadharmānālambate na tu anāsravaśūnyatā /
T07hvsatssu:19706: (pṛ) uktaṃ hi dharmamudrāsūtre- śūnyatā laukikī śūnyateti /
T07hvsatssu:19707: (u) iyaṃ lokottaraśūnyatā na tu laukikī śūnyatā /
T07hvsatssu:19708: (pṛ) atroktaṃ jñānadarśanasyāviśuddhatvāt jñāyata iyaṃ laukikī śūnyateti /
T07hvsatssu:19711: paścānnirodhasatyaṃ dṛṣṭvā abhimānaṃ vihāya jñānadarśanaṃ viśuddhaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:19713: yadbhavānāha- sarve saṃskārā anityāḥ sarve dharmā anātmāna iti /
T07hvsatssu:19714: evaṃ hi syāt- yogī yadā nairātmyasaṃjñāsamanvitaḥ tadā dharmasaṃjñāsamanvitatvāt nairātmye dharma iti sa saṃjñocyate /
T07hvsatssu:19715: yathoktaṃ darśanavarge- yo duḥkhaṃ na paśyati,
T07hvsatssu:19721: ataḥ sarve dharmā anātmāna iti vacanaṃ duḥkhasatyamātramālambya anātmā saṃskāra ityabhidadhāti /
T07hvsatssu:19726: asti dvividho vihāraḥ śūnyavihāra anātmavihāra iti /
T07hvsatssu:19727: pañcaskandheṣu nāsti sattva iti darśanaṃ śūnyavihāraḥ /
T07hvsatssu:19730: uktaṃ hi sūtre- rūpaṃ niskhabhāvaṃ paśyati [yāvat] vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ niḥskhabhāvaṃ paśyatīti /
T07hvsatssu:19732: ato jñāyate rūpasvabhāvo na vastusan yāvadvedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānasvabhāvā na vastusanta iti /
T07hvsatssu:19733: api (SSS_506) coktaṃ sūtre- pañcaskandhāḥ śūnyā māyāvat iti /
T07hvsatssu:19740: ato jñāyate pañcaskandhā na vastusanta iti /
T07hvsatssu:19747: yathoktaṃ sūtre- mṛṣā nāma yat tucchakam /
T07hvsatssu:19749: nirodhaḥ sa niyataṃ yathābhūta ityataḥ paramārthasan iti /
T07hvsatssu:19750: (pṛ) yadbhavatoktaṃ pañcaskandheṣu nāsti sattva iti darśanaṃ [śūnyavihāra] iti /
T07hvsatssu:19754: sūtra uktam- yaḥ sattvaṃ paśyati sa pañcopādānaskandhān paśyati iti /
T07hvsatssu:19756: ato jñāyate anāsravān skandhānupādāyāpi sattva ityucyante /
T07hvsatssu:19765: yathoktaṃ sūtre- avidyānivṛtatṛṣṇāsaṃyojanayā pratibaddho mūḍha imaṃ kāyamanuprāpnoti /
T07hvsatssu:19770: (u) sarve skandhā upādānādutpannā ityata upādānaskandhā ityucyante /
T07hvsatssu:19773: skandhā upādānaskandhaiḥ sahopādānādutpannā ityata upādānaskandhā ityabhidhīyante /
T07hvsatssu:19779: uktaṃ hi sūtre- rūpaṃ paśyati śūnyamanātmā vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārān vijñānañca paśyati śūnyamanātmā iti /
T07hvsatssu:19787: (u) yogī sattvakāraṇe na sattvaṃ paśyatītyata eva śūnyacittamutpādya tataḥ śūnyaṃ paśyati /
T07hvsatssu:19788: pañcaskandhānāṃ nirodhe ca na paśyati rūpasvabhāvaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānasvabhāvam /
T07hvsatssu:19802: pañcavijñānasamprayuktā ca prajñā jñānameva ca darśanam /
T07hvsatssu:19809: uktañca sūtre- yat dharmeṣu dharmān parīttaṃ prajñayā vipaśyati /
T07hvsatssu:19813: prathamā cānāsravā prajñā prāthamikaṃ darśanaṃ kṣāntiḥ /
T07hvsatssu:19826: parīttavacane ca kevalamuktaṃ vipaśyanā kṣāntiriti na jñānam /
T07hvsatssu:19828: yadi manyase yogino jñānavata eva kṣāntirbhavatīti /
T07hvsatssu:19830: uktañca sūtre- [evaṃ] jānan paśyan āsravādvimucyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:19832: kiñca bhagavānāha- duḥkhajñānaṃ samudaya[jñānaṃ] nirodha[jñānaṃ] mārgajñānam iti /
T07hvsatssu:19835: bhagavān vimuktyarthamāha- yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīti jñānam iti /
T07hvsatssu:19839: na vayaṃ vadāmaḥ pūrvaṃ kṣāntiḥ paścāt jñānamiti /
T07hvsatssu:19854: na savikalpikeyaṃ kṣāntiḥ idaṃ jñānaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:19855: yathā laukikī vipaśyanā catussatyānusāriṇī kṣāntirityapyucyate jñānamityapyucyate /
T07hvsatssu:19859: (pṛ) sūtre hi pṛthugucyate samyagdṛṣṭiḥ samyak jñānamiti /
T07hvsatssu:19861: (u) tathā cet samyagdṛṣṭirna samyag jñānaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:19865: pañcāṅgadharmakāye prajñāskandhāt pṛthaguktaṃ vimuktijñānadarśanaṃ na prajñā bhavet /
T07hvsatssu:19866: tathā ca kṣayajñānamamutpādajñānamapi na prajñā bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:19868: yaduta sarvakleśānāṃ kṣayo 'rhataścitte samutpadyata ityata[stata] samyag jñānamityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:19888: prathamata ālambanagatatvāt na dṛṣṭiriti yadi matam /
T07hvsatssu:19891: bhavatāṃ hi śāsanaṃ cakṣurvijñānaṃ santānālambanaṃ yathā manovijñānamiti /
T07hvsatssu:19901: dṛṣṭiḥ jñānaṃ prajñā ityādi sarvaṃ nāsti /
T07hvsatssu:19908: (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ- santyaṣṭadṛṣṭayo yaduta pañcamithyādṛṣṭayo laukikī samyagdṛṣṭiḥ śaikṣadṛṣṭiraśaikṣadṛṣṭiḥ /
T07hvsatssu:19909: etā aṣṭadṛṣṭirvarjayitvā anyā prajñā na dṛṣṭirityucyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:19911: (u) jñānadarśanaṃ vimuktilābhaḥ pratisaṃvedanaṃ sākṣātkāra itīdaṃ sarvamekārthakam /
T07hvsatssu:19912: iyaṃ dṛṣṭiriyaṃ na dṛṣṭiriti yat vacanam /
T07hvsatssu:19914: (pṛ) uktaṃ nanu sūtre- jānan paśyan āsravādvimucyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:19916: (u) yat jñātvā ādau prajñaptiṃ vidārayati tat jñānamityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:19929: yathoktaṃ sūtre- rāhulo bhikṣurvimuktiprāpiṇīṃ prajñāṃ sampādayati iti /
T07hvsatssu:19930: vedādīn vyāvahārikagranthān śṛṇvannapi nānāsravāṃ prajñāmutpādayatītyato na [sā] śrutamayī prajñā bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:19931: yat sūtrāṇāmarthaṃ cintayati sā cintāmayī prajñā /
T07hvsatssu:19932: yathocyate- yogī dharmaṃ śrutvā tadarthagatiṃ cintayati /
T07hvsatssu:19934: api cāha- yogī dharmaṃ śrutvā tadarthaṃ cintayan sadā pratipadamanuvartata iti /
T07hvsatssu:19937: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yūyaṃ bhikṣavo dhyānasamādhiṃ bhāvayanto yathābhūtajñānadarśanamabhimukhaṃ labhadhve /
T07hvsatssu:19939: kiñcoktaṃ saptasamyagjñānasūtre- yat bhikṣu dharmaṃ prajānāti /
T07hvsatssu:19950: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- trīṇyāyudhāni śrutāyudhaṃ vivekāyudhaṃ prajñāyudhamiti /
T07hvsatssu:19983: api coktaṃ sūtre- bhagavān dharmamupadiśati ādau kalyāṇaṃ madhye kalyāṇamante kalyāṇamityādi /
T07hvsatssu:19984: taṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇoti satpuruṣastaruṇo vṛddho vā /
T07hvsatssu:19987: tadaiva bhogaskandhaṃ prahāya jñātiparivṛttaṃ prahāya agārādanāgāraṃ (SSS_512)
T07hvsatssu:19996: tatra yat dharmaṃ śṛṇoti taruṇo vā vṛddho vā iti /
T07hvsatssu:19998: śrutvā yat pratisañcikṣati- sambādho gṛhāvāso 'bhyavakāśā pravrajyeti /
T07hvsatssu:20011: tatra niṣevya santaṃ puruṣaṃ saddharmamupaśrutya cetīyaṃ śrutamayī prajñā /
T07hvsatssu:20019: evamādinā tatra tatra sūtre bhagavān trividhāṃ prajñāmavocat /
T07hvsatssu:20024: yathā hastaka upāsako 'tapyaddeveṣūpapadya tatra dharmaṃ deśayati /
T07hvsatssu:20031: (u) kena pratyayena kāmadhātau nāsti bhāvanāmayī prajñā /
T07hvsatssu:20032: (pṛ) na kāmadhātukamārgeṇa sarvāṇi nīvaraṇāni sarvāṇi paryavasthānāni prajahāti yena kāmadhātukaparyavasthānaṃ nābhimukhībhavet /
T07hvsatssu:20033: (u) bhavatāṃ śāsane nedaṃ vacanamasti yat na kāmadhātukamārgeṇa nīvaraṇāni paryavasthānāni prajahāti yena kāmadhātukaparyavasthānaṃ nābhimukhībhavediti
T07hvsatssu:20037: yathoktaṃ sūtre- aśubhabhāvanāṃ bhāvayan kāmarāgaṃ samūhanti iti /
T07hvsatssu:20043: (u) dauṣṭhulyādinā kleśān prajahāti nāśubhādinā iti nāsti kiñcana sūtravacanam /
T07hvsatssu:20044: uktaṃ hi sūtre- aśubhādinā kleśān samūhanti iti /
T07hvsatssu:20049: yadi nāsti, vaktavyaṃ kāraṇaṃ kasmādasti aśubhādiḥ,
T07hvsatssu:20053: atrāpi kāraṇaṃ vaktavyaṃ kasmāt kāmadhātau na samucchedayati /
T07hvsatssu:20058: yayoktaṃ sūtre- cittasamādhānaṃ mārgaḥ cittavikṣepo 'mārga iti /
T07hvsatssu:20071: (u) tīrthikāḥ prahīṇasaṃyojanā api punaḥ kāmadhātau samutpadyante /
T07hvsatssu:20076: api coktaṃ sūtre- kṣīṇatrisaṃyojanastrīṇi viṣāṇi samūhantīti /
T07hvsatssu:20077: prākṛto na trīṇi saṃyojanāni kṣapayatītyato na vītarāgo bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:20092: yathoktaṃ sūtre- dvāvimau bhikṣavaḥ aśanyā phalantyā na santrasataḥ /
T07hvsatssu:20093: [katamau dvau] bhikṣuśca kṣīṇāsravo rājā ca cakravartī iti /
T07hvsatssu:20103: vastutastu pṛthagjanasya vītarāga iti kathyamānasyāpi nedaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ syāt /
T07hvsatssu:20109: āha ca arāḍaḥ kalāma udrako rāmaputro rūpe vītarāga ārūpya utpadyata iti /
T07hvsatssu:20113: ato [yat]bhavatoktaṃ pṛthagjanaḥ kṣīṇakleśo 'pi punarutpadyata ityato na kṣīṇa[kleśa] iti /
T07hvsatssu:20115: bhavānapyāha- pṛthagjanasya sarvāṇi vidyamānāni prahīṇānīti idaṃ vastutaḥ pratiṣiddhamityataḥ kṣīṇo vīta ityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:20117: ahaṃ mameti yā cintā mriyamāṇo jahāti tām
T07hvsatssu:20121: yo bālaḥ svabhūmiṃ tyajati taṃ satkṛtavatāmapi nāsti mahāvipākaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:20125: ato jñāyate pṛthagjano vastutaḥ prahīṇa[kleśo] vīta[rāga] iti /
T07hvsatssu:20128: yadi satkāyadṛṣṭiṃ vyāvṛttavān tadā pūrvokto doṣaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:20133: ataḥ pṛthagjano na vastutaḥ prahīṇasaṃyojana iti jñāyate /
T07hvsatssu:20142: na tatrāsti kāraṇamāsannabhūmiṃ niśrayate na kāmadhātukasamādhimiti /
T07hvsatssu:20146: susīmasūtre coktam- pūrvaṃ khalu dharmasthitijñānaṃ pañcānnirvāṇajñānamiti /
T07hvsatssu:20148: kintu dharmasthitijñānamavaśyaṃ pūrvaṃ kṛtvā paścādāsravakṣayo bhavatīti /
T07hvsatssu:20165: uktañca sūtre- yogī śubhaṃ pratilabhamāno 'śubhaṃ tyajati tadyathā nandaḥ apsaratṛṣṇāmupādāya pūrvatanakāmaṃ jahau iti /
T07hvsatssu:20171: yadyāryaśrāvakaḥ kadācit pañcakāmaguṇā na prītisaumanasyajanakā ityanusmarati /
T07hvsatssu:20187: yadbhavatoktaṃ- śubhaṃ praṇītaṃ pramodamupaśamarasañca pratilabhamāna iti /
T07hvsatssu:20195: yathā sūtre bhagavānāha- bhikṣūṇāṃ cīvaraṃ gṛhṇatāṃ triṣu [kleśa] viṣeṣu satsvapi cīvarāsaṅgo niruddha eveti /
T07hvsatssu:20209: ataḥ satyadarśanamārge na laukikaṃ jñānaṃ bhāvayati /
T07hvsatssu:20216: yathoktaṃ sūtre- janapadaniruktau nābhiniveśeta yogī iti /
T07hvsatssu:20220: yathoktaṃ sūtre- santi catvāro bhāṣitadharmāḥ kiñcidbhāṣitaṃ sārthagati nākṣayakaram /
T07hvsatssu:20227: yathāha- santi catvāro bhāṣitadharmāḥ kaścidarthopāyaḥ na vyañjanopāyaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:20231: ya etaccatuḥpratisaṃvitprāptaḥ sa upāyasampanno duṣpradhṛṣyo duradhigamyo dharmabhāṣaṇe /
T07hvsatssu:20247: (pṛ) catasra imāḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ kasmin dhātau vartante /
T07hvsatssu:20260: yathā jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ yāvadavidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā iti /
T07hvsatssu:20261: asti vā tathāgato nāsti vā tathāgataḥ /
T07hvsatssu:20262: eṣāṃ svabhāvaḥ sadā sthita ityato dharmasthitijñānamityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:20268: yataḥ asti vā tathāgato nāsti vā tathāgataḥ /
T07hvsatssu:20285: api coktam- santi dvidhaiva dharmāḥ saṃskṛto 'saṃskṛta iti /
T07hvsatssu:20288: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- ye vidyante saṃskṛtā vā asaṃskṛtā vā nirodho nirvāṇaṃ teṣāmagramākhyāyate iti /
T07hvsatssu:20295: bhagavān bahudhātukasūtra āha- vidvān saṃskṛtadhātumasaṃskṛtādhātuñca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
T07hvsatssu:20299: sarveṣu sūtreṣu nāsti kiñcinniyataṃ vacanaṃ nirvāṇamasaddharma iti /
T07hvsatssu:20300: ato jñāyate yannirvāṇamasaditi tat bhavataḥ svasaṃjñāvikalpa eveti /
T07hvsatssu:20301: ucyate / yadi skandhānāṃ viyoge 'pi punarasti dharmāntaraṃ nirvāṇamiti /
T07hvsatssu:20308: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yogī rūpalakṣaṇaṃ prahīṇaṃ paśyati yāvaddharmalakṣaṇaṃ prahīṇaṃ paśyati iti /
T07hvsatssu:20309: sūtre ca tatra tatroktam- sarve dharmā anityāḥ sarve dharmā anātmānaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:20314: yadi nirvāṇaṃ dharmaḥ tadā nāsti svabhāva iti darśanaṃ nopalabdhuṃ śakyate /
T07hvsatssu:20318: ghaṭe vinaṣṭe tu ghaṭo vinaṣṭa iti vaktuṃ śakyate /
T07hvsatssu:20324: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yadidaṃ bhikṣavo duḥkhaṃ nirudhyate anyadduḥkhaṃ notpadyate na punastatsantatirasti /
T07hvsatssu:20325: idaṃ sthānaṃ paramaṃ śāntaṃ śiva yaduta (SSS_521)
T07hvsatssu:20328: anyaddaḥkhaṃ notpadyata iti vacane ko dharmo nirvāṇādanyo bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:20341: tathā no cet cīvarakṣayādirapi pṛthak dharmaḥ syāt /
T07hvsatssu:20349: yathā yatra yannāsti tatra tena śūnyamiti jñānam /
T07hvsatssu:20362: yena jñānena na raṇāyate pareṇa saha /
T07hvsatssu:20375: (pṛ) tathā cet bhagavato buddhasya kevalamidaṃ jñānaṃ syāt /
T07hvsatssu:20380: yat yogī prakṛṣṭamuttamaṃ jñānaṃ sarvadhyānasamādhibhiḥ paribhāvitaṃ parivardhitaṃ pratilabhya [sva]jīvitasya bṛddhau hrāse vaśitāṃ vindate
T07hvsatssu:20385: ṣaḍabhijñāḥ- kāyarddhiḥ dviyacakṣuḥ divyaśrotraṃ paracittajñānaṃ pūrvanivāsānusmṛtirāsravakṣaya[jñāna]miti /
T07hvsatssu:20408: kecidāhuḥ- prathamadhyānābhijñayā brahmalokaṃ gacchati yāvaccaturthadhyānābhijñayā rūpaparyantaṃ gacchatīti /
T07hvsatssu:20419: yathoktaṃ sūtre rūpe vā ārūpye vā pūrvatanīnamupapattyāyatanaṃ bhagavān sarvaṃ prajānāti /
T07hvsatssu:20425: (pṛ) sūtra uktam- ālokalakṣaṇaṃ bhāvayan jñānadarśanaṃ sādhayati iti /
T07hvsatssu:20437: (pṛ) divyacakṣuṣaḥ saṃsthānaṃ kiṃ mahat kiṃ vālpam /
T07hvsatssu:20455: yathā sāsraveṇa sāsravaṃ jānāti anāsraveṇa anāsravaṃ jānāti iti /
T07hvsatssu:20457: neme vadanti kāraṇaniyamam- anena kāraṇena sajātīyamevālambanaṃ jānātīti /
T07hvsatssu:20461: yathā kaścidavitarkasamādhimupasampannaḥ prajānāti asmāt samādhervyutthite evamevaṃ vitarko bhaviṣyatīti /
T07hvsatssu:20466: āha ca- pratyekabuddho mārgasatyadarśanagatatṛtīyacittaṃ jñāsyāmīti saptamaṃ cittameva paśyati /
T07hvsatssu:20477: devā api jānanti- ayamarhan yāvadayaṃ srotaāpattipratipannaka iti /
T07hvsatssu:20479: tadyathā bhagavati parinirvāṇābhimukhe sati anirūddho bhagavatopasampannān dhyānasamādhīn yathākramamajānīt /
T07hvsatssu:20507: yathā śāriputraḥ bhagavantaṃ pratyāha- ahamatītānāgatānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ cittamajānannapi teṣāṃ dharmaṃ jānāmīti /
T07hvsatssu:20508: śuddhāvāsā devāstathāgatacittaṃ jānantītyato bhagavantamupasampadyāhuḥ- atītatathāgatānāṃ bhagavan iryāpatho 'pyevamiti /
T07hvsatssu:20509: (pṛ) pūrvanivāsā[nusmṛti]vibhaṅge kasmāduktaṃ saha nimittena saha jātyeti /
T07hvsatssu:20510: (u) anusmṛtirviśadetyata evaṃ nimittasaṃjñāmavocat amukaḥ pudgalaḥ ityādi /
T07hvsatssu:20513: yathāhuḥ- idaṃ tava kulaṃ iyaṃ tava jātiriti /
T07hvsatssu:20514: jātiṃ nimittañca militvā vadatītyato jñānadarśanaṃ viśuddham /
T07hvsatssu:20526: asti hi pudgalasya aṣṭamahāsahasrakalpān jānato 'pi nāstīyaṃ cintāmayī prajñā /
T07hvsatssu:20536: sūtre kasmāduktam- ahamekanavatikalpānāgatya nāpaśyaṃ [kimapi] dānamapacīyamānaṃ vinā vipākena iti /
T07hvsatssu:20574: (u) uktameva pūrvaṃ dhyānasamādhīn gabhīraṃ bhāvayan ṛddhipādān sākṣātkarotīti /
T07hvsatssu:20578: yathoktaṃ sūtre- tathāgate loka utpanne supuruṣā dharmaṃ śrutvā pravrajitāḥ śīlaṃ
T07hvsatssu:20579: samādadānā apanītapañca nīvaraṇāḥ samādhiṃ bhāvayantaḥ satyaṃ paśyanti ityādi sarvamāsravakṣayasyopāyāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:20580: kecidāhuḥ- dānādayaḥ kuśaladharmā api āsravakṣayasya nidānāni /
T07hvsatssu:20581: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yogino dānaṃ kṣīṇāsravaśūnyānātmajñānaṃ sādhayatīti /
T07hvsatssu:20599: yathā paśyāmaḥ stanyaṃ śuṣyat punaḥ prasravati /
T07hvsatssu:20600: asti kaścit kālaḥ [yadā] stanyaṃ pratiruddhapayaḥprasūti bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:20603: yathā ca tapte 'yasi kṛṣṇalakṣaṇaṃ niruddhaṃ punarutpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:20607: yasmin samaye nimittāni niruddhāni na punarutpadyante /
T07hvsatssu:20613: yadi kiścit cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā mithyāmanaskāreṇa mithyā vikalpayati /
T07hvsatssu:20616: (u) yadyogī pañcasu skandheṣu prajñaptaṃ sattvaṃ na paśyati /
T07hvsatssu:20626: teṣu dharmeṣu virajo dharmacakṣuḥ pratilabhata iti /
T07hvsatssu:20631: prākṛtā ajñā vadanti- te vastusanta iti /
T07hvsatssu:20632: śaikṣāḥ punaḥ prajānanti- te tucchā riktā māyāvaditi /
T07hvsatssu:20634: ato jñāyate yayā prajñayā dharmāṇāṃ nirodhaṃ sākṣātkaroti iyamāsravakṣayajñānasākṣātkriyābhijñeti //
T07hvsatssu:20637: (pṛ) sūtra uktam- yo yogī saptabhirupāyaistribhirarthāvalokanaiḥ samanvitaḥ so 'smin dharme kṣipramāsravakṣayamanuprāpnotīti /
T07hvsatssu:20639: (u) saptopāyā nāma śrutamayī prajñā cintāmayī prajñā ca /
T07hvsatssu:20642: ayaṃ rūpasamudayaḥ ayaṃ rūpanirodhaḥ iyaṃ rūpanirodhagāminī pratipat,
T07hvsatssu:20647: (u) yadyapīyaṃ śrutamayī cintāmayī prajñā tathāpyevaṃ pañcaskandhān vikalpayan ātmamatiṃ vibhedayati /
T07hvsatssu:20649: trividhāvalokanajñānaṃ yaduta saṃskārā anityā duḥkhā anātmāna iti /
T07hvsatssu:20650: skandhadhātvāyatanamukhena saṃskārān paśyato nāstyartho hitaṃ vā /
T07hvsatssu:20651: (pṛ) tathā cet pūrvamādīnava uktameva- anityā duḥkhā iti /
T07hvsatssu:20654: (u) trividhāḥ śikṣate- pūrvaṃ śrutamayīṃ cintāmayīṃ prajñām /
T07hvsatssu:20656: pūrvaṃ śrutamayyāṃ cintāmayyāṃ prajñāyāmuktāḥ sapta prakārāḥ /
T07hvsatssu:20667: (pṛ) yogino 'pi buddhe dharme saṅghe śīladiṣu kṣāntirasti /
T07hvsatssu:20673: pūrvaṃ hi mārgānukūlāṃ cintāmayīṃ prajñāṃ prayujya paścātpratyakṣajñānamanuprāpnoti /
T07hvsatssu:20674: yathā hastipakaḥ pūrvaṃ hastipadaṃ dṛṣṭvā tena jñānena prajānāti- atra vartata iti /
T07hvsatssu:20676: tathā yogyapi pūrvaṃ kṣāntyānvayajñāne na nirvāṇamabhyūhya paścāt tena jñānenābhimukhīkaroti /
T07hvsatssu:20677: ataḥ sūtra uktam- [evaṃ] jānan[evaṃ] paśyan āsravakṣayamanuprāpnotīti //
T07hvsatssu:20680: (pṛ) kecidābhidharmikā vadanti arhan kṣayajñānaṃ sākṣātkurvan sāṃvṛtāni nava jñānāni
T07hvsatssu:20693: (pṛ) yo vītarāgaḥ san na prathamadhyānasamāpattiṃ nādyāpi pratyakṣīkṛtavān /
T07hvsatssu:20695: (u) sūtre tūktam- asminnantarāle samāpadya paścāttāṃ samutpādayediti /
T07hvsatssu:20697: (pṛ) yadi (SSS_530) rāgādvirajyamānasyātītānāgatāni sarvāṇi dhyānāni mūlataḥ prāpnāni /
T07hvsatssu:20699: (u) anāgataṃ karma akṛtamabhūtaṃ na vipākaṃ prāpayati /
T07hvsatssu:20700: atītāni dhyānāni citta utpannacarāṇi yadi vipākaṃ prayacchanti /
T07hvsatssu:20713: tadānāgate 'dhvani samy dṛṣṭiṃ prāpnoti kaścidārūpyasamādhiṃ niśrityārhatphalaṃ prāpnoti /
T07hvsatssu:20714: ayamanāgate samyaksaṅkalpaṃ samyagvācaṃ samyakkarmāntaṃ samyagājīvaṃ prāpnoti /
T07hvsatssu:20719: yadi ca nāsti anāgata[dharmaḥ] kathaṃ bhāvako phalāni dhyānasamādhyādīnanuprāpsyati /
T07hvsatssu:20722: tathā no cet phalāni gaṇayitvā gaṇayitvānuprāpnuyāt /
T07hvsatssu:20726: ucyate / yat bhavatoktam- aṅgaiḥ samanvita iti /
T07hvsatssu:20733: yathā manuṣyajātiḥ prāptetyato manuṣyalakṣaṇaṃ prāptaṃ bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:20736: (pṛ) yogino vidyamānaduḥkhādīnāṃ jñānāni kramikāṇīti sarvaṃ parihṛtameva /
T07hvsatssu:20741: tadā prāptiḥ prayoga iti nāsti bhedaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:20750: yathā samāpattapañcaśīlaḥ punaḥ pravrajyāsaṃvaramanuprāpnuvannapi na maulikaśīlebhyaḥ parihīyate /
T07hvsatssu:20752: yathā kaścidādau vastu jānannapi viśiṣṭavastu[darśanāya yatata] iti pravibhāgo 'sti /
T07hvsatssu:20758: (pṛ) imāni laukikajñānāni kṣayajñānena sahārhataḥ samādhisamāpattivyutthānacittakriyāṃ prāpayanti /
T07hvsatssu:20762: tathā no cet na navajñānāni prāpnuyāt /
T07hvsatssu:20763: uktañca- anāgatabhāvanāyā nāsti hetuḥ pratyayo vā iti /
T07hvsatssu:20765: ete hi vadanti- satyadarśanamārge kevalaṃ nimittābhāsaṃ jñānaṃ bhāvayati /
T07hvsatssu:20772: śraddhāvibhukto darśanaprāptatvena parivartamānaḥ sarvasminnānantaryavimuktimārge na sāṃvṛtaṃ mārgaṃ bhāvayati /
T07hvsatssu:20773: samayavimuktaḥ akopyavimuktatayā parivartamāno navānantarya[mārgeṣu] aṣṭavimokṣamārgeṣu saṃvṛtaṃ mārgaṃ na bhāvayati /
T07hvsatssu:20777: ato bhavān yadi vā samyagdyetuṃ brūyāt yadi vā śraddhāpayet /
T07hvsatssu:20779: ūṣma[gatā]diṣu sthitikāle uttamāni sarvāṇi kuśalamūlāni bhāvayati /
T07hvsatssu:20782: ata ūṣmagatādidharmakālāt yāvat kṣayajñānaṃ sarveṣāṃ bhāvanā bhavati /
T07hvsatssu:20791: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bhagavānānandamāmantryāha- asmin dharme evaṃ jñānena dṛṣṭvā evaṃ pratibudhyasva /
T07hvsatssu:20795: yathoktaṃ sūtre- bālaḥ pratyutpannaṃ dharmaṃ bahumanyate /
T07hvsatssu:20797: kiñcāha- pratyutpannāḥ kāmā anāgatāḥ kāmāśca mārasenā māradheyā mārabandhanā ityādau sarvatrocyate pratyutpannavādaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:20810: dharmajñānamanvayajñānaṃ paracittajñānaṃ duḥkhajñānaṃ samudayajñānaṃ nirodhajñānaṃ mārgajñānañca sarvaṃ sāsravamanāsravamasti /
T07hvsatssu:20811: imāni jñānāni ūṣmagatādidharmeṣu sāsravāṇi niyāmāvakrāntiprāpyāṇi anāsravāṇi /
T07hvsatssu:20817: saṃskārāṇāṃ hetau yadanāsravaṃ jñānaṃ rūpārūpyasampratiyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ nirodhe yadanāsravaṃ jñānaṃ rūpārūpyasampratiyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ prahāṇāya mārge yadanāsravaṃ jñānam,
T07hvsatssu:20820: (u) uktaṃ hi sūtre- bhagavānānandamāmantryāha- atītae 'nāgate caivaṃ prajānīhīti /
T07hvsatssu:20822: kiñcoktaṃ sūtre- yogī anusmaret- ahamidānīṃ dṛṣṭarūpeṇopadruto bhavāmi /
T07hvsatssu:20828: pratyakṣamālokya ca janma duḥkhaṃ duḥkhaṃ tathātītamapīti viddhi /
T07hvsatssu:20829: yathā ca tat duḥkhamidañca duḥkhaṃ tathānāgatamapyavehi /
T07hvsatssu:20830: [bījasvabhāvo hi yatheha dṛṣṭo bhūto 'pi bhavyo 'pi tathānumeyaḥ /]
T07hvsatssu:20831: patyakṣataśca jvalano yathoṣṇo bhūto 'pi bhavyo 'pi tathoṣṇa eva // iti /
T07hvsatssu:20836: yogī hi atīte 'nāgāmini pratyutpanne ca duḥkhe nirvidyate /
T07hvsatssu:20847: tadarthameva ābhidharmikā āhuḥ- asti prāptiraprāptirityato 'nupūrveṇa satyaṃ paśyatīti /
T07hvsatssu:20850: ata ekasmin samaya ubhayajñānaṃ na sambhavati /
T07hvsatssu:20859: yogī anityaṃ duḥkhamiti paśyan śūnyamanātmeti paśyati /
T07hvsatssu:20866: yathoktam- adhyātmavimuktatvāt tṛṣṇāyāḥ kṣaye nirodhe svata evārhan prāpta ityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:20868: (pṛ) nanu sūtre kiṃ noktaṃ sarvasaṃskārāṇāṃ prahāṇaṃ prahāṇalakṣaṇamiti /
T07hvsatssu:20869: (u) ayaṃ yogī adhyātmanirodhaṃ sākṣātkṛrvan sarvatra nirviṇṇaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:20876: (u) evaṃ darśane sati skandhānāmanityatādidoṣamapi dṛṣṭvā duḥkhanātmasaṃjñāṃ janayati /
T07hvsatssu:20882: ātmana utpādo vyayaḥ syādityato jñāyate anātmeti /
T07hvsatssu:20887: evaṃ yoginaḥ samyak anityamanātma ca bhāvayataḥ kāyacittamupaśāmyati /
T07hvsatssu:20888: sarvasaṃskāreṣu samutpanneṣu teṣāṃ vihiṃsāmanubhavato duḥkhasaṃjñā samutpadyate /
T07hvsatssu:20891: mūḍhastu ātmasaṃjñāvaśātsatyapi mahati duḥkhe na tadupāyāsamanubhavati /
T07hvsatssu:20902: yathoktaṃ sūtre- abhūtanimittamidamabhūtaṃ saṃjñāmātramiti prajānato duḥkhāni kṣīyanta iti /
T07hvsatssu:20906: yathoktaṃ sūtre- kaścidarhan tathāgatasya purato vyākaroti- bhagavatā deśitāni na santi mama /
T07hvsatssu:20908: sadā mama samāhitaikāgrasya samyak caryāmanusmarataḥ kāmādīnyakuśalāni na cittasyāsravā bhavanti iti /
T07hvsatssu:20913: yathā sthāṇuṃ dṛṣṭvā ayaṃ puruṣa iti saṃśerate /
T07hvsatssu:20915: sadā animittavihāricittatvāt pūrvaṃ sattvaśūnyatāṃ dṛṣṭvā pañcasu skandheṣu na paśyatyātmānam /
T07hvsatssu:20927: yathā kaścit tatra tatra pratibaddha ekasmānmukto 'pi na vimukta ityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:20935: kṛtaṃ karaṇīyamiti karaṇīyāni sarvāṇi kṛtvā prajānāti- asmādbhavāt nāsti bhavāntaramiti /
T07hvsatssu:20936: ato jñāyate arhanneva sarveṣu karaṇīyeṣu vaśitāṃ prāptaḥ kṣayajñānenānutpādajñānena ca samanvitaḥ syāt, (SSS_536)
T07hvsatssu:20941: jitvā mṛtyorhi senāñca viharāmi anāsravaḥ // iti /
T07hvsatssu:20947: (pṛ) kecidāhuḥ- sarve sattvāḥ samaṃ jñānasamanvitā iti /
T07hvsatssu:20949: (u) yo jinauraso jānāti dharmāḥ pratītyasamutpannā iti /
T07hvsatssu:20957: (pṛ) sūtra uktam- catuścattvāriṃśat jñānāni yaduta jarāmaraṇe jñānaṃ,
T07hvsatssu:20968: yathoktaṃ sūtre- [tadyathā] nagarasvāmī nagare niṣaṇṇaḥ syāt /
T07hvsatssu:20969: [tatra] kiñcit dūtayugamekasmāt dvārādāgatyopasṛtya nagarasvāmino yathābhūtaṃ vacanaṃ niryātya [yathāgatamārgaṃ] pratipadyeta /
T07hvsatssu:20976: dūtā nānādvārebhya āgatā api ekameva sthānamupasarpanti /
T07hvsatssu:20978: yathā rāhula ekānte niṣaṇṇo dharmaṃ cintayan evaṃ prajānāti- īdṛśo dharma parikīrtitaṃ nirvāṇaṃ prati anuprayātīti /
T07hvsatssu:20979: kiñca bhagavān dharmasyāniśaṃsāyāmāha- dharmo 'yaṃ sarvān kleśāgnīna nirodhayatīti nirodha ityucyate /
T07hvsatssu:20987: ato jñāyate pañcaskandhādayo dvārāṇi nirvāṇaparāyaṇāni bhavanti /
T07hvsatssu:20996: (pṛ) ucyate ca jarāmaraṇasamudayaḥ jarāmaraṇanirodho jarāmaraṇanirodhamārga ityādi /
T07hvsatssu:21008: (pṛ) sūtra uktam- saptasaptatijñānāni yaduta jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇamiti [jñānam] /
T07hvsatssu:21017: tatra kasmānnoktaṃ- jarāmaraṇasya svabhāvo nirodho mārga ityādi /
T07hvsatssu:21020: tīrthikā bahavo nidāne bhrāntā vadanti- laukikānāṃ padārthānāṃ heturlokātmaka ityādi /
T07hvsatssu:21031: (u) pratyutpannamatītādhvanaḥ kadācidbhinnadharma bhavati yadutātītānāṃ sattvānāmāyurapramāṇaṃ prabhāvaśca devatulya ityevamādi /
T07hvsatssu:21032: āyurādi bhinnaṃ jarāmaraṇapratyayo 'pi bhinno bhavediti janā vadeyuriti bhītyā niyama ucyate /
T07hvsatssu:21040: kasmāt tatra rūpasya svarūpaṃ nirodhaḥ vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasya ca svarūpaṃ nirodhaḥ /
T07hvsatssu:21042: yathoktaṃ sūtre- yo bhikṣavaḥ saptabhiḥ sthānopāyaiḥ tribhirvipaśyanārthaiśca samanvitaḥ sa kṣipramāsravāṇāṃ kṣayamanuprāpnoti /
T07hvsatssu:21059: kāmarāgasya mithyāvitarkaḥ pratyayaḥ ityevamādipratyayānāṃ jñānamapramāṇamanavadhi svayamevonnetavyam //
